GS24jvkasipu:17: a i u ityanena krameṇa varṇān-upadiśyānte ṇakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhārārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:22: teṣāṃ sāvarṇya-prasiddhy-artham akāra iha śāstre vivṛtaḥ pratijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26: ṛ ḷ ity etau varṇāv updiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante kakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:33: akāra-ādayo varṇāḥ pracura-prayoga-viṣayāsteṣāṃ sujñānam upadeśe prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:37: tasya-asiddhatvād ṛkāra eva ackāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti iti kim-artham ḷkāra upadiśyate?
GS24jvkasipu:38: latva-vidhānād yāni parāṇy ackāryāṇi tāni ḷkāre yathā syur iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47: ṛtakaḥ iti prayoktavye śakti-vaikalyāt kumārī ḷtakaḥ iti prayuṅkte,
GS24jvkasipu:50: e o ity etau varṇāv upadiśya ante ṅkāramitam karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:56: ai au ity etau varṇāv upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante cakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:68: varṇeṣu ye varṇa-ikadeśā varṇa-antara-samāna-akṛtayasteṣu tat-kāryaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:69: tac-chāyāmukāriṇo hi te na punas ta eva /
GS24jvkasipu:79: ha ya va ra ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ṭakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:83: tasya yar-grahaṇena yay-grahaṇena ca grahaṇe sati,
GS24jvkasipu:88: bhadra-hrada ity atra dvirvacanaṃ prāpnoti aco ra-hā-bhyāṃ dve (*8,4.46) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:90: vanaṃ rathena ity atra anusvārasya yayi parasavarṇaḥ(*8,4.58)
GS24jvkasipu:93: ākṛtau pada-arthe samudāye sakṛl-lakṣye lakṣaṇaṃ pravartate ity etasmin darśane yaro 'nunasike 'nunāsiko vā (*8,4.45)
GS24jvkasipu:94: antaratamo bhavati ity evam etat pravarttate /
GS24jvkasipu:95: tad-anena gakāra-ādīnāṃ ṅakārā-adayo ye yathā-svaṃ sthānato guṇataś ca ataratamāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:99: sthāna-mātreṇa guṇa-mātreṇa vā antaratamās te sarve nivartitāḥ iti sthāna-mātra-antaratamo rephasya ṇakāro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:100: dvirvacane 'pi rephasya yar-antarbhāve sati yarkāryaṃ prāptam,
GS24jvkasipu:101: tat sākṣāc-chiṣṭena nimitta-bhāvena bādhyate iti na dvirucyate rephaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:103: ity etad apy anusvāra-antaratamaṃ sakṛdeva parasavarṇaṃ vidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:104: na ca rephasya anusvāra-antaratamaḥ savarṇo 'sti iti na bhaviṣyati kuṇḍaṃ rathena,
GS24jvkasipu:106: aṭāṃ madye visarjanīya-jihvāmūlīya-upadhmānīyānām apy upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:110: atra aḍ-vyavāye iti ṇatvaṃ yathā syāt iti // [#4]
GS24jvkasipu:113: la ity ekaṃ varṇam upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ṇakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:123: atha kim artham ajgrahaṇam eva-itan-na kriyate?
GS24jvkasipu:125: antaḥ-sthānām api hi savarṇānāṃ grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:134: lokam ity atra anusvārasya anunāsike yayi parasavarṇe kṛte tasya yar-grahaṇena grahaṇād dvirvacanaṃ yathā syād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:139: ity atra ra iti pratyāhāra-grahaṇāl-laparatvam api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:141: ña ma ṅa ṇa na ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante makāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:150: kecit-tu sarvāṇy-etāni pratyāhāra-grahaṇāni ñakāreṇa bhavantu iti makāram anubandhaṃ pratyācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:151: tathā ca sati ṅamo hrasva-adaci ṅamuṇ nityam(*8,3.32)
GS24jvkasipu:152: ity atra-āgaminoḥ jhabhor abhāvād-āgamābhāva-pratipattau pratipatti-gauravaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:154: jha bha ity etau varṇāv-upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ñakārāmitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:159: gha ḍha dha ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ṣakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:164: ja ba ga ḍa da ś /
GS24jvkasipu:165: ja ba ga ḍa da ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante śakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:176: kha pha dha ḍha tha ca ṭa ta v /
GS24jvkasipu:177: kha pha dha ḍha tha ca ṭa ta ity etān varṇān upadiśyānte vakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:183: ka pa ity etau varṇāv upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante yakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:194: śa ṣa sa ity enān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante rephamitam karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:206: ha ity ekaṃ varṇam upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante lakāramitam karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:220: atha kim artham upadiṣṭo 'pi hakāraḥ punar upadiśyate?
GS24jvkasipu:221: kittva vikalpa-kṣa- iḍvidhayo yathā syuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:222: snihitvā, snehitvā ity atra ralo v-y-upadhād-dhal-ādeḥ saṃś-ca (*1,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:224: liheḥ alikṣat iti śala ig-upadhād aniṭaḥ kṣaḥ (*3,1.45)
GS24jvkasipu:227: rudihi, svapihi iti valādi-lakṣaṇa iḍ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:229: jhalgrahaṇeṣu ca hakārasya grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:230: yady evam, ha ya va ra ḍ ity atra tarhi kim artham upadiśyat?
GS24jvkasipu:232: devā hasanti ity atra aḍ-grahaṇeṣu ca aś-grahaṇeṣuca hakārasya grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:235: ekasmān ṅañaṇAvaṭā dvābhāṃ ṣastribhya eva kaṇamāḥ syuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:236: jñeyau cayau caturbhyo raḥ pañcabhyaḥ śalau ṣaḍbhyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:245: taparakaraṇam aij-artham tād-api paraḥ taparaḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:275: vṛddhi-guṇau svasañjñayā śiṣyamāṇau ikaḥ eva sthāne veditavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:309: tasya lopo yasminn ārdhadhātuke tad-ārdhadhātukaṃ dhātu-lopaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:315: lolūya-ādibhyo yaṅantebhyaḥ paca-ādy-aci vihite yaṅo 'ci ca (*2,4.74)
GS24jvkasipu:316: iti yaṅo luki kṛte tam eva acam āśritya ye guṇa-vṛddhī prāpte tayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:353: acinavam, asunavam ity ādau lakārasya saty api ṅittve yāsuṭo ṅid-vacanaṃ jñāpakam ṅiti yat-kāryaṃ tal-lakāre ṅiti na bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:358: dīdhī-vevyoḥ iṭaś ca ye guṇa-vṛddhī prāpnutaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:364: vṛddhir iṭo na saṃbhavati iti laghu-upadha-guṇasya-atra pratiṣedhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:368: bhinna-jātīyair ajbhir avyavahitaḥ śliṣṭa-uccāritā halaḥ saṃyoga-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:371: tena dvayor bahūnāṃ ca saṃyogasañjñā siddhā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:384: pacati panasam - skoḥ saṃyoga-ādyor ante ca (*8,2.29)
GS24jvkasipu:392: tayā ya uccāryate varṇaḥ so 'nunāsika-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:409: tulya āsye prayatno yasya varṇasya yena varṇena saha sa samānajātīyaṃ prati savarṇasañjño bhavati / [#9]
GS24jvkasipu:411: catvāra ābhyantarāḥ prayatnāḥ savarṇasaṃ jñāyām āśrīyante -- spṛṣṭatā,
GS24jvkasipu:415: a a a iti trayo 'kārā udātta-anudātta-svaritāḥ pratyekaṃ sānunāsikā niranunāsikāś ca hrasva-dīrgha-pluta-bhedād aṣṭādaśa dhā bhidyante /
GS24jvkasipu:432: tarptum ity atra jharo jhari savarṇe (*8,4.65)
GS24jvkasipu:436: kiṃ ca syāt ? aruścyotati ity atra jharo jhari savarṇe (*8,4.65)
GS24jvkasipu:441: ubhayoḥ ṛvarṇasya ḷvarṇasya ca āntaratamaḥ savarṇo dīrgho nāsti iti rkāra eva dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:448: tulya-āsya-prayatnāv api aj-jhalau parasparaṃ savarṇasañjñau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:459: īt ūt et ity evam-antaṃ dvivacanaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ pragrhya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:481: adasaḥ sambadhī yo makāras-tasmāt pare īd-ūdetaḥ pragrhya-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:504: chāndasam etad eva-ikam udāharaṇam - asme indrā-bṛhaspatī iti /
GS24jvkasipu:506: itarat tu laukikam anukaraṇam - yuśme iti,
GS24jvkasipu:513: nipāto ya ekāc āṅ-varjitaḥ sa pragṛhya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:533: odanto yo nipātaḥ sa pragṛhya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:540: sambuddhi-nimitto ya okāraḥ sa śākalyasya ācāryasay matena pnagṛhya-sañjño bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:556: uñaḥ pragṛhya-sañjñā bhavati itau śākalyasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:563: uñaḥ itāv-anārṣe ūṃ ity ayam-ādeśo bhavati dīrgho 'nunāsikaśca,
GS24jvkasipu:565: śākalyasya grahaṇaṃ vibhāṣā-artham iha apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:566: tena trīṇi rūpāṇi bhavanti - u iti, viti, ūṃ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:571: īdantam ūdantaṃ ca śabda-rūpaṃ saptamy-arthe vartamānaṃ pragṛhya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:591: vacanādy-atra dīrghatvaṃ tatra api sarasī yadi /
GS24jvkasipu:592: jñāpakaṃ syāt tad-antatve mā vā pūrvapadasya bhūt //2 //
GS24jvkasipu:597: dhā-rūpau ca dvau dābdaipau varjayitvā ghu-sañjñakā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:612: asahāyasay ādyanta-upadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi na sidhyanti iti ayam-atideśa ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:614: ādāv-iva ante iva ekasminn-api kāryaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:615: yathā kartavyam ity atra pratyaya-ādy-udāttatvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:616: evam aupagavam ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:617: yathā vṛkṣābhyām ity atra ato 'ṅgasya dīrghatvam evam ābhyām,
GS24jvkasipu:625: tarap tamap ity etau pratyayau gha-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:635: bahu gaṇa vatu ity eta saṅkhyā-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:652: bahu-gaṇa-śabdayor vaipulye saṅghe ca vartamānayor iha grahaṇaṃ nāsti,
GS24jvkasipu:656: ardha-pūrva-padaśca pūraṇa-pratyayāntaḥ saṅkhyā-sañjño bhavati iti vaktavyaṃ samāsakan vidhy-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:658: ardhaṃ pañcamaṃ yeśām iti bahuvrīhau kṛte ardha-pañcamaiḥ śūrpaiḥ krītaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:661: ity anuvṛttes tataḥ saṅkhyā-pūrvasya dvigu-sañjñāyāṃ śūrpād añ anyatarasyām (*5,1.26)
GS24jvkasipu:673: ṣa-kārāntā na-kārāntā ca yā saṅkhyā sā ṣaṭ-sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:688: ḍatyantā yā saṅkhyā sā ṣaṭ-sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:694: ktaś ca ktavatuś ca kta-ktavatū pratyayau niśṭhā-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:706: sarva-śabdaḥ ādir yeṣāṃ tāni-imāni sarva-adīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:722: ubha-śabdasya sarvanāmatve prayojanam-- sarvanāmnas-tṛtīya ca (*2,3.27) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:744: tva tvat iti dvāv api ca anudātāu iti smaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:774: tasmin nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte vibhā-ṣeyam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:776: dig-upadiṣṭe samāse bahuvrīhau vibhāṣā sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:786: dig-grahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe jñāyate dig-upadiṣṭa-samāse vibhāṣā,
GS24jvkasipu:802: sarvanāma-sañjñāyāṃ tad-anta-vidher abhyupagamād bahuvrīher api sarva-ādy-antasay sañjñā syāt iti pratiṣedha ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:803: bahuvrīhau samāse sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:810: bahuvrīhau iti vartamāne punar-bahuvrīhi-grahaṇaṃ bhūta-pūrvamātre 'pi pratiṣedho yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:820: samāse iti vartamāne punaḥ sammasagrahaṇaṃ tṛtīyā-samāsa-artha-vākye 'pi pratiṣedho yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:832: dvandve ca samāse sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:838: pūrveṇa nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte jasi vibhāṣā ārabyate /
GS24jvkasipu:839: dvandve samāse jasi vibhāṣā sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:851: prathama carama taya alpa ardha katipaya nema ity ete jasi vibhāṣā sarvanāma-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:864: ubhaya-śabdasya tayap-pratyaya-antasya gane pāṭhān nityā sarvanāma-sañjñā iha api jaskāryaṃ prati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:869: pūrva para avara dakṣiṇa uttara apara adhara ity-eṣāṃ gaṇe pāṭhāt pūrveṇa nityāyāṃ sarvanāma-sañjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ jasi vibhāṣā ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:870: pūrvādīni vibhaṣā jasi sarvanāma-sañjñāni bhavanti vyavasthāyām asañjñāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:884: satyām eva vyavasthāyām iyaṃ teṣāṃ sañjñā //
GS24jvkasipu:888: atra api nityā sarvanāma-sañjñā prāptā jasi vibhāṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:889: svam ity etac-chabda-rūpaṃ jasi vibhāṣā sarvanāma-sañjñaṃ bhavati ,
GS24jvkasipu:895: dhūmāyanta iva aśliṣṭāḥ prajvalanti iva saṃhatāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:896: ulmukāni iva me 'mī svā jñātayo bharatar ṣabha //
GS24jvkasipu:904: atra api pūrveṇa nityā sarvanāma-sañjñā prāptā sā jasi vibhāṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:905: antaram ity etac-chabda-rūpaṃ vibhāṣā jasi sarvanāma-sañjñaṃ bhavati bahiryoge upasaṃvyāne ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:921: vibhāṣā-prakaraṇe tīyasya vā ṅitsu sarvanāma-sañjñā ity upasaṃkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:1020: sadṛśaṃ triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:1021: vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yanna vyeti tad-avyayam //
GS24jvkasipu:1041: ej-antaś ca tad-antaṃ śabda-rūpam avyaya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1050: iti se-pratyaye kutve ṣatve ca kṛte rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:1051: eṣe iti iṇaḥ se-pratyaye guṇe ṣatve ca kṛte rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:1052: jīvase iti jīveḥ ase pratyaye rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:1053: dṛśe iti dṛśeḥ ken-pratyayo nipātyate - dṛśe vikhye ca (*3,4.11) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1062: ity evam antaṃ śabda-rūpam avyaya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1068: iti iṇaḥ, kṛñaś ca tosun pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1090: tatra avyayībhāvasya avyayatve ataḥ kṛ-kami-kaṃsa-kumbha-pātra-kuśā-karṇī-ṣv anavyayasya (*8,3.46)
GS24jvkasipu:1092: sarvam idaṃ kāṇḍaṃ svara-adāv api paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1096: purā krūrasya visṛpo virapśin iti na la-u-uka-avyaya-niṣṭhā-khal-artha-tṛnām (*2,3.69)
GS24jvkasipu:1116: suṭ iti pañca vacanāni sarvanāma-sthāna-sañjñāni bhavanti napuṃsakād anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:1119: tena jasaḥ śeḥ sarvanāma-sthāna-sañjñā pūrveṇa bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:1130: tayoḥ pratiṣedha-vikalpayoḥ vibhāṣā iti sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1133: tatra pratiṣedhena samīkṛte viṣaye paścād vikalpaḥ pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:1143: ik yo yaṇaḥ sthāne bhūto bhāvī vā tasya saṃprasāraṇam ity eṣā sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1147: kecid ubhayathā sūtram idaṃ vyācakṣate vākya-arthaḥ sañjñī,
GS24jvkasipu:1149: ig-yaṇaḥ yo vākya-arthaḥ sthāny-ādeśa-sambandha-lakṣaṇaḥ sa samprasāraṇa-sañjño bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1150: yaṇ-sthānika ig-varṇaḥ sa samprasāraṇa-sañjño bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1151: tatra vidhau vākya-artha upatiṣṭhate ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ putra-patyos tatpuruṣe (*6,1.13)
GS24jvkasipu:1155: saṅkhyāta-anudeśād iha na bhavati - adhitarām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1172: acāṃ saṃniviṣṭānām antyād acaḥ paro mit bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1185: eco hrasva-ādeśe kartavye ik eva hrasvo bhavati, na anyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1196: iha śāstre yā ṣaṣṭhī aniyata-yogā śrūyate,
GS24jvkasipu:1201: yathā-darbhāṇāṃ sthāne śaraiḥ prastaritavyam iti darbhāṇāṃ prasaṅge iti gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1202: evam iha api asteḥ sthāne prasaṅge bhūr bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1210: prasaṅge sambandhasya nimitta-bhūte bruva iti ṣasṭhī / [#21]
GS24jvkasipu:1213: tatra yāvantaḥ śabde sambhavanti teṣu sarveṣu prapteṣu niyamaḥ kriyate ṣaṣṭhī sthāne-yogā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1215: ata eva nipātanāc ca saptamyā aluk //
GS24jvkasipu:1217: sthāne prāpyamāṇānām antaratam ādeśo bhavati sadṛśatamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1223: dvayor akārayoḥ kaṇṭhya eva dīrgha a-akāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1224: arthataḥ - vataṇḍī ca asau yuvatiś ca vātaṇḍya-yuvatiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1230: iti ca-kārasya alpa-prāṇasya aghoṣasya tādṛśa eva ka-kāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1237: sthāne iti vartamāne punaḥ sthāne grahaṇaṃ kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:1238: yatra anekam āntaryaṃ sambhavati tatra sthānata eva āntaryaṃ balīyo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1247: iti ha-kārasya pūrva-savarṇe kriyamāṇe soṣmaṇaḥ soṣmāṇaḥ iti dvitīyāḥ prasaktāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1249: tamab-grahaṇād ye soṣmāṇo nādavantaś ca te bhavanti caturthāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1251: uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamāna eva raparo veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1270: ṅit ca ya ādeśaḥ so 'neka-al api alo 'ntyasya sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1274: tātaṅi ṅit-karaṇasya guṇa-vṛddhi-pratiṣedha-arthatvāt sarva-ādeśaḥ tātaṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1278: parasya kāryaṃ śiṣyamāṇam āder alaḥ pratyetavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:1297: sthāny-ādeśayoḥ pṛthaktvāt sthāny-āśrayaṃ kāryam ādeśe na prāpnoti ity ayam-atideśa ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1318: kimaḥ kaḥ (*7,2.103) iti ka-ādeśe kṛte 'ṅga-āśrayā ina-dīrghatva-aisbhāvāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:1321: ktvo lyab-ādeśe kṛte hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,1.71)
GS24jvkasipu:1341: pada-ādeśaḥ padavad bhavati -- grāmo vaḥ svaṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:1345: sthānī ādeśasya sañjñā mā vijñāyi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1348: - āhata, āvadhiṣṭa iti ātmanepadam ubhayatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1350: ānumānikasya apy ādeśasya sthānivadbhāvo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1364: aj-ādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvavidau kartavye sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1368: paṭumācaṣṭe iti ṇiciṭi-lope kṛte tasya sthānivad-bhāvāt ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,2.116)
GS24jvkasipu:1370: avadhīt -- ato lopasya sthānivad-bhāvad ato hal-āder laghoḥ (*7,2.7)
GS24jvkasipu:1378: praśnaḥ iti praccheḥ naṅpratyaye c-cḥ-v-oḥ śūḍ-anunāsike ca (*6,4.19)
GS24jvkasipu:1379: iti cha-kārasya śa-kāraḥ paranimittakas tuki kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1381: iti sico lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ kṛṣeḥ ṣa-kārasya ṣaḍhoḥ kaḥ si (*8,2.41)
GS24jvkasipu:1382: iti ka-kāre kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1384: ity anunāsika-lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ tuki kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1392: vaiyāghrapadyaḥ iti na paranimittakaḥ pādasya antalopaḥ padbhāvaṃ na pratibadhnāti /
GS24jvkasipu:1393: ādīdhye iti dīdhīṅa uttamapuruṣa-ikavacane ṭeretvasya-aparanimittakatvād yi-i-varṇayor dīdhī-vevyoḥ (*7,4.53)
GS24jvkasipu:1399: he gauḥ iti vṛddhir aj-ādeśaḥ sambuddhi-lope kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1400: bābhravīyāḥ iti bābravyasya amī cchātrāḥ iti vṛddhāc chaḥ (*4,2.114) iti chaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1402: iti ya-kāral-ope kartavye av-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1406: iti dvy-aj-lakṣaṇe pratyaya-vidhau na sthānivad bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1408: pūrveṇa atiprasaktaḥ sthānivad-bhāva eteṣu vidhiṣu pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1414: śna-sor al-lopaḥ kṅiti sārvadhātuke iti paranimittakaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1415: sa pūrva-vidhāv āv-ādeśe yaṇ-ādeśe ca kartavye sthānivat syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:1417: dvirvacana-vidhiḥ -- dvirvacana-vidhiṃ prati na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1422: iti dha-kārasya dvirvacanaṃ na syād asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1423: varevidhiḥ -- vare yo 'j-ādeśaḥ sa pūrva-vidhiṃ prati na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1428: tasya sthānivattvād ato lopa iṭi ca (*6,4.64)
GS24jvkasipu:1431: ya-lopa-vidhiḥ -- ya-lopa-vidhiṃ pratyaj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1436: iti yalope sthānivat syād asmād vacanān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1437: svara-vidhiḥ -- svara-vidhiṃ prati aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1439: jihīrṣakaḥ ṇvuli kṛte ato lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ, liti (*6,1.193)
GS24jvkasipu:1441: iti svare kartavye na sthānivad bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1442: savarṇa-vidhiḥ -- savarṇa-vidhiṃ prati ajādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1448: anusvārasya yayi parasavarṇe kartavye na sthānivad bhavati / [#25]
GS24jvkasipu:1450: anusvāra-vidhiḥ -- anusvāra-vidhiṃ prati aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1454: iti anusvāre kartavye śnasorallopaḥ na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1455: dīrgha-vidhiḥ -- dīrgha-vidhiṃ prati ajādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1459: ity adhikṛtya tṛtīya-ikavacane caturthy-ekavacane ca allopo 'naḥ (*6,4.134)
GS24jvkasipu:1463: na hy ayaṃ va-kāro hal-paraḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:1465: jaś-vidhiḥ -- jaś-vidhiṃ praty-aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1466: sagdhiś ca me sapītiś ca me /
GS24jvkasipu:1494: carvidhiḥ -- carvidhiṃ prati aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1507: akṣan iti adeḥ luṅ bahuvacane ghas-la-ādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1519: vāyvoḥ iti sthānivattvāt svara-dīrghaya-lopā na bhavanti // [#26]
GS24jvkasipu:1525: tena kṛte dvirvacane punar ādeśa rūpam eva avatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:1530: iti ā-kāra-lope kṛte tasya sthānivad-bhāvāt eka-aco dve prathamasya (*6,1.1)
GS24jvkasipu:1535: ity aupadhā-lope kṛte anackatvād dvirvacanaṃ na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:1538: aṭateḥ ṇici luṅi caṅi ṇilope kṛte tasya sthānivattvād aj-āder dvitīyasya (*6,1.2)
GS24jvkasipu:1542: karoteḥ atusi usi ca yaṇ-ādeśe kṛte anackatvād dvirvacanaṃ na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:1546: nayateḥ lunāteś ca uttame ṇali guṇe kṛte vṛddhau ca ay-av-āy-āv-ādeśāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1547: teṣāṃ sthānivattvān ne nai lo lau iti dvirvacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1567: tasya lopaḥ iti iyaṃ sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1601: pratyaya-nimittaṃ kāryam asaty api pratyaye kathaṃ nu nāma syāt it sūtram idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1602: pratyaya-lope kṛte pratyaya-lakṣaṇaṃ pratyaya-hetukaṃ karyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1605: ity atra sup-tiṅoḥ luptayoḥ sup-tiṅ-antaṃ padam (*1,4.14)
GS24jvkasipu:1607: adhok iti duheḥ laṅi tipi śabluki tilope ghatva-bhaṣbhāva-jaśtva-cartveṣu kṛteṣu rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:1608: pratyaya iti vartamāne punaḥ pratyaya-grahaṇaṃ kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:1614: tatra pratyaya-lakṣaṇena jhali ity anunāsikalopo na bhavati (*6,4.37) /
GS24jvkasipu:1620: pūrveṇa atiprasaktaṃ pratyaya-lakṣaṇam iti viśeṣe pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1626: yañ-śapor lumatā luptayor aṅgasya vṛddhi-guṇau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1645: dhātv-ādau varṇa-samudāye 'ntyād alaḥ pūrvo yo varṇaḥ so 'l eva upadhā-sañjñao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1656: tasmin iti saptamy-artha-nirdeśe pūrvasya-iva kāryaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1665: tasmāt iti pañcamy-artha-nirdeśa uttarasya-iva kāryaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1669: iha na bhavati -- pacaty odanam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:1671: śāstre svam eva rūpaṃ śabdasya grāhyaṃ bodhyaṃ pratyāyyaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1674: śabdena artha-avagater arthe kāryasya asambhavāt tad-vācinām śabdānām sampratyayo mā bhūt iti sūtram idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1696: tato vaktavyam tad-viśeṣāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1706: ca-kārāt svasya rūpasya tad-viśeṣāṇāṃ ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1717: tato vaktavyam paryāya-vacanasya-iva grahanaṃ bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:1729: tato vaktavyam tasya ca grahaṇaṃ bhavati tad-viśaṣāṇāṃ ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1743: aṇ gṛhyamāṇa udic ca savarṇānāṃ grāhako bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1760: ātmanā tulya-kālasya guṇa-antara-yuktasya savarṇasya grāhako bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1764: aṇāmanyeṣāṃ ca taparāṇām idam eva grahaṇaka-śāstram / [#30]
GS24jvkasipu:1767: ity evam ādiṣu pūrva-grahaṇaka-śāstraṃ na pravartata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:1778: ādir antyena it-sañjñakena saha gṛhyamāṇas tan-madyapatitānāṃ varṇānāṃ grāhako bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1787: suṭ iti tṛtīya-ikavacanena ṭā ity anena grahaṇaṃ mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:1789: yena viśeṣaṇena vidhir-vidhīyate sa tad-antasya ātmān tasya samudāyasay grāhako bhavati ,
GS24jvkasipu:1800: iha mā bhūt -- kaṣṭaṃ paramaśrita iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1803: iha mā bhūt-- sūtra-naḍasya apatyaṃ sautranāḍiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1806: ugitaś ca (*4,1.6) iti ṅīp-pratyayaḥ tad-antād api bhavati -- bhavatī,
GS24jvkasipu:1811: al-grahaṇeṣu yasmin vidhistad ādau iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:1812: aci śnu-dhātu-bhruvāṃ yvor iyaṅ-uvaṅau (*6,4.77) iti-- śriyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1815: vṛddhir yasya acām ādis tad vṛddham (*1,1.73) /
GS24jvkasipu:1856: eṅ yasya acām ādiḥ tat prācāṃ deśābhidhāne vṛddha-saṃjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1867: prāg udañcau vibhajate haṃsaḥ kṣīrodake yathā /
GS24jvkasipu:1868: viduṣāṃ śabda-siddhy-arthaṃ sā naḥ pātu śarāvatī //
GS24jvkasipu:1869: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyām vṛttau prathamādhyāyasay prathamaḥ pādaḥ // [#32]
GS24jvkasipu:1878: kuṭādayo 'pi kuṭa kauṭilye ityeta dārabhya yāvat kuṅ śabde iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1879: egyo gāṅ-kuṭādibhyaḥ pare añṇitaḥ pratyayā ṅito bhavanti ṅidvad bhavanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1902: asmāt paraḥ iḍ-ādiḥ pratyayo ṅidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1913: asmāt paraḥ iḍādiḥ pratyayo vibhāṣā ṅidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1921: sārvadhātukaṃ yad apit tan ṅidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1936: asaṃyogāntād dhātoḥ paro liṭ pratyayaḥ apit kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1951: indhi bhavati ity etābhyāṃ paro liṭ pratyayaḥ kiḍ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1967: mṛḍa mṛda gudha kuṣa kliśa vada vasa ity etebhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā-pratyayaḥ kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1968: na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18) iti pratiṣedhaṃ vakṣyati tasyāyaṃ purastādapakarṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1969: gudha-kuṣa-kliśīnāṃ tu ralo v-y-upadhād-dhal-ādeḥ saṃś ca (*1,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:1981: ruda vida muṣa grahi svapi praccha ity etebhyaḥ saṃśca ktvā ca kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2001: igantād dhātoḥ paro jhal-ādiḥ san kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2013: yatha-iva tarhi dīrghatvaṃ guṇaṃ bādhate tathā ṇilopamapi badheta /
GS24jvkasipu:2014: tasmād dīrghatvasya avakāśa-dānāya kittvam idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2015: cicīṣati ity ādiṣu sāvakāśaṃ dīrghatvaṃ partvād ṇilopena bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2018: ikaḥ kittvaṃ guṇo mā bhūt dīrgha-ārambhāt kṛte bhatet /
GS24jvkasipu:2019: anarthakam tu hrasva-arthaṃ dīrghāṇāṃ tu prasajyate //1//
GS24jvkasipu:2025: halantād iko jhal kit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2053: ṛ-varṇa-antād dhātoḥ parau liṅ-sicau ātmanepadeśu jhal-ādī kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2066: gamer-dhātoḥ paru liṅ-sicau ātmanepadeṣu jhal-ādī vā kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2075: hanter dhātoḥ paraḥ sic kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2081: iha tu parasmaipade hanter vadhabhāvasya nityatvāt kittvasya prayojanaṃ na asti //
GS24jvkasipu:2086: yamer dhātor gandhane vartamānāt paraḥ sic pratyayaḥ kid bhavati ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2105: yamer dhātoḥ upayamane vartamānāt paraḥ sic-pratyayao vibhāṣā kid bhavati ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2120: tiṣṭhater dhātoḥ ghu-sañjñakānāṃ ca i-kāraś ca antād eśaḥ sic ca kid bhavati ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2125: icca kasya takārettvaṃ dīrgho mā bhūd ṛte 'pi saḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2126: anantare pluto mā bhūt plutaś ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2130: ktvā pratyayaḥ seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2133: seṭ iti kim ? iṛtvā ' gutvā ' ktvā-grahaṇaṃ kim ? nigṛhītiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2145: śīṅ svidi midi kṣvidi dhṛṣ ity etebhyaḥ pro niṣṭhā-pratyayaḥ seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2162: mṛṣer dhātoḥ titikṣāyām arthe niṣṭhā seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2170: niṣṭhā seṇ na kit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2171: udupadhād dhātoḥ paro bhāve ādikarmaṇi ca vartamāno niṣṭhā-pratyayaḥ seḍ-anyatarasyāṃ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2197: pūḍaḥ paro niṣṭhā-pratyayaḥ itvā ca seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2202: tathā ca-uktaṃ nityam akittvam iḍādyoḥ ktvā-niṣṭhayoḥ ktvā-grahaṇam uttara-artham iti // [#37]
GS24jvkasipu:2208: nikāra-upadhād dhātoḥ thakārāntāt phakarāntāc ca paraḥ ktvā pratyayaḥ seḍ va na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2219: vañci luñci ṛt ity etebhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā pratyayaḥ seḍ vā na kid bhvati /
GS24jvkasipu:2225: sa yatra pakṣe na asti tatra-idam udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:2231: na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18) iti pratiṣedhe prāpe kittvaṃ vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2232: tṛṣi mṛṣi kṛśi ity etebhyaḥ paraḥ krvā pratyayaḥ seṭ kāśyapasya ācāryasya mate vā na kiḍ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2241: vā iti vartate seṭ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:2244: ukāra-upadha-adikāra-upadhac ca dhāto ralantād-dhalādeḥ paraḥ saṃś ca ktvā ca seṭau va kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2262: ū iti trayāṇām ayaṃ mātrika-dvimātrika-trimātrikāṇāṃ praśliṣṭa-nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2264: u ū ū3 ity evaṃ kālo aj yathā-kramaṃ hrasva-dīrgha-plutaḥ ity evaṃ sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2288: paribhāṣā iyaṃ sthāni-niyama-arthā hrasva-dīrgha-plutaḥ svasañjñayā śiṣyamāṇā aca eva sthāne veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2314: udātta-ādi-śabdāḥ svare varṇadharme loka-vedayoḥ prasiddhā eva /
GS24jvkasipu:2316: uccair upalabhyamāno yo 'c sa udātta-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2317: uccaiḥ iti ca śruti-prakarṣo na gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2320: kiṃ tarhi ? sthāna-kṛtam uccatvaṃ sañjñino viśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:2321: tālv-ādiṣu hi bhāgavatsu sthāneṣu varṇā niṣpadyante /
GS24jvkasipu:2322: tatra yaḥ samāne sthāne ūrdhva-bhaga-niṣpanno 'c sa udātta-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2337: yasminn uccāryamāṇe gātrāṇām anvavasargo mārdavaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:2350: sāmarthyāc ca atra loka-vedayoḥ prasiddhau guṇāv eva varṇa-dharmāv udātta-anudāttau gṛhyete, nā 'cau /
GS24jvkasipu:2351: tau samāhriyete yasminn aci tasya svaritaḥ ity eṣā saṃjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2362: tatra na jñāyate kasminnaṃśe udāttaḥ kasminn anudāttaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:2363: kiyān vā udāttaḥ kiyān vā anudāttaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2369: sarveṣām eva hrasva-dīrgha-plutānāṃ svaritānām eṣa svara-vibhāgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2370: śikyam ity atra ardha-mātrā ādita udātta,
GS24jvkasipu:2373: kanyā ity atra ardha-mātrā ādita udattā adhyardha-mātrā anudāttā /
GS24jvkasipu:2375: ity atra ardha-mātrā ādita udāttā ardha-tṛtīya-mātrā anudāttā //
GS24jvkasipu:2379: traisvarye padānāṃ prāpte dūrāt sambuddhāv-aikaśrutyaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2380: ekā śrutir yasya tad idam ekaśruti /
GS24jvkasipu:2382: dūrāt sambodhayati yena vākyena tat sambodhanaṃ sambuddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2384: svarāṇām udāttādīnām avibhāgo bhedati rodhānam ekaśrutiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2392: teṣāṃ yajña-kriyāyām api tatha-iva prayoge prāpte eka-śrutir vidhīyate japa-nyūṅkha-sāmāni varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:2394: agnir mūrdhā divaḥ kakut patiḥ pṛthivyā ayam /
GS24jvkasipu:2413: yajña-karmaṇi vaṣaṭkāraḥ uccaistarāṃ vā bhavati eka-śrutir vā /
GS24jvkasipu:2416: yady evaṃ vauṣaḍ-grahaṇam eva kasmān na kṛtam ?
GS24jvkasipu:2426: vā iti prakṛte vibhāṣā-grahanaṃ yajña-karmaṇi ity asya nivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:2427: tena ayaṃ svādhyāya-kāle 'pi pākṣika aikaśrutya-vidhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2437: na subrahmaṇyāyāṃ svaritasya tu udāttaḥ // PS_1,2.37 //
GS24jvkasipu:2439: subrahmaṇyā nāma nigadas tatra yajña-karmaṇi iti vibhāṣā chandasi (*1,2.36)
GS24jvkasipu:2442: yas tu lakṣaṇa-prāptaḥ svaritas tasya-udātta ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2447: gaurāva-skandinnahalyāyai jāra kauśikabrāhmaṇa gautamabruvāṇa śvaḥ sutyāmāgaccha maghavan /
GS24jvkasipu:2448: atra subrahmaṇyom ity okāras titsvareṇa svaritas tasya-udātto vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2451: udāttād anudātasya svaritaḥ iti svaritaḥ prasaktas tasya anena-udāttaḥ triyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2452: tad evam indra āgaccha iti catvāra udāttāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2454: hariva āgaccha ityanayaiva prakriyayā catvāra udāttāḥ dvāv anudāttau /
GS24jvkasipu:2455: medhātitheḥ iti ṣaṣṭyantaṃ parama-amantritam anupraviśati subāmantrite parāṅgavatsvare (*2,1.2) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2456: tataḥ sakalasyā mantritādy-udāttatve iṛte dvitīyam akṣaram anudāttaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:2463: gaurāvaskandin iti tatha-iva dve ādye akṣare udātte,
GS24jvkasipu:2465: ahalyāyai jāra iti subantasya amantrita-anupraveśāt t advadeva svaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2467: kauśikabrahmaṇa iti samastamāmantritamādy-udāttaṃ tatra pūrvavad dvāv udāttau śeṣam anudāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:2468: evam gautama-bruvāṇa iti dvāv udāttau śeṣam anudāttām /
GS24jvkasipu:2469: śvaḥ sutyāmāgaccha maghavan iti śvaḥ-śabda udāttaḥ sutyām ity antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2471: iti kyapo vidhāne udāttaḥ iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2478: subrahmaṇyāyām eva devā brahmāṇaḥ iti paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2482: dvayor api padayor āmantrita-ādy-udāttatve śeṣanighāte ca+udāttād anudāttasya svaritaḥ kṛtas tasya-anudātto bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2487: saṃhitāyaṃ viśaye svaritāt pareṣām anudāttānām ekaśrutir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2488: imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri /
GS24jvkasipu:2491: me iti anudāttaṃ vidhi-kāla eva nighāta-vidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2494: tasmāt svaritāt pareṣām anudāttānāṃ gaṅgeprabhṛtīnām ekaśrutir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2506: udāttaḥ paro yasmāt sa udāttaparaḥ svaritaḥ paro yasmāt sa svaritaparaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2507: udāttaparasya svaritaparasya ca anudāttasya sannatara ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2512: tatra anudāttayor ekādeśa okāro 'nudāttaḥ tasya-udātte parabhūte sannatara ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2513: imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri /
GS24jvkasipu:2515: śutudri ity etad āmantritaṃ pādādau tasmān na nihanyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2518: tasya prathamam akṣaram udāttaṃ tasmin parabhūte pūrvasya sarasvati iti ikārasya sannatara ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2520: kva iti svaritas tasmin parabhūte ka iti anudattas tasya sannatara ādeśo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2524: apṛktaḥ iti iyaṃ sañjñā bhavati eka-al yaḥ pratyayas tasya /
GS24jvkasipu:2555: prathamayā vibhāktyā yan nirdiśyate samāsa-śāstre tadupasarjana-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2575: eka vibhāktir yasya tad idam eka-vibhākti /
GS24jvkasipu:2577: dvitīye sambandhini bahubhir-vibhaktibhir yujyamāne 'py ekayaiva vibhaktyā yujyate tad-upasarjana-sañjñaṃ bhavati apūrva-nipāte,
GS24jvkasipu:2581: pūrva-pade nānāvibhaktike 'py uttarapadaṃ pañcmyantam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2604: vanam, dhanam iti na antasya avadher mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:2621: kṛtas taddhitāḥ samāsāś ca prātipadika-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:2622: apratyayaḥ iti pūrvatra paryudāsat kṛdantasya taddhitāntasya ca anena prātipadika-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2632: samāsa-grahaṇasya niyama-arthatvād vākyasya arthavataḥ sañjñā na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2636: napuṃsaka-liṅge 'rthe yat prātipadikaṃ vartate tasya hrasvo bhavati ādeśaḥ alo 'nyasya acaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2649: go iti svarūpa-grahaṇaṃ strī iti pratyaya-grahaṇaṃ svaritatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2653: upasarjana-go-śabdāntasya upasarjana-strīpratyaya-antasya ca prātipadikasya hrasvo bhavati / [#44]
GS24jvkasipu:2675: taddhita-luki sati strī-pratyayasya upasrjanasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2703: lupi iti lup-sanñjñayā luptasya pratyayasya artha ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2705: yuktavat iti niṣṭhā-pratyayena ktavatunā prakṛtyartha ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2708: atha vā yuktaḥ prakṛty-arthaḥ pratyaya-arthena sambaddhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:2719: yathā teṣu kṣatriyeṣu vyaktivacane tadvajjanapade bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2742: khalatikasya parvatasya adūrabhavāni vanāni khalatikaṃ vanāni //
GS24jvkasipu:2747: lub-arthasya yāni viśeṣaṇāni teṣām api ca yuktavad vyakti-vacane bhavataḥ jātiṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:2760: tena jāt-idvāreṇa yāni viśeṣaṇāni teṣām api yuktavadbhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2777: tatra liṅgaṃ vacanaṃ ca svabhāva-saṃsiddham eva na yatna-pratipādyam,
GS24jvkasipu:2793: na hi pañcāla varaṇāḥ iti yogaḥ sambadhaḥ prakhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2807: yadi pañcālādi-śabdo yogasya pramāṇaṃ yogasya vācakaḥ syāt tatas tadabhāve 'darśanam aprayogaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2808: dṛśyate ca samprati vanaiva kṣatriya-sambandhena janapadeṣu pañcālādi-śabdāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:2810: kiṃ tarhi ? rūḍhirūpeṇaiva tatra pravṛttaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2817: tābhyām artha-vacanam artha-abhidhānam anena prakāreṇa bhavati iti pūrva-ācāryaiḥ paribhāṣitam /
GS24jvkasipu:2823: śabdair artha-abhidhānam svābhāvikaṃ na pāribhaṣākam aśakyatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2825: yair api vyākaraṇaṃ na śrutaṃ te 'pi rāja-puruṣam ānaya ity ukte rājaviśiṣṭaṃ puruṣam ānayanti na rājanam na api puruṣa-mātram /
GS24jvkasipu:2826: aupagavam ānaya ity ukte upaguviśiṣṭam apatyam ānayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:2828: yaś ca lokato 'rthaḥ siddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena //
GS24jvkasipu:2838: iha anye vaiyākaraṇāḥ kāla-upasarjanayoḥ paribhāṣāṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:2846: yairapi vyākaraṇam na śrutaṃ te 'py āhur idam asmābhir adya kartavyam idaṃ śvaḥ kartavyam idam hayaḥ kṛtam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2849: vayamatra gṛhe grāme vā upasarjanam apradhānam iti gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2850: yśca lokato 'rthaḥ siddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena /
GS24jvkasipu:2851: yady evaṃ pūrvasūtra eva kāla-upasarjana-grahaṇam kasmān na kriyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:2855: tathā ca pūrvācāryāḥ paribhaṣante matvarthe bahuvrīhiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:2866: tad-abhidhāne ekavacanam eva prāptam ata idam udyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2868: jāty-ākhyāyām ekasminn arthe vahuvacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2870: tena tadviśeṣaṇānām ajāti-śabdānām api sampannādīnāṃ bahuvacanam upapadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2882: bhavatyayaṃ jāti-śabdo na tvanena jātir ākhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2891: asmado yo 'rthas tasya+ekatve dvitve ca bahuvacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2907: phalgunyor dvayoḥ proṣṭhapadayoś ca dvayor nakṣatrayor bahuvacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2918: dvayor dvivacane prāpte punarvasvoś chandasi viṣaye ekavacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2930: dvivacane prāpte chandasi viṣaye viśākhayor ekavacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2934: tiṣya-punarvasvor nakṣatra-dvandve bahuvacanasya dvivacanaṃ nityam // PS_1,2.63 //
GS24jvkasipu:2941: niṣyapunarvasvoḥ nakṣatra-viṣaye dvandve bahuvacana-prasaṅgo nityaṃ dvivacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2949: nanu ca prakṛtam eva nakṣatra-grahaṇaṃ kim-arthaṃ punar ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2955: yastiṣyastau punarvasū yeṣāṃ te ime tiṣya-punarvasavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2956: unmugdhāḥ tiṣyādaya eva viparyayeṇa dṛśyamānā bahuvrīhiṇocyante /
GS24jvkasipu:2961: sarvo dvandvo vibhāṣā ekavad bhavati ity asya+etada eva jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:2967: sarūpāṇāṃ śabdānaṃ ekavibhaktau parata ekaśeṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2970: vṛkṣaś ca vṛkṣaś ca Vrkṣaś ca vṛkṣāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2986: brāhmaṇābhyāṃ ca kṛtaṃ brāhmaṇābhyāṃ ca dehi //
GS24jvkasipu:2988: vṛddho yūnā tal-lakṣaṇaś ced-eva viśeṣaḥ // PS_1,2.65 //
GS24jvkasipu:2992: vṛddho yūnā sahavacane śiṣyate yuvā nivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2993: vṛddha-śabdaḥ pūrvācārya-sañjñā gotrasya apatyam antarhitaṃ vṛddham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2994: vṛddha-yūnoḥ sahavacane vṛddhaḥ śiṣyate tal-lakṣaṇaś ced eva viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3000: vṛddha-yuva-nimittakam eva yadi vairūpayam bhavati tato vṛddhiḥ śiṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:3014: kutsā sauvīratvaṃ ca bhāgavittikasya aparo viśeṣo vidyate //
GS24jvkasipu:3019: vṛddho yūnā iti ca sarvam strī vṛddhā yūnā sahavacane śiṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:3031: striyā sahavacane pumān śiṣyate strī nivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:3044: yathā saṅkhyaṃ bhrātṛ-putra-śabdau śiṣyete sahavacane svasṛ-duhitṛbhyam /
GS24jvkasipu:3054: ekavac ca asya kāryaṃ bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:3061: śuklaṃ ca śuklaṃ ca śuklaṃ ca suklāni /
GS24jvkasipu:3082: tayd-ādīni śabda-rūpāṇi sarvaiḥ sahavacane nityaṃ śiṣyante tyad-ādibhir anyaiś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:3087: tyad-ādīnāṃ mitho yadyat paraṃ tattac chisyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3096: iti puṃsaḥ śeṣe prāpte strī-śeṣo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3111: iti srījayādityaviracitāyaṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // [#51]
GS24jvkasipu:3116: bhū ity evam ādayaḥ śabdāḥ kriyāvacanā dhātusañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:3122: tad iha api pūrvācarya-sañjñāśrayaṇāt kriyāvācinām eva bhūvādīnāṃ dhātusañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3124: bhūvo vārthaṃ vadanti iti bhv-arthā vā vādayaḥ smaṛtāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3133: tatra yo 'c anunāsikaḥ sa itsañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3139: ac iti kim ? ato manin-kvanib-vanipaś ca (*3,2.74) /
GS24jvkasipu:3158: hasya l hal iti dvitīyam atra hal-grahaṇaṃ tantreṇa+upāttaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:3159: tena pratyāhāra-pāṭhe hal ity atra lakārasya itsañjñā kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3160: tathā ca sati halantyam ity atra pratyāhāre na+itaretarāśraya-doṣo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:3164: pūrveṇa prāptāyamitsañjñāyāṃ vibhāktau vartamānānāṃ tavarga-sakāra-makaraṇāṃ pratiṣedha ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3185: ñi-ṭu-ḍu ity eteṣāṃ samudayānām ādito vartamānānām ity sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3206: ādiḥ ity eva - avimahyoṣṭiṣac - aviṣaḥ, mahiṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3235: taddhita-varjitasya pratyayasy ādito vartamānā lakāra-śakāra-kavargā itsañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:3269: samānāṃ samasaṅkhyānaṃ samaparipahitānām uddeśinām anudeśināṃ ca yathā-kramamauddeśibhir anudeśinaḥ sambadhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:3282: iha kasmān na bhavati veśo-yaśa-āder bhagād yal (*4,4.131)
GS24jvkasipu:3308: aviśeṣeṇa dhātor ātmanepadaṃ parsmaipadaṃ ca vidhāsyate,
GS24jvkasipu:3311: tebhya eva ātmanepadaṃ bhavati na anyebhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3319: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ (*3,4.69)
GS24jvkasipu:3320: iti bhāva-karmaṇor vihitasya lasya tib-ādayaḥ sāmānyena vakṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:3332: tena kartiva yaḥ kartā tatra prasmaipadaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:3345: kartṛ-grahaṇam uttara-arthaṃ śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam (*1,3.78) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:3350: gaty-arthebhyo hiṃsā-arthebhyaś ca dhātughyaḥ karma-vyatihare ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3365: anyonyaḥ ity evam upapadād dhātoḥ karma-vyatihāre ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3375: iti prasmaipade prāpte ni-pūrvād viśa ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3380: ya-dāgamās tad-grahaṇena gṛhyante tena aṭā na asti vyavadhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:3396: paryādaya upasargā gṛhyante tena+iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:3403: viparā pūrvāj jayater dhātor ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3414: āṅ-pūrvād dadāter anāsya-viharaṇe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3422: iha mā bhūt, vyādadate pipīlikāḥ pataṅgasya mukham // [#56]
GS24jvkasipu:3428: etasmād anu sam pari ity evaṃ pūrvād āṅ-pūrvāc ca-ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3472: sam ava pra vi ity evaṃ pūrvāt tiṣṭhater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3487: prakāśane stheya-ākhyāyāṃ ca tiṣṭhater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3497: utpūrvāt tiṣṭhater anūrdhva-karmaṇi vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3504: iha mā bhūt, asmād grāmāt śatam uttiṣṭhati /
GS24jvkasipu:3513: upapūrvāt tiṣthater mantrakaraṇe 'rthe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3525: mitrakaraṇaṃ tu vināpy upaśleṣeṇa maitrīsam Bandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3535: upapūrvāt tiṣṭhater akarmakāt akarmaka-kriyāvacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3546: ut vi ity evaṃ pūrvāt tapater akarmaka-triyāvacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3558: svāṅgaṃ ca+iha na pāribhāṣikaṃ gṛhyate adravaṃ mūrtimat svāṅgam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:3588: iti prāpte sampūrvebhyo gami ṛcchi pracchi svarati arti śru vidi ity etebhyo 'karmakebhyo dhātubhya ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3606: arty-ādeśasya tv arti ity eva siddham ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:3623: ni sam upa vi ity evaṃ pūrvāt hvayater dhātor ātnamepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3636: spardhāyāṃ viṣaye āṅ-pūrvād hvayater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3651: gandhana-ādiṣv artheṣu vartamānat karoter ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3673: tasya sato guṇantarādhānaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3687: adhipūrvāt karoteḥ prasahane vartamānāt ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3699: vipūrvat karoter akartrabhiprāye kriyāphale śabdakarmaṇa ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3710: vipūrvāt karoter akarmakād akarmaka-kriyāvacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3712: sādhu dāntāḥ śobhanaṃ valganti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3721: ṇīñ prāpṇe ity etasmāt dhātor ātmanepadaṃ bhavati sammānana-ādiṣu viśeṣaṇeṣu satsu /
GS24jvkasipu:3727: te yuktibhiḥ sthāpyamānāḥ sammānitāḥ pūjitā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:3730: ācārya-karaṇam ācāryakriyā -- māṇavakam īdṛśena vidhinā ātma-samīpaṃ prāpyati yathā sa upanetā svayam ācāryaḥ sampadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3732: ātmānam ācāryīkurvan māṇavakam ātma-samīpaṃ prāpayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3737: vigaṇanam ṛṇāder niryātanam -- madrāḥ karam vinayante /
GS24jvkasipu:3750: kartṛsthe karmaṇy aśarīre sati nayater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3766: śeṣat kartari parasmaipade prāpte vṛtty-ādiśv artheśu karmer dhator ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3783: upaparāpūrvāt kramater vṛtty-ādiśv artheṣu vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3798: āṅ-pūrvāt kramater udgamane vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3805: iha mā bhūt, ākramati dhūmo harmyatalāt //
GS24jvkasipu:3809: vi-pūrvāt kramateḥ pada-viharaṇe 'rthe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3814: yady api kramiḥ pāda-viharaṇa eva paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:3823: pra up ity etābhyāṃ parasmāt kramater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:3824: tau cet propau samarthau tulya-arthau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3835: ity anena ātmanepadam atra karmān na bhāti ?
GS24jvkasipu:3851: śeṣāt kartari prasmaipade prāpte jānater apahnavi vartamanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3853: sopasargaś ca ayam-apahnave vartate, na kevalaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3882: sam prati ity evaṃ pūrvāj jānāter anādhyāne vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3895: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prāpte bhāsana-ādiśu viśeṣaṇeṣu satsu vadater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3897: bhāsamāno dīpyamānas tatra padārthān vyaktīkaroti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3920: nanu vada vyaktāyāṃ vāci ity eva paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:3935: vadaḥ iti, vyaktavācām iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:3936: anupūrvād vadater akarmakād vyaktavāgviṣayād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3940: yathā kalāpo 'dhīyāno vadati tathā kaṭhaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3950: vipralāpātmake vyaktavācāṃ samuccārane vartamānād vadater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:3956: yugapat paraspara-pratiṣedhena viruddhaṃ vadanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3969: na tu gṝ śabde iti kryādipaṭhitasya /
GS24jvkasipu:3970: tasya hy avapūrvasya prayoga eva na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:3971: śeṣāt kartari parsmaipade prāpte avapūrvād girater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3979: saṃpūrvāt girateḥ pratijñāne vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3988: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prāpte utpūrvāc carateḥ sakarmaka-kriyāavacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4003: ubhau lokau sañcarasi imaṃ ca amuṃ ca devala / [#64]
GS24jvkasipu:4009: dāṇaś ca sā cec caturthy-arthe // PS_1,3.55 //
GS24jvkasipu:4015: vaktavyam eva+etat -- aśiṣṭavyavahāre tṛtīyā caturthy-arthe bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4018: kāmukaḥ san dāsyai dadāti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4021: samaḥ praśabdena vyavadhāne katham ātmanepadaṃ bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:4022: samaḥ iti viśeṣaṇe ṣaṣṭhī, na pañcamī // [#65]
GS24jvkasipu:4027: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prāpte upapūrvāt yamaḥ svakaraṇe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4036: jñā śru samṛ dṛś ity eteṣāṃ sannantānām ātmanepdaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4056: anupūrvāj jānāteḥ sannantād ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4057: tathā ca sati sakarmakasya+eva ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ sampadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4064: prati āṅ ity evaṃ pūrvāc-chṛṇoteḥ sannantād ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4077: śito vā sambandhī tasmād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4102: yena nimittena pūrvasmād ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate tena+eva sannantādapi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4104: sannantād api tad eva nimittam - āsisiṣate,
GS24jvkasipu:4121: avayave kṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ samudāyasya viśeṣakaṃ bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:4132: udumbhāñcakāra iti kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale atmanepadaṃ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:4140: kathaṃ punar asya anuprayogaḥ yāvatā kṛñ ca anuprayujyate liti (*3,1.40)
GS24jvkasipu:4141: ity ucyate ? kṛñ iti pratyāhāra-grahaṇaṃ tatra vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4144: iti kṛ-śabdād ārabhya yāvat kṛño dvitīya-tṛtīya-śamba-bījāt kṛṣau (*5,4.58)
GS24jvkasipu:4150: tasya kartr-abhiprāye kriyā-phale siddham eva ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:4152: pra upa ity evaṃ pūrvāt yujer ayajña-pātra-prayogaviṣayād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4182: anavana iti pratiṣedhena raudhādikasya-eva grahanaṃ vijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:4183: na taudādikasya bhujo kauṭilye ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:4187: ṇe raṇau yat karma ṇau cet sa kartā 'nādhyāne // PS_1,3.67 //
GS24jvkasipu:4189: ṇicś ca (*1,3.74) iti kartr-abhiprāye kriyā-phale siddham eva ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:4192: katham ? aṇau yat karma ṇau cet tad eva karma,
GS24jvkasipu:4201: ṇeḥ iti kim ? ārohanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:4209: ṇau ced-grahanaṃ samāna-kriya-artham -- ārohanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:4233: vibheteḥ smayateś ca ṇy-antād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati hetubhaye /
GS24jvkasipu:4245: atra kuñcikā bhayasya karaṇam, na hetuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4252: vañcu gatau ity etayor ṇy-anatayoḥ pralambhane vartamānāyor ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4259: gardhanam asya-utpādayati ity arthaḥ ahiṃ vañcayati /
GS24jvkasipu:4266: līṅ śleṣaṇe iti divādau paṭhyate lī śleṣaṇe iti ca kryādau /
GS24jvkasipu:4268: liyo ṇy-antāt saṃmānane śālīnīkaraṇe ca vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4287: ṇyantāt karoter mithyopapadād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati abhyāse /
GS24jvkasipu:4290: sāpacāraṃ svarādiduṣṭam asakṛd uccārayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4303: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prapte svariteto ye dhātavo ñitaś ca tebhyaḥ ātmanepadaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:4306: yad-artham asau kriyā ārabhyate tac cet kartur lakāra-vācyasya bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4316: yady api dakṣiṇā bhṛtiś ca kartuḥ phalmihāsti tathā api na tad-arthaḥ kriyārambhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4321: apapūrvad vadateḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4338: sam ud āṅ ity evaṃ pūrvād yameḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:4356: anupasargāj jānāteḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4368: iti pañcabhiḥ sutrair ātmanepadaṃ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale dyotite vihitam /
GS24jvkasipu:4369: tad-upapadena dyotite na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4371: tena pratīyamāne kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale vibhāśā ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4386: yebhyo dhātubhyo yena viśeṣaṇena ātmanepadam uktaṃ tato yad-anyat sa śeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4402: tena kartā-eva yaḥ kartā tatra prasmaipadam bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:4407: kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale gandhanādiṣu ca karoter ātmanepadaṃ vihitam /
GS24jvkasipu:4409: anu parā ity evaṃ pūrvāt karoteḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4416: tataḥ kartr-abhiprāya-kriyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4417: abhi prati ati ity evaṃ pūrvāt kṣipaḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4430: tatra kartr-abhiprāya-kriyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4439: tataḥ tathā+eva ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4445: vahatim api kecid atra anuvartayanti - parivahati //
GS24jvkasipu:4451: viāṅ pari ity evaṃ pūrvāt ramateḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4473: pūrveṇa nitye parasmaipade prāpte vikalpa ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4474: upapūrvad ramater akarmakād vibhāṣā parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4481: ṇicaś ca (*1,3.74) iti kartr-abhiprāya-triyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4482: budha yudha naśa jana iṅ pru dru sru ity etebhyo ṇyantemyaḥ parasmaipadam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4493: ity evaṃ siddhe vacanam idam acittavat-kartṛka-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:4498: ye 'tra calana-artha api teṣām nigaraṇa-calana-arthebhyaś ca (*1,3.87)
GS24jvkasipu:4499: iti siddhe yadā na calana-arthās tad-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:4515: nigaraṇa-arthebhyaś calana-arthebhyaś ca dhātubhyo ṇy-antebhyaḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4532: aṇyanto yo dhatur akarmakaś cittavat-kartṛkaś ca tasmād ṇyantāt parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4542: tasmād iha cetayati iti parasmaipadena+eva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4543: idaṃ tu pratyudaharaṇam -- ārohayamāṇaṃ prayuḍkte ārohayate /
GS24jvkasipu:4552: pūrveṇa yogadvayena kartrabhipraya-kriyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepada-apavādaḥ parasmaipadaṃ vihitam /
GS24jvkasipu:4556: pā dami aṅyama āṅyasa parimuha ruci nṛti vada vasa ity etebhyo ṇy-antebhyaḥ parasmaipadaṃ na bhavati / [#73]
GS24jvkasipu:4585: atha atra prasmaipadena mukte katham ātmanepadaṃ labhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:4587: ity evam ādinā prakarṇena tan niyatam ?
GS24jvkasipu:4588: evaṃ tarhi ātmanepadam eva atra vikalpitaṃ vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:4589: tac ca anantaraṃ parasmaipada-pratiṣedhena sanidhāpitam iha sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4590: tena mukte, śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:4596: tats-āhacaryād luṭhādayo 'pi kṛpū paryantās tathā+eva vyapadiśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:4598: anudāttettvān nityam eva ātmanepade prāpte dyutādibhyo luṅi vā parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4610: etebhyo dhatubhyaḥ sye sani ca parato vā parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4628: vṛtāditvād eva syasanor vikalpaḥ siddho luṭi vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4629: cakāras tarhi syasanor anukarṣaṇa-artho na vaktavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:4630: evaṃ tarhi iyaṃ prāptiḥ pūrvāṃ prāptiṃ bādheta,
GS24jvkasipu:4632: luṭi ca syasanoś ca klṛpeḥ parasmaipadaṃ vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4641: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau prathamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ // [#75]
GS24jvkasipu:4649: tatra ekā sañjñā bhavati iti veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4652: anyatra sañjāsamāveśān niyama-arthaṃ vacanam ekaiva sañjñā bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4659: ekā sañjñā iti vacanād gurusañjñā eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4667: yatra dvau prasaṅgāv anyārthav ekasmin yugapat prāpnutaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:4670: utsarga-apavāda-nitya-anitya-antaraṅga-vahiraṅgeṣu tulyabalatā na asti iti na ayam asya yogasya viṣayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4673: paryāyeṇa vā pravṛttau prāptāyāṃ vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4691: īkāra-antam ūkara-antaṃ ca stryākhyaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ nadīsañjñaṃ bhavati / [#75]
GS24jvkasipu:4726: pūrveṇa nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte āmi vikalpaḥ kriyte /
GS24jvkasipu:4727: iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānau yū āmi parato vā nadīsañjñau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4738: ṅiti parato hrasvaś ca yvoḥ sambandhī yaḥ stryākhyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:4739: stryākhyau iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānau ca yū vā nadī sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4756: stryākhyaṃ ca yan na nadīsañjñakaṃ, sa śeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4770: pati-śabdasya ghisañjñāyāṃ siddhāyām ayaṃ niyamaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:4784: pūrveṇa niyamena asamāse na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4785: ṣaṣṭhyantena yuktaḥ pati-śabdaḥ chandasi vaṣaye vā ghisañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4795: mātrikasya hrasvasañjñā kṛtā tasya anena laghusañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4801: laghu-pradeśāḥ - puganta-laghu-upadhasya ca ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4807: saṃyoge prato hrasvam akṣaraṃ gurusañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4824: yasmāt pratyayo vidhīyate dhātor vā prātipadikād vā tad-ādi śabda-rūpaṃ pratyaye parato 'ṅgasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4835: ner biśaḥ (*1,3.17) ity upasargād vidhir asti,
GS24jvkasipu:4855: subantaṃ tiṅantaṃ ca śabda-rūpaṃ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4857: padasañjñāyām antagrahaṇam anyatra sañjñā-vidhau pratyaya-grahaṇe tad-anta-vidheḥ pratiṣedha-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:4865: kye iti kyac - kyaṅ - kyaśāṃ sāmānya-grahanam /
GS24jvkasipu:4866: na-antaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ kye parataḥ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4871: na-antam eva kye parataḥ padasamñjñam bhavati, na anyat /
GS24jvkasipu:4879: siti pratyaye parataḥ pūrvaṃ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4891: pūrveṇa padasañjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ tad-apavādo bhasañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4892: yakārādāv ajādau ca svādau sarvanāmasthāna-varjite pratyaye parataḥ pūrvaṃ bhasñjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4903: vṛṣan ity etat vasvaśvayoḥ prato bhasañjñaṃ bhavati chandasi viśaye /
GS24jvkasipu:4912: takāra-antaṃ sakāra-antaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ matv-arthe pratyaye parato bhasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4922: ayasmaya-ādīni śabdarūpāṇi chandasi viśaye sādhūni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:4923: bhapada-sañjña-adhikāre vidhanāt tena sukhena sadhutvam ayasmaya-ādīnāṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4937: lasya tibādayaḥ iti sāmānyena bahuvacanaṃ vihitaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:4940: bahutvam asya vācyaṃ bhavati iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:4945: yatra ca saṅkhyā sambhavati tatra ayam upadeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4946: avyayebhyas tu niḥ-saṅkhyebhyaḥ sāmānya-vihitāḥ svādayo vidyanta eva //
GS24jvkasipu:4962: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ kārake ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4973: , akathitaṃ ca kārakaṃ karmasañjñaṃ bhavati - māṇavakaṃ panthānaṃ pṛcchati /
GS24jvkasipu:4976: kārakasaṃśabdaneṣu ca anena eva viśeṣaṇena vyavahāro vijñāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:4980: dhruvaṃ yad apāyayuktam apāye sādhye yad avadhibhūtaṃ tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4994: bibhety-arthānāṃ trāyaty-arthānāṃ ca dhātūnāṃ prayoge bhaya-hetur yaḥ stat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5014: vāraṇa-arthānām dhātūnām prayoge ya īpsito 'rthaḥ tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5025: antardhi-nimittaṃ yena adarśanam ātmana icchati tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5032: adarśanecchāyāṃ satyāṃ saty api darśane yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:5038: upayoge sādhye ya ākhyātā tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5065: karmaṇā yam abhipraiti sa sampradānam // PS_1,4.32 //
GS24jvkasipu:5067: karmaṇā karaṇa-bhūtena kartā yam abhipraiti tat kārakaṃ sampradānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5078: karmaṇaḥ karaṇasañjñā vaktavyā sampradānasya ca karmasañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:5096: ślāgha hnuṅ sthā śapa ity eteṣām jñīpsyamāno yo 'rthah,
GS24jvkasipu:5101: devadattaṃ ślāghamānastām ślāghāṃ tam eva jñapayitum icchati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5146: tasmāt sāmānyena viśesaṇam yaṃ prati kopaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:5160: krudha-druhor upasṛṣṭayor upasarga-sambaddhayoḥ yaṃ prati kopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:5171: rādher īkṣeś ca kārakam sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5178: naimittikaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ san devadattasya daivaṃ paryālocayati ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5182: prati āṅ ity evaṃ pūrvasya śṛṇoteḥ kārakam sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5184: pratipūrva āṅpūrvaś ca śṛṇoti rabhyupagame pratijñāne vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:5185: sa ca abhyupagamaḥ parena prayuktasya sato bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5186: tatra prayoktā pūrvasyāḥ kriyāyā kartā sampradānasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5194: anupūrvasya pratipūrvasya ca gṛṇāteḥ kārakam pūrvasyāḥ kriyāyaḥ kartṛ-bhūtaṃ saṃpradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5198: anugaraḥ, pratigaraḥ iti hi saṃsituḥ protsāhane vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:5204: kriyā-siddhau yat prakṛṣṭopakārakaṃ vivakṣitam tat sādhakatamaṃ kārakam karaṇasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5216: pūrveṇa karaṇa-sañjñāyāṃ karana-sañjñāyāṃ prāptāyām karmasañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5217: divaḥ sādhakatamaṃ yat kārakam tat karmasañjñam bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:5225: pūrvena karaṇa-sañjñāyāṃ prāptāyā sampradāna-sajñā pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5226: parikrayaṇe sādhakatamaṃ kārakam anyatarasyāṃ sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5237: kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kriyāśrayabhūtayoḥ dhāraṇakriyāṃ prati ya ādhārah,
GS24jvkasipu:5248: adhipūrvāṇāṃ śīṅ sthā ās ity eteṣām ādhāro yaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:5261: yā yā sañjñā yasmin yasmin sañjñiny abhiniviśate iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:5269: upa anu adhi ā ity evaṃ pūrvasya vasater ādhāro yaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:5282: kartuḥ kriyayā yad āptum iṣṭatamaṃ tat kārakaṃ karmasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5291: itarathā ādhārasya+eva hi syāt gehaṃ praviśati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:5293: saktūn pibati ity ādiṣu na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:5300: yena prakāreṇa kartur īpsitatamaṃ kriyayā yujyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5301: tena+eva cet prakārena yad anīpsitaṃ yuktaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:5311: akathitaṃ ca yat kārakaṃ tat karmasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5315: bruviśāsiguṇena ca yat sacate tad akīrtitam ācaritaṃ kavinā //
GS24jvkasipu:5347: tatha śabda-karmakāṇām akarmakanām ca aṇy-antānām yaḥ kartā,
GS24jvkasipu:5401: ani karta sa ṇau iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:5402: harateḥ karoteś ca aṇyantayor yaḥ kartā sa ṇyantayor anyatarasyāṃ karmasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5444: hetutvad ṇico nimittaṃ kartṛtvāc ca kartṛ-pratyayena+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5462: rīśvarādvīśvarān mā bhūt kṛnmejantaḥ paro 'pi saḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5616: upasarga-pratirūpakāḥ -- avadattam vidattaṃ ca pradataṃ ca adikarmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:5617: sudattam anudattaṃ ca nidattam iti ceṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:5689: ūrīsyāt ity atra upasarga-prādurbhyām astir y-ac-paraḥ (*8,3.87)
GS24jvkasipu:5702: punaścanasau chandasi gatisañjñau bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:5713: ūry-ādayaḥ śabdāḥ cvy-antā ḍaj-antāś ca kriyā-yoge gati-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5715: tat-sāhacaryād ūry-ādīnām api tair eva yoge gati-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5826: kaṇe-śabdo manas-śabdaś ca śraddhā-pratīghāte gati-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5829: tāvat pibati yāvad asya abhilāśo nivṛttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5860: sa gaty-artheṣu dhātuṣu vadatau ca gatisañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5875: svayam eva tu yadā buddhyā parām ṛśati tadā na asty upadeśaḥ iti so 'sya viśayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5880: adaḥ kṛtvā kāṇḍaṃ gataḥ iti parasya kathayati //
GS24jvkasipu:5898: tiraḥ-śabdaḥ karotau parato vibhāṣā gati-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5911: upāje 'nvāje-śabdau vibhakti-pratirūpakau nipātau durbalasya sāmarthyādhāne vartete /
GS24jvkasipu:5921: sākṣāt-prabhṛtīni śabdarūpāṇi kṛñi vibhāṣā gati-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5963: tad-abhāve 'natyādhāne urasi-manasī śabdau vibhāṣā kṛñi gati-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5975: madye pade nivacane ity ete śabdā anatyādhāne vibhāṣā kṛñi gati-sajñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5982: vācam niyamya ity arthaḥ anatyādhāne ity eva,
GS24jvkasipu:5989: haste pāṇau ity etau śabdau kṛñi nityaṃ gatisañjñau bhavataḥ upayamane /
GS24jvkasipu:6001: tad-ānukūlyaṃ vandhana-hetukaṃ yadā bhavati tadā prādhvaṃśabdaḥ kṛñi nityaṃ gatisañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6009: jīvikā upaniṣad ity etau śabdau aupamye viṣahe kṛñi gatisañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6024: prāk prayoge prapte chandasi pare 'pi abhyanujñāyante /
GS24jvkasipu:6025: chandasi viṣaye gatyupasarga-sañjñakāḥ pre 'pi pūrve 'pi prayoktavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6026: na ca preṣāṃ prayujyamānānāṃ sañjñā-kāryaṃ kiñcid asti /
GS24jvkasipu:6027: kevalaṃ praprayoge 'pi kriyāyoge eṣām asti iti jñāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6035: vyavahitāś ca gatyupasarga-sañjñakāḥ chandasi dṛśyante ā mandrairindra haribhiryāhi mayūraromabhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6041: yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ karmapravacanīya. sañjñāste veditavyāḥ adhir īśvare (*1,3.97)
GS24jvkasipu:6071: hīne dyotye ayam anuḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6077: upa-śabdaḥ adhike hīne ca dyotye karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6084: apa-parī śabdau varjane dyotye karmapravacanīya-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6094: āṅ ity eṣā śabdo maryādā-vacane karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6108: vīpsāyāṃ ca viśāya-bhūtāyāṃ prati pari anu ity ete karmapravacanīya-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:6109: lakṣaṇe tāvat - vṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotate vidyut /
GS24jvkasipu:6115: bhāge - yad atra māṃ prati syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:6123: atha pariśabda-yoge pañcamī kasmān na bhavati pañcamy-apa-aṅ-paribhiḥ (*2,3.10)
GS24jvkasipu:6129: lakṣana-ādiṣu eva bhāga-varjiteṣu abhiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6135: yad atra mama abhiṣyat tad dīyatām /
GS24jvkasipu:6136: yadatra mama bhavati tad dīyatām ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6142: pratinidhiviṣaye pratidānaviṣaye ca pratiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6148: adhiparī śabdau anarthakau anartha-antaravācinau karmapravacanīya-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6180: samuccaye ca vartamānaḥ apiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6181: padāntarasya aprayujyamānasya arthaḥ padārthaḥ - sarpiṣo 'pi syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:6184: stokam ity asya arthe 'pi śabdo vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:6185: sambhāvanam adhikārtha-vacanena śakter apratighātāviṣkaranam - api siñcen mūlaka-sahasram /
GS24jvkasipu:6201: tad ayam svasvāmi-sambandhe adhiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6202: tatra kadācit svāminaḥ karmapravacanīya-vibhaktiḥ saptamī bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:6222: śatṛkvasū ca parasmaipada-pradeśāḥ - sici vṛddhiḥ prasmaipadeṣu (*7,2.1)
GS24jvkasipu:6229: pūrveṇa parasmaipadas-añjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ taṅ-ānayor ātmanepada-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6243: tatra parasmaipradeṣu trayastrikāḥ yathākramaṃ prathama-madhyama-uttama-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:6262: supaś ca trīṇi trīṇi padāni ekaśa ekavacana-dvivacana-bahuvacana-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:6271: trīṇi trīṇi vibhakti-sañjñāś ca bhavanti supas tiṅaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:6276: yuṣmady-upapade samāna-adhikaraṇe sthāniny api madhyamaḥ // PS_1,4.105 //
GS24jvkasipu:6278: lasya (*3,4.77) ity adhikṛtya sāmānyena tib-ādayo vihitāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6280: yuṣmady-upapade sati vyavahite cāvyavahite sati samānādhikaraṇe samāna-abhidheye tulya-kārake sthānini prayujyamāne 'py aprayujyamāne 'pi madhyama-puruṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6288: prahāse ca manya-upapade manyater uttama ekavac ca // PS_1,4.106 //
GS24jvkasipu:6291: prahāse gamyamāne manya-upapade dhātor madhyama-puruṣo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:6309: asmady-upapade samānābhidheye prayujyamāne 'py aprayujyamāne 'pi uttamapuruṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6320: yatra yuṣmad-asmadī samanādhikaraṇe upapade na staḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:6349: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6356: yaḥ kaścidiha śāstre padavidhiḥ śrūyate sa samartho viditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6361: vigrahavākyārthabhidhāne yaḥ śaktaḥ sa samartho vidhitavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6401: subantam āmantrite parataḥ parasya aṅgavad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:6451: sup iti saha iti supā iti ca trayam api adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6469: anvartha-sañjñā ceyaṃ mahatī pūrvapadārtha-prādhānyam avyayībhāvasya darśayati /
GS24jvkasipu:6477: vibhaktyādiśv artheṣu yadavyayaṃ vartate tat samarthena sub-antena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6480: vibhaktivacane tāvat -- strīṣvadhikṛtya kathā pravartate adhistri /
GS24jvkasipu:6485: samṛddhir ṛddher ādhikyam -- samṛddhir madrāṇāṃ sumadram /
GS24jvkasipu:6487: vyṛddhir ṛddher abhāvaḥ -- gavadikānām ṛddher abhāvaḥ durgavadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:6497: tasya ayam upabhogakālo na bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6504: yathā-arthe yad avyayaṃ vartate tat samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6505: yogyatā vipsā padārthānativṛttiḥ sādṛśyaṃ ca iti yathārthāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6520: sampattiḥ anurūpa ātmabhāvaḥ samṛddheranyaḥ -- sabrahma bābhravāṇām /
GS24jvkasipu:6524: na kiṃcid abhyāvahāryaṃ parityajati ity ayamartho 'dhikārthavacanena pratipādyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6529: iyaṃ samāptirasakale 'py adhyayane bhavati iti sākalyāt pṛthag ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:6533: yathā ity etad avyayam asādṛśye vartamānaṃ supā saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6540: yathārthe yadavyayam iti pūrveṇa+eva siddhe samāse vacanam idaṃ sādṛśya-pratiṣedha-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:6544: yāvat ity etad avyayam avadhāraṇe vartamānaṃ supā saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6548: yāvantyamatrāṇi sambhavanti pañca ṣaṭ vā tāvata āmantrayasva /
GS24jvkasipu:6551: na avadhārayāmi kiyan mayā bhuktam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:6558: mātrā-arthe vartamānena pratinā saha subantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6564: sup iti vartamāne punaḥ sub-grahaṇam avyayanivṛtty-artham // [#103]
GS24jvkasipu:6574: pañcikā nāma dyūtaṃ pañcabhir akṣaiḥ śalākābhir vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6575: tatra yadā sarve uttānāḥ patanti avāñco vā,
GS24jvkasipu:6577: tasya+eva asya vipāto 'nyathā pāte sati jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6578: akṣeṇa+idaṃ na tathā vṛttaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ jaye akṣapari /
GS24jvkasipu:6585: akṣādayas tṛtīyāntāḥ pūrvoktasya yathā na tat /
GS24jvkasipu:6600: apa pari bahis añcu ity ete subantāḥ pañcamyantena saha vibhāṣā samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6614: āṅ ity etan maryādāyām abhividhau ca vartamānam pajcamyantena saha vibhāṣā saṃsyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6624: tad-vācinā subantena saha abhipratī śabda-avābhimukhye vartamānau vibhāṣā samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:6628: agniṃ lakṣyīkṛtya abhimukhaṃ patanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6643: anuryasya samīpa-vācī tena lakṣaṇa-bhūtena saha vibhāṣā samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6657: anuryasyāyāmavācī tena lakṣaṇabhūtena saha vibhāṣā samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6670: tiṣṭhanti gāvo yasmin kāle dohanāya sa tiṣṭhadgu kālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6671: khaleyavādīni prathamānatāni vibhaktyanatarenṇa na+eva sambadhyante 'nyapadārthe ca kāle vartante /
GS24jvkasipu:6726: vidyayā janmanā vā prāṇinām ekalakṣaṇasantāno vaṃśaḥ ity abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6730: dvau munī vyākaraṇasya vaṃśyau dvimuni vyākaranasya /
GS24jvkasipu:6732: yadā tu vidyaya tadvatām abhedavivakṣā tadā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6752: nadībhiḥ saha subantam anyapadārthe vartamānaṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣye samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6814: svayam etad avyayam ātmanā ity asyārthe vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:6815: tasya dvitīyayā sambandho 'nupapannaḥ iti dvitīyā-grahaṇam uttarārtham anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:6816: svayam ity etat subantaṃ ktāntena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6824: khaṭvā-śabdo dvitīyāntaḥ ktāntena saha kṣepe gamyamāne samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6831: sarva eva avinītaḥ khaṭvārūḍhaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6841: tasya asattvavācitvād dvitīyayā na asti sambandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6853: kālavācinaḥ śabdāḥ dvitīyāntāḥ ktāntena saha samasyante vibhāṣa,
GS24jvkasipu:6870: kālavācinaḥ śabdā dvitīyāntā atyantasaṃyoge gamyamāne supā saha samasyante vibhāṣā,
GS24jvkasipu:6880: tṛtīyāntam guṇavacanena arthaśabdena ca saha saṃsyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6895: pūrva sadṛśa sama ūnārtha kalaha nipuṇa miśra ślakṣṇa ity etaiḥ saha tṛtīyāntaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6897: asmād eva vacanāt pūrvādibhir yoge tṛtīyā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:6923: kartari karaṇe ca yā tṛtīyā tadantaṃ kṛdantena saha bahulaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6941: kartṛkaraṇayo yā tṛtīyā tadantaṃ subantaṃ kṛtaiḥ saha samasyate 'dhikārthavacane gamyamāne vibhāṣā,
GS24jvkasipu:6949: iha mā bhūt, kākaiḥ pātavyā iti //
GS24jvkasipu:6954: vyañjñavāci tṛtīyāntam anavācinā subantena sahā samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6964: miśrīkarana-vāci tṛtīyāntam bhakṣya-vācinā subantena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6977: tat iti sarvanāmnā caturthyantasya arthaḥ parāmṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6979: tadartha artha bali hita sukha rakṣita ity etaiḥ saha caturthyantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6987: tādarthye caturthī ca asmād eva jñāpakād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7016: adharmajugupsuḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:7020: apeta apoḍha mukta patita apatrasta ity etaiḥ saha pajcamyantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7030: bhojanād apatrastaḥ ity evam adau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7037: stoka antika dūra ity evam arthāḥ śabdāḥ kṛcchra-śabdaś ca pañcamyantāḥ ktāntena saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7078: siddha śuṣka pakva bandha ity etaiḥ saha saptamyantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7092: dhavāgkṣavācinā subantena saha saptamyantaṃ subantaṃ subantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7093: tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati kṣepe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:7106: tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati ṛṇe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:7115: ṛṇe iti kim ? māse deyā bhikṣā //
GS24jvkasipu:7119: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye saptayantaṃ supā saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7133: aharavayavāḥ rātryavayavāś ca saptamyantāḥ ktāntena saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7140: etat tu te divā vṛttaṃ rātrau vṛttaṃ ca drakṣyasi /
GS24jvkasipu:7149: tatra ity etat saptamyantaṃ ktāntena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7159: kṣepe gamyamāne saptamyantaṃ ktāntena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7167: niṣphalaṃ yat kriyate tad evam uchyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7174: pātresamita-ādayaḥ śabdas tatpuruṣa-sañjñā bhavanti kṣepe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:7175: ye ca atra ktāntena saha samāsāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:7176: teṣāṃ pūrvena+eva siddhe punaḥ pāṭho yuktārohyādi-parigraha-arthaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:7178: yuktarohyādiṣu hi pātresamitādayaś ca iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7182: pātre eva samitā na punaḥ kvacit kārye iti /
GS24jvkasipu:7230: pūrvakāla eka sarva jarat purāṇa nava kevala ity ete subantāḥ samānādhikaraṇena supā saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7258: digvācinaḥ śabdāḥ saṅkhyā ca samānādhikaraṇena subantena saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7259: tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati sañjñayāṃ vaṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:7271: taddhita-arthe viṣaye uttarapade ca parataḥ samāhāre ca abhidheye dik-saṅkhye samānādhikaraṇena supā saha samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:7296: ity atra yaḥ saṅkhyā-pūrvaḥ samāsaḥ sa dvigu-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7297: taddhita-arthe tāvat - pañcasu kapāleśu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7300: iti iha aṇ, tasya dvigor lug-anapatye (*4,1.88) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:7311: kutsita-vācīni subantāni kutsana-vacanaiḥ subantaiḥ saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7315: iti paranipāte prāpte viśeṣyasya pūrvanipāta-artha ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7334: pāpa aṇaka ity ete subante kutsita-vacanaiḥ saha samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:7344: upamāna-vācīni subantāni sāmānya-vacanaiḥ subantaiḥ saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7361: tadvāci subantaṃ vyāghra-ādibhiḥ sāmarthyād upamāna-vacanaiḥ saha sāmasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7365: iti paranipāte prāpte viśeṣyasya pūrvanipāta-artha ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7394: viśeṣaṇa-vāci subantaṃ viśeṣya-vācinā samānādhikaraṇena subantena saha bahulaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7416: pūrva apara prathama carama jaghanya samāna madhya madhyama vīra ity ete subantāḥ samānādhikaraṇena supā saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7431: śreṇya-ādayaḥ subantāḥ kṛta-ādibhiḥ samānadhikaraṇaiḥ sahaḥ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7488: tena nañviśiṣṭena ktāntena samānādhikaraṇena saha anañ ktāntaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7515: sat mahat parama uttama utkṛṣṭa ity ete pūjyamānaiḥ saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7517: pūjyamānaiḥ iti vacanāt pūjāvacanāḥ sadādayo vijñāyante /
GS24jvkasipu:7528: vṛndāraka nāga kuñjara ity etaiḥ saha pūjyamāna-vāci subantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7530: pūjyamānam iti vacanāt pūjāvacanā vṛndāraka-ādayo gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:7542: katara-katamau jātiparipraśne vṛtamānau samarthena supā saha samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:7551: evaṃ tarhy etaj jñāpayati katama-śabdo 'nyatra api vartate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:7552: tathā ca pratyudāharanam - kataro bhavator devadattaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:7557: kim ity etat kṣepe gamyamāne supā saha samasyate taturuṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7600: te ca āviṣṭaliṅgatvād anyaliṅge 'pi jāti-śabde svaliṅgopādānā eva samānāhikaranā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:7616: prātipādika-grahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahanam iti jñāpaka-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7628: kṛtyapratyaya-antās tulyaparyāyāś ca subantā ajāti-vacanena samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7642: varṇaviśeṣavāci subantaṃ varṇaviśeṣavācinā subantena samānādhikaraṇena saha samasyte,
GS24jvkasipu:7648: avayavadvārena kṛṣṇaśabdaḥ samudāye vartamānaḥ samānādhikaraṇo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:7658: taiḥ saha strīliṅgaḥ eva kumāra-śabdaḥ samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7766: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyām kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7774: tadvācinā subantena saha pūrva apara adhara uttara ity ete śabdāḥ sāmarthyād ekadeśabacanāḥ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7777: ekaṃ ced adhikaraṇam ekadravyam ekadeśi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7790: iti jñāpakāt sarvaṇaikadeśa-śabdena ahnaḥ samāso bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:7797: ardham ity etad napuṃsakam ekadeśinā-ekādhikaraṇena samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7817: iti pratiṣedhaś ca ata eva anyatarasyāṃ grahaṇa-sāmarthyān na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:7836: prāpta āpanna ity etau dvitīyāntena saha samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:7846: tadbācinā subantena saha sāmarthyāt parimāṇavacanāḥ kāla-śabdāḥ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7863: īṣat ity ayaṃ śabdo 'kṛdantena supā saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7878: ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ subantaṃ samarthena subantena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7882: kṛdyogā ca ṣaṣṭhī samasyata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7886: pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti vakṣyati,
GS24jvkasipu:7894: iti pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam idam ārabhyate pratiprasavārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:7912: tatsthaiś ca guṇaiḥ ṣaṣṭhī samasyate iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7925: nirdhārane yā ṣaṣṭhī sā na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7930: pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7936: pūraṇa guna suhitārtha sat avyaya tavya samānādhikaraṇa ity etaiḥ saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7955: kiṃ ca syāt ? pūrvanipātasya aniyamaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7956: anantarāyāṃ tu prāptau pratiṣiddhāyāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam (*2,1.57)
GS24jvkasipu:7967: kto yaḥ pūjāyāṃ vihitastena ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7987: karmaṇi ca yā ṣaṣṭhī sā na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7998: kartari yā ṣaṣṭhī sā tṛcā akena ca saha na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8010: kartari ca yau tṛj-akau tābhyāṃ saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8016: nanu ca bhartṛ-śabdo hy ayaṃ yājakādiṣu paṭhyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:8026: kriḍāyāṃ jīvikāyāṃ ca nityaṃ ṣaṣṭhī samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:8028: tṛc kriḍā-jīvikayor na asti ity aka eva+udāhriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8041: ku-gati-prādayaḥ samarthena śabdāntareṇa saha nityaṃ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:8072: ivena saha samāso vibhaktya-lopaḥ pūrvapada-prakṛtisvaratvaṃ ca vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8083: upapadam atiṅantaṃ samarthena śabdāntareṇa saha samasyate nityam,
GS24jvkasipu:8089: nanu ca sup supā iti vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:8091: evaṃ tarhi jñāpayati etayor yogayoḥ sup supeti na sambadhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:8092: tena gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prāk subutpatteḥ ity etad upapannaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8100: avyayena-upapadasya yaḥ samāsaḥ so 'mā+eva bhavati, na anyena /
GS24jvkasipu:8108: amā+eva yat tulya-vidhānam upapadaṃ tasya samāso yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:8109: amā ca anyena ca yat tulya-vihdhānaṃ tasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:8117: ity ataḥ prabhṛti yāny upapadāni tāni amā+eva avyayena saha-anyatarasyāṃ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:8120: yad amā+eva tulyavidhānam upapadaṃ tasya prāpte,
GS24jvkasipu:8122: yat punar amā ca anyena ca tulyavidhānaṃ tasya prāpte,
GS24jvkasipu:8136: tena anyatra na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8137: ktvāpratyayena saha tṛtīyā-prabhṛtīni upapadāny anyatarasyāṃ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:8164: anekaṃ subantamanyapdārthe vartamānaṃ supā saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:8166: prathamārtham ekaṃ varjayitvā sarveṣu vibhakty-artheṣu bahuvrīhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8167: prāptam udakaṃ yaṃ grāmaṃ prāptodako grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8178: samantaśitir andhreṇa dvayor vṛttau na sidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:8188: uṣṭrasya mukham iva mukhaṃ yasya sa uṣṭramukhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8190: samudāya-vikāraṣaṣṭhyāś ca bahuvrīhir uttarapada-lopaś ca+iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8195: prādibhyo dhatujasya+uttarapadasya lopaś ca vā bahuvrīhir vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8210: saṅkhyeye yā saṅkhyā vartate tayā saha avyaya-āsanna-adūra-adhika-saṅkhyāḥ samasyante bahuvrīhiś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8234: dakṣiṇasyāś ca pūrvasyāś ca diśor yad-antarālaṃ dakṣiṇa-pūrvā dik /
GS24jvkasipu:8240: iha ma bhūt, aindryāś ca kauberyāś ca ciśor yad-antarālam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:8247: tatra iti saptamyante sarūpe pade teneti ca tṛtīyānte idam ity etasminn arthe saṃsyete,
GS24jvkasipu:8249: itikaranaś ca+iha vivakṣārtho laukikam artham anusārayati /
GS24jvkasipu:8252: yuddhaṃ ca samāsa-arthaḥ iti sarvam itikaranāllabhyate / [#127]
GS24jvkasipu:8254: yat tatra iti nirdiṣṭaṃ grahaṇam cet tad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:8255: yat tena iti nirdiṣṭaṃ praharanaṃ cet tad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:8256: yat idam iti nirdiṣṭaṃ yuddhaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8257: keśeṣu keśeṣu ca gṛhītvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ keśākeśi /
GS24jvkasipu:8259: daṇḍaiś ca daṇḍaiś ca pragṛtya idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ daṇḍādaṇḍi /
GS24jvkasipu:8267: halaiś ca musalaiś ca prahṛtya idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttam //
GS24jvkasipu:8271: saha ity etac chābdarūpaṃ tulyayoge vartamānaṃ tena iti tṛtīyāntena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:8278: vidyamātair eva daśabhiḥ putrairbhāraṃ vahati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8293: tatra samuccayānvācayayor asāmarthyāt na asti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8296: dhavaś ca khadiraś ca palāśaś ca dhava-khadira-palāśāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8321: anyasya api yathā lakṣaṇaṃ vihitasya pūrvanipātasya ayam apavādaḥ paranipāto vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8396: aj-ādy-ad-antaṃ śabdarūpaṃ dvandve samāse pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8412: alpāctaraṃ śabdarūpaṃ dvandve samāse pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8426: abhyarhitaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nipatati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8442: sarvopasarjanatvād bahuvrīher aniyame prāpte niyama-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:8443: saptamyantaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ ca bahuvrīhi-samāse pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8453: anayor eva mithaḥ saṃpradhāraṇāyāṃ pratvāt saṅkhyāyāḥ pūrvanipātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8460: saptamyāḥ pūrvanipāte prapte gaḍvādibhyaḥ saptamyantaṃ param /
GS24jvkasipu:8473: nanu ca viśeṣaṇam eva atra niṣṭhā ?
GS24jvkasipu:8476: kathe kṛtam anena iti vā vigrahītavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8487: praharaṇārthebhyaś ca pare niṣṭhāsaptamyau bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8495: niṣṭhā iti pūrvanipāte prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8512: guna-śabdānāṃ viśeṣanatvāt pūrvanipāte prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8533: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīya pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:8554: samāsaḥ - prāptam udakaṃ yaṃ grāmaṃ prāptodako grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8557: vahuṣu bahuvacanam ity evam ādinā saṅkhyā vacyatvena vibhaktīnām upadiṣṭāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:8558: tatra viśeṣaṇa-artham idam ārabhyate - anabhihitakarmādyāśrayeṣvekatvādiṣu dvitīyādayo veditavyāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:8562: dvitīyādayaḥ śabdāḥ pūrvācāryaiḥ supāṃ trikeṣu samaryante,
GS24jvkasipu:8564: karmaṇi kārake yā saṅkhyā tatra dvitīyā vibhaktirbhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8588: chandasi viṣaye juhoteḥ karmaṇi kārake tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati, dvitīyā ca /
GS24jvkasipu:8602: antareṇa śabdas tu tac ca vinārthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:8603: antarā tvāṃ ca māṃ ca kamaṇḍaluḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8604: antareṇa tvāṃ ca māṃ ca kamaṇḍaluḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8607: antarā takṣaśilāṃ ca pāṭaliputraṃ srughnasya prākāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:8611: kāla-śabdebhyo 'dhva-śabdebhyaś ca dvitīyā vibhaktir bhavati atyantasaṃyoge gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:8633: apavarge gamyamāne kāla-adhvanor atyantasaṃyoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8641: kartavyādṛttau phala-siddher abhāvāt tṛtīyā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8648: kārakayor madhye yau kāla-adhvānau tābhyāṃ saptamī-pañcamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8649: adya bhuktavā devadatto dvyahe bhoktā dvyahād vā bhoktā /
GS24jvkasipu:8652: iha stho 'yam iṣvāsaḥ krośe lakṣyaṃ vidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:8654: kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kārakayoḥ karma-apādānayoḥ karma-adhikaraṇayor vā madhye krośaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8666: yasmād adhikaṃ yasya ca+īśvara-vacanaṃ tatra saptamī // PS_2,3.9 //
GS24jvkasipu:8669: yasamā dadhikaṃ yasya ca+īśvaravacanaṃ karmapravacanīyair yukte tatra saptamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8672: yasya ca+īśvaravacanam iti svasvāminordvayor api paryāyeṇa saptamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8679: apa āṅ pari ity etaiḥ karmapravacanīyair yoge pajcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8691: yasmāt pratinidhiryataś ca pratidānaṃ tatra karmapravacanīya-yukte pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8702: gatyarthānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ceṣtākriyāṇāṃ parispandakriyāṇāṃ karmaṇi kārake 'dhvavarjite dvitīyā-caturthyau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8751: pītā varṣāya vijñeyā durbhikṣāya sitā bhavet //
GS24jvkasipu:8758: kriyārthā kriyā upapadaṃ yasya so 'yaṃ kriyārthopapāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8761: kriyārthopapadasya ca sthānino 'prayujyamānasya dhātoḥ karmaṇi kārake caturthī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8794: namaḥ svasti svāhā svadhā alam vaṣaṭ ity etair yoge caturthī vibhaktir bhvati /
