GS24jvkasipu:8806: tena āśīrvivakṣāyām api ṣaṣṭhīṃ vādhitvā caturthy eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8813: manyakarmaṇi prāṇivarjite vibhāṣā caturthī vibhaktir bhavati anādare gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:8825: andhāyāstaṃ sutaṃ manye yasya mātā na paśyati //
GS24jvkasipu:8828: yad etad aprāṇiṣviti tad anāvādiṣviti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8830: na tvā nāvaṃ manye yāvad uttīrṇaṃ na nāvyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8831: na tvā 'nnaṃ manye yāvan na bhuktaṃ śrāddham /
GS24jvkasipu:8835: iha caturthī dvitīyā ca bhavataḥ - na tvā śvānaṃ manye,
GS24jvkasipu:8844: kartari karaṇe ca kārake tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8863: saha-arthena yukte apradhāne tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8868: sahārthena ca yoge tṛtīyā-vidhānāt paryāya-prayoge 'pi bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:8879: yena iti ca tadavayavo hetutvena nirdiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8880: yena aṅgena vikṛtena aṅgino vikāro lakṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:8906: sampūrvasya jānāteḥ karmaṇi karake dvitīyāyāṃ prāptāyām anyatarasyāṃ tṛtīyāvibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8924: tataḥ pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati tṛtīyā+apavādo yogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8935: guṇe hetāv astrīliṅge vibhāṣā pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8949: hetu-śabdasya prayoge hetau dyotye ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8954: sarvanāmno hetu-śabda-prayoge hetau dyotye tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati, ṣaṣṭhī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:8955: pūrveṇa ṣaṣṭhyām eva prāptāyām idam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8971: tena+iha api bhavati - kiṃ prpayojanaṃ vasati,
GS24jvkasipu:9006: anya ārāt itara ṛte dik-śabda añcu-uttarapada āc āhi ity etair yoge pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9028: dvik-śabda ity atra śabda-grahanaṃ deśakālavṛttinā 'pi dik-śabdena yoge yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:9049: atas-arthena pratyayena yukte ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9072: pṛthak vinā nānā ity etair yoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:9081: vinā vātaṃ vinā varṣaṃ vidyut-prapatanaṃ vinā /
GS24jvkasipu:9082: vinā hastikṛtān doṣān kenemau pātitau drumau // [#141]
GS24jvkasipu:9087: stoka alpa kṛcchra katipaya ity etebhyo 'sattva-vacanebhyaḥ karaṇe kārake 'nyatarasyāṃ tṛtīyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9089: tṛtīyā tu karaṇe ity eva siddhā /
GS24jvkasipu:9090: yadā tu dharma-mātraṃ karaṇāyā vivakṣyate na dravyam,
GS24jvkasipu:9110: dūra-antika-arthaiḥ śabdair yoge ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:9171: carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti dantayor hanti kuñjaram /
GS24jvkasipu:9172: keśeṣu camarīṃ hanti sīmni puṣkalako hataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:9178: yasya ca bhāvena yasya ca kriyayā kriyāntaraṃ lakṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:9194: anādara-adhike bhāva-lakṣane bhāvavataḥ ṣaṣṭhī-saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9204: svāmin īśvara adhipati dāyāda sākṣin pratibhū prasūta ity etair yoge ṣaṣṭhī-saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9217: ṣaṣṭhyām eva prāptayāṃ pakṣe saptamīvidhāna-arthaṃ vacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:9224: tābhyāṃ yoge āsevāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhī-saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9236: jāti-guṇa-kriyābhiḥ samudāyād ekadeśasya pṛthak karanaṃ nirdhāranam /
GS24jvkasipu:9237: yato nirdhāranaṃ tataḥ ṣaṣṭhī saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9241: goṣu kṛṣṇā sampanna-kṣīratamā adhvagānāṃ dhavantaḥ śīghratamā,
GS24jvkasipu:9249: yasmin nirdhāraṇa-āśraye vibhaktam asya asti tataḥ pajcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9255: sādhu nipuṇa ity etābhyām yoge 'rcāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ saptamī vibhaktir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:9273: prasita utsuka ity etābhyāṃ yoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:9276: yas tatra nityam eva avabaddhaḥ sa prasita-śabdena+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9315: kuṇḍam ity atra api yathā syat /
GS24jvkasipu:9318: āḍhakam ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:9331: tad-adhike prātipadika-arthe prathamā na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9339: sambodhane yā prathamā tad-antaṃ śabda-rūpam āmantritasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9364: jānāter avidarthasya ajñāna-arthasya karaṇe kārake ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9371: cittabhrāntyā tadātmanā sarvam eva grāhyaṃ pratipadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9382: eteṣaṃ karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9395: karoteḥ karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite pratiyatne gamyamāne ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9407: rujārthānāṃ dhātūnāṃ bhāva-vacanānāṃ bhāva-kartṛkāṇāṃ jvari-varjitānāṃ karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9412: jīva putraka mā maivaṃ tapaḥ sāhasamācara //
GS24jvkasipu:9425: tasyāśīḥkriyasya karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9433: jāsi niprahaṇa nāṭa krātha piṣ ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ hiṃsā-kriyāṇāṃ karmaṇi kārake ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9435: jasu tāḍane iti ca curādau paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:9437: na daivādikasya jasu mokṣaṇe ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:9451: śratha knatha kratha klatha hiṃsa-arthāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:9452: tatra ghaṭādayo mitaḥ iti mitsañjñāyāṃ mitāṃ hrasvaḥ (*6,4.92)
GS24jvkasipu:9468: vyavahṛ paṇa ity etayoḥ samarthayoḥ samānārthayoḥ karmaṇi kārake ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9485: vyavahṛpaṇisamāna-arthasya dīvyateḥ karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9495: iti nityaṃ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ prāptāyāṃ sopasargasya vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9496: upasarge sati divas tadarthasya karmaṇi kārake vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9507: brāhmaṇaviṣaye prayoge divas tadarthasya karmaṇi kārake dvitīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9515: tatsāhacaryād bruvir api tadviṣaya eva gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9516: preṣyabruvorhaviṣaḥ karmaṇaḥ ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati devatāsampradāne sati /
GS24jvkasipu:9517: agnaye chāgasya haviṣo vapāyā medasaḥ pre3ṣya /
GS24jvkasipu:9526: indrāgnibhyāṃ chāgaṃ havirvapāṃ medaḥ prasthitaṃ preṣya3 // [#148]
GS24jvkasipu:9531: chandasi viṣaye caturthy-arthe ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:9540: yā kharveṇa pivati tasyai kharvo jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9550: yajer dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake chandasi bahulaṃ ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9559: kṛtvo 'rthānāṃ prayoge kāle 'dhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9566: gamyate hi dvis traś catur veti,
GS24jvkasipu:9577: kṛt-prayoge kartari karmaṇi ca ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9591: itarathā hi kartari ca kṛti ity evaṃ brūyāt // [#149]
GS24jvkasipu:9600: tatra karmaṇy eva ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati, na kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:9605: āścaryam idam odanasya nāma pāko brāhmaṇānaṃ ca prādurbhāvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:9610: akākārayoḥ strīpratyayayorgrahanāt tadapekṣayā śeṣaḥ strīpratyaya eva gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9611: śobhanā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ pāṇineḥ pāṇininā vā /
GS24jvkasipu:9613: śabdānām anuśāsanam ācāryaṇa ācāryasya iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:9618: iti pratiṣedhe prāpte punaḥ ṣaṣṭhī vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9619: ktasya vartamāna-kāla-vihitasya prayoge ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9648: dvikarmakāṇāṃ prayoge kartari kṛti dvayor api ṣaṣṭhī dvitīyāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:9657: la u uka avyaya niṣṭhā khalartha tṛn ity eteṣāṃ prayoge ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9699: inas tu bhaviṣyati cādhamarṇye ca vihitasya prayoge ṣaṣthī vibhaktir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9718: iti nityaṃ ṣaṣthī prāptā kartari vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9719: kṛtyānāṃ prayoge kartari vā ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati, na karmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:9730: tulyārthaiḥ śabdair yoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavaty anyatarasyām,
GS24jvkasipu:9733: śeṣe viṣaye tṛtīyā-vidhānāt tayā mukte ṣaṣthy eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9741: vā iti vartamāne 'nyatarasyāṃ grahanam uttarasūtre tasya cakārena anukarṣaṇa-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:9746: āśiṣi gayamānāyām āyuṣya madra bhadra kuśala sukha artha hita ity etair yoge caturthī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9748: śeṣe caturthī-vidhānāt tayā mukte ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9752: ciraṃ jīvitaṃ devadattāya devadattasya vā bhuyāt / [#152]
GS24jvkasipu:9775: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:9783: ekasya arthasya vācako bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9797: aṅga-śabdasya pratyekaṃ vākya-parisamāptyā trīṇi vākyāni sampadyante /
GS24jvkasipu:9806: hasty-aśva-ādiṣu paratvāt paśud-vandve vibhāṣayā eakvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9817: caraṇānāṃ dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati anuvāde gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:9821: kaṭhakālāpa-ādīnām udaya-pratiṣṭhe pramāṇa-antaravagate yadā punaḥ śabdena anūdyete tadā+evam udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:9835: adhvaryukratu-vācināṃ śabdānām anapuṃsaka-liṅgānāṃ dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9836: adhvaryukratur anapuṃsakaṃ dvandvaḥ iti gauṇo nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9850: adhyayanena nimittena yeṣām aviprakṛṣṭā pratyāsannā ākhyā,
GS24jvkasipu:9862: jāti-vācināṃ śabdānāṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati prāṇino varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:9873: jāti paratve ca jāti-śabdānām ayam ekavadbhāvo vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:9874: na niyata-dravya-vivakṣāyām - iha kuṇḍe badarāmalakāni tiṣṭhanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:9878: viśiṣta-liṅgānāṃ bhinna-liṅgānāṃ nadī-vācināṃ śabdānāṃ deśavacināṃ ca grāma-varjitānaṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9881: nadī deśaḥ ity asamāsa-nirdeśa eva ayam /
GS24jvkasipu:9882: uddhyaś ca irāvatī ca uddhyer āvati /
GS24jvkasipu:9884: deśaḥ khalv api - kuravaś ca kurukṣetraṃ ca kurukurukṣetram /
GS24jvkasipu:9895: tathā ca parvatānāṃ grahaṇaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:9897: agrāmā ity atra nagarānāṃ pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9898: iha mā bhūt, mathurā ca pāṭaliputraṃ ca mathurā-pāṭaliputram /
GS24jvkasipu:9912: kṣudra-janturanasthiḥ syād atha vā kṣudra eva yaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9913: śataṃ vā prasuṛtau yeṣāṃ kecidā nakulād api //
GS24jvkasipu:9914: ā nakulād api iti iyam eva smṛtiḥ pramāṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:9921: yeṣāṃ śāśvatiko virodhaḥ tadvācināṃ śabdānāṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9927: tena paśuśakuni-dvandve virodhinām anena nityam ekavad bhāvo bhavati - aśvamahiṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:9935: yair bhukte pātraṃ saṃskāreṇa api na śudhyati te niravasitāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9945: gavāśva-prabhṛtīni ca kṛta-ekavad-bhāvani dvandva-rūpāṇi sādhūni bhavnti /
GS24jvkasipu:9972: rūpāntare tu na ayaṃ vidhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9979: vṛkṣa mṛga tṛṇa dhanya vyañjana paśu śakuni aśvavaḍava pūrvāpara adharottara ity eteṣām dvandvo vibhāṣā ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9998: eṣāṃ bahuprakṛtir eva dvandva ekavad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10011: vipratiṣiddha-arthānāṃ śabdānām anadhikaraṇa-vācinām adravya-vācināṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10025: yathāyatham ekavad bhāve prāpte pratiṣedha ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10052: tasya+etāvattve parimāṇe gamyamāne dvandvo na+ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10060: adhikaraṇa-etāvattvasya samīpe vibhāṣā dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10072: yasya ayam ekavad bhāvo vihitaḥ sa napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati dvigur dvandvaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10084: ano nalopaś ca vā ca dviguḥ striyām /
GS24jvkasipu:10119: nañ-samāsaṃ karmadhārayaṃ ca varjayitvā 'nyas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati ity etad adhikṛtaṃ viditavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:10125: dṛḍhaseno rājā anañ iti kim ? asenā /
GS24jvkasipu:10131: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye kanthā-anatas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10149: yady upajñeyasya+upakramyasya ca arthasya ādir ākhyātum iṣyate tata etad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10151: pāṇiner upajñānena pratham ataḥ praṇītam akālakaṃ vyākaraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:10168: chāyā-antas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati bāhulye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:10196: aśālā ca yā sabhā tadantas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10206: senā surā chāyā śālā niśā ity evam antas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:10219: parasya yal liṅgaṃ tat bhavati dvandvasya tatpuruṣasya ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10227: dviguḥ - pañcasu kapālesu saṃskṛtaḥ puroḍāśaḥ pañcakapālaḥ / [#160]
GS24jvkasipu:10237: tatra+ekavad-bhāvād anyatra paravilliṅgatāyāṃ prāptāyām idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10250: hemanta-śiśirau ahorātre ity etayoś chandasi viṣaye pūrvavalliṅgaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10269: rātra ahna aha ity ete puṃsi bhāṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:10296: ardharcādayaḥ śabdāḥ puṃsi napuṃsake ca bhāṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:10302: śabda-rūpa-āśrayā ca+iyaṃ dvi-liṅgatā kvacid arthabhedena api vyavatiṣṭhate,
GS24jvkasipu:10540: kiṃ tarhi ? ekasya+eva abhidheyasya pūrvaṃ śabdena pratipāditasya dvitīyaṃ pratipādanam anvādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10546: etadas tra-tasos tra-tasau ca anudātau // PS_2,4.33 //
GS24jvkasipu:10549: etado 'nvādeśa-viṣayasya aśādeśo bhavati anudāttaḥ tra-tasoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10550: tau ca api tra-tasāv anudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10556: etado 'ś ity ādeśe labhe punar vacanam anudātta-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:10561: dvitīyā ṭā os ity eteṣu parata idam etador anvādeśa-viṣayayoḥ ena-śabda ādeśo ādeśo bhavati anudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10569: etadaḥ khalv api -- etaṃ chātraṃ chanto 'dhyāpaya,
GS24jvkasipu:10581: yatra kiñcid vidhāya vākyāntareṇa punar anyadupadiśyate so 'nvādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10582: iha tu vastu-nirdeśamātraṃ kṛtvā ekam eva vidhānam //
GS24jvkasipu:10588: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyamast ad ārdhadhātuke veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:10593: tena ārdhadhātuka-vivakṣāyām ādeśeṣu kṛteṣu paścād yathā-prāptaṃ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:10598: ado jagdhir lyap ti kiti // PS_2,4.36 //
GS24jvkasipu:10600: ado jagdhiḥ ādeśo bhavati lyapi parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:10621: luṅi sani ca parato 'do ghasḷ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10633: ghañi api ca parataḥ ado ghasḷ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10640: chandasi viṣaye bahulam ado ghasḷ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10645: anyatarasya aṃgrahaṇam eva kasmān na kriyate tad eva+uttara-artham api bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:10658: veño vayiḥ ādeśo bhavati anyatrasyāṃ liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10672: hanter dhātoḥ vadha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati liṅi parata ārdhadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:10676: tasya sthānivadbhāvād avadhīt iti halanta-lakṣanā vṛddhiḥ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:10680: luṅi ca parataḥ hano vadha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10683: ātmanepadeṣu luṅi vikalpo yathā syāl liṅi mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:10688: ātmanepadeṣu parato hano luṅy anyatarasyāṃ vadha ity ayamādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10696: iṇaḥ gā ity ayam āveśo bhavati luṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10698: luṅi iti vartamāne punar luṅ-grahaṇam ātmanepadeṣv anyatarasyām (*2,4.44)
GS24jvkasipu:10718: sani parataḥ iṇo 'bodhana-arthasya gamir ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10731: iṅaś ca sani parato gamir ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10739: gāṅ adeśo bhavati iṅo liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10744: ity atra asya grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:10745: na hi sthānivadbhāvena gāṅ iti rūpaṃ labhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:10749: lugi ḷṅi ca parata iṅo vibhāṣā gāṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10772: ṇau sanpare caṅpare ca parataḥ iṅo vibhāṣā gāṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10782: aster dhātor bhūḥ it ayam ādeśo bhavati ārdhadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:10791: tathā cocyate - anupratoge tu bhuvā 'styabādhanam smaranti kartur vacanān manīṣiṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10832: liṭi parataścakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ ādeśaḥ vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10840: ajer dhātoḥ vī ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty ārdhadhātuke parato ghañapau varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:10860: yau prabhūte aje rvā vī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10869: ṇyāntāt kṣatriyagotrād ārṣād ñitaś ca prayoḥ aṇḍañoryūni lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10883: it yaṇ, tasmād yūni iñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:10886: ārṣa -- ṛṣyaṇ (*4,1.114), tasmād yūni iñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:10894: , tasmād yūni prāg dīvyato 'ṇ (*4,1.83), tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:10926: paila ity evam ādibhyaś ca yuva-pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10932: anye paila-ādayaḥ iñantāḥ tebhyaḥ iñaḥ prācām (*2,4.60)
GS24jvkasipu:10956: gotre ya iñ tadantād yuva-pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10960: yañ-iñoś ca (*4,1.101) iti phak, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:10972: taulvaly-ādibhyaḥ parasya yuvapratyayasya na lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11008: tasya tadrāja-sañjñasya pratyayasya bahuṣu vartamānasya astrīliṅgasya lug bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11009: tena+eva cet tadrājena kṛtaṃ bahutvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11020: priyo vāṅgo yeṣāṃ te ime priyavāṅgāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11026: bahuṣu tena+eva astriyām iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:11027: yaska ity evam ādibhyaḥ parasya gotra-pratyayasya bahuṣu vartamānasya astrīliṅgasya lug bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11028: tena+eva ced gotra-pratyayena kṛtaṃ bahutvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11029: pratyaya-vidheś ca anyatra laukikasya gotrasya grahaṇam ity anantarāpatye 'pi lug bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:11053: tataḥ parebhyaś caturbhyaḥ gṛṣṭy-ādibhyaś ca (*4,1.136) iti ḍhañ /
GS24jvkasipu:11086: yaño 'jś ca gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu vartamānasya astrīliṅgasya luṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11103: yañādīnām ekadvayor vā tatpuruṣe ṣaṣṭhyā upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:11106: evaṃ baidasya kulaṃ baidakulaṃ bidakulaṃ vā /
GS24jvkasipu:11118: atry-ādibhyaḥ parasya gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11119: atri-śabdāt itaś ca aniñaḥ (*4,1.122) iti ḍhak /
GS24jvkasipu:11137: bahvacaḥ prātipadikāt ya iñ vihitaḥ prācya-gotre bharatagotre ca vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:11148: teṣāṃ punar grahaṇaṃ jñāpana-artham anyatra prāg grahaṇe bharata-grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11150: iti bharatānāṃ yuvapratyayasya lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11156: gopavana-ādibhyaḥ prasya gotrapratyayasya lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11173: tebhyaś ca bahuṣu lug bhavaty eva,
GS24jvkasipu:11179: tika-ādibhyaḥ kitava-ādibhyaś ca dvandve gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11183: vāṅkharayaś ca bhānḍīrathayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95)
GS24jvkasipu:11188: pāphakayaś ca nārakayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95)
GS24jvkasipu:11190: bākanakhayaś ca śvāgudapariṇaddhayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95)
GS24jvkasipu:11194: tayor luk, aubjayaś ca kākubhāś ca ubjakakubhāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11195: lāṅkayaś ca śāntamukhayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95)
GS24jvkasipu:11202: bhrāṣṭakayaś ca kāpiṣṭhalayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95)
GS24jvkasipu:11204: kārṣṇājinayaś ca kārṣṇasundarayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95)
GS24jvkasipu:11214: upaka ity evam ādibhyaḥ parasya gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu lug bhavati anyatarasyāṃ dvandve ca advandve ca /
GS24jvkasipu:11216: eteṣaṃ ca madye trayo dvandvāstikakitav ādiṣu paṭhyante - upakalamakāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:11219: teṣāṃ pūrveṇa+eva nityam eva lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11231: pariśiṣṭānāṃ ca dvandve 'dvandve ca vikalpaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11261: āgastya-kauṇḍinyayor gotrapratyayayoḥ aṇo yañaś ca bahuṣu lug bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11267: madyodātto hi kuṇḍinī-śabdas tadādeśo 'pi tathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:11271: iti luki pratiṣiddhe āgastīyāḥ chatrāḥ iti vṛddha-lakṣaṇaścho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11279: supo vibhakter dhātu-sañjñāyāḥ prātipadika-sañjñāyāś ca lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11298: chandasi viṣaye śapo bhaulaṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11299: adiprabhṛtibhya uktas tato na bhavaty api - vṛtraṃ hanti /
GS24jvkasipu:11301: anyebhyaś ca bhavati - trādhvaṃ no devāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11305: yaṅo lug bhavati aci pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11308: tena chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca yaṅo lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11328: chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ śapaḥ ślur bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11331: juhoty-ādibhyast āvan na bhavati - dāti priyāṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:11339: gāti sthā ghu pā bhū ity etebhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11358: ghrā gheṭ śā chā sā ity etebhya uttarasya sicaḥ prasmaipadeṣu vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11371: tan-ādibhya uttarasya sicaḥ ta-thāsoḥ parato vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11383: mantra-viṣaye ghasa hvara naśa vṛ daha āt vṛca kṛ gami jani ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya leḥ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11385: hvara iti hvṛ kauṭilye - mā hvārmitrasya tvā /
GS24jvkasipu:11387: vṛ iti vṛṅvṛñoḥ sāmānyena grahanam -- suruco vena āvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11391: vṛc -- mā no asmin mahādhane parā vṛg bhārabhṛdyathā /
GS24jvkasipu:11407: avyayād uttarasya āpaḥ supaś ca lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11414: na avyayībhāvād ato 'm tv apañcamyāḥ // PS_2,4.83 //
GS24jvkasipu:11417: dantād avyayībhāvād uttarasya supo na lug bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11418: amādeśas tu tasya supo bhavaty apañcamyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11419: etasmin pratiṣiddhe pañcamyāḥ śravanam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11431: pūrveṇa nityam ambhāve prāpte vacanam idam /
GS24jvkasipu:11432: tṛtīyā-saptamyoḥ vibhaktyor bahulam ambhāvo bhavati avyayībhāve /
GS24jvkasipu:11446: luḍ-ādeśasya prathamapuruṣasya prasmaipadasya ātmanepadasya ca yathākramam ḍā rau ras ity ete ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:11454: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11474: ayam apy adhikāro yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate,
GS24jvkasipu:11476: paraś ca sa bhavati dhātor vā prātipadikād vā yaḥ pratyaya-sañjñaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11486: ādy-udāttaś ca sa bhavati yaḥ pratyaya-sañjñaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11487: aniyatasvara-pratyaya-prasaṅge 'nekākṣu ca pratyayeṣu deśasya aniyame sati vacanam idam āder udātta-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:11494: supaḥ pitaś ca pratyayā anudāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:11504: kita nivāse etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ san pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11509: nindākṣamāvyādhipratīkāreṣu sanniṣate 'nyatra yathā prāptaṃ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:11522: ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ san pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11540: dhātoḥ karmaṇaḥ samāna-kartṛkād icchāyāṃ vā // PS_3,1.7 //
GS24jvkasipu:11543: tasmād icchāyām arthe vā san pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11559: dhātoḥ iti vidhānād atra sanaḥ ārdhadhātuka-sañjñā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11571: sarūpaḥ pratyayo neṣṭaḥ sanantān na saniṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:11576: iṣikarmaṇaḥ eṣituḥ eva ātmasambandhinaḥ subantād icchāyām arthe vā kyac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11596: subantāt karmaṇaḥ ātmecchāyāṃ kāmyac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11607: upamanāt karmaṇaḥ subantād ācāre 'rthe vā kyac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11618: upamānāt kartuḥ subantād ācāre 'rthe vā kyaṅ-prattyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11627: {sakārasyeṣyate lopaḥ śabdaśāstravicakṣanaiḥ} ojāyamānaṃ yo ahiṃ jaghāna /
GS24jvkasipu:11630: salopa-vidhau ca kartuḥ iti sthāna-ṣaṣṭhī sampadyate,
GS24jvkasipu:11644: bhṛśādibhyo bhuvy-acver lopaś ca halaḥ // PS_3,1.12 //
GS24jvkasipu:11646: bhṛśa ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo 'cvyantebhyo bhuvi bhavaty arthe kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11682: lohitādibhyo ḍājantebhyaś ca bhavaty arthe kyaṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11689: yāni lohitādiṣu paṭhyante tebhyaḥ kyaṅ eva,
GS24jvkasipu:11697: yathā ca kakāraḥ sāmānyagrahaṇārtho 'nubadhyate naḥ kye (*1,4.15) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11698: na hi paṭhitānāṃ madhye nakārāntaḥ śabdo 'sti /
GS24jvkasipu:11699: kṛbhvastibhir iva kyaṣā 'pi yoge ḍāj bhavati ity etad eva vacanam jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:11700: acveḥ ity anuvṛtter abhūta-tadbhāve kyaṣ vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11713: kaṣṭa-śabdāc caturthīsamarthāt kramaṇe 'rthe 'nārjave kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11730: romantha-śabdāt tapaḥ-śabdāc ca karmaṇo yathākramaṃ varticaror arthayoḥ kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11733: iha mā bhūt, kīṭo romanthaṃ vartayati /
GS24jvkasipu:11740: bāṣpa-śabdād ūṣma-śabdāc ca karmana udvamane 'rthe kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11748: śabda vaira kalaha abhra kanva megha ity etebhayaḥ karaṇe karoty arthe kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11773: sukha ity evam ādibhyaḥ karmabhyaḥ vedanāyām arthe 'nubhave kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11795: namas varivas citraṅ ity etebhyo vā kyac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11805: puccha bhāṇḍa cīvara ity etebhyo ṇiṅ pratyayo bhavati karaṇaviśeṣe /
GS24jvkasipu:11820: muṇḍa miśra ślakṣṇa lavaṇa vrata vastra hala kala kṛta tūsta ity etebhyaḥ karaṇe ṇic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11825: vratāt bhojane tannivṛttau ca - payo vratayati /
GS24jvkasipu:11837: dhātor eka-aco hala-ādeḥ kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅ // PS_3,1.22 //
GS24jvkasipu:11839: eka-aj yo dhātur halādiḥ kriyāsamabhihāre vartate tasmād yaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11866: gativacanād dhatoḥ kauṭilye gamyamāne nityaṃ yaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11876: lupa sada cara japa jabha daha daśa gṝ ityetebhyo bhāva-garhāyāṃ dhātvartha-garhāyāṃ yaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11926: tasminn abhidheye dhātoḥ ṇic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11929: tat karoti ity upasaṅkhyānaṃ sūtrayati ity ādyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:11931: ākhyānāt kṛtas tad ācaṣṭa iti ṇic kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivac ca kārakam /
GS24jvkasipu:11932: ākhyānāt kṛdanttaṇ ṇic vaktavyaḥ tad ācaṣṭe ity etasminn arthe,
GS24jvkasipu:11943: ujjayinyāḥ prasthito māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryodgamanaṃ sambhāvayate sūryam udgamayati /
GS24jvkasipu:11950: kaṇḍūñ ity evam ādibhyo yak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11953: tatra dhātvadhikārād dhatubhyaḥ eva pratyayo vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:11957: āha ca ayam imaṃ dīrghaṃ manye dhatur vibhāṣitaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12002: pana ca ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ āya-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12008: stuty-arthena paninā sāhacaryāt tadarthaḥ paṇiḥ pratyayam utpādayati na vyavahāra-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12022: dhātu-vihitānāṃ pratyayānām āyanādayo na bhavanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:12033: ārdhadhātuka-viṣaye ārdhadhātuka-vivakṣāyām āyādayaḥ pratyayā vā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:12037: nityaṃ pratyayaprasaṅge tad utpattir ārdhadhātuka-viṣaye vikalpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:12047: pratyaya-grahaṇa-paribhāṣā+eva pada-sañjñāyām antavacanena liṅgena pratiṣiddhā satī punar iha antavacanena pratiprasūyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12055: tasmin luṭi ca parato dhātor yathā-saṅkhyaṃ syatāsī pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12065: dhātoḥ sip pratyayo bhavati bahulaṃ leti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12076: tataḥ pratyayāntebhyaś ca dhātubhyaḥ ām pratyayo bhavati liṭi parato 'mantra-viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:12092: tasmāc ca liṭi parata ām pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12106: atha vā -- vācya ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvo yaṅ-prasiddhiḥ prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:12114: etebhyaś ca liṭi parata ām pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12123: etebhyo liṭi parato 'nyatarasyām ām pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12135: etebhyo liṭi parataḥ ām pratyayo bhavati anyatarasyām,
GS24jvkasipu:12146: ām-pratyayasya paścāt kṛñ anuprayujyate liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12148: tat sāmarthyād aster bhūbhāvaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12165: kiṃ tarhi sarvāṇy eva loḍ-vacanāny anuprayujyante,
GS24jvkasipu:12174: abhyutsādayām ity evam ādayaḥ chandasi viṣaye 'nyatarasyāṃ nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:12175: sadijaniramīṇāṃ ṇyantānāṃ luḍi ām pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12176: cinoter api tatra+eva+aampratyayo dvirvacanaṃ kutvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12177: akar iti caturbhir api pratyekam anuprayogaḥ sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12178: pāvayām kriyāt iti pavateḥ punāter vā ṇyantasya liṅi ām nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:12181: vidām-akran iti vider luṅi ām nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:12199: dhātoḥ cliḥ pratyayo bhavati luḍi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12212: āgamān udāttatvaṃ hi pratyaya-svaram iva citsvaram api badheta iti sthāninyādeśe ca dviś cakāro 'nubadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12223: śalanto yo dhātur ig-upadhas tasmāt parasya cleḥ aniṭaḥ kṣa ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12234: śliṣeḥ dhātoḥ āliṅgana-kriyāvacanāt parasya cleḥ kṣaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12245: dṛśeḥ dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ kṣa-ādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12254: śri dru sru ity etebhyaś ca parasya cleḥ caṅ-ādeśo bhavati kartavācini luṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12267: iti yadā ṇiṅ na asti tadaa+etat upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:12277: etābhyām uttarasya cler vibhāṣā caṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12293: gupeḥ parasya cleḥ chandasi viṣaye vibhāṣā caṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12294: yatra āya-pratyayo nāsti tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12298: bhāśāyāṃ tu caṅantaṃ varjayitvā śiṣṭaṃ rūpatrayaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:12306: etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ ṇyantebhyaḥ pūrveṇa cleścaṅi prāpte chandasi viṣaye na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12321: ebhyaḥ parasya cler aṅ-ādeśo bhavati kartṛ-vācini lugi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12322: asyateḥ puṣādipāṭhādevāṅi siddhe punar grahaṇam ātmanepada-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:12337: etebhyaś ca parasya cleḥ aṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12346: lipi-sici-hva ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ cleḥ aṅ-ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:12356: dyutādibhyaś ca dhātubhyaḥ parasya cleḥ parasmaipadeṣu parataḥ aṅādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12370: sṛ gatau, śāsu anuśiṣṭau ṛ gatau ity etebhyaḥ parasya cleḥ aṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12376: cakāraḥ parasmaipadeṣu ity anukarṣaṇa-arthaḥ taccottaratropayogaṃ yāsyati //
GS24jvkasipu:12380: irito dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ aṅ-ādeśo vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12399: etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ parasya cler vā aṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12410: kecit tu varnayanti dvayor upādāna-sāmarthyād gluñcer anunāsikalopo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:12415: kṛ mṛ dṛ ity etebhyaḥ parasya cleḥ chandasi viṣaye aṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12429: pada gatau, asmād dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ ciṇ-ādeso bhavati taśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12445: etebhyaḥ parasya cleḥ taśabde parato 'nyatarasyāṃ ciṇ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12455: ajantād dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ karmakrtari ta-śabde parataḥ ciṇādeṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12469: asmāt parasya cleḥ ciṇādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:12478: asmāt parasya cleḥ karmakrtari ciṇ-ādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12487: asmāt parasya cleḥ ciṇādeśo na bhavati karmakartari anutāpe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12490: tatra hi bhāvakarmaṇor api pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12497: dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ ciṇ-ādeśo bhavati bhāve karmaṇi ta-śabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12499: karmaṇi khalv api -- akāri kaṭo devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:12505: bhāvakarma-vācini sārvadhātuke parato dhatoḥ yak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12518: kartṛ-vācini sārvadhātuke parato dhātoḥ śap pratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12526: div ity evam ādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ śyan partyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12558: tasmān nityaṃ śyani prāpte 'nupasargād vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12568: sampūrvāc ca yaseḥ vā śyan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12574: ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ śnupratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12582: tatsaṃniyogena śruvaḥ śṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12595: asmāt tanūkaraṇe vartamānāt anatarasyāṃ śnu-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12604: tuda vyathane ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ śa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12612: rudhir āvaraṇe ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ śnam pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12623: tanu vistāre ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ kṛñaś ca u-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12629: tanādi-pāṭhād eva u-pratyaye siddhe karoter upādānaṃ niyama-artham,
GS24jvkasipu:12632: iti vibhāṣā sico lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12644: ato lopasya sthānivadbhāvāt guṇo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:12648: ḍukrīñ dravyavinimaye ity evam ādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ śnā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12658: etebhyaḥ śnā pratyayo bhavati, śnuḥ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12664: udittva-pratijñānāt sautrāṇām api dhātūnāṃ sarvārthatvaṃ vijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:12669: hala uttarasya śnā-pratyayasya śanaj-ādeśo bhavati hau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12675: itarathā hi pratyaya-antaram eva sarvaviṣayaṃ vijñāyeta // [#194]
GS24jvkasipu:12680: chandasi viṣaye śnaḥ śāyac ādeśo bhavati, śānaj api /
GS24jvkasipu:12682: śānacaḥ khalv api - badhāna deva savitaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12687: teṣāṃ chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ vyatyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12703: vyatyayamicchati śāstrakṛdeṣāṃ so 'pi ca sidhyati bahulakena //
GS24jvkasipu:12707: āśiṣi viṣaye yo liṅ tasmin parataḥ chandasi viṣaye aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12726: karmasthayā kriyayā tulyakriyaḥ kartā karmavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12727: yasmin karmaṇi kartṛbhūte 'pi tadvat kriyā lakṣyate yathā karmaṇi,
GS24jvkasipu:12731: iti kartṛ-grahaṇam iha anuvṛttaṃ prathamayā vipariṇamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12741: tatra lānuvṛtter lāntasya kartā karmavad bhavati iti kusūlād dvitīyā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12752: karmasthaḥ pacater bhāvaḥ karmasthā ca bhideḥ kriyā /
GS24jvkasipu:12753: māsāsibhāvaḥ kartṛsthaḥ kartṛsthā ca gameḥ kriyā //
GS24jvkasipu:12773: duha sanu nam it yeteṣaṃ karmakartari yak-ciṇau karmavadbhāva-apadiṣṭau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12810: kuṣi-rajoḥ prācāṃ śyan parasmaipadaṃ ca // PS_3,1.90 //
GS24jvkasipu:12814: anayor dhātvoḥ karmakartari prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena śyan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:12823: tena liṭ-liṅoḥ syādi-viṣaye ca na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12836: ātṛtīyādhyāya-parisamāpteḥ yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo dhātoḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:12845: dhātoḥ ity evaṃ vihitasya yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:12846: iha mā bhūt, lūbhyām, lūbhiḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:12850: tatra+etasmin dhātv-adhikāre tṛtīye yat saptamī-nirdiṣṭaṃ tad upapada-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12854: itarathā hi saptamī śrūyate yatra tatra+eva syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:12857: yatra vā saptamī-śrutir asti saptamyāṃ janer ḍaḥ (*3,2.97)
GS24jvkasipu:12863: karoti kaṭam iti pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12870: asmin dhātv-adhikāre tiṅ-varjitaḥ pratyayaḥ kṛt-sajñako bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12880: asmin dhātv-adhikāre 'smānarūpaḥ pratyayo 'pavādo vā bādhako bhavati stryadhikāra-vihita-pratyayaṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:12907: prāg etasmāṇ ṇvulsaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:12941: aj-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā halantāṇ ṇyataṃ vakṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:12954: pavarga-antād dhātoḥ akāropadhāt yat prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12979: etebhyaś ca anupasargebhyo yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12995: avadya paṇya varyā ity ete śabdā nipātyante garhya paṇitavya anirodha ity eteṣv artheṣu yathā-saṅkhyam /
GS24jvkasipu:12996: avadhyam iti nipātyate garhyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13016: vaher dhātoḥ karaṇe yat pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13023: ṛ gatau, asmāṇ ṇyati prāpte svāmi-vaiśyayoḥ abhidheyayoḥ yat pratyayo nipatyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13026: yato 'nāvaḥ (*6,1.213) ity ādy-udāttatve prāpte - svāminyantodāttatvaṃ ca vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:13032: upasaryā iti nipātyate kālyā cet prajane bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13047: jīryateḥ nañpūrvāt saṅgate saṅgamane kartari yat prayayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13058: vader dhātoḥ subantoḥ upapade anupasarge kyap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13069: bhavater dhātoḥ subante upapade 'nupasarge bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13083: hanter dhātoḥ subanta upapade 'nupasarge bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13088: ṇyat tu bhāve na bhavty anabhidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:13096: eti stu śās vṛ dṛ juṣ ity etebhyaḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13103: kyap iti vartamāne punaḥ kyab-grahaṇaṃ bādhaka-bādhana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:13105: iti ṇyataṃ bādhitvā kyab eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13107: vṛ-grahaṇe vṛño grahaṇam iṣyate, na vṛṅaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13121: ṛkāra-upadhāc ca dhātoḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati kḷpi-cṛtī varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:13123: vṛdhu - vṛdhyam akḷpi-cṛteḥ iti kim ? kalpyam /
GS24jvkasipu:13144: bhṛño dhatoḥ asañjñāyāṃ viṣaye kyap prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13152: sañjñāyāṃ puṃsi dṛṣṭatvān na te bhāryā prasidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:13157: mṛjer dhātoḥ vibhāṣā kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13165: rājasuya surya mṛṣodya rucya kupya kṛṣṭapacya avyathya ity ete śabdāḥ kyapi nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:13167: rājā vā iha sūyate rājasūyaḥ kratuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13172: mṛṣāpūrvasya vadateḥ pakṣe yati prāpte nityaṃ kyab nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13185: bhider ujjheś ca kyap nipātyate nade 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:13194: puṣeḥ sidheś ca adhikaraṇe kyap nipātyate nakṣatre abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:13202: nipūya vinīya jitya ity ete śabdā nipātyante yathā-saṅkhyaṃ muñja kalka hali ity eteṣu artheṣu vodhyeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:13203: vipūrvāt pavater nayateś ca tathā jayater yati prāpte karmaṇi kyab nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13213: prati api ity evaṃ pūrvād graheḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:13223: pade asvairiṇi bāhyāyāṃ pakṣye carthe graher dhātoḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13242: kṛño vṛṣaś ca vibhāṣā kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13243: karoter ṇyati prāpte varṣateḥ ṛdupadhatvāt nitye kyapi prāpte vibhāṣārbhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13249: yugyam iti nipātyate patraṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13261: tasminn upapade vaser dhātoḥ kāle 'dhikaraṇe ṇyat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13263: saha vasato 'smin kāle sūryācandramasau iti amāvāsya, amāvasyā /
GS24jvkasipu:13265: ity atra amāvasyā-śabdasya api grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13267: tathaikavṛttitā tayoḥ svaraś ca me prasidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:13272: yad iha lakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:13273: niṣṭarkyaḥ iti kṛtī chedane ity asmān nispūrvāt kyapi prāpte ṇyat,
GS24jvkasipu:13277: devaśabde upapade hvayater juhoter vā kyap,
GS24jvkasipu:13316: niṣṭarkye vyatyayaṃ vidyān nisaḥ ṣatvaṃ nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:13318: ṇyadekasmāc caturghyaḥ kyap caturbhyaś ca yato vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13319: ṇyadekasmād ya-śabdaś ca dvau kyapau ṇyadvidhiś catuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:13324: ṛvarṇa-antād dhātor halantāc ca ṇyat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13333: uvarṇa-antād dhātoḥ ṇyat prayayo bhavati āvaśyake dyotye /
GS24jvkasipu:13349: āṅ-pūrvāt sunoteḥ yu vapi rapi lapi trapi cama ity etebhyaś ca ṇyat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13368: yaśca gārhapatyād ānīyate dakṣiṇāgnir āhavanīyena saha ekayoniḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:13371: tasya hi yonir vikalpyate vaiśyakulād vittavato bhrāṣṭrādvā gārhapatyād vā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:13372: ānāyyo 'nitya iti ced dakṣiṇāgnau kṛtaṃ bhavet /
GS24jvkasipu:13373: ekayonau tu taṃ vidyād āneyo hy anyathā bhavet //
GS24jvkasipu:13385: jyeṣṭhāya putrāya pitā brahma brūyāt praṇāyyāntevāsine,
GS24jvkasipu:13388: tad abhāvena niṣkāmatayā asammatir antevāsī bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13389: tasmai niṣkāmāya mokṣa-arthaṃ yatamānāyāntevāsine praṇāyyāya brahma brūyāt iti yujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:13393: pāyyādayaḥ śabdā nipātyante yathā-saṅkhyaṃ māne haviṣi nivāse sāmidhenyāṃ ca abhidheyāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:13405: tatra ca dhāyyā iti na sarvā sāmidhenī ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:13414: kuṇḍapāyya sañcāyya ity etau śabdau nipātyete kratāv abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:13415: kuṇḍa-śabde tṛtīyānta upapade pibater dhātor adhikaraṇe yat pratyayo nipātyate yuk ca /
GS24jvkasipu:13416: kuṇḍena pīyate 'smin somaḥ iti kuṇḍapāyyaḥ kratuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13426: paricāyya upacāyya samūhya ity ete śabdā nipātyante agnāv abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:13427: paripūrvat upapūrvāc ca cinoter ṇya dāyādeśau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:13430: sampūrvād vaheḥ samprasāraṇaṃ dīrghatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13461: tribhyo gaṇebhyaḥ trayaḥ pratyayāḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:13465: nandi-graha-pacādayaś ca na dhātu-pāṭhataḥ sanniviṣṭā gṛhyante,
GS24jvkasipu:13467: nandana ramaṇa ity evam ādiṣu prātipadika-gaṇeṣu apoddhṛtya prakṛtayo nirdiśyante / [#207]
GS24jvkasipu:13580: ig-upadhebhyaḥ jānāteḥ prīṇāteḥ kirateś ca kapratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13592: ākārāntebhyo dhātubhyaḥ upasarga upapade kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13601: pādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ upasarge upapade śa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13640: dāño dhāñaś ca vibhāṣā śa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13650: jvala dīptau ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ kasa gatau ity evam antebhyo vibhāṣā ṇa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13664: vyadha āsrau saṃsrau atīṇ avasā avahṛ liha śliṣa śvasa ity etebhyaś ca ṇa pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13665: ākāra-antatvād eva śyāyateḥ pratyatye siddhe punar vacanaṃ bādhakabādhana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:13683: dunoter nayateś ca anupasarge ṇa-pratyayo bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:13703: graher dhātoḥ ka-pratyayo bhavati gehe kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:13711: dhātoḥ ṣvun pratyayo bhavati śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:13724: gāyateḥ thakan pratyayo bhavati śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:13730: gāyateḥ ṇyuṭ pratyayo bhavati śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:13737: gāyateḥ ṇyuṭ pratyayo bhavati śilpiti kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:13743: pru sṛ lū ity etebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ samabhihāre vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13748: sādhukāriṇi vun vidhānāt sakṛd api yaḥ suṣṭhu karoti tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13749: bahuśo yo duṣṭaṃ karoti tatra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:13753: āśiṣi gamyamānāyāṃ dhātum ātrāt vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13758: amuṣyāḥ kriyāyaḥ kartā bhavet ity evam āśāsyate //
GS24jvkasipu:13759: iti śrījyādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ // [#211]
GS24jvkasipu:13770: sarvatra karmaṇi upapade dhātoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13779: himavantaṃ śṛṇoti ity atra na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13797: māṅ māne ity etebhyaś ca karmaṇy-upapade aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13832: iti uttaraṃ karmaṇi iti ca supi iti ca dvayam apy anuavartate /
GS24jvkasipu:13833: tatra sakarmakeṣu dhātuṣu krmaṇi ity etad upatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:13839: tunda-śokayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ parimṛja-apanudoḥ dhātvoḥ kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13857: dadāteḥ jānāteś ca dhātoḥ preṇopasṛṣṭāt karmaṇy-upapade kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13866: saṃpūrvāt khyā ity etasmād dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13873: gāyateḥ pibateś ca dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade 'nupasarge ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13888: yā bāhmaṇī surāpī bhavati naināṃ devāḥ patilokaṃ nayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:13889: yā brahmaṇī surāpā bhavati naināṃ devāḥ patilokaṃ nayanti // [#213]
GS24jvkasipu:13894: harater dhātor anudyamane vartamānāt karmaṇi upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13917: vayasi gamyamāne harateḥ karmaṇy-upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13920: yad udyamanaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ sambhāvyamānaṃ vā vayo gamayati,
GS24jvkasipu:13927: āṅ-pūrvād harateḥ karmaṇy-upapade ac pratyayo bhavati tācchīlye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:13931: puṣpādy-āharane svābhāvikī phalānapekṣā pravṛttir asya ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13947: stamba karṇa ity etayoḥ subantayor upapadayor yathā-saṅkhyaṃ rami-japoḥ dhātvoḥ acpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13949: japeḥ śabda-karmakatvāt karma na sambhavati iti supi ity etad iha abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13960: śamy upapade dhātu-mātrāt sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye acpratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13964: dhātu-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā dhātoḥ iti vartata eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:13965: śami-sañjñāyām iti siddhe dhātu-grahaṇaṃ kṛño hetvādiṣu ṭapratiṣedha-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:13973: śeter dhātor adhikaraṇe subanta upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13991: carer dhātor adhikaraṇe subanta upapade ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14001: bhikṣā senā ādāya ity eteṣu upapadeṣu careḥ dhatoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14009: puras agratas agre ity eteṣu upapadeṣu sarteḥ dhātoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14016: pūrva-śabde kartṛ-vāciny-upapade sarter dhātoḥ ṭapratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14023: karmaṇi upapade karoteḥ dhātoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati hetau tācchīlye ānulomye ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:14040: karmaṇi supi iti ca dvayam apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:14042: divā-ādiṣu upapadeṣu karoter dhātoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14044: divā-śabdo adhikaraṇa-vacanaḥ supi ity asya viśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:14085: karama-śabde upapade karma-vācini karoteḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati bhṛtau gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:14088: karma karoti iti karmakaraḥ bhṛtakaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14093: śabdādiṣu upapadeṣu karoteḥ ṭapratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14108: stamba śakṛt ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ inpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14118: dṛti nātha ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ harater dhātoḥ paśau kartari in pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14126: phalegrahiḥ ātmambhariḥ ity etau śabdau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:14127: phala-śabdasya upapadasya ekārāntatvam inpratyayaś ca graher nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14129: ātma-śabdasya upapadasya mumāgama inpratyayaś ca bhṛño nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14140: etebhyaḥ karmaṇy-upapade chandasi viṣaye inpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14141: brahmavaniṃ tvā kṣatravaniṃ suprajāvaniṃ rāyaspoṣavaniṃ paryūhāmi /
GS24jvkasipu:14149: ejṛ kampane ity asmāt ṇyantāt karmaṇy-upapade khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14162: nāsikāstanayoḥ karmaṇorupapadayoḥ dhmādheṭordhātvoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14166: nāsikāyāṃ tu dhmaś ca dheṭaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14169: tac ca+etan nāsika-stanayor iti lakṣaṇavyabhicāracihnād alpāctarasya apūrvanipātanāl labhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14170: dheṭaḥ ṭitvāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14175: nāḍī muṣti ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ dhmādheṭoḥ khaśpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14193: vaha prāpaṇe ity etābhyām utpūrvābhyāṃ kūle karmaṇi upapade khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14199: vaha abhra ity etayoḥ karamṇor upapadayoḥ liher dhātoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14207: tasmin karmaṇy-upapade paceḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14214: mita nakha ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ paceḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14221: vidhu arus ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ tuder dhātoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14227: asūrya lalāṭa ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ dṛśi-tapoḥ dhātvoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14234: evaṃ nāma guptā yad aparihārya-darśanaṃ sūryam api na paśyanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:14238: ugrampaśya irammada pāṇindhama ity ete śabdā nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:14241: pāṇayo dhmāyante eṣu iti pāṇindhamāḥ panthānaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:14245: priya vaśa ity etayoḥ karamṇoḥ upapadayoḥ vadeḥ dhātoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14265: dviṣat-parayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ tāpeḥ chātoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14277: vākśabde karmaṇi upapade yameḥ dhātoḥ khac prayayo bhavati vrate gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:14284: pur sarva ity etayoḥ karamaṇoḥ upapadayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dārisahoḥ dhātvoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14292: sarvakūla abhra karīra ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu kaṣeḥ dhātoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14301: megha ṛti bhaya ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu kaṛñaḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14310: kṣema priya madra ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu karoteḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14318: vā iti vaktavye punar aṇ-grahanaṃ hetvādiṣu ṭapratiṣedha-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:14323: āśita-śabde subante upapade bhavater dhātoḥ karaṇe bhāve ca-arthe khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14329: karmaṇi iti supi iti ca prakṛtaṃ sajñāvaśād yathāsambhavaṃ sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14330: bhṛ tṝ vṛ ji dhāri sahi tapi dama ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14344: gameḥ dhātoḥ supi upapade sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14352: anta atyanta adhvan dura pāra sarva ananta ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu gameḥ ḍapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14373: apra āha - ḍaprakaraṇe 'nyeṣv api dṛśyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14381: āśiṣi gamyamānāyāṃ hanter dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade ḍaprayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14387: dārāv upapade āṅpūrvād hanteḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14397: karmaṇy-upapade sampūrvāt hanteḥ dhātoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14407: apapūrvāt hanteḥ dhātoḥ kleśa-tamasoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ ḍapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14415: kumāra śīrṣa ity etayoḥ upapadayoḥ hanteḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14422: hanteḥ jāyāpatyoḥ karmaṇoḥ uapapadayoḥ lakṣaṇavati kartari ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14424: atha vā lakṣaṇe dyotye ṭak pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:14428: amanuṣyakartṛke vartamānād hanteḥ dhātoḥ karmaṇi upapade ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14442: śaktau gamyamānāyāṃ hasti kapāṭayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ hanteḥ ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14451: pāṇigha tāḍagha ity etau śabdau nipātyete śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:14452: pāṇi tāḍa ity etayoḥ karmaṇoḥ upapadayoḥ hanteḥ dhatoḥ ṭak pratyayo bhavati, [#223]
GS24jvkasipu:14454: tasmiṃśca parato hanteḥ ṭilopo ghatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14463: āḍhya-subhaga-sthūla-palita-nagna-andha-priyeṣu cvy-artheṣv acvau kṛñaḥ karaṇe khyun // PS_3,2.56 //
GS24jvkasipu:14465: āḍhyādiṣu karmasu upapadeṣu cvy-artheṣu acvyanteṣu karoteḥ dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake khyun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14477: āḍhyaṃ tailena kurvanti abhyañjayanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14481: nanu ca khyunā mukte lyuṭā bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:14482: na ca lyuṭaḥ khyunaś ca viśeṣo 'sti,
GS24jvkasipu:14484: evaṃ tarhi pratiṣedha-sāmarthyāt khyuni asati lyuḍ api na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14490: āḍhyādisu subanteṣu upapadeṣu cvyartheṣu acvyanteṣu bhavater dhātoḥ kartari kārake khiṣṇuc,
GS24jvkasipu:14517: spṛśe rdhātor anudake subanta upapade kvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14522: subantamātre ca+upapade kartṛpacayo labhyate ghṛtaṃ spṛśati ghṛtaspṛk /
GS24jvkasipu:14535: ṛtu-śabda upapade yajer dhatoḥ kvin pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14553: añcu yuji kruñca ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ kvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14554: nipātanaiḥ saha nirdeśāt atra api kiṃcid alākṣaṇikaṃ kāryam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:14555: añcateḥ subnata-mātra upapade kvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14570: tyadādiṣu upapadeṣu dṛśer dhātor anālocane 'rthe vartamānāt kañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14596: sadādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ subante upapade upasarge 'pi anupasarge 'pi kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14598: anyatra sub-grahaṇe upasarga-grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:14600: sū iti dviṣā sāhacaryāt sūteḥ ādādikasya grahaṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:14639: nayateḥ pūrvapadāt sajñāyām agaḥ (*8,4.3) iti ṇatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:14643: mo rāji samaḥ kvau (*8,2.35) iti matvam /
GS24jvkasipu:14652: bhajer dhātoḥ subanta upapade upasarge 'pi - prabhāk //
GS24jvkasipu:14657: chandasi viṣaye saher dhātoḥ subante upapade ṇvi-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14666: vaher dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye subanta upapade ṇvipratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14673: kavya purīṣa purīṣya ity eteṣu upapadeṣu chandasi viṣaye vaher dhātoḥ ṇyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14680: havya-śabde upapade chandasi viṣaye vaher dhātoḥ ñyuṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14682: agniś ca havya-vāhanaḥ anantaḥpādam iti kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:14694: janādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ subanta upapade chandasi viṣaye viṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14696: iti, viṣeṣaṇa-arthaś ca viḍvanor anunāsikasyāt (*6,4.41) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14707: ader dhātor ananne supy upapade viṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14714: kravya-śabda upapade ader dhātoḥ viṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14727: duher dhātoḥ supy upapade kap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14735: śvetavaha ukthaśas puroḍāś ity etebhyo ṇvin pratyayo bhavati mantre viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:14738: śveta-śabde kartṛ-vācini upapade vaher dhātoḥ karaṇi kārake ṇvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14740: uktha-śabde karmaṇi karaṇe vā upapade śaṃsater dhātoḥ ṇvin pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14745: dāśṛ dāne ity etasya puraḥpūrvasya ḍatvam,
GS24jvkasipu:14757: ave upapade yajeḥ dhātoḥ ṇvin pratyayo bhavati mantre viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:14763: upe upapade yajeḥ chandasi viṣaye vic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14767: vicaḥ citkaraṇaṃ sāmānya-grahaṇa-avighāta-artham ver apṛktasya (*6,1.67) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14770: iti yajer api vic siddha eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:14780: ākārāntebhyo dhātubhyaḥ supi upapde chandsi viṣaye manin kvanip vanip ity ete pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14795: anyebhyo 'pi dhātubhyo 'nākārāntebhyo manin kyanip vanip ity ete pratyayā dṛśyante, vic ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14810: sarvadhātubhyaḥ sopapadebhyo nirupapadebhyaś ca chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14820: sthā ity etasmād dhātoḥ supi upapade kapratyayo bhavati, kvip ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14833: ajāti-vācini subanta upapade tācchīlye gamyamāne dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14840: supi iti vartamāne punaḥ sub-grahaṇam upasarganivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:14852: kartṛ-vācini upamāne upapade dhātoḥ ṇini-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14865: vrata iti śāstrato niyama ucyate vrate gamyamāne subanta upapade dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14871: sati śayane sthaṇḍila eva śete na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:14872: sati bhojane 'śrāddham eva bhuṅkte na śrāddham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14881: ābhīkṣṇye gamyamāne dhātoḥ bahulaṃ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14888: bahula-grahaṇat kulmāṣakhādaḥ ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:14893: manyateḥ subante upapade ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14897: uttarasūtre hi khaś-pratyaye vikaraṇakṛto viśeṣaḥ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:14902: ātmamāne vartamānān manyateḥ supy upapade khaś-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14904: yadā pratyaya-arthaḥ kartā ātmānam eva darśanīyatvādinā dharmeṇa yuktaṃ manyate,
GS24jvkasipu:14915: bhūte ity adhikāro vartamane laṭ (*3,2.123) iti yavat /
GS24jvkasipu:14916: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ bhūte ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:14917: dhātv-adhikārāc ca dhātv-arthe bhūte iti vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14926: yajater dhātoḥ karaṇe upapade ṇinipratyayo bhavati bhūte /
GS24jvkasipu:14933: karaṇi upapade hanter dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati bhūte kale /
GS24jvkasipu:14942: brahmādiṣu karmasu upapadeṣu hanter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati bhūte /
GS24jvkasipu:14946: kimartham idam ucyate yāvatā sarvadhātubhyaḥ kvip vihita eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:14955: brahmādiṣu hanter bhūtakāle kvip eva na anyaḥ pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:14962: pūrveṇa niyamād aprāptaḥ kvip pratyayaḥ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14963: chandasi viṣaye upapadantareṣv api hanter bahulaṃ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14973: tad-asambhavāt su-śabdam varjayitvā pariśiṣṭānāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14974: svādiṣu karmasu upapadeṣu karoter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14983: dhator aniyatatvād anyasminn upapade api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14990: some karmaṇi upapade sunoter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15000: agnau karmaṇy upapade cinoter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15002: atra api pūrvavac caturvidho niyama iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:15007: karmaṇi upapade cinoteḥ karmaṇy eva kārake kvip pratyayo bhavati agny-ākhyāyāṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:15012: agny-artho hi iṣṭakācaya ucyate śyenacit iti //
GS24jvkasipu:15016: karmaṇi upapade vi-pūrvat krīṇāter dhātoḥ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15017: karmaṇi iti vartamāṇe punaḥ karma-grahaṇaṃ kartuḥ kutsānimitte karmaṇi yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:15027: dṛśeḥ dhātoḥ karmaṇi upapade kvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15036: rājan-śabde karmaṇi upapade yudhyateḥ karoteś ca kvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15045: saha-śabde ca+upapade yudhikṛñoḥ dhātvoḥ kvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15052: saptamyanta upapade janer dhatoḥ ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15059: pañcamyanta upapade jātivarjite janer ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati / [#232]
GS24jvkasipu:15071: upasarge ca upapade janeḥ ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:15077: anupūrvāt janeḥ karmaṇi upapade ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati / [#232]
GS24jvkasipu:15085: anyeṣv api upapadeṣu kārakeṣu janeḥ ḍaḥ pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15086: saptamyām ity ukatama saptamyām api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15108: ity uktaṃ, sa niṣṭha-sañjñakaḥ pratyayo bhūte bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15119: yasyotpannasya niṣṭhā ity eṣā sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15128: sunoter yajateś ca ṅvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15144: chandasi viṣaye dhātoḥ liṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15162: na pūrvasya+eva prakṛtasya ādeśāvidhāne vibhakti-vipariṇāmo bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:15164: yo 'pi parokṣe vihitas tasya apy ayam ādeśo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:15177: sada vasa śru ity etebhyaḥ parasya liṭo bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye vā kvasur ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15197: upeyivān anāśvān anūcāna ity ete śabdā nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:15234: būte 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ luṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15245: avidyamānādyatane bhūte 'rthe vartamānād dhātor laṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15249: adya hyo vā abhukṣmahi iti vyāmiśre mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:15250: parokṣe ca lokavijñāte prayoktur darśana-viṣaye laṅ vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15257: tadvacane upapade bhūtānadyatane lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15268: yac-chabda-sahite abhijñā-vacana upapade lṛṭ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15279: abhijñā-vacane upapade yac-chabda-sahite kevale ca vibhāṣā lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15282: abhijānasi devadatta kaśmīreṣu vatsyāmas tatra udanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:15285: yadi khalv api - abhijānāsi devadatta yat kaśmīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:15296: ghūtānadyatana-parokṣe 'rthe vartamanād dhātḥ liṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15299: asti tu loke dhātv-arthena api kārakeṣu pratyakṣābhimanaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15300: sa yatra na asti tat parokṣam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15313: bhūtānadyatana-parokṣe 'rthe liṭi prāpte hāśvatoḥ upapadayoḥ laṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15326: āsanakāle pṛcchyamane bhūtānadyatana-parokṣe 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ laṅ-liṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15341: sma-śabde upapade bhūtānadyatana-parokṣe laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15348: aparokṣe ca bhūtānadyatane 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ sme upapade laṭ pratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15356: nanu-śabde upapade praśna-pūrvake prativacane bhūte 'rthe laṭ prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15368: na-śabde nu-śabde ca upapade pṛṣṭa-prativacane vibhaṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati bhūte /
GS24jvkasipu:15377: purā-śabde upapade sma-śabda-varjite bhūtānadyatane 'rthe vibhāṣā luṅ pratyayo bhavati, laṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:15378: tābhyāṃ mukte pakṣe yathā-viṣayamanye 'pi pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:15390: tasmin vartamāne 'rthe vartamanād dhātoḥ laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15396: laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:15404: laṭ iti vartamane punar laṅ-grahaṇam adhikavidhāna-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:15417: kecid vibhāṣā-grahaṇam anuvartayanti na-nvor vibhāṣā (*3,2.121) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15424: sambhodhane ca viṣaye laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15433: l akṣaṇe hetau ca arthe vartamanāda dhātoḥ parasya laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:15463: pūṅo yajeś ca dhātoḥ śānan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15472: ity ataḥ prabhṛti ā tṛno nakārāt /
GS24jvkasipu:15492: iṅo dhāreś ca dhātvoḥ śatṛpratyayo bhavati akṛcchriṇi kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:15493: akṛcchraḥ sukhasādyo yasay kartur dhātv-arthaḥ so 'kṛcchrī /
GS24jvkasipu:15503: amitre kartari dviṣer dhātoḥ śatṛ-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15512: yajñasaṃyukte 'bhiṣave vartamānāt sunoter dhātoḥ śatṛ-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15533: ā etasmāt kvip saṃ-śabdād yānita ūrdhvam-anukramiṣyāmas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu te veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15537: tacchīlo yaḥ svabhāvataḥ phala-nirapekṣas tatra pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:15539: yaḥ svadharme mamāyamiti pravartate vināpi śīlena /
GS24jvkasipu:15564: tviṣer devatāyām akāraś ca+upadhāyā aniṭtvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:15575: alaṅ-kṛñ-ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu iṣṇuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15592: ṇyantād dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu iṣṇuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15598: bhavater dhatoḥ chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu iṣṇuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15607: glā ji sthā ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:15608: cakārāt bhuvaś ca tacchīlādiṣu kṣnuḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15615: kṅiti ca (*1,1.5) ity atra gakāro 'pi cartvabhūto nirdiśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:15628: tras-ādibhyo dhatubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu knuḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15637: śamādibhyo dhātubhyo 'ṣṭābhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ghinuṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15638: śama upaśame ity ataḥ prabhṛti madī harṣe ity evam antaḥ śamādir divādyantargaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15656: pṛcī samparke iti rudhādir gṛhyate natvadādir lug-vikaraṇatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:15660: yujir yoge rudhādiḥ dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:15661: rañja rāge ity asya nipātanād anunāsika-lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15696: etebhyo dhātubhyo vi-śabde upapade ghinuṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15720: vasaḥ iti vasa nivāse ity asya grahaṇaṃ nācchādana-arthasya,
GS24jvkasipu:15725: ninda-ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu vuñ pratayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15741: tācchīlikeṣu vā 'sarūpanyāyena tṛjādayo na bhavanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:15745: devayateḥ kruśeś ca upasarge upapade vuñ patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15755: calana-arthebhyaḥ śabda-arthebhyaś ca akarmakebhyo dhātubhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15780: ju-praghṛtibhyo dhatubhyo yuc pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:15792: calanārthānāṃ padeś ca grahaṇaṃ sakarmaka-artham iha /
GS24jvkasipu:15794: tācchīlikeṣu mitho vā+asarūpa-vidhir na asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15795: tena alaṅkṛñaḥ tṛn na bhavati alaṅkartā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15796: tathā hi paderukañā viśeṣa-vihitena sāmānya-vihitasya yuco 'sarūpatvāt samāveśo bhavedeva,
GS24jvkasipu:15806: maḍi bhūṣāyām ity etad arthebhyaḥ ca dhatubhyo yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15814: yakārāntāt dhatoḥ yuc pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15821: sūda dīpa dīkṣa ity etebhyaś ca yuc pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15826: nanu ca dīper viśeṣa-vihito ra-pratyayaḥ dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:15831: tācchīlikeṣu ca vā+asarūpa-vidhir na asti iti prāyikam etad ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:15843: laṣa-ādibhyo dhātubhaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ukañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15857: jalpa-ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ṣākan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15868: pra-pūrvāj javateḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15875: kṣi kṣaye, kṣi nivāsagatyoḥ iti dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:15876: prasū iti ṣū preraṇe ity asay grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:15877: jiprabhṛtibhyo dhātubhyaḥ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:15900: etebhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu āluc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15914: dā dheṭ si śada sada ity etebhyaḥ ruḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15924: sṛ ghasi ada ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kmarac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15931: bhañja bhāsa mida ity etebhyo ghurac pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu bhaṅguraṃ kāṣṭham /
GS24jvkasipu:15939: jñāna-arthasya videḥ grahaṇaṃ na lābhādy-arthasya, svabhāvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:15940: vidādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kurac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15950: iṇ naś ji sarti ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kvarap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15972: jāgarteḥ ūkaḥ pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:15977: yajādīnāṃ yaṅantānām ūkaḥ pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:15984: namyādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu raḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15991: ajasram iti jasu mokṣaṇe nañpūrvo rapratyayāntaḥ krayāsātatye vartate //
GS24jvkasipu:15995: san iti sanpratyayānto gṛhyate na sanirdhātuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:15997: sannantebhyo dhātubhyaḥ āśaṃser bhikṣeś ca tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu uḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16002: āṅaḥ śasi icchāyām ity asya grahaṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:16008: iṣeḥ chatvam ukāraś ca pratyayo nipātyate tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:16015: kya-pratyayāntād dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ukāra-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16025: ā-kārāntebhyaḥ ṛ-varṇāntebhyaḥ gama hana jana ity etebhyaś ca chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu ki-kinau pratayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16029: mā bhūttād api paraḥ taparaḥ iti ṛkāre tatkāla-grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:16061: svapeḥ tṛṣeś ca tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu nijiṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16071: etābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu āruḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16079: asmād dhātoḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kru-klukanau pratyayu bhavāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16091: etebhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu varac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16100: yā prāpane, asmād yaṅantāt tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu varac pratyayo havati /
GS24jvkasipu:16105: bhrājādibhyaḥ dhātubhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16127: anyebhyo 'pi dhātubhyaḥ tācchīlikeṣu kvip pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16135: tathā ca āha -- kvibvacipracchāyatastukaṭaprujuśrīṇāṃ dīrgho 'saṃprasāraṇaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:16150: dṝ bhye ity asya hrasvaś ca dve ca /
GS24jvkasipu:16157: bhavater dhātoḥ sañjñāyām antare ca gamyamāne kvip pratyayo bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:16160: dhanikādhamarṇayor antare yas tiṣṭhati sa pratibhūr ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:16165: vi pra sam ity evaṃ pūrvād bhavater dhātoḥ ḍu-pratayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16178: dhayater dadhāteś ca karmaṇi kārake ṣṭran pratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16180: dhayanti tāṃ dadhati vā bhaiṣajyārtham iti dhātrī /
GS24jvkasipu:16197: etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ karaṇe kārake ṣṭran pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16212: kṅito 'nyasminn api pratyaye nalopaḥ kvacid bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16221: asmād dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake ṣṭran pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16237: etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ karaṇe kārake itraḥ patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16249: pavater dhatoḥ karaṇe kārake itra-pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16257: puvaḥ karane kartari ca itra-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16262: devatāyām - agniḥ pavitraṃ sa mā punātu /
GS24jvkasipu:16263: vāyuḥ somaḥ sūrya indraḥ pavitraṃ te mā punantu //
GS24jvkasipu:16281: etad arthebhyaś ca dhātubhyo vartamāna-arthe kta-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16289: śīlito rakṣitaḥ kṣānta ākruṣṭo juṣṭa ity api /
GS24jvkasipu:16292: kaṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati ity āhur amṛtaḥ pūrvavat samṛtaḥ //2//
GS24jvkasipu:16300: tṛptaḥ ity evam ādayo 'pi vartamāne dṛaṣṭavyāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:16301: itiśrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:16310: uṇādayaḥ pratyayāḥ vartamāne 'rthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye bahulaṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16322: bāhulakaṃ prakṛtes tanudṛṣṭeḥ prāya-samuccayanād api teṣām /
GS24jvkasipu:16323: kāryasaśeṣavidheś ca taduktaṃ naigamarūḍhibhavaṃ hi susādhu //1//
GS24jvkasipu:16324: nāma ca dhātujamāha nirukte vyākaraṇe śakaṭasya ca tokam /
GS24jvkasipu:16325: yan na padārtha-viśeṣa-samutthaṃ pratyayataḥ prakṛteś ca tad ūhyam //2//
GS24jvkasipu:16326: sañjñāsu dhāturūpāṇi pratyayāś ca tataḥ pare /
GS24jvkasipu:16327: kāryād vidyād anubandham etac chāstram uṇādiṣu //3//
GS24jvkasipu:16340: bhaviṣyati kāle gamyādayaḥ śabdāḥ sādhavo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16358: yāvat-purā-śabdayor nipātayor upapadayoḥ bhaviṣyati kāle dhātor laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16368: kadā karhi ity etayoḥ upapadayor vibhāṣā bhaviṣyati kāle dhātoḥ laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16382: kiṃvṛtte upapade lipsāyāṃ bhaviṣyati kāle dhātoḥ vibhāṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16398: lipsyamāna-siddhau gamyamānāyāṃ bhaviṣyati kāle dhātoḥ vibhāṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16400: yo bhaktaṃ dadāti sa svargaṃ gacchati,
GS24jvkasipu:16401: yo bhaktaṃ dāsyati sa svargaṃ gamiṣyati,
GS24jvkasipu:16402: yo bhaktaṃ dāta sa svargaṃ gantā /
GS24jvkasipu:16407: loḍ-arthaḥ praiṣādir lakṣyate yena sa loḍ-arthalakṣaṇo dhātv-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16408: tatra vartamānād dhātoḥ bhaviṣyati kāle vibhāṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16421: ūrdhva-mauhūrtike bhaviṣyati kāle loḍ-arthalakṣaṇa-arthe vartamānāt dhātor vibhāṣā liṅ-pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16427: ūrdhvaṃ muhūrtāt upari muhūrtasya upādhyāyaś ced āgacchet,
GS24jvkasipu:16438: kriya-arthāyāṃ kriyāyām upapade dhātor bhavisyati kale tumun-ṇvulau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16446: atha kimarthaṃ ṇvul vidhīyate yāvatā ṇvul-tṛcau (*3,1.133)
GS24jvkasipu:16447: iti sāmānyena vihita eva so 'sminn api viṣaye bhavisyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:16451: kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyāṃ vā 'sarūpeṇa tṛjādayo na bhavanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16453: vikṣipo vrajati ity evam ādi nivartyate //
GS24jvkasipu:16458: bhāve (*3,3.18) iti prakṛtya ye ghañ-ādayo vihitās te ca bhāva-vacanāḥ bhavisyati kāle kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyāṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16459: kimartham idaṃ yāvatā vihitā eva te ?
GS24jvkasipu:16460: kriyartha-upapade vihitena asmin viṣaye tumunā bādhyeran /
GS24jvkasipu:16461: vā 'sarūpa-vidhiś ca atra na asti ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:16465: yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyo yena viśeṣaṇena vihitā yadi tābhyas tathā+eva bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:16475: dhātoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati bhaviṣyati kāle karmaṇy upapade kriyāyāṃ ca kriyārthāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:16476: karmaṇyaṇ (*3,2.1) iti sāmānyena vihito vā 'sarūpa-vidher abhāvād ṇvulā bādhitaḥ punar aṇ vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:16490: cakārāt kriyāyāṃ ca upapade kriyārthāyāṃ dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16499: lṛṭaḥ sthāne satsañjñau śatṛśānacau vā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16501: tena yathā laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau tathā asya api bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16517: bhaviṣyadanadyatane 'rthe vartamānād dhatoḥ luṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16533: ita uttaraṃ triṣv api kāleṣu pratyayāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16546: sarteḥ dhātoḥ sthire kartari ghañ pratayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16548: sa ciraṃ tiṣṭhan kālantaraṃ sarati iti dhātv-arthasya kartā yujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16561: bhāve vācye dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16566: tena artha-nirdeśaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ sarvadhātu-viṣayaḥ kṛto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16568: yastasya siddhatā nāma dharmaḥ tatra ghañ-ādayaḥ pratyayāḥ vidhīyante /
GS24jvkasipu:16570: liṅgāntare vacanāntare 'pi ca atra pratyayā bhavanty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:16576: kartṛ-varjite kārake sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye dhātoḥ ghañ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16590: tat kriyate prasajya-pratiṣedhe 'pi samāso 'sti iti jñāpana-artham,
GS24jvkasipu:16593: akartari ca kārake iti dvayam anuvartate //
GS24jvkasipu:16597: parimāṇa-ākhyāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ sarvebhyo dhātubhyaḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16603: purastād apavāda-nyāyena hy acam eva bādheta, na apam /
GS24jvkasipu:16623: apādāne striyām upasaṅkhyānaṃ tadantāc ca vā ṅīṣ /
GS24jvkasipu:16633: upasarge upapade rauter dhātor ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16641: sami upapade yu dru du ity etebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16649: śri ṇī bhū ity etebhyo dhātubhyo 'nupasargebhyo ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16665: vāv-upapade kṣu śru ity etābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16674: ava ut ity etayor upapadayoḥ nayater dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16684: pra-śabde upapade dru stu sru ity etebhyo dhātubhyo ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16697: nirabhipūrvayoḥ pū-lvor dhātvoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16707: unnyor upapadayoḥ gṝ ity etasmād dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16715: kṝ ity etasmād dhātor unnyoḥ upapadayoḥ ghañ pratayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16727: yajña-viṣaye prayoge sampūrvāt stauter ghañ partyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16729: sametya stuvanti yasmin deśe chandogāḥ sa deśaḥ saṃstāvaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16736: asmād dhātoḥ pra-śabde upapade ghañ pratyayo bhavati na ced yajña-viṣayaḥ prayogo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16745: asmād dhātoḥ vi-śabde upapade ghañ patyayo bhavati prathane gamyamāne,
GS24jvkasipu:16746: tac cet prathanaṃ śabda-viṣayaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16757: vipūrvāt stṛnāteḥ chandonāmni ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16758: vṛttam atra chando gṛhyate yasya gāyatryādayo viśeṣāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:16770: udi upapade graher dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16775: udgrābhaṃ ca nigrābhaṃ ca brahma devā avīvṛdhan //
GS24jvkasipu:16780: sami upapade graher dhātoḥ ghañ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16791: pari-śabde ni-śabde ca upapade yathāsaṅkhyaṃ niyaḥ iṇaś ca dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16807: pari-śabde upapade iṇo dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16818: vi upa ity etayoḥ upapadayoḥ śeter dhātoḥ ghañ bhavati paryāye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:16822: tava rājānam upaśayituṃ paryāyaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16828: hastādāne gamyamāne cinoter dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16846: eteṣv artheṣu cinoteḥ ghañ pratyayaḥ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16853: iha kasmān na bhavati mahān kāṣṭhanicayaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:16864: saṅghe vācye cinoter dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati ādeś ca kaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16879: karma-vyatihāre gamyamāne dhātoḥ ṇac patyayo bhavati strīliṅge vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:16881: cakāro viśeṣaṇa-arthaḥ ṇacaḥ striyām añ (*5,4.14) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16901: abhividhau gamyamāne dhātoḥ bhave inuṇ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16908: bhāve iti vartamane punar bhāva-grahaṇaṃ vāsarūpanirāsa-artham,
GS24jvkasipu:16918: ava ni ity etayoḥ uapadayoḥ graher dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati ākrośe gamyamane /
GS24jvkasipu:16929: pra-śabde upapade graher dhāto ghañ pratyayo bhavati lipsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:16937: pari-śabde upapade graheḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16948: ni-śabde upapade vṛ ity etasmād dhātoḥ dhānya-viśeṣe 'bhidheye ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16956: uc-chabde upapade śrayaty-ādibhyo ghañ pratayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16967: āṅi upapade rauteḥ plavateś ca vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16974: ave upapade graheḥ dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati vibhāṣā varṣapratibandhe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:16975: praptakālasya varṣasya kutaścin nimittād abhāvo varṣapratibandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16985: pra-śabde upapade graher dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16989: tulā pragṛhyate yena sūtreṇa sa śabda-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16998: pra-śabde upapade graher dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17000: rathādiyuktānām aśvādīnāṃ saṃyamana-arthā rajjū raśmir iha gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17007: praśabde upapade vṛṇoteḥ dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17016: pariśabde upapade bhavateḥ dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati avajñāne gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:17025: bhāve, akartari ca kārake iti prakṛtam anuvartate yāvat kṛtya-lyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17027: akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17045: ṝ-kārāntebhyaḥ u-varṇāntebhyaḥ ca ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17082: upasarge upapade ader dhātoḥ ap prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17089: ni-śabde upapade adeḥ dhātoḥ ṇa-pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17095: vyadha japa ity etayoḥ anupasargayoḥ ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17106: svana-hasoḥ anupasargayor vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17115: sam upa ni vi ity eteṣu upapadeṣu anupasarge 'pi yamer vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17126: ni-śabde upapade gada nada paṭha svana ity etebhyaḥ dhatubhyaḥ vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17136: kvaṇateḥ dhātoḥ nipūrvād anupasargāc ca vīṇāyāṃ vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17148: asmād dhātor nityam ap pratyayo bhavati parimāṇe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:17152: saṃvyavahārāya mūlakādīnāṃ yaḥ parimito muṣṭir badhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:17158: madeḥ dhātoḥ anupasargāt ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17169: pramada sammada ity etau śabdau nipātyete harṣe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:17179: samudor upapadayoḥ ajaer dhātoḥ paśu-viṣaye dhātv-arthe ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17207: sarteḥ dhātoḥ prajane viṣaye ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17212: strīgavīṣu puṃgavānām garbhādhānāya prathamam upasaraṇam ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:17216: ni abhi upa vi ity eteṣu upapadeṣu hvayateḥ dhātoḥ samprasāraṇam ap pratyayaḥ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:17226: āṅi upapade hvayater dhātoḥ samprasāraṇam ap pratyayaś ca bhavati yuddhe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:17235: vṛddhiś ca nipātyate nipānaṃ ced abhidheyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17236: nipibanty asminn iti nipānam udakādhāra ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17238: kūpopasareṣu ya udakādhāras tatra hi pānāya paśava āhūyante /
GS24jvkasipu:17243: anupargasya hvayateḥ samprasāraṇam ap pratyayaś ca bhavati bhāve abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:17253: hanter dhātoḥ anupasarge bhāve ap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17264: ap ca, yaś ca aparaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:17272: mūrtau abhidheyāyāṃ hanteḥ ap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17281: antaḥ pūrvāt hanteḥ ap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17285: anye ṇakāraṃ paṭhanti antarghaṇo deśaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17293: pra-pūrvasya hanteḥ praghaṇaḥ praghāṇaḥ ity etau śabdau nipātyete agāraikadeśe vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:17301: ut-pūrvāt hanteḥ udghanaḥ iti nipātyate 'tyādhānaṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17303: yasmin kāṣṭhe sthāpayitvā anyāni kāṣṭhāni takṣyante tad abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17312: kiṃ tarhi ? pāṇiḥ pādaś ca abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17318: ayas vi dru ity eteṣu upapadeṣu hanteḥ dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake ap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17331: stamba-śabde upapade karaṇe kārake hanteḥ kaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17344: pari-śabde upapade anter dhātoḥ ap pratyayo bahvati karaṇe kārake,
GS24jvkasipu:17351: upa-pūrvāt hanteḥ ap pratyayaḥ upadhā-lopaś ca nipātyate āśraye 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:17361: samudoḥ upapadayoḥ hanteḥ dhātoḥ ap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17371: nighaḥ iti ni-pūrvād hanteḥ ap pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:17383: ḍu it yasya tasmād ḍvito dhātoḥ ktriḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17392: ṭu it yasya, tasmāt ṭvito dhātoḥ athuc pratyayo bhavati bhāvādau /
GS24jvkasipu:17399: bhāve akartari ca kārake iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:17408: praccheḥ asamprasāraṇaṃ jñāpakāt praśne ca āsanna-kāle (*3,2.117) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:17419: bhāve akartari ca kārake iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:17420: upasarge upapade ghu-sañjñakebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ kiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17429: karmaṇy upapade ghu-sañjñakebhyo dhātubhyaḥ kiḥ pratyayo bhavati adhikaraṇe kārake /
GS24jvkasipu:17437: bhāve akartari ca kārake ti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:17438: strīliṅge bhāvādau dhātoḥ ktin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17460: ṝkāralvādibhyaḥ ktin niṣṭhāvad bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:17479: sthādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ strīliṅge bhāve ktin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17485: iti jñāpakāt nātyantāya bādhā bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:17490: mantre viṣaye vṛṣādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ ktin pratyayo bhavati udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17502: sarvatra sarvadhātubhyaḥ sāmānyena vihita eva ktin /
GS24jvkasipu:17514: avateḥ jvara-tvara-srivy-avi-mavām upadhāyāś ca (*6,4.20) iti ūṭḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17529: vraja-yajoḥ dhātvoḥ strī-liṅge bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17539: samajādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ striyāṃ kyap pratyayo bhavati udāttaḥ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:17550: kathaṃ taduktam striyāṃ bhāvādhikāro 'sti tena bhāryā prasidhyati iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:17556: karoter dhātoḥ striyāṃ śaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17564: iṣeḥ dhātoḥ śaḥ pratyayo yagabhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17576: pratyayāntebhyo dhātubhyaḥ stiryām akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17599: ṣidbhyaḥ bhidādibhyaś ca striyām aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17642: ebhyo dhātubhyaḥ yuci prāpte striyām aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17653: ākārāntebhyaḥ upasarge upapade striyam aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17665: āsa śrantha ity etābhyām ca striyām yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17676: na curādiḥ śrantha grantha sandarbhe iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17682: ghaṭṭeḥ bhauvādikasya grahaṇaṃ ghaṭṭa calane iti,
GS24jvkasipu:17694: rogākhyāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ ṇvul pratyayo bahulaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17696: ākhyā-grahaṇaṃ rogasya cet pratyayāntena sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17730: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye dhātoḥ ṇvul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17744: paripraśne ākhyāne ca gamyamāne dhatoḥ iñ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17784: eteṣv artheṣu dhātoḥ ṇvuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17803: ākrośe gamyamāne nañi upapade dhātoḥ aniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17813: bhāve, akartari ca kārake iti nivṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:17814: kṛtya-sañjñakāḥ pratyayāḥ lyuṭ ca bhaulam artheṣu bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17827: bahula-grahaṇād anye 'pi kṛtaḥ yathāprāptam abhidheyaṃ vyabhicaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:17834: napuṃsaka-liṅge bhāve dhatoḥ ktaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17841: napuṃsaka-liṅge bhāve dhātoḥ lyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17849: karmaṇi ca yena saṃsparśāt kartuḥ śarīra-sukham // PS_3,3.116 //
GS24jvkasipu:17851: yena karmaṇā saṃspṛśyamānasya kartuḥ śarīra-sukham utpadyate,
GS24jvkasipu:17852: tasmin karmaṇi upapade dhatoḥ napuṃsaka-liṅge bhāve lyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17874: karaṇe 'dhikaraṇe ca kārake dhātoḥ lyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17883: puṃliṅgayoḥ karaṇa-adhikaranayor abhidheyayoḥ dhātoḥ ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati samudāyena cet sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17887: adhikaraṇe khalv api - etya tasmin kurvanti iti ākaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17899: gocarādayaḥ śabdāḥ gha-prayayāntā nipātyante pūrvasminn eva arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:17918: ave upapade tarateḥ stṛṇāteś ca dhātoḥ karana-adhikaraṇayoḥ sañjñāyām ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17932: halantād dhātoḥ karaṇa-adhikaraṇayoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17945: puṃsi sañjñāyāṃ ghe prāpte ghañ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17959: udaṅka iti nipātyate anudaka-viṣayaś ced dhātv-artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17973: ānāyaḥ iti nipātyate jālaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17980: khanateḥ dhātoḥ karaṇa-adhikaraṇayoḥ ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17995: īṣat dus su ity eteṣu upapadeṣu kṛcchrākṛcchra-artheṣu dhatoḥ khal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18016: bhavateḥ karoteś ca dhātoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kartari karmaṇi ca+upapade,
GS24jvkasipu:18017: cakārād īṣadādiṣu ca khal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18029: kṛcchrākṛcchra-artheṣu īṣadādiṣu upapadeṣu ākārāntebhyo dhatubhyaḥ yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18040: īṣadādisu kṛcchrākṛcchra-artheṣu upapadeṣu gaty-arthebhyo dhātubhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18047: anyebhyo 'pi dhātubhyaḥ gaty-arthebhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye yuc pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18061: vartamāna-samīpe bhūte bhaviṣyati ca vartamānād dhātoḥ vartamānavat pratyayā vā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18078: yena viśeṣaṇena vartamāne pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ prakṛtyopapadopādhinā tathā+eva atra bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18086: yo manyate gacchāmi iti padaṃ vartamāne kāle eva vartate,
