GS24jvkasipu:18088: na ca vākyagamyaḥ kālaḥ padasaṃskāravelāyām upayujyate iti tādṛśaṃ vākyārtha-pratipattāraṃ prati prakaraṇam idaṃ nārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18099: tatra bhaviṣyati kāle āśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ vā bhūtavat pratyayā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:18116: kṣipravacane upapade āśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18117: bhūtavac ca ity asya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18125: na iti vaktavye lṛḍ-grahaṇaṃ luṭo 'pi viṣaye yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:18131: tasminn upapade dhātor liṅ pratyayo bhavati bhūtavac ca ity asya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18142: anadyatanavat pratyaya-vidhir na bhavati kriyāprabandhe sāmīpye ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:18163: bhaviṣyati kāle maryādā-vacane satyavarasmin pravibhāge 'nadyatanavat pratyaya-vidhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18191: kālamaryādāvibhāge satyavarsmin pravibhāge bhaviṣyati kāle 'nadyatanavat pratyayavidhirna bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18226: bhaviṣyati maryādā-vacane kālavibhāge ca anahorātrāṇām iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:18227: kālamaryādāvibhāge sati bhavisyati kāle parasmin pravibhāge vibhāṣā anadyatanavat pratyayavidhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18231: samprati parasminn aprāpta eva vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18233: tasya yat paramāgrahāyaṇyāḥ tatra yuktā adhyeṣyāmahe,
GS24jvkasipu:18264: tatra liṅ-nimitte bhaviṣyati kāle lṛṅ pratyayo bhavati kriyātipattau satyām /
GS24jvkasipu:18266: dakṣiṇena ced āyāsyan na śakaṭaṃ paryabhavisyat /
GS24jvkasipu:18272: liṅgiliṅge buddhavā tadatipattiṃ ca pramāṇāntarād avagamya vaktā vākyaṃ prayuṅkte,
GS24jvkasipu:18274: hetuhetumator āhvānāparyābhavanayoḥ bhaviṣyat kāla-viṣayayoḥ atipattiḥ ito vākyād avagamyate //
GS24jvkasipu:18278: liṅ-nimitte lṛṅ kriya-atipattau iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:18279: pūrvena bhaviṣyati vihitaḥ samprati bhūte vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18280: bhūte ca kāle liṅ-nimitte kriya-atipattau satyāṃ lṛṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18294: bhūte liṅ-nimitte lṛṅ kriya-atipattau iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:18301: tatra bhūte liṅ-nimitte kriya-atipattau lṛṅ vā bhavati ity etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:18303: - kathaṃ nāma tatra bhavān vṛṣalam ayājayiṣyat /
GS24jvkasipu:18309: garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyām api-jātvoḥ upapadayoḥ dhātoḥ laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18310: vartamane laṭ uktaḥ kāla-sāmānye na prāpnoti iti vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18311: kālaviśeṣa-vihitāṃś ca api pratyayān ayaṃ paratvād asmin viṣaye vādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:18316: liṅ-nimittābhāvād iha kriya-atipattau lṛṅ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:18321: kathami upapade garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyaṃ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18330: kathaṃ nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yāyajāṃ cakāra /
GS24jvkasipu:18331: atra liṅ-nimittam asti iti bhūta-vivakṣāyāṃ kriya-atipattau vā lṛṅ /
GS24jvkasipu:18332: bhaviṣyad vivakṣāyāṃ sarvatra nityena+eva lṛṅā bhavitavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:18336: garhāyām ity eva vibhāṣā na svaryate /
GS24jvkasipu:18337: kiṃvṛtte upapade garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ liṅ-lṛṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18340: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:18343: katamo nāma yāṃ tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:18347: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān ayājayiṣyat // [#285]
GS24jvkasipu:18355: kiṃvṛtte 'kiṃvṛtte ca+upapade anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ-lṛṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18361: na śraddadhe tatrabhavān nāma vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:18363: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:18365: amarṣe - na marṣayāmi tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:18367: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:18369: bhūta-vivakṣāyāṃ tu kriya-atipattau vā lṛṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18371: na avakalpayāmi tatrabhavān nāma vṛṣalam ayājayiṣyat //
GS24jvkasipu:18378: kiṃkila-asty-artheṣu upapadeṣu anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18380: kiṃ - kila nāma tatrabhavan vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:18386: liṅ-nimittam iha na asti tena lṛṅ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:18391: jātu yadā ity etayoḥ upapadayoḥ anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ gamyamānayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18408: yac ca yatra ity etayoḥ upapadayor anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ gamyamānayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18422: yac ca yatra ity etayoḥ upapadayor dhatoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:18425: yatra tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayed ṛddho vṛddhaḥ san brāhmaṇaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:18436: yaccayatrayoḥ upapadayoḥ citrīkaraṇe gamyamāne dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18446: śeṣe uapapade citrīkaraṇe gamyamāne dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18455: liṅ - nimitābhāvāt iha lṛṅ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:18459: uta api ity etayoḥ samarthayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18461: bāḍham ity asminn arthe samānārthatvam anayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18473: itaḥ prabhṛṭi bhūte 'pi liṅ-nimitte kriya-atipattau nityaṃ lṛṅ /
GS24jvkasipu:18482: tasmin gamyamāne akacciti upapade dhātor liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18487: kaccij jīvati te mātā kaccij jīvati te pitā /
GS24jvkasipu:18488: mārāvida tvāṃ pṛcchāmi kaccij jīvati pārvatī // [#287]
GS24jvkasipu:18501: yatra gamyate ca-artho na ca asau prayujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18502: tadīdṛśe sambhāvanopādhike 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18510: kriyātipattau bhūte bhaviṣyati ca nityaṃ lṛṅ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:18514: sambhāvane 'lam iti cet siddha-aprayoge iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:18516: sambhāvana-vacane dhātāv upapade yac chabda-varjite dhātor vibhāṣā liṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18531: hetubhūte hetumati cārthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18535: dakṣiṇena ced yāsyati na śakaṭaṃ paryābhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:18536: tatra vibhāṣāgrahaṇaṃ tāvad anantaram eva anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:18537: liṅ iti vartamāne punar liṅ-grahaṇaṃ kālav-iśeṣa-pratipatty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:18545: icchārtheṣu dhatuṣu upapadeṣu dhatoḥ liṅ-loṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18557: icchārtheṣu dhātuṣu samāna-kartṛkeṣu upapadeṣu dhātoḥ tumun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18571: icchārtheṣu samānakartṛkeṣu dhātuṣu upapadeṣu dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18579: ichārthebhyo dhatubhyo vartamāne kāle vibhāṣā liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18593: vidhyādiṣv artheṣu dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18604: sampraśne - kiṃ nu khalu bho vyākaranam adhīyīya /
GS24jvkasipu:18605: prārthane - bhavati me prārthanā vyākaranam adhīyīya //
GS24jvkasipu:18609: loṭ pratyayo bhavati dhātoḥ vidhyādiṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:18611: vidhau tāvat - kaṭaṃ tāvat bhavān karotu /
GS24jvkasipu:18616: adhīṣṭe - adhīcchāmo bhavantaṃ māṇavakaṃ bhavān adhyāpayatu,
GS24jvkasipu:18618: sampraśne - kiṃ nu khalu bho vyākranam adhyayai /
GS24jvkasipu:18619: prārthane - bhavati me prārthanā vyākaraṇam adhyayai,
GS24jvkasipu:18628: eteṣv artheṣu dhātoḥ kṛtya-sañjñakāḥ pratyayāḥ bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:18633: loṭ khalv api - karotu kaṭaṃ bhavān iha preṣitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:18636: kimarthaṃ praiṣādiṣu kṛtyā vidhīyante na sāmānyena,
GS24jvkasipu:18637: bhāva-karmaṇor vihitā eva te praiṣādiṣv anyatra ca bhaviṣyanti ?
GS24jvkasipu:18641: stry-adhikārāt pareṇa vāsarūpa-vidhir nāvaṣyaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18649: praiṣādiṣu gamyamāneṣu ūrdhva-mauhūrtike 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18652: upari muhūrtasya bhavatā khalu kaṭaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:18663: sam-śabde upapade praiṣādiṣu gamyamāneṣu ūrdhva-mauhūrtike 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ loṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18665: ūrdhvaṃ muhūrtād bhavān kaṭaṃ kaortu sma,
GS24jvkasipu:18673: sma-śabde upapade 'dhīṣṭe gamyamāne dhātoḥ loṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18680: kālādiṣu upapadesu dhātoḥ tumun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18690: uktam idam, stry-adhikārāt paratra vāsarūpa-vidhir anityaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:18695: yacchabde upapade kālādiṣu dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18704: arhe kartari vācye gamyamāne vā dhātoḥ kṛtya-tṛcaḥ pratyayā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:18722: avaśyaṃ bhāvaviśiṣṭe ādhamarṇyaviśiṣṭe ca kartari vācye dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18725: ādhamarṇye khalv api - śatam dāyī sahasraṃ dāyī /
GS24jvkasipu:18731: kṛtya-sañjākāś ca pratyayā āvaśyaka-ādhamarṇyayor upādhibhūtayoḥ dhātor bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18739: yāvatā sāmāgyena vihitā asminn api viṣaye bhavisyanti ?
GS24jvkasipu:18758: sāmānya-vihitānāṃ punar vacanam liṅā bādhā mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:18765: aśīrviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ-loṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18774: āśiṣi viṣaye dhātoḥ ktic-ktau pratyayau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:18780: ktaḥ khalv api - devā enaṃ deyāsuḥ devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18788: māṅi upapade dhātoḥ luṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18800: sma-śabda-uttare māṅi upapade dhātoḥ laṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18806: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyām kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:18815: tasmin sati ayathākāloktā api pratyayāḥ sādhavo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18821: tatra bhūtaḥ kālaḥ bhaviṣyatkālena abhisambadhyamānaḥ sādhur bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18824: pratyayādhikāre punaḥ pratyaya-grahaṇam adhātv-adhikāra-vihitā api pratyayāḥ taddhitā dhātu-sambandhe sati kālabhede sādhavo yathā syuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18828: āsīt bhavitā iti sambandhādtīte bhaviṣyati ca sādhur bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:18830: kriyāsam-abhihāre loṭ loṭo hi-svau vā ca ta-dhvamoḥ // PS_3,4.2 //
GS24jvkasipu:18835: samabhihāra-viśiṣṭa-kriyāvacanād dhātoḥ loṭ pratyayo bhavati sarveṣu kāleṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:18836: sarvalakārāṇām apavādaḥ tasya ca loṭo hi sva ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18841: loṭ ity eva, loḍ-dharmāṇau hisvau bhavataḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18844: lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayaṃ lunāti,
GS24jvkasipu:18847: lunīhi lunīhi ity eva tvaṃ lunāsi,
GS24jvkasipu:18850: atha vā, lunīta lunīta+ity eva yūyaṃ lunītha /
GS24jvkasipu:18851: lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ahaṃ lunāmi,
GS24jvkasipu:18854: bhūte - lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayam alāvīt,
GS24jvkasipu:18857: bhaviṣyati - lunīhi lunihi ity eva ayaṃ laviṣyati,
GS24jvkasipu:18867: atha vā, adhīdhvam adhīdhvam ity eva yūyam adhīdhve /
GS24jvkasipu:18874: yaṅ-pratyayaḥ punar asminn eva arthe vidhīyamānaḥ svayam eva śaktatvān na apekṣate dvirvacanam // [#293]
GS24jvkasipu:18880: samuccīyamāna-kriyāvacanād dhātor anyatarasyāṃ loṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18886: sthālyapidhānam aṭa ity eva ayam aṭati,
GS24jvkasipu:18897: sthālyupidhānam aṭata ity eva yūyam aṭatha /
GS24jvkasipu:18901: sthālyupidhānam aṭa ity eva aham aṭāmi,
GS24jvkasipu:18907: sthālyupidhānam aṭati ity eva ayam aṭati,
GS24jvkasipu:18919: sthālyupidhānam aṭāmi ity eva aham aṭāmi,
GS24jvkasipu:18924: niruktam adhīṣva ity eva ayam adhīte,
GS24jvkasipu:18928: vyākaraṇam adhīdhvam ity eva yūyam adhīdhve /
GS24jvkasipu:18931: niruktam adhīṣva ity eva aham adhīye,
GS24jvkasipu:18942: niruktam adhīṣe ity eva tvam adhīṣe,
GS24jvkasipu:18947: niruktam adhīye ity eva aham adhīye,
GS24jvkasipu:18954: yasmād dhātoḥ loḍ vihitaḥ sa eva dhātur anuprayoktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18957: tathā ca+eva+udāhṛtam lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayaṃ lunīti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18964: dvitīye loḍvidhāne samuccaye sāmānya-vacanasya dhātor anuprayogaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18967: dhānāḥ khāda ity eva ayam abhyavaharati /
GS24jvkasipu:18969: lāghavaṃ ca laukike śabda-vyavahāre na adriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18973: sthālyupidhānam aṭa ity eva ayam aṭati ity atra api kāraka-bhedāt kriyābhede sati sāmānya-vacanatā sambhavaty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:18978: chandasi viṣaye dhātu-sambandhe sarveṣu luṅ-laṅ-liṭaḥ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18983: laṅ - agnim adya hotāram avṛṇītāyaṃ yajamānaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18994: tatra chandasi viṣaye 'nyatarasyāṃ leṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19006: yadi me bhavān idaṃ kuryād aham api bhavate idaṃ dāsyāmi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19009: upasaṃvāde āśaṅkāyāṃ ca gamyamānāyāṃ chandasi viṣaye leṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19011: madagrā eva vo grahā gṛhyāntai iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19023: tatra chandasi viṣaye dhātoḥ sayādayaḥ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:19027: na ca ayam anyasminn arthe tumun ādiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19050: prayai rohiṣyai avyathiṣyai ity ete śabdā nipātyante chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:19062: dṛśe vikhye ity etau chandasi viṣaye nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:19071: śaknotau dhātāv upapade chandasi viṣaye tumarthe ṇamul kamul ity etau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19083: īśvara-śabda upapade chandasi viṣaye tumarthe dhatoḥ tosun-kasun-pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19095: tasmin kṛtya-arthe chandasi viṣaye tavai ken kenya tvan ity ete pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:19110: tumarthe chandasi iti sayādi-sūtre 'pi tavai vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:19126: bhāvo lakṣyate yena tasminn arthe vartamānebhyaḥ sthādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye tumarthe tosun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19140: sṛpi-tṛdor dhātvoḥ bhāva-lakṣaṇe 'rthe vartamānayoḥ chandasi viṣaye tum-arthe kasun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19147: alam khalu ity etayoḥ pratiṣedha-vācinor upapadayoḥ dhātoḥ ktvā pratyayo bhavati prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:19160: māṅo dhātoḥ vyatīhāre vartamānād udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ktvā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19167: meṅaḥ kṛtātvasya ayaṃ nirdeśaḥ kṛto jñāpana-arthaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:19176: pareṇa pūrvasya yoge gamyamāne avareṇa ca parasya dhātoḥ ktvā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19177: pareṇa tāvat - aprāpya nadīṃ parvataḥ sthitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19179: avarayoge - atikramya tu parvataṃ nadī sthitā /
GS24jvkasipu:19184: samānaḥ kartā yayoḥ dhātv-arthayos tatra pūrvakāle dhātv-arthe vartamānād dhātoḥ ktvā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19194: āsyaṃ vyādāya svapiti cakṣuḥ saṃmīlya hasti ity upasaṃkhyānam apūrvakālatvāt //
GS24jvkasipu:19201: ābhīkṣṇya-viśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19203: dvirvacana-sahitau ktvāṇamulāv ābhīkṣṇyaṃ dyotayataḥ, na kevalau /
GS24jvkasipu:19204: ābhīkṣṇye dve bhavataḥ ity upasaṅkhyānād dvirvacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:19212: yacchabde upapade dhātoḥ ktvā-ṇamulau pratyayau na bhavato 'nākāṅkṣe vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:19214: tacced vākyaṃ na paraṃ kiñcid ākāṅkṣate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19220: yad ayaṃ bhuktvā vrajati adhīte eva tataḥ param // [#298]
GS24jvkasipu:19227: agre prathama pūrva ity eteṣu upapadeṣu samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle dhātoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayu vibhāṣā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19234: vibhāṣāgrahaṇam etābhyāṃ mukte laḍādayo 'pi yathā syuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19237: ktvāṇamulau yatra saha vidhīyete tatra vāsarūpavidhir na asti ity etad anena jñāpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:19241: amaiva yat tulya-vidhānam upapadaṃ tat samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:19246: karmaṇy-upapade kṛjo dhātoḥ khamuñ pratyayo bhavati ākrośe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:19254: samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle kṛñaḥ iti ca anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:19256: svādvartheṣu upapadeṣu kṛño ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19262: asvādvīṃ svādvīṃ kṛtvā bhuṅkte svāduṅ-kāraṃ bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:19265: tumartha-adhikārāc ca sarva ete bhāve pratyayāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19266: yady evam, svāduṅkāraṃ bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti ṇamulā kartur anabhihitatvāt kartari kasmāt tṛtīyā na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:19268: na ca asmin prakaraṇe śaktiśaktimatorbhedo vivakṣyte,
GS24jvkasipu:19275: anyathādiṣu upapadesu kṛño ṇamul pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19278: nirarthakatvān na prayogam arhati iti evam eva prayujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19279: anyathā bhuṅkte iti yavānarthastāvān eva anyathākāraṃ bhugkte iti gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19291: yathātatha-śabdayor upapadayoḥ kṛño ṇamul pratyayo bhavati asūyāprativacane gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:19305: karmaṇy-upapade sākalya-viśiṣte 'rthe dṛśividoḥ dhātvoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19307: yāḥ yāḥ kanyāḥ paśyati tāstāḥ varyati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19309: yaṃ yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ jānāti labhate vicārayati vā tān sarvān bhojayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19315: yāvac-chabda upapade vindater jīvateś ca ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19324: carmodarayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ pūryateḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19328: varṣa-pramāṇa ūlopaś ca asya anyatrasyām // PS_3,4.32 //
GS24jvkasipu:19332: ūlopaś ca asya pūrayter anyatarasyāṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19333: samudāyena ced varṣasya pramāṇam iyattā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19347: asmāṇṇyantād dhātoḥ cel-artheṣu karmasu upapadeṣu ṇamul pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19357: nimūla-samūla-śabdayoḥ karmavācinor upapadayoḥ kaṣeḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19361: itaḥ prabhṛti kaṣādīn yān vakṣyati tatra kaṣādiṣu yathā-vidhy-anuprayogaḥ (*3,4.46) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:19366: śuṣkādiṣu karmavāciṣu upapadeṣu piṣer dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19377: samūla akṛta jīva ity eteṣu śabdeṣu karmasu upapadeṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ han kṛñ graha ity etebhyo dhātubhyo ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19385: karaṇe upapade hanter dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19400: snehana-vācini karaṇe upapade piṣer dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19411: hasta-vācini karaṇe upapade vartayateḥ gṛhṇāteś ca ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19425: sva-vācini karaṇe upapade puṣer dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19437: adhikaraṇa-vācini upapade badhnāteḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19446: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye badhnāteḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19455: jīva-puruṣayoḥ kartṛ-vācinor upapadayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ naśi-vahoḥ dhātvoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19459: puruṣaḥ preṣyo bhūtvā vahati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19467: ūrdhva-śabde kartṛ-vācini upapade śuṣiṣuroḥ dhātvoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19493: yasmād dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati sa eva anuprayoktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19494: nanu dhātu-sambandhe pratyaya-vidhānād anuprayogaḥ siddha eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:19501: asmād dhator upapūrvāt tṛtīyānte upapade ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19509: sarvasminn eva atra ṇamul-prakaraṇe kriyābhede sati vāsarūpa-vidhinā ktvāpi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19516: tadarthānāṃ dhātūnām anuprayoga-dhātunā samāna-karmakāṇāṃ tṛtīyānte upapade ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19546: samāsattau gamyamānāyāṃ tṛtīyā-saptamyoḥ upapadayoḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19559: pramāṇe gamyamane tṛtīyā-saptamyoḥ upapadayoḥ dhātor ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19568: parīpsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām apādāne upapade dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19571: evaṃ nāma tvarate yadavaśyaṃkartavyam api na apekṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:19581: dvitīyānta upapade parīpsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19586: evaṃ nāma tvarate yadāyudha-grahaṇam api na adriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19587: loṣtādikaṃ yat kiṃcid āsannaṃ tad gṛhṇāti //
GS24jvkasipu:19592: agruve svāṅga-vācini dvitīyānta upapade dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19597: yasmin aṅge chinne 'pi prāṇī na mriyate tadaghruvam /
GS24jvkasipu:19604: parikliśyamāne svāṅga-vācini dvitīyānte upapade dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19616: dvitīyānte upapade viśyādibhyo dhātubhyo ṇamul pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19618: viśyādibhiḥ kriyābhir anavayavena padārthānāṃ sambandho vyāptiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19631: pati - geha-anuprapātam āste gehaṃ geham anuprapātam āste,
GS24jvkasipu:19643: kim arthaṃ punar āsevāyāṃ ṇamul ucyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:19656: kriyāntare dhātvarthe vartamānābhyām asyati-tṛṣibhyāṃ dvitīyānteṣu kāla-vāciṣu upapadeṣu ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19663: atyasanena tarṣaṇena ca gavāṃ pānakriyā vyavadhīyate vicchidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19664: adya pāyayitvā dvyahamatikramya punaḥ pāyayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19679: nāma-śabde dvitīyānte upapade ādiśer graheś ca dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19685: avyaye upapade ayathabhipreta-ākhyāne gamyamāne karoteḥ ktvā-ṇamulau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19701: yāvatā sarvasminn eva atra prakaraṇe vāsarūpeṇa ktvā bhavati ity uktam ?
GS24jvkasipu:19711: tiryak-śabde upapade kṛñaḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:19729: tas-pratyayo yataḥ sva-aṅgāt tad evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19730: tas-pratyaye svāṅga-vācini upapade karoteḥ bhavateś ca dhātvoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19756: nā-artho dhā-arthaś ca pratyayo yasmāt sa evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19757: nādhārthapratyaye śabde cvy-arthe upapade kṛbhvoḥ dhātvoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19758: anānā nānā kṛtvā gataḥ nānākṛtya gataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:19793: tūṣṇīṃ-śabde upapade bhavateḥ dhātoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19801: anvak-śabde upapade bhavater dhātoḥ ānulomye ktvāṇamulau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19814: śaka-ādiṣu upapadeṣu asty-artheṣu vā dhātumātrāt tumun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19832: paryāpti-vacaneṣu alamartheṣu upapadeṣu dhātostumun pratyao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19846: tatra yeṣu artha-nirdeśo nāsti tatra+idam upatiṣṭhate,
GS24jvkasipu:19860: iti bhāva-karmaṇoḥ prāptayoḥ kartā ca vācyaḥ pakṣe ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19876: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akramakebhyaḥ // PS_3,4.69 //
GS24jvkasipu:19881: cakārāt kartari ca akarmakebhyo dhātubhyo bhāve bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:19892: tayor eva bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtya-sañjñākāḥ kta-khal-arthāś ca pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:19907: bhāvo cākramakebhyaḥ ity anuvṛtteḥ sakarmakebhyo bhāve na bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:19911: ādikarmaṇi yaḥ kto vihitaḥ sa kartari bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19914: tasminn ādikarmaṇi bhūtatvena vivakṣite yaḥ kto vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:19925: gaty-arthabhyo dhātubhyo 'karmakebhya śliṣādibhyaś ca yaḥ ktaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:19970: āgatāya tasmai dātuṃ gāṃ hanti iti goghnaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:19975: asaty api ca gohanane tasya yogyatayā goghnaḥ ity abhidhīyate // [#309]
GS24jvkasipu:19983: bhiyaṣṣuk grasvaś ca ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20002: uṇādayaḥ śabdāḥ tābhyām apādāna-sampradānābhyām anyatra kārake bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:20003: kṛttvāt kartary eva prāptāḥ karmādiṣu kathyante /
GS24jvkasipu:20016: dhrauvyā-gati-pratyavasāna-arthebhyaḥ yaḥ kto vihitaḥ so 'dhikaraṇe bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20042: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ lasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:20044: daśa lakārā anubandha-viśiṣṭā vihitā artha-viśeṣe kāla-viśeṣe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:20045: teṣāṃ viśeṣakarān anubandhān utsṛjya yat sāmānyaṃ tad gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20059: atha lakāramātrasya grahaṇam kasmān na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:20084: ṭito lakārasya sthāne yāny ātmanepadāni teṣām ṭeḥ ekāra-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20086: iha kasmān na bhavati pacamānaḥ, yajamānaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:20092: ṭito lakārasya yaḥ thās tasya seśabda ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20100: liḍ-ādeśayoḥ ta-jhayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam eś irec ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20109: liḍ-ādeśānāṃ parasmaipada-sañjñākānāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tibādīnāṃ ṇalādayo nava ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:20121: vida jñāne, asmād dhātoḥ pareṣāṃ laḍādeśānāṃ parasmaipadānāṃ ṇalādayo nava vikalpena ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:20131: bruvaḥ pañcānām ādita āho bruvaḥ // PS_3,4.84 //
GS24jvkasipu:20135: bruvaḥ parasya laṭaḥ parasmaipadānāṃ pañcānāma adibhūtānāṃ pañcaiva ṇalādaya ādeśā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:20136: tatsanniyogena ca bruva āhaśabda ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20180: loḍ-ādeśasya seḥ hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:20191: la-ādeśaḥ chandasi viṣaye hi-śabdo vā apid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20208: loṭ sambadhinaḥ ekārasya am ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20214: sakāra-vakārābhyām uttarasya loṭ-sambandhina ekārasya yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ca am ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20265: āta ai (*3,4.95) ity etad viṣayaṃ varjayitvā eta ai bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20271: yatra kva ca te mano dakṣaṃ dadhasa uttaram /
GS24jvkasipu:20291: leṭaḥ iti vā iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:20292: leṭ-sambhandhina uttamapuruṣasya sakārasya vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20319: ṅillakāra-sambandhināṃ caturṇām yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tām-ādayaḥ adeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:20337: yāsuṭ parasmaipadesu udātto ṅic ca // PS_3,4.103 //
GS24jvkasipu:20348: sthanivadbhāvād eva liṅādeśasya ṅittve siddhe yāsuṭo ṅid-vacanaṃ jñāpana-artham,
GS24jvkasipu:20375: jhasya liṅ-ādeśasya ran ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20383: liṅādeśasya iaḥ ata ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20403: tena bhinna-viṣayatvāt suṭā bādhanaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20438: sica ākārāntāc ca parasya jheḥ jus-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20458: ākārāntād uttarasya laṅādeśasya jheḥ jus ādeśo bhavati śākaṭāyanasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:20463: atra laṅ eva akārāntād anantaro ṅit sambhavati na anyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:20465: evaṃ tarthi laṅ eva yo laṅ vihitaḥ tasya yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:20471: ity ayam api jher jus loṭo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20481: dviṣaḥ parasya laṅ-ādeśasya jher jusādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:20488: tiṅaḥ śitaś ca prayayāḥ sārvadhātuka-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:20500: tiṅaḥ śitaś ca varjayitvā anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣo dhātu-saṃśabdanena vihitaḥ ārdhadhātuka-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20520: nanu ca ekasañjña-adhikārād anyatra samāveśo bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:20527: āśiṣi viṣaye yo liṅ sa ārdhadhātuka-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20547: ktinaḥ sārvadhātukatvād aster bhūbhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20556: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ // [#317]
GS24jvkasipu:20564: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ āapañvamādhyāya-parisamāpteḥ ṅy-āp-prātipadikād ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:20571: yady api ca pratyaya-paratvena pāriśeṣyād iyam eva prakṛtir labhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:20575: na prātipadika-grahaṇe liṅga-viśiṣṭasya api grahaṇaṃ bhavati ity eva siddham ?
GS24jvkasipu:20577: svarūpavidhi-viṣaye paribhāṣeyaṃ prātipadika-svarūpa-grahaṇe sati liṅga-viśiṣta-grahaṇaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20595: saṅkhyākarmādayaś ca svādīnām arthāḥ śāstrāntareṇa vihitās tena saha asya+ekavākyatā /
GS24jvkasipu:20641: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ striyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:20643: iti sarvādhikāre 'pi prātipadika-mātram atra prakaraṇe sambadhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:20647: sāmānya-viśeṣāḥ strītvādayo gotvādaya iva bahuprakārā vyaktayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20651: prakṛtyartha-viśeṣaṇaṃ ca ity ubhayathā api prayujyate,
GS24jvkasipu:20652: striyām abhidheyāyāṃ striyāṃ vā yat prātipadikaṃ vartate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20662: ajādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ akārāntāc ca prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṭāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20676: ajādi-grahaṇaṃ tu kvacij jāti-lakṣaṇe ṅīṣi prāpte,
GS24jvkasipu:20681: halantānāṃ tavaprāpta eva kasmiṃścid āb vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20682: śūdrā ca amahatpūrvā jātiḥ iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20684: śūdra-śabdaṣ ṭāpam utpādayati jātiś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20692: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadanta-vidhir na iti kathaṃ tadanta-vidhiḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:20693: etad eva jñāpakaṃ bhavati asmin prakaraṇe tadanta-vidhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20736: ṛ-kārāntebhyo na-kārāntebhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati ṅa-kāraḥ sāmānyagrahaṇa-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20744: ug iti yatra sambhavati yathākathaṃcit tadugic-chābda-rūpaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:20760: vannantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:20767: ity eva ṅīpi siddhe tat-sanniyogena repha-vidhāna-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:20776: pādantāt prātipadikād anyatarasyāṃ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20786: ṛci vācyāyāṃ pādantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṭāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20795: ṣaṭ-sañjñākebhyaḥ svasrādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ strī-pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20796: yo yataḥ prāpnoti sa sarvaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20808: ṣaṭsañjñānāmante lupte ṭābutpattiḥ kasmān na syat /
GS24jvkasipu:20809: pratyāhārāc cāpā siddhaṃ doṣastvittve tasmān na+ubhau //
GS24jvkasipu:20813: mannantāt prātipadikāt ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20815: iti ṅīp prāpto manaḥ iti sūtreṇa pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20818: aninasmaṅgrahaṇānyarthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:20825: annantād bahuvrīheḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20838: ḍāp pratyayo bhavati ubhābhyāṃ mannantāt prātipadikāt anantāc ca bahuvrīher anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:20853: ity asya api vikaopo yathā yāt /
GS24jvkasipu:20861: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo 'nupasarjanāt ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:20876: jñāpitaṃ ca+etad asty atra prakaraṇe tadantavidhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20887: ṭid-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20902: niranubandhako ḍha-śabdaḥ striyāṃ na asti iti niranubandhaka-paribhāṣā na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:20908: dāṇḍā, mauṣṭā ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20912: iti punar año grahaṇaṃ jātilakṣaṇaṃ ṅīṣaṃ bādhitum /
GS24jvkasipu:20943: yañantāc ca prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20947: iha mā bhūt, dvīpād anusamudraṃ yañ (*4,3.10) dvaipyā /
GS24jvkasipu:20953: prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena yañantāt striyāṃ ṣphaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:20964: tam api bādhitvā prācāṃ ṣpha eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:20971: sarvatra lohitādibhyaḥ kataparyantebhyaḥ yañantebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṣphaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20972: kataśabdaḥ svatantraṃ yat prātipadikaṃ tadavadhitvena parigṛhyate kapi-śabdāt paraḥ kapi kata iti ,
GS24jvkasipu:20976: kaṇvāt tu śakalaḥ pūrvaḥ katād uttara iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20982: tatra tatpuruṣa-vṛttyā saṃgṛhīto madhyapātī śakala-śabdo yañantaḥ pratyayadvayam api pratipadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20989: kauravya māṇḍūka ity etābhyāṃ striyāṃ ṣphaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20991: ḍhak ca mṇḍūkāt (*4,1.119) ity aṇi ca /
GS24jvkasipu:21006: prathame vayasi yat prātipadikaṃ śrutyā vartate tataḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21027: dvigu-sañjñakāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21036: aparimāṇa-antāt dvigoḥ bista-ācitakambaly-āntāc ca taddhitaluki sati ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21039: aparimāṇa-antāt tāvat - pañcabhir aśvaiḥ krītā pañcāśvā /
GS24jvkasipu:21060: kāṇḍa-śabda-antāt dvigos taddhitaluki sati kṣetre vācye ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21063: iti vihitasya taddhitasya pramāṇe lo dvigor nityam iti luki kṛte,
GS24jvkasipu:21066: kāṇḍa-śabdasya aparimāṇavācitvāt pūrveṇa+eva pratiṣedhe siddhe kṣetre niyama-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:21075: tadantād dvigoḥ taddhitaluki sati anyatarasyāṃ na ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21076: dvau puruṣau pramāṇam asyāḥ parikhāyāḥ dvipuruṣā, dvipuruṣī /
GS24jvkasipu:21078: aparimāṇāntatvān nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte vikalpārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:21088: ūdhas-śabdāntād bahuvrīheḥ striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21089: ūdhaso 'naṅ (*5,4.131) iti samāsānte kṛte ano bahuvrīheḥ (*4,1.12)
GS24jvkasipu:21096: ity asya api ṅīpo 'yam uttaratra anuvṛtter bādhaka iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21104: saṅkhyādeḥ avyayādeś ca bahuvrīher ūdhas-śabdāntād ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21111: trividhodhnī ity atra api yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:21118: saṅkhyādeḥ bahuvrīheḥ dāma-śabdāntāt hāyana-śabdāntāt ca striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21131: ṇatvam api tricaturbhyām hāyanasya iti vayasya+iva smaryate // [#325]
GS24jvkasipu:21155: annantād bahuvrīher upadhā-lopinaḥ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye chandasi ca nityaṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21168: chandasi viṣaye striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21190: jasviṣayādanyatra sañjñāyāṃ chandasi ca rātri-śabdāt ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21207: antarvat-pativator nuk bhavati ṅīp ca pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:21221: garbhiṇyāṃ jīvapatyāṃ ca vā chandasi tu nug-vidhiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21230: ṅīp pratyayas tu nakārāntatvād eva siddhaḥ yajñasaṃyoge /
GS24jvkasipu:21235: grāmasya patiriyaṃ brāhmaṇī kathaṃ vṛṣalasya patnī ?
GS24jvkasipu:21241: pati-śabda-antasya prātipadikasya sapūrvasya anupasarjanasya striyāṃ vibhāṣā nakāra-ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21259: samānādiṣv iti vaktavye samānasya sabhāva-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:21275: yayā hi pūtāḥ kratavaḥ pūtakratuḥ sā bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:21306: varṇa-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt anudāttāntāt takāropadhād vā ṅīp pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21339: varṇa-vācinaḥ prātipadikād anudāttāntāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21351: ṣidbhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo gaurādibhyaś ca striyām ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21475: iti ṣittvād eva siddhe jñāpana-arthaṃ vacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:21481: jānapada-ādibhya ekādaśabhyaḥ prātipadikebhya ekādaśasu vṛttyādiṣv artheṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21532: śoṇa-śabdāt prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21538: guṇavacanāt prātipadikād ukārāntāt striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21550: ādheyaś ca akriyājaś ca so 'sattvaprakṛtir guṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21554: bahu ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21594: bahv-ādibhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye nityaṃ striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21601: chandasi viṣaye striyāṃ bhuvo nityaṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21614: puṃyogād dhetor yat prātipadikaṃ striyāṃ vartate puṃsa ākhyābhūtaṃ tasmād ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21635: indrādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ striyām ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21663: vinā puṃyogena svārtha eva ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21672: karaṇaṃ pūrvam asminn iti karaṇapūrvaṃ pratipadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:21673: krīta-śabdāntāt prātipadikāt karaṇa-pūrvāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21679: sā hī tasya dhanakrītī prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:21682: gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prāk subutpatteḥ iti bahulaṃ taducyate,
GS24jvkasipu:21688: karaṇapūrvāt prātipadikāt ktāntād alpākhyāyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:21715: yasya astu kathañcit pāṇir gṛhyate pāṇigṛhītā sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21730: asvāṅgapūrvapadād antodāttāt ktāntād bahuvrīheḥ striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21746: pravṛddhā ca asau vilūnā ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21751: bahuvrīheḥ ktāntād antodāttāt iti sarvaṃ nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:21753: svāṅgaṃ yad upasarjanam asaṃyogopadhaṃ tad antāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21769: atatsthaṃ tatra dṛṣṭaṃ cet tena cettattathāyutam //
GS24jvkasipu:21774: bahvaj-lakṣaṇe saṃyogopadha-lakṣaṇe ca pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:21776: nāsikā-ādyantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21802: kroḍādyantāt bahvajantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21823: saha nañ vidyamāna evaṃ pūrvāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21834: nakha-mukhāntāt prātipadikāt sañjñāyām viṣaye striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21853: svāṅgāc ca+upasarjanāt ity evam ādividhi-pratiṣedha-viṣayaḥ sarvo 'py apekṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21854: yatra ṅīṣ vihitas tatra tad apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21870: bahantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21876: sakhī aśiśvī ity etau śabdau ṅīṣantau bhāṣāyāṃ nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:21878: na asyāḥ śiśur asti iti aśiśvī /
GS24jvkasipu:21885: jātivāci yat prātipadikaṃ na ca striyām eva niyatam astrīviṣayam ayakāropadhaṃ ca tasmāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21886: ākṛti-grahaṇā jātir liṅgānāṃ ca na sarvabhāk /
GS24jvkasipu:21909: pāka-ādy-uttarapadāt jātivācinaḥ prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21910: strī-viṣayatvād eteṣāṃ pūrveṇa aprāptaḥ pratyayo bidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21918: puṣpa-phala-mūla-uttarapadāt tu yato neṣyate tadajādiṣu paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:21925: ikārāntāt prātipadikāt manuṣyajāti-vācinaḥ striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21933: jāteḥ iti vartamāne punar jāti-grahaṇaṃ yopadhād api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:21943: ukārāntāt manusyajāti-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21961: bāhu-śabdāntāt prātipadikāt sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye striyāṃ ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21977: ūru-uttarapadāt prātipadikāt aupamye gamyamāne striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21986: saṃhita śapha lakṣaṇa vāma ity evam ādeḥ prātipadikād ūru-uttarapadāt striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21998: kadru-śabdāt kamaṇḍalu-śabdāc ca chandasi ciṣaye striyāṃ ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22011: kadru-kamaṇḍalu-śabdābhyāṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22021: śārṅgaravādibhyo 'ñantebhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṅīn pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22057: atra yathāyogaṃ ṅībādiṣu prāpteṣu ṅīn vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:22061: yaṅantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ cāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22070: ṣāt paro yo yañ tadantāc cāp vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22080: tasmād yañi kṛte ṅīpi prāpte vacanam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:22081: āvaṭyāc ca striyāṃ cāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22089: āpañcamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ yānita ūrdhvam anukramisyāmaḥ taddhitasañjñāste veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22101: yuvan-śabdāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ tiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22106: aṇ-iñor anārṣayor guru-upottamayoḥ ṣyaṅ gotre // PS_4,1.78 //
GS24jvkasipu:22108: gotre yāv aṇiñau vihitāv anārṣau tadantayoḥ prātipadikayor gurūpottamayoḥ striyāṃ ṣyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22109: nirdiṣyamānasya ādeśā bhavanti ity aṇiñor eva vijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:22116: guru upottamaṃ yasya tad gurūpottamaṃ prātipadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:22132: gurūpottamādikaṃ sarvam asti iti na staṇiñau /
GS24jvkasipu:22147: tato gotre vihitayor aṇiñoḥ striyāṃ ṣyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22158: krauḍi ity evam ādibhyaś ca striyāṃ ṣyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22186: daivayajñi śaucivṛkṣi sātyamugri kāṇṭheviddhi ity eteṣām anyatarasyāṃ ṣyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22187: iñantā ete, gotra-grahaṇaṃ ca na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:22204: trayam apy adhikriyate samarthānām iti ca,
GS24jvkasipu:22205: prathamād iti ca, vā iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:22215: teṣu sāmarthye sati prathama-nirdiṣṭād eva vikalpena pratyayo bhavati iti veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:22227: vā iti kim ? vākyam api yathā syāt upagor apatyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22228: yady evaṃ samāsa-vṛttiḥ taddhita-vṛttyā bādhyeta upagvapatyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22238: aṇ pratyayas tatra bhavati iti veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:22240: cidhirvā iti triṣv api darśaneṣv apavādaviṣayaṃ parigṛtya aṇ pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:22246: aśvapatyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ prāgdīvyatīyeṣv artheṣu aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22270: patyuttarapadāt ca prātipadikāt prāgdīvyatīyeṣv artheṣu ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22314: sarvato 'ktinn-arthād ity eke iti ṅīṣaṃ kṛtvā strībhyo ḍhak kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22321: utsādibhyaḥ prāgdīvyatīyeṣu artheṣu añ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22355: sacchabdo matubanta āgatanuṅko gṛhyate sattvantu iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22366: chandaś ca+iha vṛttaṃ gṛhyate, na vedaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:22373: prāgbhavanasaṃśabdanād ye 'rthās teṣu strī-śabdāt puṃs-śabdāc ca yathākramaṃ nañsnañau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22382: striyāḥ puṃvat iti jñāpakād vatyarthe na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22383: yoga-apekṣaṃ ca jñāpakam iti strīvad ity api siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:22390: dvigor yaḥ sambandhī nimittatvena taddhitaḥ prāgdīvyatīyo 'patya-pratyayaṃ varjayitvā tasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22402: atha vā dvigor eva ayaṃ lug vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22406: upacāreṇa tu lakṣaṇayā dvigu-nimitta-bhūtaḥ pratyaya eva dviguḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:22408: dvigu-nimittako 'pi tarhi guṇakalpanayā kasmān na dvigur ucyate pājcakapālam iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:22410: itaras tu dvigutvasya+eva nimittam ity asti viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22411: yady evam iha kathaṃ pañcakapālyāṃ saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:22418: tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayor ekena vigrahaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22422: pañcagargam ayam iti vā ity anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:22429: ity ādinā yeṣāṃ gotrapratyayānāṃ lug uktaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:22437: aci iti kim ? gargebhya āgatam gargarūpyam /
GS24jvkasipu:22441: gotrasya bahuṣu lopino bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayor aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:22444: vaida-śabdāt ataḥ iñ kṛte tasya ca iñaḥ ṇya-kṣatriya-ārṣa-ñito yūni lug-aṇ-iñoḥ (*2,4.58)
GS24jvkasipu:22447: baidasya baidayor vā apatyaṃ bahavo māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22452: prāg dīvyataḥ iti vartate, aci ca /
GS24jvkasipu:22453: prāgdīvyatīye ajādau pratyaye vivakṣite buddhisthe 'nutpanna eva yuva-pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22454: tasman nivṛtte sati yo yataḥ prāpnoti sa tato bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22459: tasya chāatrāḥ iti vivakṣite 'rthe buddhisthe yuva-pratyaysya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22474: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā, pheś cha ca (*4,1.149)
GS24jvkasipu:22504: pūrvasūtreṇa nitye luki prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22505: phakphiñor yuva-pratyayayoḥ prāgdīvyatīye 'jādau pratyaye vivakṣite 'nyatarasyāṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22523: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt apatyam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22533: utsargaḥ śeṣa eva asau vṛddhāny asya prayojanam //
GS24jvkasipu:22540: tasman vivakṣite bhedena pratyapatyaṃ pratyayotpatti-prasṅge niyamaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:22553: sarvasmin vyavahitajanite 'pi gotrāpatye garga-śabdād yañ eva bhavati iti pratyayo niyamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22554: athavā gotrāpatye vivakṣite eka eva śabdaḥ prathamā prakṛtiḥ pratyayam utpādayati iti prakṛtir niyamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22561: yūny apatye vivakṣite gotrād eva pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22575: striyā gotraprayayena abhidhānaṃ na prāpnoti gora-sañjñāyāḥ yuva-sañjñayā bādhitatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:22579: yūni yad uktaṃ tat striyāṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22591: śubhaṃyāḥ, kīlālapāḥ ity ato mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:22597: bāhu ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye iñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22648: bāhvādiprabhṛtiṣu yeṣāṃ darśanaṃ gotrabhāve laukike tato 'nyatra teṣāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22663: tatsaṃniyogena ca tasya akaṅ adeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22676: gotrasañjñake 'patye vācye kuñjādibhyaḥ cphañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22690: param api ñitsvaraṃ tyaktvā citsvara eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22709: naḍ ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ gotrāpatye phak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22713: śalaṅku śalaṅkaṃ ca ity atra paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22718: tat katham ? gotra-viśeṣe kauśike phakaṃ smaranti,
GS24jvkasipu:22720: athavā pailādipāṭha eva jñāpakaḥ iño bhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:22797: na ca gotrādaparo gotrapratyayo bhavati eko gotre (*4,1.93)
GS24jvkasipu:22801: iha tu gotrādhikāre 'pi sāmarthyād yūni pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22806: yañantāt iñantāc ca prātipadikād apatye phak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22815: tadantāt tu yūny eva ayaṃ pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:22816: gotrād yūni pratyayo bhavati iti vacanāt //
GS24jvkasipu:22821: śaradvat śunaka darbha ity etebhyo gotrāpatye phak pratyayo bhavati yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhṛguvatsāgrāyaṇeṣu artheṣu apatya-viśeṣeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:22834: droṇādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo gotrāpatye 'nyatarasyāṃ phak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22839: katham anantaraḥ aśvatthāmā drauṇāyanaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22851: ye punar atra anṛṣi-śabdāḥ putrādayastebhyo 'nantarāpatye eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22862: ṛṣyapatye nairantaryaviṣaye pratiṣedhe vijñāyamāne kauśiko viśvāmitraḥ iti duṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:23019: madhu-śabdād babhru-śabdāc ca gotrāpatye yañ pratyayo bhavati yathāsaṅkhyam brāhmaṇe kauśike vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:23025: tataḥ siddhe yañi kauśike niyama-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:23032: kapi-bodha-śabdābhyām āṅgirase 'patya-viśeṣe gotre yañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23046: vataṇḍa-śabdād āṅgirase 'patyaviśeṣe gotre yañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23049: kim artham idaṃ yāvatā gargādiṣv ayaṃ paṭhyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:23052: anāṅgirase tu ubhayatra pāṭhasāmarthyāt pratyayadvayam api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23059: vataṇḍa-śabdād āṅgirasyāṃ striyāṃ yapratyayasya luk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23072: ye tv atra pratyayāntāḥ paṭhyante tebhyaḥ sāmārthyād yūni pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23146: bharga-śabdād apatye viśeṣe traigarte gotre phañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23161: gaṅgā-śabdaḥ paṭhyate tikādiphiñā śumrādiḍhakā ca samāveśa-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:23240: vṛddhir yasya acām ādis tad vṛddham (*1,1.73) /
GS24jvkasipu:23245: avṛddhāni yāni nadīnāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ ca nāmadheyāni,
GS24jvkasipu:23252: mānuṣībhyaḥ khalv api - śikṣitāyāḥ apatyaṃ śaikṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23270: atryādibhyas tu paratvāḍ ḍhagādibhir eva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:23279: kathaṃ punar nityānāṃ śabdānāmandhakādivaṃśasamāśrayeṇa anvākhyānaṃ yujyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:23280: kecid āhuḥ katham api kākatālīyanyāyena kurvādivaṃśeṣvasaṃkareṇa+eva nakulasahadevādayaḥ śabdāḥ subahavaḥ saṅkalitāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:23288: matṛ-śabdāt saṅkhyā-pūrvāt saṃ-pūrvāt bhadra-pūrvāc ca apatye aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23311: vikarṇ-aśuṅga-chaṅgala-śabdebhyaḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vatsabharadvājātriṣu apatya-viśeṣeṣu aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23325: tannāmikāṇo bādhake dvyaca iti ḍhaki prāpte aṇ pratyayaḥ pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23326: pīlāyāḥ apatye vā aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23357: dvyacaḥ strī-pratyayāntād apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23367: ikārāntāt prātipadikād aniñ-antād apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23381: śubhra ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23387: pāṇḍaveyaḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23450: vikarṇa-śabdāt kuṣītaka-śabdāc ca kāṣyape 'patya-viśeṣe ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23464: kalyāṇī ity evam ādīnāṃ śabdānām apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23492: tatsanniyogena ca vā inaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23523: godhāyāḥ apatye udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ārak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23538: kṣudrābhyo vā apatye dṛak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23550: pitṛṣVasuḥ apatya-pratyaye ḍhaki parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23559: pitṛṣvasur yad uktaṃ tan mātṛṣvasur api bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23609: uttara-sūtre pūrva-pratiṣedhād iha tadantaḥ kevalaś ca dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23610: kula-śabda-antāt prātipadikāt kevalāc ca apatye khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23620: apūrvapadāt kula-śabdāt anyatarasyāṃ yat ḍhakañ ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23664: bhrātṛ-śabdād vyan pratyayo bhavati samudāyena ca+idam itraḥ sapatna ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23671: revatī ity evam ādibhyo 'patye ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23688: gotraṃ yā strī tadabhidhāyinaḥ śabdād apatye ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23708: vṛddhāt sauvīragotrād apatye bahulaṃ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati kutsane gamyamane /
GS24jvkasipu:23719: tṛtīyas tvākaśāpeyo gotrāṭ ṭhag bahulaṃ tataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:23726: gotrastriyāḥ ity ārabhya catvāro yogās teṣu prathamaḥ kutsana eva,
GS24jvkasipu:23735: pheḥ iti phiño grahaṇaṃ na phinaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:23737: phiñantāt prātipadikāt sauvīragotrād apatye chaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23746: phiñantād autsargikasya aṇa āgatasya ṇya-kṣatriya-arṣa-ñito yūni lug aṇ-iñoḥ (*2,4.58) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:23749: yamundaś ca suyāmā ca vārṣyāyaṇiḥ phiñaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23750: sauvīreṣu ca kutsāyāṃ dvau yogau śabdavit samaret //
GS24jvkasipu:23756: phāṇṭāhṛtimimataśabdābhyāṃ sauvīra-viṣayābhyām apatye ṇa-phiñau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23759: tena yathāsaṅkhyam iha na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23772: kuru ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23781: kauravyaśabdasya kṣatriya-vacanasya tikādiṣu pāṭhāt phiñ api bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23786: kāriṇas tu rathakāra-śabdād uttarasūtreṇa+eva ṇyaḥ siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23794: chandasa eva ayaṃ pramādāt kavibhiḥ prayuktaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23849: senāntāt prātipadikāt lakṣaṇa-śabdāt kāri-vacanebhyaś ca apatye ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23861: senānta-lakṣaṇa-kāribhyo 'patye iñ pratyayo bhavati udīcāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:23867: vacanasāmarthyād eva pratyaya-samāveśe labdhe ācārya-grahaṇaṃ vaicitry-ārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:23869: tena aṇā ayam iñ bādhyate, na tu ṇyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23874: tika ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye phiñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23949: aṇantād dvyacaḥ prātipadikād apatye phiñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23965: tasmād apatye phiñ pratyayo bhavati udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:23968: kāriśabdād api vṛddhād agotrāt paratvād anena+eva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:23978: vākina ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye phiñ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23980: yadiha vṛddham agotraṃ śabdarūpaṃ tasya āgama-artham eva grahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:23985: udīcām ity adhikārāt pakṣe te 'pi bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:23998: putrāntam agotram iti pūrveṇa+eva pratyayḥ siddhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:24013: avṛddhāc chabdarūpād apatye phin pratyayo bhavati bahulaṃ prācāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:24019: udīcāṃ prācām anyatarasyāṃ bahulam iti sarva ete vikalpa-arthas teṣām ekena+eva sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:24025: manor jātāv añ-ayatau ṣuk ca // PS_4,1.161 //
GS24jvkasipu:24027: manu-śabdād añ yat ity etau pratyau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:24033: tathā ca mānuṣāḥ iti bahuṣu na lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24036: apatye kutsite mūḍhe manor autsargikaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24037: nakārasya ca mūrdhanyas tena sidhyati māṇavaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24041: pautraprabhṛti yad apatyaṃ tad gotra-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24042: sambandhi-śabdatvād apatya-śabdasya yad apatyaṃ tad apekṣayā pautra-prabhṛter gotra-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24057: tasmin jīvati sati pautraprabhṛty-apatyaṃ yuva-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24058: pautraprabhṛti iti ca na sāmānāadhikaraṇyena apatyaṃ viśeṣayati,
GS24jvkasipu:24060: ṣaṣṭhyā vipariṇamyate pautra-prabhṛter yad apatyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24069: bhratari jyayasi jīvati kanīyān bhrātā yuva-sañjño bhavati pautra-prabhṛter apatyam /
GS24jvkasipu:24071: tayoḥ kanīyān mṛte pitrādau vaṃśye bhrātari jyāyasi jīvati yuva-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24083: vā anyasmin sapiṇḍe sthaviratare jivati // PS_4,1.165 //
GS24jvkasipu:24086: yeṣām ubhayatra daśāhāni kulasyannaṃ na bhujyate ity evam ādikāyāṃ kriyāyām anadhikāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24087: bhrātur anyasmin sapiṇḍe sthaviratare jīvati pautraprabhṛter apatyaṃ jīvadeva yuvasañjñam vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24091: sthānena vayasā ca+utkṛṣṭe yathā syāt pitṛvye pitāmahe bhrātari vayasādhike jivati /
GS24jvkasipu:24098: mṛte mṛto vā gārgya eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:24102: apatyam antarhitaṃ vṛddham iti śāstrāntare paribhāṣaṇād gotraṃ vṛddham ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24103: vṛddhasya yuvasañjñā vā bhavati pūjāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:24105: vṛddhasya iti ṣaṣṭhī-nirdeśo vicitrā sūtrasya kṛtiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24114: kutsāyāṃ gamyamanāyāṃ yūno vā yuvasañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24145: janapadaśabdāv etau kṣatriyābhidhāyinau tābhyām añapavāde vṛddhād iti ñyaṅi prāte punar añ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24156: magadha kaliṅga sūramasa iti etebhyaś ca apatye aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24164: tasya rājani ity eva, āṅgo rājā //
GS24jvkasipu:24170: kosala-ajāda-śabdābhyāṃ ca aptya ñyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24195: kuruśabdāt nādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyo ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24213: sālvāvayavebhyaḥ pratyagratha-kalakūṭa-aśmaka-śabdebhyaś cāpatye iñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24233: ity evam ādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sarvanāmnā pratyavamṛśyante,
GS24jvkasipu:24243: janapadaśabdāt kṣatriyāt ity anena vihitasya año lug ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24256: avanti-kunti-kuru-śabdebhya utpannasya tadrājasya stiryām abhidheyāyāṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24269: akāra-pratyayasya tadrājasya striyām abhidheyāyām lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24280: prācyebhyaḥ bhargādibhyaḥ yaudheyādibhyaś ca utpannasya lugna bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24281: ataś ca (*4,1.177) ity anena striyāṃ luk prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24293: kasya punar akārasya pratyayasya yaudheyādibhyo luk prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:24296: kathaṃ punas tasya bhinnaprakaraṇasthasya anena luk prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:24297: etad eva vijñāpayati pāścamikasya api tadrājasya ataś ca ity anena lug bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24303: tathā ca+uktaṃ yaudheyādi-pratiṣedho jñāpakaḥ parśvādyaṇo luk iti / [#362]
GS24jvkasipu:24324: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyām kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24333: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthād rāgaviśeṣa-vācinaḥ śabdād raktam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitam pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24349: lākṣādibhyo rāgavacanebhyas tṛtīyāsamarthebhyo raktam ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24369: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthād nakṣatraviśeṣa-vācinaḥ śabdād yuktaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24372: kathaṃ punar nakṣatreṇa puṣyādinā kālo yujyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:24373: puṣyādi-samīpasthe candramasi vartamānāḥ puṣyādi-śabdāḥ pratyayamutpādayanti puṣyeṇa yuktaḥ kālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24387: pūrveṇa vihitasya pratyayasya lub bhavati aviśeṣe /
GS24jvkasipu:24401: śravana-śabdād aśvattha-śabdāc ca+utpannasya pratyayasya lub bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24411: nakṣatradvandvāt tṛtīyāsamarthād yukte kāle chaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24421: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthād dṛṣṭaṃ sāma ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24422: yad dṛṣṭaṃ sāma cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24429: kali-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthād dṛṣṭaṃ sāma ity etasminn arthe ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24436: agneḥ svam iti sarvatra ḍhag eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24439: dṛṣṭe sāmani aṇ vā ḍid bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:24441: jāte ca arthe yo 'nyena bādhitaḥ punar aṇ vidhīyate sa vā ḍid bhavati iti vaktavyam / [#365]
GS24jvkasipu:24443: prāgdīvyato 'ṇ prāptaḥ kālaṭhañā bādhitaḥ saṃdhivelādy-ṛtu-nakṣatrebhyaḥ iti punar vidhiyate sa vā ḍid bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:24459: dṛṣṭe sāmani jāte ca dviraṇ ḍidvā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24464: vāmadeva-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt dṛṣṭaṃ sāma ity etasminn arthe ḍyat ḍya ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24470: iti naña uttarasya antodāttatve vidhīyamāne 'nyor grahaṇaṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:24471: ananubandhakagrahaṇa-paribhāṣayā ekānubandhakagrahaṇaparibhāṣayā ca anayor nivṛttiḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24473: siddhe yasya+iti lopena kimarthaṃ yayatau ḍitau /
GS24jvkasipu:24478: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt parivṛtaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24479: yo 'sau parivṛtaḥ rathaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24493: pāṇḍukambala-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt parivṛto rathaḥ ity etasminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24504: tābhyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ parivṛto rathaḥ ity etasminn arthe añ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24515: apūrvapatiṃ kumārīṃ patir upapannaḥ kaumāraḥ patiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24517: apūrvapatiḥ kumārī patim upapannā kaumārī bhāryā /
GS24jvkasipu:24520: apūrvatvaṃ yadā tasyāḥ kumāryāṃ bhavati iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:24522: tasya strī kaumārī bhāryā iti siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:24526: tatra iti saptamīsamarthād amatra-vācinaḥ śabdād uddhṛtam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24535: tatra iti saptamī samarthavibhaktiḥ kṣīrāḍ ḍhañ (*4,2.20)
GS24jvkasipu:24540: sthaṇḍila-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt śayitaryabhidheye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24551: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24552: yat saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ cet te bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:24563: śūla-śabdād ukhā-śabdāc ca saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24570: dadhi-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24572: nanu ca saṃskṛta-arthe prāgvahateḥ ṭhakaṃ vakṣyati,
GS24jvkasipu:24575: dadhnā hi tat saṃskṛtaṃ yasya dadhikṛtam eva+utkarṣādhānam,
GS24jvkasipu:24581: udaśvic-chabdāt saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ it yetasminn arthe anyatarasyāṃ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24588: kṣīra-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ ity etasminn arthe ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24594: sā iti prathamāsamarthād asminn iti saptamy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24595: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ paurṇamāsī ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24607: itikaraṇasya sañjñāśabdasya ca tulyam eva phalaṃ prayoga-anusaraṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:24610: na hy ayaṃ loke tathā prasiddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24611: sañjñārthatve tu samprati jñāpite yat tatra tatra+ucyate itikaraṇas tataś ced vivakṣā iti tadupapannaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24620: sā asmin paurṇamāsī iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:24621: āgrahāyaṇī-śabdād aśvattha-śabdāc ca prathamasamarthāt paurṇamāsy-upādhikād asminn iti saptamyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24630: phalguny-ādayaḥ paurṇamāsī-śabdāḥ tebhyo vibhāṣā ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24633: nityam aṇi prāpte pakṣe ṭhag vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24642: sā iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24643: yat prathamāsamarthaṃ devatā cet sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24655: katham āgneyo vai brāhmaṇo devatā iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:24658: iti yāvat sā 'sya devatā ity adhikāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24659: sā iti prakṛte punaḥ samartha-vibhakti nirdeśaḥ sañjñā-nivṛtty-arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24672: śukra-śabdāt sā 'sya devatā ity asinnn arthe ghan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24680: aponaptṛ apāṃnaptṛ ity etābhyāṃ ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24684: aponapād apāṃnapād iti devatāyā nāmadheye ete /
GS24jvkasipu:24685: tayos tu patyayasanniyogena rūpam idaṃ nipatyate //
GS24jvkasipu:24689: aponaptṛ apāṃnaptṛ ity etābhyāṃ cha-kāraḥ pratyayo bhavati sā asya devatā iti yasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24712: soma-śabdāt ṭyaṇ pratyayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24722: vāyv-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ yat pratyayo bhavat sā 'sya devatā ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24732: dyāvāpṛthivy-ādibbhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:24735: dyauś ca pṛthivī ca dyāvāpṛthivyau devate asya dyāvāpṛthivīyam,
GS24jvkasipu:24737: śunaś ca sīraś ca tau devate asya iti śunāsīrīyam,
GS24jvkasipu:24752: agni-śabdād ḍhak pratyayo bhavati sā+asya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24759: kālaviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ śabdebhyo bhavavat pratyayā bhavanti sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24760: kālāṭ ṭhañ (*4,3.11) iti prakaraṇe bhave pratyayā vidhāsyante te sā 'sya devatā ity asmin arthe tathā+eva+iṣyante,
GS24jvkasipu:24776: mahārāja-śabdāt proṣṭhapada-śabdāc ca ṭhañ prayayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24780: ṭhañ-prakaraṇe tadasmin vartata iti navayajñādibhya upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:24792: pitṛmātṛbhyāṃ bhrātaryabhidheye vyat ḍulac ity etau pratyayu nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:24796: tābhyām eva pitari ḍāmahac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24813: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt samūhaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24815: cittavadadyudāttamagotraṃ yasya ca na anyat pratipadaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:24818: , gotrād vuñ, pratipadaṃ ca kedārād yañca (*4,2.40)
GS24jvkasipu:24838: bhikṣā ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24842: tasya grahaṇa-sāmarthyād pumbadbhāvo na bhavati bhasyāḍhe taddhite (*6,3.35) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24861: gotrādibhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24875: prakṛtyā 'ke rājanyamanuṣyayuvānaḥ iti yalopo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24893: kavacin śabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24901: brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo yan pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24920: grāmādibhyaḥ tal pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24930: anudāttādeḥ śabdād añ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24938: khaṇdikā ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'ñ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24943: kṣudrakāś ca mālavāś ca iti kṣatriya-dvandvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24944: tataḥ pūrveṇa+eva añi siddhe vacanaṃ gotravuñ bādhana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:24948: evaṃ tarhi etaj jñāpayati vuñi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:24950: pratyojanam aupagavakaṃ kāpaṭavakam iti vuñ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24952: kṣudrakamālavāt ity etāvatā yogavibhāgena pūrvaviprateṣedhas tadantavidhiś ca jñāpitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:24953: punar asyaa+eva niyamārtham ucyate senāsañjñāyām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24958: gotrād vuñ na ca tadgotraṃ tadantān na ca sarvataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24959: jñāpakaṃ syāt tadantatve tathā ca api śalier vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24960: senāyāṃ niyama-arthaṃ ca yathā badhyeta cāñ vuñā //
GS24jvkasipu:24976: tebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ samūhe dharmavat pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:24977: gotracaraṇād vuñ ity ārabhya pratyayā vakṣyante,
GS24jvkasipu:24978: tatra ced amucyate caraṇād dharmāmnāyayoḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:24994: acitta-arthebhyo hasti-dhenu-śabdābhyāṃ ca ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25006: keśa aśva ity etyābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yañ cha ity etau pratyayau bhavato 'nyatarasyāṃ tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25012: pāśadibhyaḥ yaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25031: khala-go-ratha-śabdebhyaḥ yaḥ pratyaya bhavat tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25039: khala-go-ratha-śabdebhyo yathāsaṅkhyam ini tra kaṭyac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25073: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād viṣayaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25074: yo 'sau viṣayaḥ deśaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25092: rājanyādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati viṣayo deśe ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:25118: bhairikyādibhyaḥ aiṣukāryādibhyaś ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vidhal bhaktal ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ viṣayo deśe ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25166: sa iti prathamāsamarthād asya ti ṣaṣṭyārthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25167: yat prathamāsamarthaṃ chandaś cet tadādir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25168: yat tadasya iti nirdiṣṭaṃ pragāthāś cet te bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:25180: pragātha-śabdaḥ kriyānimittakaḥ kvacid eva mantraviśeṣe vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:25181: yatra dve ṛcau pragrathanena tisraḥ kriyante,
GS24jvkasipu:25182: sa pragrathanāt prakarṣagānād vā pragāthaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25193: prayojanavācibhyaḥ yoddhṛvācibhyaś ca śabdebhyaḥ prathamāsamarthebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe saṅgrāme 'bhidheye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25194: bhadrā prayojanam asya saṅgrāmasya bhadraḥ saṅgrāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25205: tad asyāṃ praharaṇam iti krīḍāyāṃ ṇaḥ // PS_4,2.57 //
GS24jvkasipu:25207: tat iti prathamāsamarthād asyām iti saptamy-arthe ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25208: yat tat iti nirdiṣṭaṃ praharaṇaṃ cet bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25209: yad asyām iti nirdiṣṭaṃ krīḍā tad cet sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25225: ghañantāt kiyāvācinaḥ prathamāsamarthād asyām iti saptamyarthe strīliṅge ñaḥ prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25233: atha samarthavibhaktiḥ pratyayārthaś ca kasmāt punar upādiyate,
GS24jvkasipu:25243: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthāt adhīte veda ity etayoḥ arthayoḥ yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25255: kratuviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ ukthādibhyaś ca sūtrāntāc ca ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25268: na ca tāny adhīyāne pratyaya iṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:25270: sāmalakṣaṇe aukthikye vartamānaḥ uktha-śabdaḥ pratyayam utpādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:25273: aukthikya-śabdāc ca pratyayo na bhavaty eva,
GS24jvkasipu:25354: krama ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ vun pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25367: anubrāhmaṇa-śabdāt iniḥ pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25381: vasanta ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25409: sūtra-vācinaḥ ka-kāra+upadhād upannasya pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25416: iha mā bhūt, mahāvārttikaṃ sūtram adhīte māhāvārttikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25424: chandāṃsi brāhmaṇāni ca proktapratyayāntāni tadviṣayāṇy eva bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:25427: tena svātantryam upādhyāntarayogo vakyaṃ ca nivartate / [#380]
GS24jvkasipu:25455: tad asminn asti iti deśe tannāmni // PS_4,2.67 //
GS24jvkasipu:25462: tat iti rathamāsamarthād asmin iti saptamyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25463: yat prathamāsamartham asti cet tad bhavati yad asmin iti nirdiṣṭaṃ deśaś cet sa tannāmā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25473: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt nirvṛttam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati deśanāmadheye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:25474: deśe tannamni iti caturṣv api yogeṣu sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25477: hetau kartari ca yathāyogaṃ tṛtīyā samartha-vibhaktiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:25481: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthān nivāsaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati deśanāmadheye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:25490: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt adūrabhavaḥ ityetasminnarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25493: cakāraḥ pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇām arthānām iha sannidhāna-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25501: u-varṇāntāt prātipadikāt yathavihitaṃ samarthavibhakti-yuktāt añ pratyayo bhavati tad asminn asti ity evam ādiṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:25512: bahvac aṅgaṃ yasya asau bahvajaṅgao matup,
GS24jvkasipu:25513: tadantāt prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25519: aṅga-grahaṇaṃ bahvaj iti tad viśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:25525: bahvacaḥ prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ kūpeṣv abhidheyesu /
GS24jvkasipu:25533: vipāśaḥ uttare kūle ye kūpāsteṣv abhidheyeṣu añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25539: dakṣiṇato vipāśaḥ kūpeṣu aṇ eva dāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25547: saṅkala ity evam ādibhyaḥ añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25593: deśe tannamni ity asya viśeṣanaṃ sauvīrādayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:25597: sauvīre strīliṅge deśe vācye sālve prāci /
GS24jvkasipu:25598: sauvīre tāvat - dattamitreṇa nirvṛttā nagarī dāttāmitrī /
GS24jvkasipu:25600: prāci khalv api - kakandena nirvṛttā kākandī /
GS24jvkasipu:25607: subāstu ity evam ādibhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25647: ka-kāra-upadhāt ca prātipadikāt an pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25660: tatra yathāsaṅkhyaṃ saptadaśabhyaḥ prātipadikagaṇebhyaḥ saptadaśa pratyayāḥ bhavanti cāturarthikāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25965: tasya ca varaṇādiṣu darśanāl lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25972: deśe tannāmni yaś cāturarthikaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25987: na ca atra lubantaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:25991: varaṇa ity evam ādibhyaḥ utpannasya cāturarthikasya pratyayasya lup bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26020: śarkarā-śabdād utpannasya cāturarthikasya pratyayasya vā lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26022: yāvatā śarkarā-śabdaḥ kumudādiṣu varāhādiṣu ca paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:26023: tatra pāṭhasamarthyāt pratyayasya pakṣe śravaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:26029: gaṇapāṭhāc ca śravaṇam uttarasūtre vihitau ca dvau pratyayau,
GS24jvkasipu:26039: śarkarā-śabdāt ṭhak cha ity etau pratyayau bhavataś cāturarthikau /
GS24jvkasipu:26046: nadyām abhidheyāyāṃ matup pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26061: madhu ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo matup pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26096: kumuda naḍa vetasa ity etebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ḍmatup pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26121: utkara ity evam ādibhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26172: naḍa ity evam ādīnāṃ kugāgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26199: teṣu ghādayo mā bhūvan iti śeṣādhikāraḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26200: kiṃ ca sarveṣu jātādiṣu ghādayo yathā syuḥ anantareṇa+ev ārthādeśena sambandhitvena kṛtārthatā mā jñāyi iti sākalyārthaṃ śeṣa-vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:26208: śeṣe iti lakṣaṇaṃ ca adhikāraś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:26219: rāṣṭra avārapāra ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ gha-khau ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26228: teṣāṃ tu jātādayo 'rthāḥ samartha-vibhaktayaś ca purastād vakṣyante //
GS24jvkasipu:26230: grāma-śabdāt ya khañ ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26235: katri ity evam ādibhyo ḍhakañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26256: kula-kukṣi-grīvā-śabdebhyo yathāsaṅkhyaṃ śvan asi alaṅkāra ity eteṣu jatādiṣv artheṣu ḍhakañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26267: nadī ity evam ādibhyo ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26297: dakṣiṇā paścāt puras ity etebhyaḥ tyak prayayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26329: tena rāṅkavaḥ kambalaḥ iti ṣphak na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26330: viśeṣavihitena ca ṣphakā aṇo bādhā mā bhūt ity aṇ-grahaṇam api kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:26334: div prāc apāc udac pratyac ity etebhyo yat pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26340: avyayāt tu kālavācinaḥ paratvāt ṭyuṭyulau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26352: varṇau yā kanthā tasyā vuk pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26363: ninirbhyāṃ ghruvagatyoś ca praveśo niyame tathā //
GS24jvkasipu:26380: āvis śabdāc chandasi tyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26392: aiṣamas hyas śvas ity etebhyo 'nyatarasyāṃ tyap patyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26403: tīra-uttarapadāt rūpya-uttarapadāc ca prātipadikād yathāsaṅkhyam añ ña ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:26409: tīrarūpyāntāt iti noktaṃ bahuc-pratyaya-pūrvād mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26416: dik-pūrvapadāt prātipadikāt asañjñā-viṣayāt ñaḥ patyayo hbavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26432: dik-pūrvapadāt madra-śabdād añ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26441: udīcyagrāmavācinaḥ prātipadikād bahvaco 'ntodāttād añ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26455: prasthottarapadāta paladyādibhyaḥ kakāropadhāt ca prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26470: vāhīka-śabdaḥ kopadho 'pi punaḥ paṭhyate paraṃ chaṃ (*4,2.114) bādhitum /
GS24jvkasipu:26495: gotram iha na pratyaya-artho na ca prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:26498: tadantebhya eva aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26506: gotre ya iñ vihitaḥ tadantāt prātipdikāt aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26516: dvy-acaḥ prātipadikāt prācya-bharata-gotrād iñantād aṇ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26530: deśavācinaḥ kāśiśabdasya tatra grahaṇaṃ caidi-śabdena sāhacaryāt /
GS24jvkasipu:26532: jñāpakād anyatra prācya-grahaṇena bharata-grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti sva-śabdena bharatānām upādānaṃ kṛtam // [#393]
GS24jvkasipu:26539: vṛddhāt prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26550: bhavac-chabdād vṛddhāt ṭhak-chasau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:26560: kāśi ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṭhañ ñiṭha ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:26577: kathaṃ bhāṣye udāhṛtaṃ vā nāmadheyasya vṛddhasañjñā veditavyā devadattīyāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:26619: vāhīkagrāma-vācibhyaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ ṭhaññiṭhau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:26631: tadvācibhyo vṛddhebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vibhāṣā ṭhaññiṭhau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26643: u-varṇāntāt deśavācinaḥ prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26648: ṭhaññiṭhayoḥ prakaraṇe ṭhañaḥ kevalasya anuvṛttiḥ na labhyate iti ṭhañ-grahaṇaṃ kṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:26659: vṛddhād eva prācām avṛddhān na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26664: vṛddhāt iti vartate, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:26665: dhanva-vācino ya-kāra-upadhāc ca deśa-abhidhāyino vṛddhāt prātipadikāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26674: vṛddhāt ity eva, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:26676: prasthapura vaha ity evam antāt deśa-vācinaḥ prātipadikād vṛddhād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26683: purānto ropadhastataḥ uttarasūtraiṇaiva siddham aprāgartham iha grahaṇam //
GS24jvkasipu:26687: vṛddhat ity eva, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:26689: ra-upadhāt īkārāntāc ca pragdeśa-vācino vṛddhād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26703: vṛddhāt ity eva, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:26705: vṛddhāj janapada-vācinaḥ tadavadhi-vācinaś ca prātipadikāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26711: tadavadher api janapā eva gṛhyate na grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26714: gartottarapadāc chaṃ bādhitvā vuñ eva janapada-avadher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26720: avṛddhād vṛddhāc ca janapadāt tadavadhi-vācinaś ca bahuvanaca-viṣayāt prātipadikād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26744: apigrahaṇaṃ kim yāvatā vṛddhāta pūrveṇa+eva siddham ?
GS24jvkasipu:26745: takrakauṇḍinyanyāyena bādhā mā vijñāyi iti samuccīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:26749: deśe ity eva uttarapada-śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26751: prātipadikāc ca avṛddhād vṛddhāc ca vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26764: dhūmādibhyo deśavacibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26769: tasya yopadhātvād eva vuñi siddhe sāmarthyād adeśārthaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:26770: tathā videha-anartaśabdayoḥ janapada-lakṣaṇe vuñi siddhe 'deśārthaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26774: tasya nāvi manuṣye ca vuñ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26824: nagara-śabdāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ kutsane prāvīṇye ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:26826: kutsane prāvīṇye ca jātādau pratyayārtha iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26829: kena ayaṃ muṣitaḥ panthā gātre pakṣamālidhūsaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26830: iha nagare manuṣyeṇa sambhāvyata etan nāgarakeṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:26833: iha nagare manuṣyeṇa sambhāvyata etan nāgarakeṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:26837: katryādiṣu tu sañjñāśabdena sāhacaryāt sañjñānāgaraṃ paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:26842: araṇya-śabdād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisiko manusye 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:26859: kuru yugandhara ity etābhyāṃ vibhāṣā vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26864: tābhyām avṛddhād api iti nitye vuñi prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26868: manuṣyatatsthayoḥ tu kuru-śabdān nitya eva vuñ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26883: ka-kāra-upadhāt prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26885: anyatra janapadaṃ muktvā pūrveṇa+eva kopadhād aṇi siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:26894: kaccha ity evam ādibhyo deśavācibhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26902: tasya kopadhatvād eva aṇi siddhe grahanam uttarārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:26925: manuṣye manuṣyasthe ca jātādau pratyayārthe kacchādibhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26940: tataḥ pūrveṇa+eva manusya-tatsthayoḥ vuñi siddhe niyamārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:26941: apadātāv eva manusye manaṣyasthe ca sālva-śabdād vuñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26949: gavi yavāgvām ca jātādau pratyayārthe sālva-śabdād buñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26959: garta-uttarapadāt deśa-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26970: gaha ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27052: prāgdeśa-vācinaḥ kaṭādeḥ prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27061: rājñaḥ kakāraś ca antādeśo bhavti chaś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27071: vṛddhād deśa-vācinaḥ aka ika ity evam antāt khakāropadhāc ca prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27090: kanthādy-uttarapadād deśa-vācino vṛddhāt prātipadikāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27112: parvataśabdāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati vā amanuṣye vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:27128: kṛkaṇaparṇa-śabdābhyāṃ bhāradvājadeśa-vācibhyāṃ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27133: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27146: tyadāditvād vṛddha-sañjñakayor yuṣmad-asmadoḥ che prāpte pratyekaṃ pratyayatrayaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27156: tasmin iti sākṣād vihitaḥ khañ nirdiṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:27158: tasmin khañi aṇi ca yuṣmad-asmador yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yuṣmāka asmāka ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27159: nimittayor ādeśau prati yathāsaṅkhaṃ kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:27173: ekavacana-parayor yuṣmad-asmadoḥ tavaka mamaka ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tasmin khañi aṇi ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27174: nimittayos tu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pūrvavad eva na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27176: iti pratyayalakṣaṇa-pratiṣedhād ekavacana-paratā yuṣmad-asmador na sambhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:27180: ekavacane yuṣmad-asamādī ekasya arthasya vācake tavaka-mamakāv ādeśau pratipadyete iti sūtra-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27185: tasminn aṇi ca ity eva, tvadīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27200: para avara adhama uttama ity evaṃ pūrvāc ca ardhāt yat pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27209: para-avara-śabdāv adig-grahaṇāv api staḥ paraṃ sukham,
GS24jvkasipu:27211: tatra kṛta-arthatvād dik-śabdapakṣe pareṇa ṭhañyatau syātām /
GS24jvkasipu:27212: asmāt pūrva-grahaṇād yat pratyayo bhavati parārdhyam,
GS24jvkasipu:27217: dik-pūrvapadād ardhāntāt prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27229: grāma-ekadeśa-vācino janapada-ekadeśavācinaś ca prātipadikād dik-pūrvapadād ardhāntād añ-ṭhañau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:27231: ime khalv asmākaṃ grāmasya janapadasya vā paurvārdhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:27249: a-kāraḥ pratyayo bhavati madhya-śabdāt sāmpratike jātādau pratyaya-arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27272: kāla-viśeṣa-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27278: yathākathañcid guṇa-vṛttyā api kāle vartamānāt pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27286: śarac-chabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śrāddhe 'bhidheye śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27297: roge ātape ca abhidheye śarac-chabdāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo vā bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27308: niśā-pradoṣa-śabdābhyāṃ ca vibhāṣā ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27309: kālāṭ ṭhañ (*4,3.11) iti nitye ṭhañi prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27328: sandhivela-ādibhyaḥ ṛtubhyo nakṣatrebhyaś ca kāla-vṛttibhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27357: varṣa-śabdāṭ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ ṛtvaṇo 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27363: varṣa-śabdāt chandasi viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27371: vasanta-śabdāc chandasi viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27378: hemanta-śabdāc chandasi viṣaye ṭhaj pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27383: sarvatra aṇ ca talopaś ca // PS_4,3.22 //
GS24jvkasipu:27391: nanu ca chandasi iti na anuvartiṣyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:27392: saivān anuvṛttiḥ śabdena akhyāyate pratyatnādhikyena pūrvasūtre 'pi sambandha-artham / [#404]
GS24jvkasipu:27394: haimantikam iti bhāṣāyām api ṭhañaṃ smaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:27395: atha aṇ ca iti cakāraḥ kim arthaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:27398: ṛtvaṇi hi takāralopo na asti haimanti paṅktī paṅktiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27407: sāyaṃ ciraṃ prāhṇe prage ity etebhyaḥ avyayebhyaś ca kālavācibhyaḥ ṭyu-ṭyulau pratyayau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:27417: yastu syaterantakarmaṇo ghañi sāya-śabdas tasya+idaṃ makārāntatvaṃ pratyaya-sanniyogena nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27437: kālāṭ ṭhañ (*4,3.11) iti ṭhañi prāpte vacanaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:27445: yadā tu na saptamī samartha-vibhaktiḥ pūrvāhṇaḥ soḍhaḥ asya iti tadā pūrvāhṇatanaḥ iti bhavitavyam // [#405]
GS24jvkasipu:27451: teṣām ataḥ prabhṛti arthāḥ samartha-vibhaktayaḥ ca nirdiśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:27452: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt jātaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27468: prāvṛṭ-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāj jātaḥ ity etasminn arthe ṭhap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27475: śarac-chabdāt saptamī-samarthāj jātaḥ ity etasminn arthe vuñ pratyayo bhavati ṛtvaṇaḥ apavādaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:27487: pūrvāhṇa-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ vun pratyayo bhavati tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25)
GS24jvkasipu:27501: asañjñāyāṃ tu yathāprāptaṃ ṭhañādayaḥ eva bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:27507: pratyaya. saṃniyogena ca pathaḥ pantha ity ayam ādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27513: amāvāsyā-śabdād vun pratyayo bhavati vā tatra jātaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27522: amāvāsyā-śabdāt akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25)
GS24jvkasipu:27524: pūrveṇa vunnaṇoḥ prāptayoḥ ayaṃ tṛtīyaḥ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27530: sindhu-śabdād apakara-śabdāc ca kan pratyayo bhavati tatra jāta (*4,3.25)
GS24jvkasipu:27540: sindhv-apakara-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇañau pratyayau bhavataḥ tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25)
GS24jvkasipu:27548: śraviṣṭhā-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ nakṣatrebhyaḥ āgatasya jātārthe lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27576: sthānāntāt prātipadikāt gośāla-śabdāt kharaśāla-śabdāt ca jāta-arthe pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27584: vatsaśālādibhyaḥ parasya jāta-arthe pratyayasya lug vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27595: nakṣatrebhyaḥ uttarasya jāta-arthe pratyayasya bahulaṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27602: saptamī-samārthāt kṛtādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27603: srudhne kṛto vā labdho vā krīto vā kuśalo vā sraughanaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27606: nanu ca yad yatra kṛtaṃ jātam api tatra bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27607: yac ca yatra krītaṃ labdham api tatra+eva bhavati kimarthaṃ bhedena+upādānaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:27615: saptamī-samarthāt ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt prāyabhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye yathā-vihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27627: upajānv-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ saptamī-samarthebhyaḥ prāyabhava ity etasmin viṣaye ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27636: saptamī-samarthād ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt sambhūte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27637: avaklṛptiḥ pramāṇānatirekaś ca sambhavaty arthaḥ iha gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:27646: kośa-śabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sambhūte ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27649: rūḍhir eṣā, tena krimau na bhavati,
