GS24jvkasipu:27654: tatra ity eva kāla-viśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ saptamī-samārthebhyaḥ sādhv-ādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27666: saptamī-samarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt upte 'rthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27682: grīṣma-vasanta-śabdābhyām anyatarasyāṃ vuñ pratyayo bhavati upte 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27692: saptamī-samārthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt deyam ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27693: yad deyam ṛṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27697: ṛṇe iti kim ? māse deyā bhikṣā //
GS24jvkasipu:27702: kalāpin aśvattha yavabusa ity etebhyaḥ kālavācibhyaḥ saptamī-samarthebhyo deyam ṛṇam ity etasminn arthe vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27704: yasmin kāle mayūśaḥ kalāpino bhavanti sa kalāpī /
GS24jvkasipu:27713: grīṣma avarasama-śabdābhyāṃ vuñ pratyayo bhavati deyam ṛṇam ity etasminnarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27723: cakārād vuñ ca deyam ṛṇam ity etasminn arthe saṃvatsare deyam ṛṇaṃ sāṃvatsarikam,
GS24jvkasipu:27727: vā iti vaktavye ṭhañ-grahaṇaṃ sandhivelādiṣu saṃvatsarāt phalaparvaṇoḥ iti paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:27728: tatra phale ṛṇatvena vivakṣite 'ṇaṃ bādhitvā ṭhañ eva yathā syāt iti // [#410]
GS24jvkasipu:27735: kālavācinaḥ saptamī-samarthāt prātipadikāt vyāharati mṛgaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27744: tad iti prathamā-samarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat prathamā-samarthaṃ soḍhaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27747: tat soḍham asya chātrasya naiśaḥ, vaiśikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27753: tatra iti saptamī-samarthāt ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt bhavaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27761: punas tatra-grahaṇaṃ tad asya iti nivṛtty-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:27765: diś ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ yat pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27804: śarīraṃ prāṇikāyaḥ śarīra-avayava-vācinaḥ prātipadikād yat pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27813: dṛtyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27830: grīvā-śabdo dhamanīvacanas tāsāṃ bahutvād bahuvacanaṃ kṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:27834: gambhīra-śabdād ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27844: avyayībhāva-sañjñākāt prātipadikāc ca ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27849: parimukhādīnāṃ ca gaṇapāṭhasya etad eva prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:27876: atapūrvapadāt avyayībhāvāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27920: īyaḥ kāryo 'tha madhyasya maṇmīyau pratyayau tathā //
GS24jvkasipu:27921: madhyo madhyaṃ dinaṇ ca asmāt sthāmno lugajināt tathā //
GS24jvkasipu:27926: grāma-śabdāntād avyayībhāvāt pari anu ity evaṃ pūrvāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27933: jihvāmūla-śabdād aṅguli-śabdāt ca chanḥ pratayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27940: varga-śabdāntāt ca prātipadikāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27948: śabdād anyasmin pratyaya-arthe vargāntāt prātipadikād anyatarasyāṃ yatkhau pratyayau bhavataḥ tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27962: karṇalalāṭa-śabdābhyāṃ kan pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye 'laṅkāre 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:27969: tasya vyākhyāna iti ca vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ // PS_4,3.66 //
GS24jvkasipu:27973: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt vyākhayātavyanāmnaḥ prātipadikād vyākhyāne 'bhidheye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhave ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27974: vākyārthasamīpe cakāraḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ pūrvavākhya-artham eva samuccinoti tatra bhava (*4,3.53) iti / [#414]
GS24jvkasipu:27992: bahvaco vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ prātipadikād antodāttād bhavavyākhyānayoḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28009: kratubhyo yajñebhyaś ca vyākhyātavyanamabhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28018: kratubhyaḥ ity eva siddhe yajña-grahaṇam asomayāgebhyo 'pi yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:28026: tebhyaḥ ṛṣi-śabdebhyo bhavavyākhyānayoḥ arthayoḥ ṭhañ pratayo bhavati aṇo 'pavādaḥ adhyāyeṣveva pratyayārthe viśeṣaṇeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:28029: vasiṣṭhasya vyākhyānaḥ tatra bhavo vā vāsiṣṭhiko 'dhyāyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28036: paurāḍāśa-śabdāt puroḍāśa-śabdāc ca bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28039: tasya vyākhyānaḥ tatra bhavo vā pauroḍāśikaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:28042: tasya vyākhyānas tatra bhavo vā puroḍāśikaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:28049: chandaḥ-śabdād bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ yad aṇau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28055: dvyajādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vyākhyātavyanāmabhyo bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28073: ṛgayana-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28102: tataḥ iti pañcamī-samarthād āgataḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28106: tataḥ iti mukhyam apādānaṃ vivakṣitaṃ yat tad iha gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:28114: āyasthanavācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28124: śuṇḍika ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati tataḥ āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28144: tadvācibhyaḥ śabdebhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28157: ṛ-kārāntebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vidyāyonisambandha-vācibhyaḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28170: ca-kārāṭ ṭhañ ca tat āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28175: apatyādhikārād anyatra laukikaṃ gotram apatyamātraṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28176: gotra-pratyayāntāt prātipadikād aṅkavat pratyaya-vidhirb havati tataḥ āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28193: hetubhyo manusyebhyaś ca anyatarasyāṃ rupyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28206: hetubhyo manuṣyebhyaḥ ca mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati tataḥ āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28218: pañcamī-samarthāt ṅyāp-prātipadikāt prabhavati ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28226: vidūra-śabdāt ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tataḥ prabhavati ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28232: evaṃ tarhi - vālavāyo vidūraṃ ca prakṛtyanataram eva vā /
GS24jvkasipu:28233: na vai tatra iti ced brūyāj jitvarīvad upācaret //
GS24jvkasipu:28237: tad iti dvitīyā-samarthād gacchati ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28238: yo 'sau gacchati panthāś cet sa bhavati dūto vā /
GS24jvkasipu:28239: srughnaṃ gacchati sraughnaḥ panthā dūto vā /
GS24jvkasipu:28241: tatstheṣu gacchatsu panthā gacchati ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28250: tad iti dvitīyā-samarthād abhiniṣkrāmati ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat abhiniṣkrāmati dvāraṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28267: taditi dvitīyāsamarthād adhikṛtya kṛte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat tat kṛtaṃ granthaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28282: tad ity eva, adhikṛtya kṛte granthe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:28283: śiśukranda-ādibhyo dvitiyā-samarthebhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati adhikṛtya kṛte granthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28305: saḥ iti prathamā-samarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28306: yat prathamā-samarthaṃ nivāsaḥ cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28315: sa iti prathamā-samarthād asya+iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28316: yat prathamā-samartham abhijanaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28336: parvatavācinaḥ prathamā-samarthād abhijanād asya+iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe chanḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28337: āyudhajīvibhyaḥ āyudhajīvyartham āyudhajīvino 'bhidhātuṃ pratyayo bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28342: ṛkṣodaḥ parvato 'bhijanaḥ eśāṃ brahmaṇānām ārkṣodā brāhmaṇāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28348: śaṇḍika ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati so 'sya abhijanaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28365: sindhv-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ takṣaśilādibhyaś ca yathāsaṅkhyam aṇ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ so 'sya abhijanaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28381: tebhyas tata eva aṇi siddhe manuṣyavuño bādhanārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:28400: tūdyādibhyaś caturbhyaḥ śabdebhyo yathāsaṅkhyaṃ catvāra eva ḍhak chaṇ ḍhañ yak ity ete pratyayā bhavanti so 'sya abhijanaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28411: sa iti prathamā-samarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28412: yat prathamā-samarthaṃ bhaktiś ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28420: deśa-kāla-vyatiriktād acittavācinaḥ prātipadikāṭ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktir ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28433: mahārāja-śabdāt ṭhaj pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28441: vāsudeva-arjuna-śabdābhyāṃ vun pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28445: nanu ca vāsudeva-śabdād gotra-kṣatriya-ākhyebhyaḥ iti vuñ asty eva,
GS24jvkasipu:28446: na ca atra vun-vuñor viśeṣo vidyate,
GS24jvkasipu:28451: iti ca arjuna-śabdasya pūrva-nipātam akurvan jñāpayati abhyarhitaṃ pūrvam nipatati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:28455: gotra-ākhyebhyaḥ kṣatriya-ākhyebhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ bahulaṃ vuñ pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28470: janapadināṃ janapadavat sarvaṃ janapadena samānaśabdānāṃ bahuvacane // PS_4,3.100 //
GS24jvkasipu:28472: janapadino ye bahuvacane janapadena samānaśabdās teṣāṃ janapadavat sarvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28473: pratyayaḥ prakṛtiś ca so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28474: janapadatadavadhyoś ca ity atra prakaraṇe ye pratyayā vihitāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:28481: tadvat aṅgāḥ kṣatriyā bhaktir asya āṅgakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28489: vṛddhi-nimitteṣu ca vuñādiṣu viśeṣo na asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28495: sa bhaktir asya iti prakṛtinirhrāse kṛte, madrakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28502: anyathā hi yatra+eva samānaśabdatā tatra+eva atideśaḥ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:28504: vāṅgo vaṅgau vā bhaktir asya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28506: bahuvacane samānaśabdānām ekavacana-dvivacanayoḥ saty api śabdabhede 'tideśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28507: vāṅgaḥ vāṅgau vā bhaktir asya vāṅgaka // [#422]
GS24jvkasipu:28512: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthāt proktam ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28517: anyena kṛtā māthureṇa proktā māthurī vṛttiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28524: tittiryādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ chaṇ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28531: tittiriṇā proktaḥ ślokaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28533: ity atra asya anuvṛtteḥ chando 'dhikāra-vihitānāṃ ca tadviṣayatā iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:28537: kāśyapa-kauśikābhyām ṛṣibhyāṃ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28543: ity atra anuvṛtteḥ chando 'dhikāra-vihitānāṃ ca tatra tadviṣayatā iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28551: kalāpyantevāsināṃ vaiśampāyanāntevāsināṃ ca ye vācakāḥ śabdās tebhyo ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28565: pratyakṣa-kāriṇo gṛhyante na tu vyavahitāḥ śaiṣyaśiṣyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28573: kalāpyanatevāsibhyaḥ tāvat - haridruṇā proktam adhīyate hāridraviṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28598: tṛtīyā-samarthāt prokte ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati yat proktaṃ purāṇa-proktāś ced brāhmaṇa-kalpās te bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:28607: āśmarathaḥ kalpaḥ yājñavalkyādayo 'cirakālā ity ākhyāneṣu vārtā /
GS24jvkasipu:28610: pratipadaṃ brāhmaṇesu yaḥ pratyayas tasya tadviṣayatā vidhīyate ṇineḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28620: śaunaka ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye chandasy abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:28662: kalāpi-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28673: saulabhāni brāhmaṇāni ity evam ādi siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:28677: chaṅgalin-śabdāt ḍhinuk pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28684: pārāśaryaśilālibhyāṃ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28698: karmanda-kṛśāśva-śabdābhyām iniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhikṣu-naṭasūtrayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28709: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthād ekadik ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28715: tena iti prakṛte punaḥ samarthavibhakti-grahaṇaṃ chando 'dhikāranivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:28720: tasiś ca pratyayo bhavati tena+ekadik ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28721: pūrveṇ ghādisu aṇādiṣu ca prāpteṣu ayam aparaḥ pratyayo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28738: tṛtīyā-samarthāt upajñāte ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28748: tṛtīyā-samarthāt kṛte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28749: yat tatkṛtaṃ granthaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28757: vidyāmānām eva jñātam aupajñātam ity ayam anayor viśeṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:28761: tṛtīyā-samarthāt kṛte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati samudāyena cet sañjñā jñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28771: tena, kṛte, sañjñāyām iti ca+etat sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:28772: kulālādibhyaḥ vuñ pratyayo bhavati tena kṛtam ity etasminn arthe sañjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:28797: tena, kṛte, sañjñāyām iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:28798: kṣudrādibhyaḥ añ pratyayo bhavati tena kṛte ity etasmin viṣaye sañjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:28808: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhī-samarthād idam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28831: ratha-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmn viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28844: patanti tena iti patram aśvādikaṃ vāhanam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28845: tatpūrvād ratha-śabdāt añ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28854: tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāt adhvaryu-pariṣac-chabdābhyāṃ ca añ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28865: hala-sīra-śabdābhyāṃ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28872: dvandva-sañjñākāt vun pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:28888: gotra-vācibhyaḥ caraṇa-vācibhyaḥ ca prātipadikebhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye aṇo 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28903: iñantāc ca prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28920: lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyabhūtasya+eva cihnabhūtaṃ svaṃ yathā vidyā bidānām,
GS24jvkasipu:28921: aṅkastu gavādistho 'pi gavādīnāṃ svaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28927: śākala-śabdāt saṅghādiṣu pratyayārtha-viśeṣaneṣu vā aṇ-pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28942: chandoga-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28946: chandogānāṃ dharmo vā āmnāyo vā chandogyam /
GS24jvkasipu:28957: teṣv abhidheyeṣu vuñ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28966: daivatika-ādibhyaḥ chaḥ pratayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28968: tataḥ pūrveṇa vuñi prāpte cha-vidhāna-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:28982: kaupiñjala-hāstipada-śabdābhyam aṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29000: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhī-samarthād vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29004: yasya ca na anyat pratipadaṃ vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:29011: tasya prakaraṇe tasya iti punar vacanaṃ śaiṣika-nivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:29018: prāṇ-yoṣadhi-vṛkṣa-vācibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhī-samarthebhyaḥ avayave yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29028: ita uttare pratyayāḥ prāṇyoṣadhivṛkṣebhyaḥ vikārāvayavayoḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:29030: kathaṃ dvayam apy adhikriyate tasya vikāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:29038: bilva ity evam ādibhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29042: tataḥ kopadhāt eva siddhe mayaḍbādhanārthaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:29061: ka-kāra-upadhāt prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati yathāyogaṃ vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29080: u-varṇāntāt prātipadikāt añ pratayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29088: anudāttādeḥ prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29096: palāśa-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vā añ pratyayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29114: śamī-śabdāṭ ṭlañ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29120: mayaḍ vaā+etayor bhāṣāyām abhakṣya ācchādanayoḥ // PS_4,3.143 //
GS24jvkasipu:29122: prakṛtimātrād vā mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati bhakṣyācchādanavarjitayoḥ vikārāvayavayor arthayor bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye yathāyathaṃ pratyayeṣu prāpteṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:29130: etayoḥ ity anena kiṃ yāvatā vikāra-avayavau prakṛtāv eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:29132: ity evam ādayas tadviṣaye 'pi yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:29140: vṛddhebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ śarādibhyaś ca abhakṣyācchādanayoḥ vikārāvayavayoḥ bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye nityaṃ mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29147: nitya-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā ārambha-sāmarthyād eva nityaṃ bhavisyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:29168: purīṣaṃ na vikāro na ca avayavaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:29174: piṣṭa-śabdān nityaṃ mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati tasya vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29180: piṣṭa-śabdāt kan pratyayo bhavati vikāre sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29186: vrīhi-śabdān mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati puroḍaśe vikāre /
GS24jvkasipu:29194: tila-yava-śabdābhyām asañjñāviṣaye mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29203: dvyacaḥ prātipadikāt chandasi viṣaye mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29212: utvataḥ prātipadikād vardhra-bilva-śabdābhyāṃ ca mayaṭ pratyayao na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29225: tāla-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29244: jātarūpa-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati parimāṇe vikāre /
GS24jvkasipu:29256: prāṇi-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo rajatadibhyaś ca añ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29258: anudāttādeḥ añ vihita eva pariśiṣṭam iha+udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:29265: rajatādiṣu ye 'nudāttādayaḥ paṭyante rajatakaṇḍakaraprabhṛtayastebhyo 'ñi siddhe punarvacanaṃ mayaḍvādhanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:29283: ñid yo vikārāvayavapratyayas tadantāt prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati vikāravayavayoḥ eva /
GS24jvkasipu:29308: ity ata ārabhya krītārthe ye pratyayāḥ parimāṇād vihitāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:29310: parimāṇāt krīta iva pratyayā bhavanti tasya vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29335: umā-śabdād ūrṇā-śadac ca vā vuñ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29341: eṇī-śabdād ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29349: gopayas-śabdābhyāṃ yat pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29357: dru-śabdād yat pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29363: dra-śabdān māne vikāra-viśeṣe vayaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29369: vikārāvayavayor utpannasya phale tadviṣaye vivakṣite lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29373: phalitasya vṛkṣāsya phalam avayavo bhavati vikāraś ca,
GS24jvkasipu:29379: plakṣa-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ phale vikārāvayavatvena vivakṣite aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29397: jambū-śabdāt phale 'bhidheye vā aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29399: atra aṇo vidhāna - samārthyāl lug na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29406: jambvāḥ phale 'bhidheye pratyayasya vā lup bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29434: harītakī ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ phale pratyayasya lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29435: luki prāpte lupo vidhāne yuktavadbhāve strī-pratyayaśravaṇe ca viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29466: kaṃsīya-paraśavya-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yañ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ tasya vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:29472: paraśavya-śabdād anudātta-āditvād eva añi siddhe lug-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:29478: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ [#437]
GS24jvkasipu:29489: vakṣyati - tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam (*4,4.2) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29507: tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam // PS_4,4.2 //
GS24jvkasipu:29509: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthād dīvyati khanati jayati jitam ity eteṣv artheṣu ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29518: devadattena jitam iti pratyayo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29527: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthāt saṃskṛtam ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29536: kulattha-śabdāt ka-kāropadhāt śabdāc ca prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo hbavati saṃskṛtam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29544: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt tarati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo hbavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29551: gopuccha-śabdāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tarati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29558: nau-śabdād dvyacaś ca prātipadikāṭ ṭhan pratyayo hbavati tarati ity etasmin arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29573: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāc carati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29582: ākarṣa-śabdād ṣthal pratyayo bhavati carati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29592: parpa ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati carati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29629: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthebhyaḥ vetanādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ jīvati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29656: vasna-krayavikraya-śabdābhyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ ṭhan pratyayo bhavati jīvati ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29675: utsaṅgādibhyas tṛtiyāsamarthebhyo harati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29687: bhastrā ity evam ādibhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamrthebhyaḥ harati tiyetasminnarthe ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29704: vivadha-vīvadha-śabdābhyām tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ vibhāṣā ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29712: vivadha-vīvadha-śabdau samānārthau pathi paryāhāre ca vartete //
GS24jvkasipu:29717: kuṭilikā-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthād aṇ pratyayo hbavati harati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29718: kuṭilikāyā harati mṛgo vyādhaṃ kauṭiliko mṛgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29727: akṣadyūtādibhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamarthebhyo nirvṛtte ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29745: tryantān nityaṃ map pratyayo bhavati tena virvṛtte ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29750: tena tryantaṃ nityaṃ map-pratyayāntam eva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29761: apamitya-yācita-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kak kan ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ nirvṛtte ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29768: tṛtīyāsamarthāt saṃsṛṣṭe ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29785: saṃsṛṣte (*4,3.22) ity anena+utpannasya ṭhako lavaṇa-śabdāl luk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29794: mudga-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati saṃsṛṣṭe ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29802: vyañjana-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamarthebhyaḥ upasikte ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29811: ojas sahas ambhas ity etebhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamarthebhyo vartate ity arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29819: prati anu ity evaṃ pūrvebhyaḥ īpa-loma-kūla-śabdebhyo dvitiyāsamarthebhyo vartate ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29832: parimukha-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vartate ity easminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29840: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthāt prayacchati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29841: yat tad dvitīyāsamarthaṃ garhyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29858: kusīda-daśa-ekādaśaśabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṣṭhan ṣṭhac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ prayacchati garhyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29867: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād ucchati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29875: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād rakṣati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29881: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthābhyāṃ śabda-dardura-śabdābhyāṃ karoti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29888: pakṣyādibhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyo hanti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29889: svarūpasya paryāyāṇāṃ tadviśeṣāṇām ca grahaṇam iha+isyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29906: paripantha-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt tiṣṭhati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29916: mātha-śabda-uttarapadāt prātipaikāt padavī anupada ity etābhyāṃ ca dhāvati ity etasminnarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29926: atha vā ākrandyate ity ākrandaḥ ārtāyanam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29928: ākranda-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād dhāvati ity etasminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29936: padaśabdaḥ uttarapadaṃ yasya tasmāt padottarapada-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād gṛhṇāti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29944: pratikaṇṭha-artha-lalāma-śabdebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ gṛhṇāti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29951: dharma-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāc carati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29960: pratipatha-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād eti ity asminn arthe ṭhan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29967: samavāyā-vācibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ samavaiti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29971: samavaiti āgatya tadekadeśī bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29979: pariṣadaḥ ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati samavāyān samavaiti ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29985: senā-śabdād vā ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati samavāyān samavaiti ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29992: lalāṭa-kukkuṭī-śabdābhyāṃ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthābhyāṃ paśyati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29998: tad anena lalāṭa-darśanena sevakasya svāminaṃ prati anupaśleṣaḥ kāryeṣu anupasthāyitvaṃ lakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30002: deśasya alpatayā hi bhikṣuravikṣiptadṛṣṭiḥ pādavikṣepadeśe cakṣuḥ saṃyamya gacchati sa ucyate kaukkuṭikaḥ iti // [#446]
GS24jvkasipu:30007: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād dharmyam ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30017: mahiṣī ity evam ādibhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya dharmyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30035: ṛkārāntāt prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati tasya dharmyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30049: ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt avakraya ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30062: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yattatprathamāsamarthaṃ paṇyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30066: paṇyam iti viśeṣanaṃ taddhitavṛttāv antarbhūtam ataḥ paṇya-śabdo na prayujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:30070: lavaṇa-śabdāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tad asya paṇyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30077: kiśara ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṣṭhan pratyayo tad asya paṇyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30097: śalālu-śabdād anyatarasyāṃ ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati tad asya paṇyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30108: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yattat prathamāsamarthaṃ śilpaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30119: maḍḍuka-jharjhara-śabdābhyām anyatarasyām aṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya śilpam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30129: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30130: yattat prathamāsamarthaṃ praharaṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30144: śakti-yaṣṭi-śabdābhyām īkak pratyayo bhavati tad asya praharaṇam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30152: tad iti prathamāsamarthebhyaḥ asti nāsti diṣṭa ity etebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ matiś cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30158: paraloko 'sti iti yasya matiḥ sa āstikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30163: vacanasāmarthyād vā ākhyātād vākyāc ca pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:30168: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yattat prathamāsamarthaṃ śīlaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30173: bhakṣaṇakriyā tadviśeṣaṇaṃ ca śīlaṃ taddhitavṛttāv antarbhavati // [#449]
GS24jvkasipu:30178: chatra ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asya śīlam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30184: sa upasarga-pūrvo 'tra gṛhyate āsthā saṃsthā avasthā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30204: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30205: yat tatprathamāsmarthaṃ karma cet tad vṛttam adhyayanaviṣayaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30209: ekamanyat iti vigṛhya taddhitārtha iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30211: adhyayane karma vṛttam ity etat sarvaṃ taddhitavṛttāvantarbhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30212: yasya adhyayanaprayuktasya parīkṣākāle paṭhataḥ skhalitam apapāṭharūpam ekaṃ jātaṃ sa ucyate aikānyikaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30217: bahvac pūrvapadaṃ yasya tasmād bahvacpūrvapadāt prātipadikāt ṭhac pratyayo bhavati tad asya karmādhyayane vṛttam ity etasminn arthe ṭhako 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30222: udātte kartavye yo 'nudāttaṃ karoti sa ucyate anyat tvaṃ karoṣi iti //
GS24jvkasipu:30227: tad iti prathamāsamarthādasya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yat tatprathamāsamarthaṃ hitaṃ cet tad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30240: tat iti prathamāsamarthād asmā iti caturthyartha ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ tac ced dīyate niyuktam /
GS24jvkasipu:30243: agre bhojanam asmai niyuktaṃ dīyate āgrabhojanikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30251: śrāṇā-māṃsa-odana-śabdābhyāṃ ṭiṭhan pratyayo bhavati tad asmai dīyate niyuktam ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30260: na hy atra ṭhañaṣ ṭiṭhano vā viśeṣo 'sti ?
GS24jvkasipu:30268: bhakta-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati anyatrasyām tad asami dīyate niyuktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30271: bhaktam asmai dīyate niyuktam bhāktaḥ, bhaktikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:30275: tatra iti saptamīsamarthān niyukta ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30285: agāra-śabdāntāt prātipadikāt ṭhan pratyayo bhavati tatra niyuktaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30295: saptamīsamarthād adeśa-vācinaḥ paratipadikād akāla-vācinaḥ ca adhyāyinyabhidheye ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30296: adhyayanasya yau deśakālau śāstraṇa pratiṣiddhau tāvadeśakāla-śabdena+ucyete,
GS24jvkasipu:30309: kaṭhina-śabdāntāt saptamīsamarthāt prastāra-saṃsthāna-śabdābhyāṃ ca ṭhak pratyayo bhavati vyavaharati ity etasmnn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30318: nikaṭa-śābdāt saptamīsmarthāt vasati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30319: yasya śāstrato nikaṭavāsas tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30320: āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā grāmāt krośe vastavyam iti śāstram /
GS24jvkasipu:30326: āvasatha-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt vasati ity etasminn arthe ṣṭhal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30338: prāg etasmād dhitasaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo yat pratyayasteṣvadhikṛto veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30347: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyo rathayugaprāsaṅgebhyo vahati ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30351: rathasītāhalebhyo yad vidhau iti tad anatavidhy-upasaṅkhyānāt paramarathyaḥ ity api bhavati // [#452]
GS24jvkasipu:30357: dhur ity etasmād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe yat ḍhak ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30363: sarvadhurā-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthāt vahati ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30365: strīliṅge nyāyye sarvadhurāt iti prātipadikamātra-apekṣo nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30373: ekadhurā-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30381: śakaṭa-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30387: hala-sīra-śabdābhyāṃ dvitīyāsmarthābhyāṃ vahati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30394: janī-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30404: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthād vidhyati ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30410: nanu asamarthatvād anabhidhānāc ca pratyayo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30411: na hi dhanuṣā padya iti vivakṣito 'rthaḥ pratīyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:30421: dhanagaṇa-śabdābhyāṃ dvitīyāsamarthābhyām labdhā ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30429: anna-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt labdhā ity etasmin arthe ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30434: vaśa-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād gataḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30441: padaśabdāt prathamāsamarthād dṛśyārthopādhikād asminniti saptamyarthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30446: suṣṭhu draṣṭuṃ pratimudrotpādanena sa padyaḥ kardamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30451: mula-śabdāt prathamāsamarthād āvarhi ity evam upādhikādasya+iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30455: yeṣāṃ mūlam āvṛhyate utpāṭyate te mūlyāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:30457: mūlotpāṭanena vinā saṅgrahītuṃ na śakyante ity arthaḥ // [#454]
GS24jvkasipu:30464: dhenoḥ sugāgamo yaś ca pratyayaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30466: yā dhenur uttamarṇāya ṛṇapradānād dohanārthaṃ dīyate sā dhenuṣyā /
GS24jvkasipu:30473: gṛhapati-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt saṃyukte ity etasminn arthe ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30480: nāvādhibhyo 'ṣṭabhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'ṣṭasv eva tāryādiṣv artheṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30487: tena vayasā tulye śatrau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30489: nanu ca dharmādanapete iti vakṣyamāṇena+eva siddham ?
GS24jvkasipu:30491: dharmaṃ yad anuvartate tad dharmād anapetam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30498: paṭādīnām utpattikāraṇaṃ mūlaṃ tena tadabhibhūyate śeṣīkriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30501: iti yati prāpte ānāmyam iti nipātanāt ṇyat /
GS24jvkasipu:30506: rathasītāhalebhyo yad vidhau iti tad antavidhir api iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30514: yathā tulā paricchinatti param evaṃ tad api iti //
GS24jvkasipu:30519: dharmādibhyaḥ pañcamīsamarthebhyo 'napetaḥ ity arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30530: chandaḥ-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthān nirmite ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30538: uraḥśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthān nirmite ity etasminn arthe 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30547: hṛdaya-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt priyaḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30560: hṛdaya-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād bandhane ṛṣāvabhidheye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30563: parahṛdayaṃ yena badhyate vaśīkriyate sa vaśīkaraṇamantro hṛdyaḥ ity ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:30567: matādibhyaḥ tribhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ triṣv eva karaṇādiṣv artheṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30580: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt sādhuḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30585: sādhuḥ iha pravīṇo yogyo vā gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:30593: pratijanādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ khañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30612: yatra hitārtha eva sādhvarthastatra vacanāt prākkrītīyā bādhyante //
GS24jvkasipu:30616: bhakta-śabdāt ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30623: pariṣac-chabdād ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30635: kathādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30654: guḍa-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30674: pathy-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30684: sabhā-śabdād yaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30691: sabhā-śabdāḍ ḍhaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye chandasi /
GS24jvkasipu:30699: samāanatīrtha-śabdāt tatra iti saptamīsamarthād vāsi ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30706: samānodara-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt śayitaḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30713: sodara-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt śayitaḥ ity etsminn arthe yaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30715: iti sūtreṇa yakārādau pratyaye vivakṣite prāg eva samānasya sabhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30723: sptamīsamarthāt bhava ity etasminn arthe chandasi viṣaye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30727: namo medhyāya ca vidyutyāya ca namaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30729: bhavādhikāraś ca samudra-abhrād dhaḥ (*4,4.118) iti yāvat // [#458]
GS24jvkasipu:30734: pāthaḥ-śabdān nadī-śabdāc ca ḍyaṇ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30737: ca no dadhīta nādyo giro me /
GS24jvkasipu:30742: veśanta-śabdād dhimavaccha-śabdāc ca aṇ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30748: srotaḥ-śabdād vibhāṣā ḍyat dya ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30757: sagarbha-sayūtha-sanuta-śabdebhyo yan pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30767: tugra-śabdād ghan pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30774: agra-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30776: kim artham idaṃ yāvatā sāmānyena yad vihita eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:30778: iti vakṣyati tābhyāṃ bādhā mā bhūt iti punar vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:30782: agra-śabdāt yat gha-cchau ca pratyayā bhavanti tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30792: samudra-śabdāt abhra-śabdāc ca ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30803: barhiḥ-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt dattam ity etasmin arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30809: dūta-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād bhāge karmaṇi ca abhidheye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30818: rakṣaḥ-śabdād yātu-śabdāc ca ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād hananī ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30820: yā vāṃ mitrāvaruṇau rakṣasyā tanū yātavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:30828: revaty-ādibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ praśasye vācye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30837: iti lope kṛte halo yamāṃ yami lopaḥ (*8,4.64) iti lopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:30841: asura-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt svam ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30843: asuryaṃ vā etat pātraṃ yat kulālakṛtaṃ cakravṛttam // [#460]
GS24jvkasipu:30848: asura-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt māyāyāṃ svaviśeṣe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30852: tadvān āsām upadhāno mantra iti iṣṭakāsu luk ca matoḥ // PS_4,4.125 //
GS24jvkasipu:30855: matub-antāt prātipadikāt prathamāsamarthād āsām iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30856: yat prathamāsamartham upadhāno mantraś cet sa bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30857: yat tad āsām iti nirdiṣṭam iṣṭakāś cet tā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:30864: varcasvānupadhānamantraḥ āsām iṣṭakānām iti vigṛhya yati vihite mator luki kṛte,
GS24jvkasipu:30872: varcasvān upasthānamantraḥ āsām ity atra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:30874: aṅgulimānupadhāno hastaḥ āsām ity atra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:30876: aṅgulimānupadhāno hasta āsām ity atra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:30878: anekapadasambhave 'pi kenacid eva padena tadvān mantro gṛhyate, na sarveṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:30885: aśvimānupadhāno mantraḥ āsāmi ṣṭakānām iti vigṛhyāṇ vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:30893: tāsv abhidheyāsu mūrdhno matup pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30895: yasmin mantre vayaḥ-śabdo mūrdhan-śabdaś ca vidyate sa vayasvān api bhavati mūrdhanvān api,
GS24jvkasipu:30896: yathā mūrdhā vayaḥ prajāpatiś chandaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30897: tatra vayasvacchabdād iva mūrdhavacchabdād api yati prāpte matup vidhāsyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30901: yatra mūrdhan-śabda eva kevalo na vayaḥ-śabdasn tatra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:30902: mūrdhanvataḥ iti vaktavye mūrdhnaḥ ity uktaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:30909: tasminś chandasi viṣaye yat pratyayo bhavati māsatanvoḥ pratyayārtha-viśeṣaṇayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30910: prathamāsamarthād asty upādhikāt ṣaṣṭhyārthe saptamyarthe ca yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30912: nabhāṃsi vidyante asmin māse abhasyo māsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30917: tanvā khalv api - ojo 'syāṃ vidyate ojasyā tanūḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30920: madhumatā pātreṇa carati māsatanvor anantarārthe vā /
GS24jvkasipu:30921: madhv asminn asti madhv asminn anantaram iti vā madhvyo māsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30951: matvarthe ity eva veśoyaśasī ādau yasya prātipadikasya tasmād veśoyaśāader bhagāntāt prātipadikāt matvarthe yal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30952: lakāraḥ svarārthaḥ veśobhago vidyate yasya sa veśobhagyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30956: veśaś ca asau bhagaś ca śrīprabhṛtir veśobhagaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:30962: veśoyaśāader bhagāntāt prātipadikāt matvarthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30974: pūrvaśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt kṛtam ity etasminn arthe ina ya ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30979: pūrvaiḥ iti bahuvacanān tena pūrvapuruṣāḥ ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:30980: tatkṛtāḥ panthānaḥ praśastā iti pathāṃ praśaṃsā //
GS24jvkasipu:30985: ap-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt saṃskṛtam ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30992: sahasra-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt sammita ity etasminn arthe ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30997: tatra api samityā sammitaḥ eva lakṣayitavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31002: matvarthe ca sahasra-śabdāt ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31011: soma-śabdāt dvitīyāsamarthāt arhati ity etasminn arthe yaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31041: vasu-śabdāt samūhe vācye yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31052: eśa vai saptadaśākṣaraś chandasyaḥ prajāpatiraṃryajño mantre vihitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31054: chandaḥśabdād akṣarasamūhe vartamānāt svārthe yat pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31069: sarvadeva-śabdābhyāṃ tātil pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye svārthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31078: śivādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ kare ity etasminn arthe tātil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31085: bhāve cārthe chandasi viṣaye śivādibhyaḥ tātil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31091: iti śrijayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31100: prāg etasmāt krīta-saṃśabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ cha-pratyayasteṣv adhikṛto veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31108: tena prāk ṭhañaḥ chanḥ iti noktam //
GS24jvkasipu:31113: u-varṇāntāt prātipadikāt gava-ādibhyaś ca yat pratyayo bhavati prāk-krītiyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:31132: gavādiṣu nābhi nabha ca iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31134: nābhi-śabdo yat-pratyayam utpādayati nabhaṃ cādeśam āpadyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31139: nābhaye hitaṃ nābhyaṃ tailam iti bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31140: gava-ādiṣu yatā sanniyukto nabhabhāvo 'tra na bhavati / go /
GS24jvkasipu:31150: śunaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ vā ca dīrghatvaṃ tatsaniyogena cāntodāttatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:31152: cakārasya anukta-samuccaya-arthatvāt nas taddhite iti lopo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:31164: kambalāt prākkrītīyeṣv artheṣu yat pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31172: havir-viśeṣa-vācibhyo 'pūpa-ādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ prakkrītīyeṣv artheṣu vibhāṣā yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31177: haviśśabdāt tu gavādiṣu paṭhān nityam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31202: tasmai iti caturthī-samarthād htam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31214: śarīra-avayava-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt yat pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31224: khala-ādibhyo yat pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31233: brāhmaṇebhyo hitam iti vākyam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31242: aja avi ity etābhyāṃ thyan pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31251: ātman viśvajana ity etābhyāṃ bhogottarapadāc ca prātipadikāt khaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31253: ātmann iti nalopo na kṛtaḥ prakṛti-parimāṇa-jñāpana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:31261: ṣaṣṭhī-samāsād bahuvrīheś ca cha eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31297: sarva-puruṣābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṇaḍañau pratyayau bhavataḥ tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31311: māṇavacaraka-śabdābhyāṃ khañ pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31320: vikṛti-vācinaḥ prātipādikāt prakṛtāv abhidheyāyāṃ yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31328: pratyayārthasya ca tadarthatve sati sāmarthyāl labhyā caturthī samarthavibhaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31331: aṅgārebhyo hitāni etāni kāṣṭhāni aṅgārīyāṇi kāṣṭhāni /
GS24jvkasipu:31338: prakṛtyantar anivṛttir atra vivakṣitā na tādarthyam dhānānāṃ saktavaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:31350: na tu kośī tasya prakṛtir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31351: dvayor api prakṛti-vikṛtyor grahaṇe vivakṣitaḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvo labhyate // [#469]
GS24jvkasipu:31356: chadir-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tadarthaṃ vikṛteḥ prakṛtau (*5,1.12)
GS24jvkasipu:31363: upadhīyate iti upadhiḥ rathāṅgaṃ aupadheyam api tad eva dāru //
GS24jvkasipu:31367: ṛṣabha upānaḥ ity rathāṅgaṃ aupadheyam api etābhyāṃ ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tadarthaṃ vikṛṭeḥ prakṛtau (*5,1.12)
GS24jvkasipu:31372: carmaṇy api prakṛtitvena vivakṣite pūrvavipratiṣedhād ayam eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31378: carmaṇo yā vikṛtiḥ tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati tadarthaṃ vikṛteḥ prakṛtau (*5,1.12)
GS24jvkasipu:31384: tad asya tad asmin syād iti // PS_5,1.16 //
GS24jvkasipu:31391: saptamy-arthe tu pratyaya ity etāvān viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31392: prathamāsamarthāt ṣaṣṭhyarthe saptamyarthe ca yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31393: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ syāc cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31397: saptamyarthe khalv api - prākāro 'smin deśe syāt prākārīyo deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31401: iṣṭakānāṃ vahutvena tat sambhāvyate prākāra āsāmiṣṭakānāṃ syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31402: deśasya ca guṇena sambhāvyate prāsādo 'smin deśe syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31407: anekasmin pratyayārthe pratyekaṃ samarthavibhaktiḥ sambandhanīyā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31416: parikhāś-abdāt ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tad asya tad asmin syāt (*5,1.16)
GS24jvkasipu:31427: prāg etasmād vatisaṃ-śabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ṭhañ pratyayas teṣv adhikṛto viditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31436: ā etasmād arhasaṃśabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ṭhak pratyayas teṣv adhikṛto veditavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:31455: ūrdhvamānaṃ kilonmānaṃ parimāṇaṃ tu sarvataḥ āyāmastu pramāṇaṃ syāt saṅkhyā bāhyā tu sarvataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31460: viṣkādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'samāse ṭhak pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:31471: atha kimartham asamāse ity ucyate yāvatā grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:31481: - dantyam, rājadantyam ity evamādi sidhdaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31482: ita uttaraṃ ca saṅkhyāpūrvapadānāṃ tadantavidhir iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31489: dviśūrpeṇa krītam iti tadantavidhi-pratiṣedhāt śūrpād añ anyatrasyām (*5,1.26)
GS24jvkasipu:31508: śata-śabdāt ṭhanyatau pratyayau bhavataḥ aśate 'dhidheye ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:31514: śatam eva vastutaḥ prakṛtyarthān na bhidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31518: vākyena hy atra pratyaya-arthasya tattvaṃ gamyate, na śrutyā /
GS24jvkasipu:31525: prāgvateḥ saṅkhyā-pūrvapadānāṃ tadantagrahaṇam aluki ity anayā iṣṭyā samāsād api prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:31530: saṅkhyāyā aty-antāyā aśad-antāyāś ca kan pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:31538: arthavatastiśabdasya grahaṇāḍ ḍateḥ paryudāso na bhavati, katikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31544: vatoḥ parasya ano vā iḍ-āgamo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:31551: viṃśati-triṃśadbhyāṃ ḍvun pratyayo bhavati asañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:31567: kaṃsāṭ ṭiṭhan pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:31580: pratiśabdaś ca asya ādeśo vā vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31586: śūrpa-śabdād anyatarasyām añ pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:31593: śatamānādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:31604: adhyardha-śabdaḥ pūrvo yasmin tasmād adhyardhapūrvāt prātipadikad dvigoś ca parasya ārhīyasya lug bhavati asañjñāyāṃ iti kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:31608: pratyayāntasya viśeṣaṇam asañjñā-grahaṇaṃ na cet pratyayāntaṃ sañjñā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31617: adhyardhapūrvād dvigoś ca kārṣāpaṇa-sahasrāntāt uttarasya ārhīya-pratyayasya vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31632: alukpakṣe saṅkhyāyāḥ saṃvatsara-saṅkhyasya ca ity uttarapadavṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31647: dvitripūrvād dvigor niṣkāntāt ārhīya-pratyayasya vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31658: dvi-tri-pūrvād bistāntād dvigoḥ parasya ārhīya-pratyayasya vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31667: adhyardhapūrvāt prātipadikād dvigoś ca viṃśatika-śabdāntāt ārhīyeṣv artheṣu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31675: adhyardhapūrvad dvigoḥ ity eva adhyardhapūrvāt prātipadikād dvigoś ca khārī-śabdānatāt ārhīyeṣv artheṣu īkan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31690: adhyardhapūrvād dvigoś ca paṇ-apāda-māṣa-śata-śabdāntāt ārhīyeṣv artheṣu yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31697: padbhāvo na bhavati pad yaty-atadarthe (*6,3.53) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31710: śāṇa-śabdād adhyardhapūrvād dvigor ārhīyeṣv artheṣu vā yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31728: dvi-tri-pūrvāc chāṇāntāt prātipadikād ārhīyeṣv artheṣu aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31739: teṣām itaḥ prabhṛti samartha-vibhaktayaḥ pratyayārthāś ca nirdiśyante tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt krītam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31750: tena iti mūlyāt karaṇe tṛtīyā samartha-vibhaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31758: yatra tu prakṛtyarthasya saṅkhyābhedāvagame pramāṇam asti tatra dvivacana-bahuvacana-antād api pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31764: na hy ekena mudgena krayaḥ sambhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:31768: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt nimittam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31769: yat tan nimittaṃ saṃyogaś cet sa bhavati utpāto vā saṃyogaḥ sambandhaḥ prāṇināṃ śubhāśubhasūcakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31770: mahābhūta-pariṇāmaḥ utpātaḥ śatasya nimitta dhanapatinā saṃyogaḥ śatyaḥ, śatikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31772: utpataḥ khalv api - śatasya nimittaṃ utpātaḥ dakṣiṇākṣispandanam śatyam, śatikam /
GS24jvkasipu:31783: gośabdād dvyacaś ca prātipadikāt saṅkhyā-parimāṇa-aśvādivivarjitāt yat pratyayo bhavati tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga-utpātau (*5,1.38)
GS24jvkasipu:31786: goḥ nimittaṃ saṃyogaḥ utpāto vā gavyaḥ / [#476]
GS24jvkasipu:31814: cakārād yat ca tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga+utpātau (*5,1.38)
GS24jvkasipu:31816: dvyacaḥ iti nitye yati prāpte vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:31817: putrasya nimittaṃ saṃyogaḥ utpāto vā putrīyam, putryam //
GS24jvkasipu:31821: sarvabhūmi-pṛthivī-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇañau pratyayu bhavataḥ tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga-utpātau (*5,1.38)
GS24jvkasipu:31824: sarvabhūmer nimittaṃ saṃyoga utpāto vā sārvabhaumaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31830: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthābhyāṃ sarvabhūmi-pṛthivī-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ īśvaraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31834: anyathā saṃyogotpātāv iva īśvaro 'pi pratyayārthasya nimittasya viśeṣaṇaṃ saṃbhāvyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:31838: tatra iti saptamīsamarthābhyāṃ sarvabhūmi-pṛthivī-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ viditaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31845: loka-sarvaloka-śabdābhyāṃ tatra iti saptamīsamarthābhyām viditaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31853: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād vāpaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31861: pātra-śabdāt ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati tasya vāpaḥ (*5,1.45)
GS24jvkasipu:31872: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asminn iti saptamyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31873: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ vṛddhyādi cet tad dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31874: dīyate ity ekavacanāntaṃ vṛddhyādibhiḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31875: tatra yad adhamarṇena uttamarṇāya mūladhanātiriktaṃ deyaṃ tad vṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31880: pañca asmin vṛddhir vā āyo vā lābho vā śulko vā upadā vā dīyate pañcakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31885: pañca asmai vṛddhir vā āyo vā lābho vā upadā vā dīyate pajcako devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31891: pūraṇa-vācinaḥ śabdāt ardha-śabdāc ca ṭhan pratyayo bhavati tad asmin vṛddhy-āya. lābhaśulka-upadā dīyate (*5,1.47)
GS24jvkasipu:31915: tad dharati vahavty āvahati bhārād vaṃśādibhyaḥ // PS_5,1.50 //
GS24jvkasipu:31917: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād dharaty-ādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31919: vaṃśādibhyaḥ paro yo bhāra-śabdaḥ tadantāt prātipadikāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31920: vaṃśabhāraṃ harati vahati āvahati vā vāṃśabhārikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31937: sūtrārthadvayam api ca+etad ācāryeṇa śiṣyāḥ pratipāditāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31956: vasna-dravya-śabdābhyām dvitīyāsamarthābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṭhan kan ity aitau pratyayau bhavato haratyādiṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:31963: tad iti dvitiyāsamarthāt sambhavatyādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31967: prasthaṃ sambhavati avaharati pacati vā prāsthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31979: āḍhaka-ācita-pātra-śadebhyo dvitīyāsamarthabhyo 'nyatarasyāṃ saṃbhavādiṣv artheṣu khaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31982: āḍhakaṃ saṃbhavati avaharati pacati vā āḍhakīnā, āḍhakikī /
GS24jvkasipu:31989: āḍhaka-ācita-pātra-antād dvigoḥ saṃbhavatyādiṣv artheṣu ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31992: vidhānasāmarthyād eva anayor luk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31993: ṭhañas tu pakṣe 'nujñātasya adhyardha-pūrva-dvigoḥ iti lug bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:32007: kulija-śabdānatād dvigoḥ saṃbhavatyādiṣv artheṣu lukkhau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32012: dve kulije saṃbhavati avaharati pacati vā dvikulijiki,
GS24jvkasipu:32022: sa iti prathamāsamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat prathamāsamartham aṃśavasnabhṛtayaś cet tā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32026: pañca aṃśo vasno vā bhṛtirvāsya pañcakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32032: tat iti prathamāsamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat prathamāsamarthaṃ parimāṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32043: samarthavibhaktiḥ pratyayārthaś ca pūrvasūtrād eva anuvartiṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:32048: punar vidhāna-sāmarthyād adhyardha-pūrvadvigor luk na bhavati // [#480]
GS24jvkasipu:32055: saṅkhyā-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt parimāṇopādhikāt prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32060: saṅgha - pañca parimāṇam asya pañcakaḥ saṅghaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32062: sūtra - aṣṭau adhyāyāḥ parimāṇam asya sūtrasya aṣṭakaṃ pāṇinīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:32065: nanu ca adhyāyasamūhaḥ sūtrasaṅgha eva bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:32073: tasya saṅkhyāparimāṇaṃ pañcāvṛttayaḥ pañcavārāḥ pañca rūpāṇi asya adhyayanasya pañcakam adhyayanam /
GS24jvkasipu:32075: pañcadaśa mantrāḥ parimāṇam asya pañcadaśaḥ stomaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32088: yad iha lakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:32091: dvayor daśatoḥ vinbhāvaḥ śatiś ca pratyayaḥ dvau daśatau praimāṇam asya saṅghasya viṃśatiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32092: trayāṇāṃ daśatāṃ trinbhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32094: caturṇāṃ daśatāṃ catvārinbhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32096: pañcānāṃ daśatāṃ pañcābhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32101: saptānāṃ daśatāṃ saptabhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32104: aṣṭānāṃ daśatām aśībhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca / [#480]
GS24jvkasipu:32107: navānāṃ daśatāṃ navabhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32109: daśanāṃ daśatāṃ śabhāvaḥ taś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32110: daśa daśataḥ parimāṇam asya saṅghasya śatam /
GS24jvkasipu:32114: tathā hi - paṅktiḥ iti kramasamniveśe 'pi vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:32117: na ca atra avayavārthaḥ kaścid asti /
GS24jvkasipu:32118: yā ca+eṣāṃ viṣayabhedena guṇa-mātre guṇini ca vṛttiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:32121: sahasrādayo 'py evaṃ jātiyakāḥ tadvad eva draṣṭavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32127: pañcat daśat ity etau nipātyete tad asya aprimāṇam ity asmin viṣaye varge 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:32139: saptan śabdāc chandasi viṣaye 'ñ pratyayo bhavati varge 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:32146: triṃśac-catvariṃśac-chabdābhyāṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ḍaṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya parimāṇam ity etasmin viṣaye brāhmaṇe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:32150: triṃśad-adhyāyāḥ parimāṇam eṣāṃ brāhamaṇānāṃ traiśāni brāhmaṇāni /
GS24jvkasipu:32156: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthād arhati ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32166: cheda-ādibhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyo nityam arhati ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32185: śīrṣaccheda-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthān nityam arhati ity asminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32194: daṇḍādibhyo dvitiyāsamarthebhyaḥ arhati ity asminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32215: prātipadikamātrāc chandasi viṣaye tad arhati ity asminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32223: pātra-śabdād ghan pratyayo bhavati cakārād yat ca,
GS24jvkasipu:32240: dakṣiṇaśabdasya alpāctarasya apūrvanipātena lakṣaṇavyabhicāracihnena yathāsaṅkhyābhāvaṃ sūcayati // [#483]
GS24jvkasipu:32245: chayatau anuvarttete sthālībila-śabdāc chayatau pratyayau bhavataḥ tad arhati ity asminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32253: yajña-śabdād ṛtvik-śabdāc ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ gha-khañau pratyayau bhavataḥ tad arhati ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32261: ataḥ paraṃ prāgvatīyaḥ ṭhañ eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:32267: pārāyaṇa-adibhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ vartayati ity asminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32274: saṃśaya-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthāt āpannaḥ ity etasminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32279: yojana-śabdāt dvitīyāsamarthād gacchati ity asminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32284: tato 'bhigamanam arhati iti ca krośaśatayojanaśatayor upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:32291: pathin-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād gacchati ity asminn arthe ṣkan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32300: pathaḥ pantha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati ṇaś ca pratyayo nityaṃ gacchati ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32301: panthānaṃ nityaṃ gacchati pāntho bhikṣāṃ yācate /
GS24jvkasipu:32307: uttarapatha-śabdād tṛtīyāsamarthāt āhṛtam ity etasmin viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32333: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ kālāt ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:32340: kālāt ity adhikāraḥ vyuṣṭa-ādibhyo 'ṇ (*5,1.97) iti yāvat // [#485]
GS24jvkasipu:32343: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt kāla-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt virvṛttam ity asminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32348: tam adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī // PS_5,1.80 //
GS24jvkasipu:32350: tam iti dvitīyāsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32361: nanu cādhyeṣaṇaṃ bharaṇaṃ ca muhūrtaṃ kriyate tena kathaṃ māso vyāpyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:32363: tatra phalabhūtayā kriyayā māso vyāpyamānas tābhyām eva vyāptaḥ ity ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:32367: māsa-śabdād vayasy abhidheye yatkhañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32369: adhīṣṭādīnāṃ caturṇām adhikāre 'pi sāmarthyād bhūta eva atra abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32376: māsāntād dvigor yap pratyayo bhavati vayasy abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:32383: ṣaṇmāsa-śabdād vayasy abhidheye ṇyat pratyayo bhavati, yap ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32393: ṣaṇmāsa-śabdād vayasy abhidheye ṭhaṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32401: samā-śabdād dvitīyāsmārthād adhīṣṭādiṣu artheṣu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32402: ṭhaño 'pavādaḥ samāmadhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā samīnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32410: samā-śabdāntād dvigoḥ nirvṛttādisu artheṣu pañcasu vā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32414: khena mukte pakṣe ṭhañ api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32422: rātri ahaḥ saṃvatsara ity evam antād dvigoḥ nirvṛttādiṣu artheṣu vā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32423: khena mukte pakṣe ṭhañ api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32439: varṣāntād dvigor nirvṛttādiṣv artheṣu vā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32453: cittavati pratyaya-arthe 'bhidheye varṣa-śabdāntād dvigor nirvṛttādiṣv artheṣu utpannasya pratyayasya nityaṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32463: ṣaṣṭirātra-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt kan pratyayo nipātyate pacyante ity etasminn arthe,
GS24jvkasipu:32472: vatsarāntāt prātipadikāt nivṛttādiṣv artheṣu chandasi viṣaye chanḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32489: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt parijayya,
GS24jvkasipu:32492: sukara ity eteṣv artheṣu ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32509: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:32514: aparā vṛttiḥ - tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:32515: yat tad asya iti nirdiṣṭaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32534: bhasyāḍhe iti puṃbadbhāvena ṅīpi nivṛtte nas taddhite (*6,4.144)
GS24jvkasipu:32539: aṣṭācatvāriṃśato ḍvuṃś ca ḍiniś ca vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32542: cāturmāsyānāṃ yalopaś ca ḍvuṃś ca ḍiniś ca vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32555: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyo yajñākhyebhyo dakṣiṇā ity etasminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32559: ākhyā-grahaṇam akālād api yajñavācino yathā sayāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32560: itarathā hi kālādhikārād ekāhadvādaśāhaprabhṛtaya eva yajñā gṛhyeran /
GS24jvkasipu:32565: tatra ca dīyate kāryaṃ bhavavat // PS_5,1.96 //
GS24jvkasipu:32567: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikād dīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:32568: kāryam ity etayor arthayor bhavavat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32591: kāryam ity etayor aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32618: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ yathākathāca-hasta-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṇa-yatau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32619: dīyate, kāryam ity etayor arthayoḥ pratyekam abhisambadhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:32640: karma-veṣa-śabdābhyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ yat pratyayo bhavati sampādini ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32647: tasmai iti caturthīsamarthebhyaḥ santāpādibhyaḥ prabhavati ity asmin viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32678: karman-śabdā ukañ pratyayo bhavati tasmai prabhavati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32686: samaya-śabdāt tat iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:32687: yat tatprathamāsamarthaṃ prāptaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32695: ṛtu-śabdāt tad iti prathamāsamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prāptam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32704: ṛtu-śabdāc chandasi viṣaye ghas pratyayo bhavati tad asya prāptam ity asmin visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32710: kāla-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati tad asya prāptam ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32720: prakarṣe vartamānāt kālāt prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32728: tad iti prathamasamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣthyarthe ṭhañ prayayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:32729: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ prayojanaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32735: viśākhā-ṣaḍhā-śabdābhyām aṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prayojanam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāsaṅkhyam mantha-daṇḍayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32744: anupravacanādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prayojanam ity asmin viṣaye ṭhaño 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32781: samāpana-śabdāt sapūrvapadāt vidyamānapūrvapadāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prayojanam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32795: iha mā bhūt, ekāgāraṃ prayojanam asya bhikṣoḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32797: ṅīb eva bhavati na ñitsvaraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32798: apare punar ikaṭ pratyayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca nipātayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:32815: tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ // PS_5,1.115 //
GS24jvkasipu:32817: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt tulyam ity etasminn arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:32818: yat tulyaṃ kriyā cet sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32829: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāc ca iva-arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32832: ṣaṣthīsamarthāt - devadattasya iva devadattavat yajñādattasya gāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32837: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthāt arham ity etasminn arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32844: upasargāt sasādhane dhātvarthe vartamānāt svārthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32850: tasya iti ṣaṣthīsamarthād bhāvaḥ ity etasmninn arthe tavatalau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32860: ā etasmāt tvasaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:32868: karmaṇi ca vidhānārthaṃ guṇavacana-brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmaṇi ca (*5,1.124) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32878: te nañ-pūrvāt tatpuruṣāt na bhavanti caturādīn varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:32888: na asya paṭavaḥ santi iti apaṭuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:32903: pṛthu ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ imanic pratyayo bhavati vā tasya bhāvaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32950: varṇaviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo dṛḍha-ādibhyaś ca ṣyañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:32987: guṇavacanedhyo brāhmaṇādibhyaś ca tasya iti ṣaṣthīsamarthebhyaḥ karmaṇyabhidheye ṣyañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33063: stona-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33074: sakhiśabdāt yaḥ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33084: kapi-jñāti-śabdābhyāṃ ḍhak prayayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33087: yathāsaṅkhyam arthayoḥ sarvatra+eva atra prakaraṇe na+iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:33091: patyantāt prātipadikāt purohitādibhyaś ca yak pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33130: prāṇabhṛjjātivācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vayovacanebhya udgātrādibhyaś ca añ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakramaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33152: hāyanāntebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ yuvādibhaś ca aṇ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33188: igantāc ca laghupūrvāt aṇ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33193: laghuḥ pūrvo yasmād ikaḥ tadantān prātipadikād ity ayam artho vivakṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33216: yakāropadhāt gurūpottamād vuñ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33229: dvandva-sañjñakebhyaḥ manojña-ādibhyaś ca vuñ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33260: gotravācinaḥ caranavācinaḥ ca prātipadikāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33269: gārgyatvena kaṭhatvena ca vikatthate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33272: gārgyatvena kaṭhatvena ca parānadhikṣipati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33275: gārgyatvaṃ kaṭhatvaṃ ca prāptaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33297: brahman-śabdād hotrāvācinaḥ tvaḥ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33300: na iti vaktavye tvavacanaṃ talo bādhanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:33305: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ______________________________________________________
GS24jvkasipu:33312: dhānyaviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyo bhavane 'bhidheye khañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33314: bhavanam iti bhavanti jāyante 'sminn iti bhavanam /
GS24jvkasipu:33319: tṛṇānāṃ bhavanaṃ kṣetram ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33326: vrīhi-śāli-śabdābhyāṃ ḍhak pratyayo bhavati bhavane kṣetre abhidheye khaño 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33332: yavādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo yat pratyayo bhavati bhavane kṣetre 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:33340: tila māṣa umā bhaṅgā aṇu ity etebhyaḥ vibhāṣā yat pratyayo bhavati bhavane kṣetre 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:33352: sarvacarman śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt kṛtaḥ ity asminn arthe kha-khañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33353: sarvaśabdaś ca atra pratyayārthena kṛtena sambadhyate, na carmaṇā /
GS24jvkasipu:33355: sarvaś carmaṇā kṛtaḥ ity etasmin vākyārthe vṛttiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33362: yathāmukha-śabdāt sammukha-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād darśanaḥ ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33363: dṛśyate 'smin iti darśanaḥ ādarśādiḥ pratibimbāśraya ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33373: sarva-ādeḥ prātipadikāt pathin aṅga karman patra pātra ity evam antād dvitīyāsamarthād vyāpnoti ity asminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33385: āprapada-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt prāpnoti ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33387: śarīreṇa asambaddhasya api paṭasya pramāṇam ākhyāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:33391: anupada-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ baddhā bhakṣayati neya ity eteṣv artheṣu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33398: pradakṣiṇaprasavyagāmināṃ śārāṇāṃ yasmin paraśāraiḥ padānāmasamāveśaḥ so 'yānayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33404: parovara parampara putrapautra ity etebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ anubhavati ity asmin arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33417: avārapāra atyanta anukāma ity etebhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ gāmī ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33437: garbhadhāraṇena sakalā 'pi samā vyāpyate iti atyantasaṃyoge dvitīyā /
GS24jvkasipu:33441: kecit tu samāyāṃ vijāyate iti vigṛhṇanti,
GS24jvkasipu:33442: garbhamocane tu vijanir vartate ity āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33445: anutpattāv uttarapadasya ca vā yalopo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33454: āvidūrye hi mūrdhanyo vidhīyate avāc ca ālambana-āvidūryayoḥ (*8,3.68) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33455: adya vā śvo vā vijāyate 'dyaśvīnā gauḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33457: kecit tu vijāyate iti na anuvartayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:33466: goḥ āṅpūrvād ā tasya goḥ pratipādanāt karmakāriṇi khaḥ pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33468: yo gavā bhṛtaḥ karma karoti ā tasya goḥ pratyarpaṇāt //
GS24jvkasipu:33473: anugu-śabdād alaṅgāmī ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33480: adhvan-śabdāt dvitīyāsamarthād alaṅgāmī ity etasminn arthe yat-khau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33489: abhyamitra-śadāt dvitīyāsamarthāt alaṅgāmī ity asminn arthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33500: goṣṭha-śabdād bhūtapūrvopādhikāt svārthe khañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33508: aśva-śabdād ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt ekāhagamaḥ ity etasminn arthe khañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33516: śālīna-kaupīna-śabdau nipātyete yathāsaṅkhyam adhṛṣṭe akārye ca abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:33521: kūpāvatāram arhati iti khañ pratyayaḥ uttarapadalopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33528: vrāta-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt jīvati ity asminn arthe khañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33544: yadā guṇapradhānaḥ sāptapadīna-śabdaḥ sakhibhāve tatkarmaṇi ca vartate tadā sakhya-śabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33545: yadā tu lakṣaṇayā vartate tadā puruṣeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:33551: tasya vikāre khañ pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:33559: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ pīlvādibhyaḥ karṇādibhyaś ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pāka-mūlayor arthayoḥ kuṇap jāhac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33591: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt pakṣa-śabdāt mūle 'bhidheye tiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33599: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt vittaḥ ity etasminn arthe cuñcup caṇap ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33606: vi nañ ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ nā nāñ ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33608: asahārthe pṛthagbhāve vartamānābhyāṃ vinañbhyāṃ savārthe nā-nāñau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33614: viśadāt śālac śaṅkaṭac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33619: paramārthatas tu guṇa-śabdā ete yathākathañcid vyutpādyante /
GS24jvkasipu:33624: sam pra ud ity etebhyaḥ kaṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33669: nāsikāyāḥ sambandhini nate abhidheye ṭiṭac nāṭac bhraṭac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:33682: ni-śabdān nāsikāyā nate 'bhidheye biḍac birīsac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33691: inac piṭac cika ci ca // PS_5,2.33 //
GS24jvkasipu:33693: neḥ ity eva, nate nāsikāyāḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33694: ni-śabdān nāsikāyā nate 'bhidheye inac piṭac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:33695: tatsaṃniyogena ca ni-śabdasya yathāsaṅkhyaṃ cika ci ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33699: tathā ca+uktam - inac-piṭac-kāścikacicikādeśāś ca vaktavyāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33701: klinnasya cil pil ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ laś ca pratyayo 'sya cakṣuṣī ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:33713: upa adhi ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam āsannārūḍhayor vartamānābhhyāṃ svārthe tyakan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33717: pratyayasthāt kātpūrvasya iti itvam atra na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33723: karma-śabdāt saptamīsamarthād ghaṭaḥ ity etasminn arthe aṭhac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33727: tad asya sañjātaṃ tārakā-ādibhya itac // PS_5,2.36 //
GS24jvkasipu:33729: tad iti prathamāsamarthebhyas tārakā-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe itac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33731: tārakāḥ sañjātā asya nabhasaḥ tārakitaṃ nabhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33766: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe dvayasac daghnac mātrac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ pramāṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33772: prathamaś ca dvitiyaś ca ūrdhvamāne matau mama /
GS24jvkasipu:33789: tatra api dvigor lug eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:33790: dve diṣṭī syātāṃ vā na vā dvidiṣṭiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33800: pramāṇaparimāṇābhyāṃ saṅkhyāyāś ca api saṃśaye mātrac vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33820: puruṣahastibhyāṃ prathamāsamarthābhyāṃ pramāṇopādhikābhyām asya iti ṣaṣṭhyārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33842: yat-tad-etebhyaḥ prathamāsamarthebhyaḥ parimāṇopādhikebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe vatup pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33850: na tvā vāṃ anyo divyo na pīrthivo a jāto na janisyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33857: kim-idam-bhyām uttarasya vatupo vakārasya ghakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33860: etad eva cādeśavidhānaṃ jñāpakaṃ kimidambhyāṃ vatup-pratyayo bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33861: atha vā yogavibhāgena vatupaṃ vidhāya paścād vo gho vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:33866: saṅkhyāparimāṇe vartamānāt kimaḥ prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ḍatiḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33869: pṛcchyamānatvāt paricchedopādhikāyāṃ saṅkhyāyāṃ vartamānāt kimaḥ pratyayo vijñāyate / [#508]
GS24jvkasipu:33871: kā saṅkhyā parimāṇam eṣāṃ brāhmaṇānām kati brāhmaṇāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:33873: atha vā saṅkhyā+eva parimāṇātmikā paricchedasvabhāvā gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:33877: yatra aparicchedakatvena vivakṣyate tatra mā bhūd iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33884: saṅkhyāyā avayave vartamānāyāḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe tayap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33885: avayavāvayavinaḥ sambandhinaḥ iti sāmarthyāt avayavī pratyayārtho vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33893: pūrveṇa vihitasya tayasya dvitribhyāṃ parasya vā ayajādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33899: trayī gatiḥ iti tayanibandhana īkāro na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:33908: ubha-śabdāt parasya tayapo nityam ayajādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33911: ubhaśabdo yati laukikī saṅkhyā tataḥ pūrveṇa+eva vihitasya tayapa ādeśavidhānārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:33913: tato yogavibhāgena tayapaṃ vidhāya tasya nityam ayajādeśo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33917: tad asminn adhikam iti daśāntāḍ ḍaḥ // PS_5,2.45 //
GS24jvkasipu:33919: tat iti prathamāsamarthāt asmin iti saptamyarthe daśāntāt prātipadikāt ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati yat tatprathamāsamartham adhikaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33930: pratyayārthena ca samānajātīye prakṛtyarthe sati pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33931: ekādaśa kārṣāpaṇā adhikā asmin kārṣāpaṇaśate ekādaśaṃ kārṣāpanaśatam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33933: ekādaśa māṣā adhikā asmin kārṣāpaṇaśate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33941: sahasrāṇām vā śatam iti śatasahasram ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33944: yasya saṅkhyā tadādhikye ḍaḥ kartavyo mato mama //
GS24jvkasipu:33948: tad asminn adhikam ity anuvartate, ḍaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33949: śadantāt prātipadikāt viṃśateś ca ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asminn adhikam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:33951: śad-grahane 'nta-grahanaṃ pratyaya-grahaṇe yasmāt sa tadāder adhikārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:33955: iha mā bhūt, gotriṃśadadhikā asmin gośate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33961: iha mā bhūt, goviṃśatir adhikā 'smin gośate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:33965: tad asya ity anuvartate tad asya sañjātam ity ataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33966: tad iti prathamāsamarthāt saṅkhyāvācinaḥ prātipadikāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ guṇasya cen nimāne vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:33968: guṇo yena nimīyate mūlyabhūtena so 'pi sāmarthyād bhāga eva vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33969: yavānāṃ dvau bhāgau nimānam asya udaśvidbhāgasya dvimayamudaśvid yavānām /
GS24jvkasipu:33972: bhāge 'pi tu vidhīyāmānaḥ pratyayaḥ prādhānyena bhāgavantamācaṣṭe /
GS24jvkasipu:33976: dvau bhāgau yavānāṃ traya udaśvitaḥ iti / [#510]
GS24jvkasipu:33978: bhūyasaś ca vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33981: bhūyasaḥ iti ca pratyayārthāt prakṛtyarthasya adhikyamātraṃ vivakṣitam /
GS24jvkasipu:33986: dvau bhāgau yavānām adhyardha udaśvitaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33988: nimeye vartamānāyāḥ saṅkhyāyā nimāne pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33989: udaśvito dvau bhāgau nimeyamasya yavabhāgasya dvimayā yavā udaśvitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33996: dviguṇaṃ pacyate tailaṃ kṣīreṇa ity atra mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:34000: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt saṅkhyāvācinaḥ prātipadikāt pūraṇe ity asminn arthe ḍaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34006: yasminn upasañjāte 'nyā saṅkhyā sampadyate sa pratyayārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34013: nakārāntāt saṅkhyāvācinaḥ prātipadikāt asaṃkhyādeḥ parasya ḍaṭo maḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34014: nāntāt iti pañcamī iṭa āgamasambandhe ṣaṣṭhīṃ prakalpayati /
GS24jvkasipu:34024: nāntād asaṅkhyādeḥ parasya ḍaṭaḥ chandasi viṣaye thaḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34037: ṣaṭ kati katipaya catur ity eṣāṃ ḍaṭi puratasthugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34039: tasya asmād eva jñāpakāt ḍaṭ pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34051: bahu pūga gana saṅgha ity eteṣāṃ ḍaṭi parataḥ tithugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34052: pūgasaṅghaśabdayor asaṅkhyātvādidam eva jñāpakaṃ ḍaṭo bhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:34070: dviśabdāt tīyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasya pūraṇe ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34076: triśabdāt tīyaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati tasya pūraṇe ity etad viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34080: halaḥ (*6,4.2.) iti saṃprasāraṇasya dīrghatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34081: aṇaḥ iti tatra anuvartate ḍhralope ity ataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34087: viṃśaty-ādibhyaḥ parasya ḍaṭaḥ tamaḍāgamo bhavaty anyatarasayām /
GS24jvkasipu:34099: evaṃ ca sati ṣaṣṭyādeś ca asaṅkhyādeḥ (*5,2.58)
GS24jvkasipu:34105: śatādibhyaḥ māsārdhamāsasaṃvatsaraśadebhyaś ca parasya ḍaṭo nityaṃ tamaḍāgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34107: tebhyo 'smād eva jñāpakāt ḍaṭ pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34121: ṣaṣṭyādeḥ saṅkhyāśabdād asaṅkhyādeḥ parasya ḍaṭo nityaṃ tamaḍāgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34133: prātipadikān matvarthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati sūkte sāmani ca abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:34150: matvarthe utpannasya chasya luk bhavati adhyāyānuvākayoḥ abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34165: vimuktādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe adhyāyānuvākayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34199: goṣadādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vun pratyayo bhavati matvarthe 'dhyāyānuvākayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34220: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt pathinśabdāt kuśalaḥ ity asminn arthe vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34227: ākarśādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ saptamīsamarthebhyaḥ kuśalaḥ ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34254: tatra ity eva, kan iti ca / [#513]
GS24jvkasipu:34256: dhana-hiraṇya-śabdābhyāṃ tatra iti saptamīsamarthābhyāṃ kāme ity asminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34264: tatra ity eva, kan iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:34265: svāṅgavācibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tatra iti saptamīsamarthebhyaḥ prasite ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34277: udaraśabdāt saptamīsamarthāt prasite ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34280: yo bubhukṣayā 'tyantaṃ pīḍyate sa evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34286: kan pratyayaḥ ity eva svaryate, na ṭhak /
GS24jvkasipu:34288: sasya-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt parijātaḥ ity asminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34292: yasya kiñcid api vaiguṇyaṃ na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:34301: aṃśaśabdān nirdeśād eva dvitiyāsamarthād hārī ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34305: tatra ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhāt karmaṇi dvitīyā eva bhavati // [#515]
GS24jvkasipu:34310: tantraśabdān nirdeśād eva pañcamīsamarthāt acirāpahṛte ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34318: brāhmaṇaka uṣṇika ity etau śabdau nipātyete kan pratyayāntau sañjñāyām viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34321: yatra ayudhajīvino brāhmaṇāḥ santi tatra brāhmaṇakaḥ iti sañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:34344: anuka abhika abhīka ity ete śabdāḥ kanpratyayāntā nipātyante kamitā ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34352: pārśvaśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthād anvicchati ity asminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34361: ayaḥśūla-daṇḍa-ajināhbyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyām anvicchati ity etasminn arthe ṭhakṭ-hañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34363: tena anvicchati āyaḥśūlikaḥ sāhasikaḥ ity arthaḥ dambho daṇḍājinam,
GS24jvkasipu:34368: tāvatithaṃ grahaṇam iti lug vā // PS_5,2.77 //
GS24jvkasipu:34373: pūraṇapratyayāntāt prātipadikāt grahaṇopādhikāt svārthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34375: dvitīyena rūpeṇa granthaṃ gṛhṇāti dvikaṃ grahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:34381: ṣaṣṭhena rūpeṇa granthaṃ gṛhṇāti ṣaṭko devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34390: sa iti prathamāsamarthāt eṣām iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe kan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:34391: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ grāmaṇīś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34401: śṛṅkhala-śabdāt prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe kan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:34402: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ bandhanaṃ ced tad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:34403: yat tad asya iti nirdeṣṭaṃ karabhaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34408: yadyapi rajjvādikam api tatra asti tathāpi śṛṅkhalam asya asvatantrīkaraṇe bhavati sādhanam iti bandhanam ity ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:34415: uc-chabdāt sasādhanakriyāvacanāt tadvati kan pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34423: kālāt prayojanāc ca yathāyogaṃ samarthavibhaktiyuktāt roge 'bhidheye kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34436: tad asminn annaṃ prāye sañjñāyām // PS_5,2.82 //
GS24jvkasipu:34438: tat iti prathamāsamarthād asmin iti saptamyarthe kan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:34439: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ annaṃ cet prāyaviṣayaṃ tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34442: guḍāpūpāḥ prāyeṇa annam asyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ guḍāpūpikā /
GS24jvkasipu:34457: śrotriyan iti nipātyate chando 'dhīte ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34464: bāgrahaṇam anuvartate tāvatithaṃ grahaṇam iti lug vā (*5,2.77) ity ataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:34471: śrāddhaśabdād bhuktopādhikād anena ity asminn arthe iniṭhanau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34472: śrāddha-śabdaḥ karmanāmadheyam tat sādhanadravye vartitvā pratyayam utpādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:34476: adya bhukte śrāddhe śvaḥ śrāddhikaḥ iti mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:34481: na ca kriyām antareṇa kartā sambhavati iti yāṃ kāñcit kriyāmadhyāhṛtya pratyayo vidheyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34482: pūrvāt anena ity asminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34483: pūrvaṃ gatam anena pītam bhuktaṃ vā pūrvī,
GS24jvkasipu:34489: vidyamānaṃ pūrvaṃ yasmād iti sapūrvaṃ prātipadikam,
