GS24jvkasipu:34491: sapūrvāt pratipadikāt pūrvaśabdāntāt anena ity asminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34494: sup supā iti samāsaṃ kṛtvā taddhita utpādyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34499: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhir na asti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:34503: anena ity eva iṣṭādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ anena ity asminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34550: paripanthin pariparin ity etau śabdau chandasi viṣaye nipātyete,
GS24jvkasipu:34554: mā tvā paripanthino vidan mā tvā paripariṇo vidan //
GS24jvkasipu:34558: anupadī iti nipātyate anveṣṭā cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34577: kṣetriyac iti nipātyate parakṣetre cikitsyaḥ ity etasmin vākyārthe padavacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:34578: parakṣetrād tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt cikitsyaḥ ity etasminn arthe ghac pratyayaḥ paraśabdalopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34585: atha vā kṣetriyaṃ viṣam yat parakṣetre paraśarīre saṃkramayya cikitsate /
GS24jvkasipu:34586: atha vā kṣetriyāṇi tṛṇāni yāni sasyārthe kṣetre jātāni cikitsyāni nāśayitavyāni /
GS24jvkasipu:34596: indra-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt liṅgam ity etasminn arthe ghac-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34598: indra ātmā, sa cakṣurādinā karaṇena anumīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34614: vāśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyamāno vikalpānāṃ svātantryam darśayati //
GS24jvkasipu:34616: tad asya asty asminn iti matup // PS_5,2.94 //
GS24jvkasipu:34622: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya+iti ṣaṣṭhyārthe 'sminn iti saptamyarthe vā matup pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:34623: yat tat prathamāsamartham asti cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34624: astyarthopādhikaṃ ced tad bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34650: rasādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ matup pratyayo bhavati tad asya asty asmin ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34661: atha vā guṇāt iti atra paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34680: prāṇisthavācinaḥ śabdāt ākārāntāt lac pratyayo bhavaty anyatarasyāṃ matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34689: iha mā bhūt, cikīrṣā 'sya asti cikīrṣāvān,
GS24jvkasipu:34692: cakāraś cūḍālo 'sti ity atra svarito vānudatte padādau (*8,2.6)
GS24jvkasipu:34698: sidhmādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo lac pratyayo bhavaty anyatarasyāṃ matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34703: tasmāt akārāntebhyaḥ iniṭhanau pratyayau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34761: vatsāṃsaśabdābhyām lac pratyayo bhavati yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kāmavati balavati ca arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34764: vṛttiviṣaye vatsāṃsaśabdau svabhāvāt kāmabalayor vartamānau tadvati pratyayam utpādayataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34765: na hy atra vatsārthaḥ aṃsārtho vā vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34770: na ca ayam artho matupi sambhavati iti nityaṃ lajeva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34778: anyatarasyām grahaṇam matup samuccayārthaṃ sarvatra+eva anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:34783: lomādibhyaḥ pāmādibhyaḥ picchādibhyaś ca tribhyo gaṇebhyo yathāsaṅkhyaṃ śa na ilac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti matvarthe, matup ca /
GS24jvkasipu:34824: prajñā śraddhā arcā vṛtti ity etebhyaḥ ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati matubarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34834: tapaḥ-sahasra-śabdābhyāṃ vini ini ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34835: pratyayārthayos tu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sarvatra+eva asmin prakaraṇe nisyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34838: asantatvād adantatvāc ca siddhe pratyaye punar vacanam aṇā vakṣyamāṇena bādhā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34885: dantaśabdād unatopādhikād urac pratyayo bhavati mavarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34886: dantā unnatā asya santi danturaḥ unnata iti kim ? dantavān //
GS24jvkasipu:34890: ūṣa suṣi maṣka madhu ity etebhyo raḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34902: mukham asya asti iti sarvasmin vaktavye mukharaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34922: keśaśabdād vaḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:34923: nanu ca prakṛtam anyatarasyāṃ grahaṇam anuvartata eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:34955: gāṇdī ajaga ity etābhyāṃ vaḥ pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34958: hrasvād api bhavati gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34964: kāṇḍa aṇḍa ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam īrannīracau pratyayau bhavato matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34970: rajaḥ-prabhṛtibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ valac pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34986: danta-śikhā-śabdābhyāṃ balac pratyayo bhavati matvarthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34994: jyotsnādayaḥ śabdāḥ nipātyante matvarthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34995: jyotiṣa upadhālopo naś ca pratyayo nipātyate - jyotsnā candraprabhā /
GS24jvkasipu:34996: tamasa upadhāyā ikāro raś ca - tamisrā rātriḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34997: strītvamatantram anyatra api dṛśyate - tamisraṃ nabhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35002: malaśabdād inajīmasacau pratyayau nipātyete - malinaḥ, malīmasaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:35009: anyatarasyām ity adhikārān matub api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35014: ekākṣarāt kṛto jāteḥ saptamyāṃ ca na tau smṛtau /
GS24jvkasipu:35020: saptamyām - danḍā asyāṃ santi daṇḍavatī śālā iti / [#525]
GS24jvkasipu:35022: itikaraṇo viṣayaniyamārthaḥ sarvatra sambadhyate ity uktam,
GS24jvkasipu:35031: vrīhyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ iniṭhanau pratyayau bhavato matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35035: na ca vrīhyādibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pratyayadvayam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35036: kiṃ tarhi ? śikhādibhya inirvācya ikan yavakhadādiṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:35038: śikhā mekhalā sañjñā balākā mālā vīṇā vaḍavā aṣṭakā patākā karman carman haṃsā ity etebhya inir eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35039: yavakhada kumārī nau ity etebhya ikann eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35044: evaṃ tarhi tundādisu vrīhigrahaṇam arthagrahaṇam vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35057: tundādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhya ilac pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35074: ekapūrvād gopūrvāc ca prātipadikān nityaṃ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35079: ata ity eva ekaviṃśatir asya asti iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35094: śatāntāt sahasrāntāt ca prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe tau cet śatasahasraśabdau niṣkāt parau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35097: suvarṇaniṣkaśatam asya asti iti anabhidhānān na bhavati // [#526]
GS24jvkasipu:35103: āhatapraśaṃsāviśiṣṭārthe vartamānād rūpaśabdāt yap pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35107: praśastaṃ rūpam asya asti rūpyaḥ purusaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35108: nighātikātāḍanādinā dīnārādiṣu rūpaṃ yad utpadyate tad āhatamn ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35117: māyā medhā sraj ity etebhyaś ca viniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35123: māyāśabdād vrīhyādiṣu pāṭhāt iniṭhanau api bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35128: chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ viniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35166: vātaṃ na sahate iti vā vātūlaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35189: vācśabdāt prathamāsamarthād ālac āṭac ity etau pratyayau bhavato matvarthe bahubhāṣiṇi abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:35194: yo hi samyag bahu bhāṣate vāgmīty eva sa bhavati // [#528]
GS24jvkasipu:35200: svaśadād aiśvaryavācino matvarthe āmin pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35201: svam asya asti iti aiśvaryam asya asti iti svāmī /
GS24jvkasipu:35208: arśas ity evam adibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo 'c pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35212: yatra abhinnarūpeṇa śabdena tadvato 'bhidhānaṃ tat sarvam iha draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:35233: tadviṣayebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ prāṇisthārthavācibhyaḥ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35253: vātātisārayor upatāpatvāt pūrveṇa+eva siddhe pratyaye kugartham eva+idaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:35265: pūraṇapratyayāntāt prātipadikāt iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe vayasi dyotye /
GS24jvkasipu:35266: pañcamo 'sya asti māsaḥ saṃvatsaro vā pañcamī uṣṭraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35278: sukha ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ iniḥ pratyayo niyamyate matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35319: varṇaśabdāt iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe samudāyena ced brahmacārī bhaṇyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35321: sa hi vidyāgrahaṇārtham upanīto brahama carati,
GS24jvkasipu:35329: puṣkara ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhya iniḥ pratyayo bhavati samudāyena ced deśo 'bhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35393: mannantāt prātipadikān maśabdāntāc ca iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe,
GS24jvkasipu:35404: kam śam iti makārāntau udkasukhayor vācakau,
GS24jvkasipu:35405: tābhyāṃ ba bha yus ti tu ta yas ity ete sapta pratyayā bhavanti matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35423: tundi bali vaṭi ity etebhyo bhaḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35442: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:35451: prāg etasmād dikṣaṃ śabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo vibhaktisañjñās te veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35456: tasilādīnāṃ vibhaktitve prayojanaṃ tyadādividhayaḥ idamo vibhaktisvaraś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:35460: teṣu samarthādhikāraḥ prathamagrahaṇaṃ ca pratiyogyapekṣatvān na+upayujyate iti nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:35470: kimaḥ sarvanāmno bahuśabdāc ca prāgdiśaḥ pratyayāḥ veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35482: sarvanāmatvād eva siddhe kimo grahaṇam dvyādiparyudāsāt /
GS24jvkasipu:35491: idam iś ity ayam ādeśo bhavati prāg-diśīyeṣu pratyayeśu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35497: rephathakārādau prāg-diśīye pratyaye parataḥ idamaḥ eta-itau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35507: etadaḥ prāg-diśīye parataḥ aś ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35512: etado rathoḥ parata eta it ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35520: sarvasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati prāg-diśīye dakārādau pratyaye parato 'nyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:35539: tasya taseḥ kiṃsarvanāmabahubhyaḥ parasya tasilādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35548: pari abhi ity etābhyāṃ tasil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35581: kimaḥ saptamyanatād vā haḥ pratyayo bhavati chandasi visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:35585: kutracidasya sā dūre kva brāhmaṇasya cāvakāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:35631: saptamyāḥ ity eva, kāle iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:35632: idamaḥ saptamyantāt kāle vartamānāt rhil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35647: idamaḥ saptamyantāt kāle vartamānād dānīṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35652: tadaḥ saptamyantāt kāle vartamānād dā pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:35661: tayor idamaḥ tadaś ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dā-rhilau pratyayau bhavataś chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:35672: kiṃsarvanāmabahubhyaḥ saptamyantebhyaḥ anadyatane kālaviśeṣe vartamānebhyaḥ rhil pratyayo bhavaty antarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:35679: sptamyāḥ iti kāle iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:35683: kālaviśeṣaḥ iti sarvam etan nipātanāl labhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35684: samānasya sabhāvo nipātyate dyaś ca pratyayaḥ ahany abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:35686: pūrvapūrvatarayoḥ parabhāvo nipātyate udārī ca pratyayau saṃvatsare 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:35689: idama iśbhāvaḥ samasaṇ pratyayaḥ nipātyate saṃvatsare 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:35712: saptamyāḥ iti kāle iti ca nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:35715: prakāravṛttibhyaḥ kiṃ-sarvanāma-bahubhyaḥ svārthe thāl pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35737: kiṃśabdād dhetau vartamānāt thā pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:35739: hetau tāvat - kathā grāmaṃ na pṛcchasi /
GS24jvkasipu:35740: kena hetunā na pṛcchasi ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35747: tebhyo dikśabdebhyo dig-deśa-kāleṣu vartamānebhyaḥ saptamī. pañcamī-prathamāntebhyaḥ astātiḥ pratyayo bhavati svārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35765: dikṣiṇa-uttarābhyāṃ dig-deśa-kāleṣu vartamānabhyāṃ saptamī-pañcamī-prathamāntābhyāṃ svārthe 'tasuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35767: dakṣiṇā-śabdaḥ kāle na sambhavati iti digdeśavṛttiḥ parigṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35779: para-avara-śabdābhyāṃ vibhāṣā atasuc pratyayo bhavati astāter arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35795: añcatyantebhyo dikśabdebhya uttarasya astātipratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35808: upari upariṣṭat ity etau śabdau nipātyete astāterarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35809: ūrdhvasya upabhāvaḥ rilriṣṭātilau ca pratyayau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:35821: aparasyāṃ diśi vasati paścād diśi vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:35824: dikpūrvapadasya aparasya paścabhāvo vaktavya ātiś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35858: uttara-adhara-dakṣiṇa-śabdebhyaḥ enap pratyayo bhavatyanatarasyām astāterarthe adūre ced avadhimānavadher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35917: uttara-śabdād ājāhī pratyayau bhavataḥ astāterarthe dūre ced avadhimānavadher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35933: tat saṃniogena ca+eṣām yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pur adḥ av ity ete ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:35948: astāti-pratyaye parataḥ purvādīnāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ purādaya ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:35962: avarasya astātau parato vibhāṣā av ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35972: saṅkhyāvācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vidhārthe vartamāṇebhyo dhā pratyayo bhavati svārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35988: adhikaraṇavicāle gamyamāne saṅkhyāyāḥ svārthe dhā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35995: ekaśabdāt parasya dhā-pratyayasya dhyamuñ ādeśaḥ bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:36000: prakaraṇād eva labdhe punar dhā-grahaṇam vidhārthe vihitasya api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:36007: dvi-tryoḥ sambandhino dhā-prayayasya vidhārthe adhikaraṇavicāle ca vihitasya dhamuñ-ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:36017: dvi-tryoḥ sambandhino dhā-pratyayasya edhāc ādeśo bhavaty anyatrasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:36025: yāpye vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe pāśap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36037: tadantāt prātipadikād bhāge vartamānāt svārthe an pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36050: prāg ekādaśabhyaḥ saṅkhyāśabdebhyaḥ pūraṇapratyayāntebhyaḥ bhāge vartamānebhyaḥ svārthe 'n pratyayo bhavati acchandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:36066: ṣaṣṭha-aṣṭamabhyāṃ bhāge abhidheye acchandasi viṣaye ñaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36074: ṣaṣṭha-aṣṭamābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kan-lukau ca bhavato mānapaśvaṅgayor bhāgayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36075: ṣaṣṭhako bhāgo mānaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36076: aṣṭamo bhāgaḥ paśvaṅga cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36088: eka-śadād sahāya-vācinaḥ svārthe ākinic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36099: pūrva bhūtaḥ iti vigṛhya supsupeti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36102: bhūtapūrvatvaviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe caraṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36112: ṣaṣṭhyantāt pratyayavidhānāt saṃprati bhūtapūrvagrahaṇaṃ pratyayārthasya viśeṣaṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:36123: atiśāyanaviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe tamabiṣṭhanau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36132: yadā ca prakarṣavatāṃ punaḥ prakarṣo vivakṣyate tadātiśāyikāntād aparaḥ pratyayo bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:36133: devo vaḥ savitā prārpayatu śreṣṭhatamāya karmaṇe /
GS24jvkasipu:36138: tiṅantāt ca atiśāyane dyotye tamap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36140: ity adhikārāt tiṅo na prāpnoti iti idaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:36149: dvayor arthayor vacanaṃ dvivacanam vibhaktavyo vibhajyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36151: dvyarthe vibhajye ca+upapade prātipadikāt tiṅantāc ca atiśāyane tarabīyasunau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36170: guṇavacanād eva bhavatastau na anyasmād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36187: trantāc chandasi viṣaye ajadī pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36188: pūrveṇa guṇavacanād eva niyame kṛte chandasi prakṛtyantarāṇy abhyanujñāyante,
GS24jvkasipu:36192: bhasyāḍhe taddhite iti puṃvadbhāve kṛte turiṣṭhemeyaḥsu (*3,4.154)
GS24jvkasipu:36197: praśasya śabdasya śra ity ayam ādeśe bhavati ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36199: nanu ca praśasya śabdasya aguṇavacanatvād ajādī na sambhavataḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:36200: evaṃ tarhi ādeśavidhānasāmarthyāt tadviṣayo niyamo na pravartate,
GS24jvkasipu:36208: prakṛtyau kāc iti prakṛtibhāvat śraśabdasya ṭilopayasyetilopau na bhavataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:36212: praśasya śabdasya jya ity ayam ādeśo bhavati ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36222: vṛddha-śabdasya ca jya ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36223: tayoś ca sattvaṃ niyamābhāvena pūrvavaj jñāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36229: priyasthira ity ādinā vṛddhaśabdasya varṣādeśo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36237: antika-bāḍhayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ neda sādha ity etāv ādeśau bhavato 'jādyoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36245: ayam eṣām atiśayena bāḍham adhīte sadhiṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36247: ayam anayor atiśayena bāḍham adhīte sādhīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36252: yuva-alpa-śabdayoḥ kan ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyām ajadyoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36269: vino matupaś ca lug bhavati ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36270: idam eva vacanaṃ jñāpakam ajādis adbhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:36286: praśaṃsāviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe rūpap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36287: svārthikāś ca pratyayāḥ prakṛtyarthaviśeṣasya dyotakā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36300: ekā ca kriyā iti rupappratyayāntād dvivacanabahuvacane na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36309: īṣadasamāptiviśeṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt kalpap deśya deśīyar ity ete pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36320: vibhāṣā supo bahuc parastāt tu // PS_5,3.68 //
GS24jvkasipu:36322: īṣadasamāptiviśeṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt subantāt vibhaṣā bahuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36323: sa tu purastād eva bhavati, na parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36336: subantāt prakāraviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe jātīyar pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36347: prāk etasmād iva saṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ kapratyayas teṣu adhikṛto veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36353: tiṅaś ca (*5,3.56) ity anuvṛttam uttarasūtreṇa+eva sambandhanīm // [#546]
GS24jvkasipu:36359: avyayānām sarvanāmnāṃ ca prāgivīyeṣv artheṣu akac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:36360: sa ca prāk ṭeḥ, na parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36369: supaḥ iti dvayam api iha anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:36371: kvacit prātipadikasya prāk ṭeḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:36384: sa ca mittvād antyāt acaḥ paro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36407: ajñātatvopādhike 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt tiṅantāc ca svārthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36408: svena rūpeṇa jñāte padārthe viśeṣarūpeṇa ajñāte pratyayavidhānam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:36409: kasya ayam aśvaḥ iti svasvāmisambandhena ajñāte aśve pratyayaḥ, aśvakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36412: evam anyatra api yathāyogam ajñātatā vijñeyā /
GS24jvkasipu:36425: kutsitasvopādhike 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36449: tasyā gamyamānāyāṃ subantāt tiṅantāc ca yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36460: nītau ca gamyamānāyāṃ tadyuktād anukampāyuktād yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36466: pūrveṇa pratyāsannānukampāsambandhāt anukampyamānād eva pratyayo vihitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36467: saṃprati vyavahitād api yathā syād iti vacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:36474: bahvacaḥ prātipadikāt manuṣyanāmadheyād vā ṭhac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:36489: bahvaco manusyanāmno ghan ilac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36501: upaśabda ādiryasya tasmād upādeḥ prātipadikād bahvaco manusyanāmnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36503: cakārād ghanilacau pratyayau bhavataḥ ṭhac ca vā /
GS24jvkasipu:36516: jātiśabdo yo manusyanāmadheyo vyāghra siṃha ity evam ādiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:36517: tasmād anukampāyāṃ nītau ca kan-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36539: asmin prakaraṇe yaḥ ṭhaḥ ajādiś ca pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:36540: tasmin parataḥ prakṛter dvitīyād aca ūrdhvaṃ yac chabdarūpaṃ tasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36558: lopaḥ pūrvapadasya ca ṭhājādāvanajādau ca vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36561: vinā 'pi pratyayena pūrvottarapadayoḥ vibhāṣā lopo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36567: apratyaye tathā+eva+iṣṭa uvarṇāl la ilasya ca //
GS24jvkasipu:36568: dvitīyād aco lope sandhyakṣaradvitīyatve tadāder lopavacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:36580: śevalādīnāṃ manuṣyanāmnāṃ ṭhājādau pratyaye parataḥ tṛtīyād acaḥ ūrdhvasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36588: śevalādīnāṃ tṛtīyādaco lopaḥ sa cākṛtasandhīnām iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36600: alpatvaviśiṣṭe arthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt yathāvihitaṃ patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36612: hrasvatvaviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36621: hrasvatvahetukā yā sañjñā tasyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ kan-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36632: kuṭī-śamī-śuṇḍābhyo hrasvārthe dyotye raḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36652: kāsū-goṇī-śabdābhyāṃ hrasvasve dyotye ṣṭarac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36664: vatsa ukṣan aśva ṛṣabha ity etebhyaḥ tanutve dyotye ṣṭarac-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36665: yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tasya tanutve pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36679: kiṃ-yat-tado nirdhāraṇe dvayor ekasya ḍatarac // PS_5,3.92 //
GS24jvkasipu:36681: kim yat tat ity etebhyaḥ prātipadikebhya dvayor ekasya nirdhāraṇe ḍataracpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36685: sañjñayā vā samudāyād ekadeśasya pṛthakkaraṇaṃ nirdhāraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:36706: bahunāṃ madhye ekasya nirdhārane gamyamāne jātiparipraśnaviṣayebhyaḥ kimādibhyaḥ vā ḍatamac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36723: kimo 'smin viṣaye ḍataram api icchanti kecit,
GS24jvkasipu:36730: ekaśabdāt prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ḍatarac ḍatamac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ svasmin viṣyae /
GS24jvkasipu:36749: yat punaḥ svayam eva kutsitaṃ tatra kutsite (*5,3.74)
GS24jvkasipu:36758: ivārthe yat prātipadikaṃ vartate tasmāt kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36771: iva ity anuvartate, kan iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36782: sañjñāyāṃ vihitasya kano manusye 'bhidheye lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36789: devapathāder ākṛtigaṇatvāt tasya+eva ayaṃ prapañco veditavyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:36793: jīvikārthaṃ yad apaṇyam tasminn abhidheye kano lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36811: vihitasya kano devapathādibhya uttarasya lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36847: vastiśabdād ivārthe dyotye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36864: śākhā ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ patpratyayo bhavati ivārthe śākheva śakhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36898: tad ity anena prakṛta ivārtho nirdeśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36899: ivārthaviṣayāt samāsād aparasminn ivārthe eva chanḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36910: tatra yo devadattasya dasyūnāṃ ca samāgamaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:36916: samāsaś ca ayam asmād eva jñāpakāt,
GS24jvkasipu:36917: na hy asya aparaṃ sakṣaṇam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:36923: śarkarā ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ivārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36976: pratna pūrva viśva ima ity etebhyaḥ ivārthe thālpratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:36983: pūgavācinaḥ prātipadikāt agrāmaṇīpūrvāt svārthe ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36996: vrātavācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ca svārthe ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavaty astriyām /
GS24jvkasipu:37020: tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāt brāhmaṇarājanyavarjitāt svārthe ñyaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37047: vṛkaśadāt āyudhajīvinaḥ svārthe ṭeṇyaṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37058: dāmanyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ trigartaṣaṣṭhebhyaḥ ca āyudhajīvisaṅghavācibhyaḥ svārthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37059: yeṣām āyudhajīvināṃ saṅghānāṃ ṣaḍantavargās teṣām ca trigartaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37060: trigartaḥ ṣaṣṭho yeṣāṃ te trigartaṣaṣṭhāḥ ity ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:37093: parśvādibhyaḥ yaudheyādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ āyudhajīvisaṅghavācibhyaḥ svārthe 'ṇañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37128: abhijidādibhyo 'ṇantebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ svārthe yañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37153: tadrājapradeśāḥ - tadrājasya bahusu ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:37154: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:37159: pādaśatasya saṅkhyāder vīpsāyāṃ vun lopaś ca // PS_5,4.1 //
GS24jvkasipu:37161: pādaśatāntasya saṅkhyādeḥ prātipadikasya vīpsāyāṃ dyotyāyāṃ vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37163: yasya+iti lopena+eva siddhe punar vacanam anaimittikārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:37168: dvau dvau pādau dadāti dvipadikāṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:37169: dve dve śate dadāti dviśatikāṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:37172: svabhāvāc ca vunpratyayāntaṃ striyām eva vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:37188: daṇḍavyavasargayoḥ gamyamānayoḥ pādaśatāntasya prātipadikasya saṅkhyādeḥ vunpratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:37242: sāmivacane upapade ktāntāt kanpratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37250: evaṃ tarhi na+eva ayam anatyantagatau vihitasya kanaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:37254: etad eva jñāpakaṃ bhavati svārthe kan iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37257: etair hi bahutarakaṃ vyāpyate ity evam ādi,
GS24jvkasipu:37264: bṛhatīśabdād ācchādane vartamānāt svārthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37271: aṣaḍakṣa āśitaṅgu alagkarma alampuruṣa ity etebhyaḥ adhyuttarapadāt ca svārthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37276: yo dvābhyam eva kriyate na bahubhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37280: alampuruṣaḥ iti paryādayo glānadyarthe caturthyā iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37297: añcatyantāt prātipadikāt adikṣtriyāṃ vartamānāt svārthe vibhāṣā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37311: jātyantāt prātipadikāt bandhuni vartamānāt svārthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37312: badhyate 'smiñ jātiḥ iti bandhuśabdena dravyam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37322: sthānāntāt prātipadikāt vibhāṣā chaḥ pratyayo bhavati sasthānena cet sthānāntamarthavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37337: dvyor vibhāṣayor nityā vidhayaḥ iti pūrvatra nityavidhayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:37341: kima ekārāntāt tiṅantād avyayebhyaś ca yo vihito ghaḥ sa kimettiṅavyayaghaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:37343: yady api dravyasya svataḥ prakarṣo na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:37344: tathā api kriyāguṇasthaḥ prakarṣo yadā dravye upacaryate tadā 'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37361: kimettiṅavyayaghād adravyaprakarṣe amu pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:37378: tadantāt svārthe añ pratyayo bhavati striyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:37384: evaṃ tarhy etaj jñāpayati - svārthikāḥ pratyayā prakṛtito liṅgavacanānyativartante 'pi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37387: deva eva devatā ity evam ādi upapannaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37392: vihitaḥ, tadantāt svārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37399: visārinśabdāt svārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati matsye 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:37406: saṅkhyāśabdebhyaḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane vartamānebhyaḥ svārthe kṛtvasuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37429: akriyamāṇe gaṇanagrahaṇe kriyābhyāvṛttau vartamānebhyaḥ saṅkhyeyavacanebhya eva pratyayaḥ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:37431: iha na syāt, śataṃ vārāṇāṃ bhuṅkte iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:37438: dvi tri catur ity etebhyaḥ saṅkhyāśabdebhyaḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane vartamānebhyaḥ suc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37447: ekaśabdasya sakṛt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati suc ca pratyayaḥ kriyāgaṇena /
GS24jvkasipu:37452: ekaḥ pākaḥ ity atra na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:37457: bahuśabdāt kriyābhyāvṛtigaṇane vartamānāt vibhāṣā dhā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37472: prathamāsamarthāt prakṛtopādhike 'rthe vartamānāt svārthe mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37478: tad iti prathamāsamarthāt prakṛtavacane 'bhidheye mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37488: bahusu prakṛteṣu ucyamānesu samūhavat pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37496: dvitīye sūtrārthe - modakāḥ prakṛtāḥ asmin yajñe maudakiko yajñaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:37513: devatāśabdāntāt prātipadikāt caturthīsamarthāt tādarthe yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37524: pādārghaśabdābhyāṃ caturthīsamarthābhyāṃ tādarthye abhidheye yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37542: yaviṣṭha ity etebhyaḥ chandasi svārthe yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37591: atithiśabdāt caturthisamarthāt tādarthye abhidheye ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37608: yāva ity evam ādibhyaḥ svārthe kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37633: lohitaśabdāt maṇau vartamānāt svārthe kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37639: anitye varṇe vartamānāt lohitaśabdāt svārthe kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37664: kālaśabdāt anitye vartamānāt rakte ca kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37672: vinaya ity evam ādibhyaḥ svārthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37696: vyāhṛtaḥ prakāśito 'rtho yasyāstasyāṃ vāci vartamānād vācśabdāt svārthe ṭhakpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37706: tadabhidhāyinaḥ karmaśabdāt svārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37708: vācikaṃ śrutvā tathaiva yat karma kriyate tat kārmaṇam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37744: prajña ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ svārthe aṇpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37747: yasya astu prajñā vidyate sā prājñā prajñā-śraddhā-arcā-vṛttibhyo ṇaḥ (*5,2.101) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37751: ity ata eva jñāpakāt pākṣiko vasvādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37799: praśaṃsopādhike 'rthe vartamānān mṛcchabdāt sa sna ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37808: vṛka-jyeṣṭhābhyāṃ praśaṃsopādhike 'rthe vartamānābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam til-tātilau pratyayau bhavataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:37815: bahvarthāt alpārthāc ca kārakābhidhāyinaḥ śabdāt śaspratyayo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:37833: yatra maṅgalaṃ gamyate tatra ayaṃ pratyaya isyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37839: saṅkhyāvācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ekavacanāc ca vīpsāyāṃ dyotyāyāṃ śaspratyayo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:37842: ekavacanāt khalv api - kārṣāpaṇaṃ kārṣāpaṇaṃ dadāti karṣāpaṇaśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37846: kārṣāpaṇādayaś ca parimāṇaśabdāḥ vṛttāvekārthā eva bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37858: pratinā karmapravacanīyena yoge yā pañcamī vihitā tadantāt tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37872: apādāne yā pañcamī tasyāḥ pañcamyāḥ vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:37873: tac ced apādānaṃ hīyaruhoḥ sambandhi na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37885: kathaṃ mantro hīnaḥ svarato varṇato vā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37888: svareṇa varṇena vā hīnaḥ ity arthaḥ // [#569]
GS24jvkasipu:37896: atigrahādiviṣaye yā tṛtīyā tadantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:37900: suṣṭhuvṛttavān anyān atikramya vṛttena gṛhyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37901: avyathane - vṛttena na vyathate vṛttato na vyathate /
GS24jvkasipu:37902: cāritreṇa na vyathate cāritrato na vyathate /
GS24jvkasipu:37913: hīyamānena pāpena ca yogo yasya tad vācinaḥ śabdāt parā yā tṛtīyā vibhaktir akartari tadantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37918: kṣepasya ca avivakṣāyāṃ tat tv ākhyāyām idam udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:37926: vyāśraye gamyamāne ṣaṣṭhyantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37938: tad vācinaḥ śabdād yā ṣaṣthī vibhaktiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:37939: tadantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati apanayane gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:37952: kāraṇasya vikārarūpeṇa abhūtasya tadātmanā bhāvaḥ abhūtatadbhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37954: sampadyakartari vartamānāt prātipadikāt abhūtatadbhāve gamyamāne kṛbhvastibhir dhātubhir yoge cviḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37977: aruḥprabhrtīnām antasya lopo bhavati cviś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38002: abhūtatadbhāve kṛbhvastiyoge sampadyakartari iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:38003: asmin viṣaye vibhāṣa sātiḥ prayayo bhavati kārtsnye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:38004: yadi prakrtiḥ kṛtsnāṃ vikārātmatāmāpadyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38017: abhividhau gamyamāne cviviṣaye sātiḥ pratyayo bhavati sampadā yoge,
GS24jvkasipu:38020: sa tu kṛbhvastibhir eva yoge bhavati, na sampadā /
GS24jvkasipu:38029: yatra+ekadeśena api sarvā prakṛtir vikāram āpadyate so 'bhividhiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:38030: yathā+asyāṃ senāyām utpātena sarvaṃ śastram agnisātsampadyate,
GS24jvkasipu:38032: kārtsnyaṃ tu sarvātmanā dravyasya vikārarūpāpattau bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:38043: svāmiviśeṣavācinaḥ prātipadikāt īśitavye 'bhidheye sātiḥ pratyayo bhavati kṛbhvastibhiḥ sampadā ca yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:38059: cakārāt sātiś ca kṛbhvastibhiḥ sampadā ca yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:38061: tad yadā teṣā samarpaṇena tadadhīnaṃ kriyate tadātrā pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38074: devādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ dvitīyāsaptamyantebhyaḥ trā pratyayo bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:38090: yatra dhvanāvakārādayo varṇā viśeṣarūpeṇa na vyajyante so 'vhyaktaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38094: yasya apakarṣe kriyamāṇe suṣṭhu nyūnamardhaṃ dvyackaṃ sampadyate,
GS24jvkasipu:38095: tasmād avyaktānukaraṇād anitiparāḍ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati / [#572]
GS24jvkasipu:38098: yasya ca dvirvacane kṛte dvyajavarārdhaṃ tataḥ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38099: ḍāci bahulaṃ dve bhavataḥ iti viṣayasaptamī /
GS24jvkasipu:38100: ḍāci vivakṣite dvirvacanam eva pūrvaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:38127: dvitīya-tṛtīyādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ kṛṣāvabhidheyāyāṃ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:38130: dvitīyaṃ karṣaṇaṃ vilekhanaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38133: anulomakṛṣṭaṃ kṣetraṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ kṛṣati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38135: saha bījena vilehanaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38143: saṅkhyāvācinaḥ śabdasya gunaśabdo 'nte samīpe yatra sambhavati sā saṅkhyā guṇāntā ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38144: tādṛśāt prātipadikāt kṛṣāvabhidheyāyāṃ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:38145: dviguṇaṃ vilekhanaṃ karoti kṣetrasya dviguṇākaroti kṣetram /
GS24jvkasipu:38156: samayaśabdād yāpanāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:38167: sapatra-niṣpatra-śabdābhyām ativyathane ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge sati /
GS24jvkasipu:38170: sapatraṃ śaramasya śarīre praveśayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38180: niṣkulaśabdāt niṣkoṣane vartamānāt kṛño yoge ḍāc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38189: sukha-priya-śabdābhyām ānulomye vartamānābhyāṃ kṛño yoge ḍāc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38195: sukhaṃ priyaṃ vā kurvann apy ānulomye 'vasthita evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38203: duḥkhaśabdāt prātipadikāt prātilomye gamyamāne ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:38213: śūlaśabdāt pākaviṣaye ḍāc pratyayo bhavti kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:38222: satyaśabdāt aśapathe ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:38235: madraśabdāt parivāpaṇe ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:38247: āpādaparisamāpteḥ ye pratyayāḥ vihitās te samāsāntāvayavā ekadeśāḥ bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:38252: na avyayībhāvāt ity eṣa vidhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:38263: tatpuruṣe tulyārtha ity eṣa svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38271: yān śabdān upādāya samāsāntā vidhīyante rāja-ahaḥ-sakhibhyaṣ ṭac (*5,4.91)
GS24jvkasipu:38273: yadā te pūjanāt pūjanavacanāt pare bhavanti tadā samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38282: bahuvrīhau sakthyakṣṇoḥ ity evam ādau pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38291: kṣepe yaḥ kiṃśabdaḥ tataḥ parasya samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38303: nañaḥ pare vakṣyamāṇā ye rājādayas tadantāt tatpuruṣāt samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38313: tadantāt tatpuruṣāt samāsānto vibhāṣā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38319: saṅkhyeye yo bahuvrīhir vartate tasmād abahu-gaṇa-antāt ḍac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38320: saṅkhyayāvyayāsanna iti yo bahuvrīhiḥ tasya+idaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:38345: ṛk pur ap dhur pathin ity evam antānāṃ samāsānām akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati samāsānto 'kṣe na /
GS24jvkasipu:38348: akṣesambandhinī yā dhūḥ tadantasya na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38369: bahvṛkkaṃ sūktam ity atra na bhavati // [#576]
GS24jvkasipu:38374: prati anu ava ity evaṃ pūrvāt sāmāntāt lomāntāt ca samāsād ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38382: godāvaryāś ca nadyāś ca saṅkhyāyā uttare yadi //
GS24jvkasipu:38389: bhūmer api saṅkhyāpūrvāyāḥ ac pratyaya iṣyate - dvibhūmaḥ prāsādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38391: daśabhūmakaṃ sutram anyatra api ca dṛśyate - padmanābhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38396: tad etat sarvam iha yogavibhāgaṃ kṛtvā sādhayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:38401: darśanād anyatra yo 'kṣiśabdaḥ tadantāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38418: samāse vyavasthā api nipātanād eva pratipattavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:38420: adṛśyāni avidyamānāni vā catvāri yasya so 'caturaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38450: niḥśreyaskaḥ puruṣaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38454: tato dvigū - dve āyuṣī samāhṛte dvyāyuṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:38458: tato dvandvaḥ - ṛk ca yajuś ca ṛgyajuṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:38476: brahmahastibhyāṃ paro yo varcaḥśabdas tadantāt samāsād ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38485: ava sam andha ity etebhyo yaḥ paraḥ tamasśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38492: śvasaḥ parau yau vasīyas-śreyas-śabdau tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38496: svabhāvāc ca+iha śvaḥśabdaḥ uttarapadārthasya praśaṃsāmāśīr viṣayām ācaśṭe,
GS24jvkasipu:38498: śobhanaṃ śreyas te bhūyāt ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38504: anu ava tapta ity etebhyaḥ paro yo rahasśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsād ac pratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38511: prateḥ paro ya urasśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:38531: dvistāvā tristāvā iti vediś ced abhidheyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38535: yāvatī prakṛtau vediḥ tato dviguṇā vā triguṇā vā kasyāṃcid vikṛtau tatra+idaṃ nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:38544: upasargāt paro yo 'dhvanśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38555: aṅguliśabdāntasya tatpuruṣasya saṅkhyādeḥ avyayādeś ca ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38571: aharādibhyaḥ paro yo rātriśabdaḥ tadantasya tatpuruṣasya ac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:38582: saṅkhyāvyāyadeḥ khalv api - dve rātrī samāhṛte dvirātraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38591: tasmin parabhūte ahan ity etasya ahnaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati etebhya uttarasya /
GS24jvkasipu:38608: saṅkhyādes tatpuruṣasya samāhāre vartamānasya ahaḥśabdasya ahnādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38615: taddhitārtha iti samāse kṛte aṇaḥ āgatasya dvigor lug anapatye (*4,1.88) iti luk //
GS24jvkasipu:38619: uttamaikābhyāṃ ca parasya ahnaḥ ity ayam ādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38621: puṇyagrahaṇam eva na kṛtam vaicitryārtham puṇyāhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38623: kecit tu upottamasya api pratipattyarthaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:38624: tena saṅkhyātaśabdād api parasya na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:38630: rājan ahan sakhi ity evam antāt prātipadikāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38640: laghvakṣarasya pūrvanipāte prāpte rājaśabdasya savarṇadīrghārthaṃ prathamaṃ prayogaṃ kurvann etad jñāpayati yasya akāreṇa savarṇadīrghatvaṃ sambhavati tasya+idaṃ grahaṇam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:38645: sa cet tapuruṣas taddhita-lug-viṣayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38654: ity āgatasya ārhīyasya ṭhako 'dhyardhapūrvād dvigoḥ iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:38680: anas aśman ayas saras ity evam antāt tatpurusāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati jātau sañjñāyān ca viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:38696: grāmakauṭābhyāṃ paro yaḥ takṣanśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38702: na kasya cit pratibaddhaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38708: atiśabdāt paraḥ yaḥ śvanśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38718: upamānavācī yaḥ śvanśabdo 'prāṇiṣu vartate tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38729: uttara mṛga pūrva ity etebhyaḥ paro yaḥ sakthiśabdaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:38731: tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38735: upamānāt khalv api - phalakam iva sakthi phalakasaktham //
GS24jvkasipu:38739: nauśabdāntāt dvigoḥ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38753: ardhaśabdāt paro yo nauśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38762: dvigoḥ, ardhac ca iti dvayam apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:38763: khārīśabdāntāt dvigor ardhāc ca paro yaḥ khārīśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:38772: dvitribhyāṃ paro yo 'ñjaliśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38785: annantāt asantāt ca napuṃsakaliṅgāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:38802: brahmanśabdānatāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsena ced brahmaṇo jānapadatvam ākhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38804: yasya tatpruṣasya janapadaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ tasmād etat pratyayavidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:38813: kumahadbhyāṃ paro yo brahmā tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:38848: śarat ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ṭac pratyayo bhavati avyayībhāve /
GS24jvkasipu:38854: ye 'tra jñayantaḥ paṭhyante teṣāṃ nityārthaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:38884: annantād avyayībhāvāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38894: annantaṃ yad napuṃsakaṃ tadantād avyayībhāvāt anyatarasyāṃ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38902: nadī paurṇamāsī āgrahāyaṇī ity evam antād avyayībhāvāt anyatarasyāṃ ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38912: jñayantād avyayībhāvād anyatarasyām ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38918: giriśabdāntāt avyayībhāvāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati senakasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:38927: svāṅgavācī yaḥ sakthiśabdaḥ akṣiśabdaś ca tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ ṣac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38947: tatra yasmin pakṣe na asty udāttatvaṃ tatra ṅīpi sati udāttanivṛttisvarasya abhāvād anudāttaḥ śrūyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:38953: aṅguliśabdāntād bahuvrīheḥ ṣac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ dāruṇi samāsārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:38958: yasya tu dve aṅgulī pramāṇam dāruṇaḥ tatra taddhitārtha iti samāse iṛte tatpruṣasya aṅguleḥ ity acā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:38964: dvitribhyāṃ paro yo mūrdhanśabdaḥ tadantād bahuvrīheḥ ṣapratyayaḥ bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38974: pūraṇyanatāt pramāṇyantāt ca bhuvrīheḥ ap pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38975: kalyāṇī pañcamī āsāṃ rātrīṇāṃ tāḥ kalyāṇīpañcamā rātrayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38980: yatra anyapadārthe pūraṇī anupraviśati na kevalaṃ vartipadārtha eva,
GS24jvkasipu:38984: kalyāṇī pañcamī asmin pakṣe kalyāṇapañcamīkaḥ pakṣaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38987: mṛgo netā āsāṃ rātrīṇām mṛganetrā rātrayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39002: antar bahis ity etābhyāṃ paro yo lomanśabdaḥ tadantād bahuvrīheḥ ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39006: añ nāsikāyāḥ sañjñāyāṃ nasaṃ ca asthūlāt // PS_5,4.118 //
GS24jvkasipu:39011: na cet sthūlaśabdāt parā nāsikā bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39032: upasargāt paro yo nāsikāśabdaḥ tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ ac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:39045: anyad api ca ṭilopādikaṃ nipātanād eva siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:39058: nañ dus su ity etebhyaḥ parau yau hali-sakthi-śabdau tadantad bahuvrīher anyatarasyām ac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39075: nañ dus su ity etebhyaḥ parau yau prajā-medhā-śabdau tadantād bahuvrīheḥ nityam asic pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39084: evaṃ tarhi nityagrahaṇād anyatra api bhavati iti sūcyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39097: kevalād yo dharmaśabdaḥ tadantād bahuvrīheḥ anic pratyayo bhavati samāsantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39104: evaṃ tarhi kevalāt iti pūrvapadaṃ nirdiśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:39105: kevalāt padād yo dharmaśabdo na padasamudāyāt,
GS24jvkasipu:39111: bahuvrīhau samāse svādibhyaḥ paraṃ jambhā iti kṛtasamāsāntam uttarapadaṃ nipātyate jambhaśabdaḥ abhyavahāryavacī dantaviśeṣavācī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:39118: soma iva jambhaḥ asya iti vigrahītavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39124: dakṣiṇermā iti kṛtasmāsāntaḥ nipātyate bahuvrīhau samāse lubdhayoge /
GS24jvkasipu:39127: dakṣiṇam aṅgaṃ vraṇitam asya vyādhena ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39133: karmavyatihāre yo bahuvrīhiḥ tasmād ic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39136: keśesu keśesu gṛhītvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ keśākeśi /
GS24jvkasipu:39138: mṛsalaiś ca musalaiś ca prahṛtya idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ musalāmusali /
GS24jvkasipu:39144: dvidaṇḍyādayaḥ śabdāḥ ic pratyayāntāḥ sādhavo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39145: dvidaṇḍyādibhyaḥ iti tādarthye eṣā caturthī, na pañcamī /
GS24jvkasipu:39146: dvidaṇḍyādyartham ic pratyayo bhavati tathā bhavati yathā dvidaṇḍyādayaḥ siddyanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39154: prohya pādau hastinaṃ vāhayati prodyapādi hastinaṃ vāhayati /
GS24jvkasipu:39182: pra sam ity etābhyām uttarasya jānuśabdasya jñurādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau /
GS24jvkasipu:39188: ūrdhvaśabdād uttarasya jānuśabdasya vibhāṣā jñuḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39194: ūdhasśabdāntasya bahuvrīheḥ anaṅ ādeśo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39195: kuṇḍam iva ūdhaḥ asyāḥ sā kuṇdodhnī /
GS24jvkasipu:39211: dhanuḥśabdāntād bahuvrīher anḍādeśo vā bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:39227: ut pūti su surabhi ity etebhyaḥ parasya gandhaśabdasya ikārādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:39236: tena śobhanaḥ gandhaḥ asya sugandhaḥ āpaṇikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:39240: alpākhyāyāṃ yogandhaśabdaḥ tasya ikārādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:39248: upamānāt paro yo gandhaśabdaḥ tasya ikārādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:39256: upamānāt ihastyādivarjitāt parasya pādaśabdasya lopo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:39276: pādasya lopo bhavati kumbhapadyādiviṣaye yathā kumbhapadyādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39278: samudāyapāṭhasya ca prayojanaṃ viṣayaniyamaḥ - striyām eva,
GS24jvkasipu:39282: yac ca iha upamānapūrvaṃ saṅkhyāpūrvaṃ ca paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:39314: saṅkhyāpūrvasya supūrvasya ca bahuvrīheḥ pādaśabdāntasya lopo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39322: tasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati samāsāntaḥ vayasi gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:39327: śobhanā dantāḥ asya samastāḥ jātāḥ sudan kumāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39334: chandasi ca dantaśadasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati samāsāntaḥ bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:39340: striyām anyapadārthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye dantaśabdasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39348: śyāva aroka ity etābhyāṃ parasya dantaśabdasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā samāsānto bahuvrīhau /
GS24jvkasipu:39360: agrāntāt śabdāt śuddha śubhra vṛṣa varāha ity etebhyaś ca parasya dantaśabdasya vibhāṣā datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:39377: kakudaśabdāntasya bahuvrīher lopo bhavati samāsāntaḥ avasthāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:39378: kālādikṛtā vastudharmā vayaḥprabhṛtayaḥ avasthā ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39394: trikakudi bahuvrīhau kakudaśabdasya lopaḥ samāsānto nipātyate parvate 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:39396: kakudākāraṃ parvatasya śṛṅgaṃ kakudam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39404: ut vi ity etābhyāṃ parasya kākudaśabdasya lopo bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:39411: pūrṇāt parasya kākudaśabdasya vibhāṣā lopo bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:39417: suhṛt durhṛt iti nipātyate yathāsaṅkhyaṃ mitra-amitrayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39418: suśabdāt parasya hṛdayaśabdasya hṛdbhāvo nipātyate bahuvrīhau,
GS24jvkasipu:39432: pumān anaḍvān payaḥ nauḥ lakṣmīḥ iti vibhaktyantāḥ paṭhyante,
GS24jvkasipu:39434: tatra+idaṃ prayojanam - ekavacanāntānām eva grahaṇam iha vijñāyeta,
GS24jvkasipu:39455: innantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo bhavati striyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:39456: bahavo daṇdinaḥ asyāṃ śālāyāṃ bahudaṇdikā śālā /
GS24jvkasipu:39468: nadyantāt bahuvrīheḥ ṛkārāntāt ca kap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39469: bahvyaḥ kumārya asmin deśe bahukumārīkaḥ deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39476: yasmād bahuvrīheḥ samāsānto na vihitaḥ sa śeṣaḥ tasmād vibhāṣā kap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39488: yāvatā vihito 'tra sāmānyena samāsāntaḥ ṛṣpūḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39491: anṛco māṇadako jñeyo bahvṛcaś caraṇākhyāyām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39499: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye bahuvrīhau samāse kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39506: īyasantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39519: vandite 'rthe yo bhrātṛśabdo vartate tadantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39528: ṛvarnāntād bahuvrīheḥ chandasi viṣaye kap pratyayo na bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:39536: svāṅge yau nāḍīt-antrī-śabdau tadantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39546: niṣpravāṇiḥ iti nadīlakṣaṇasya kapaḥ pratiṣedho nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39554: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ padaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:39564: prathamasya iti ca tritayam adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39565: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ prāk saṃprasāraṇavidhānāt tatra ekācaḥ prathamasya dve bhavataḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39567: tatra dhātor avayavayasya anabhyāsasya prathamasya+ekāco dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39573: eko 'c yasya so 'yam ekāc ity avayavena vigrahaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39575: abhyantaraś ca samudāye 'vayavo bhavati iti sāckasya+eva dvirvacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39576: evaṃ ca pac ity atra yena+eva acā samudāyaḥ ekāc,
GS24jvkasipu:39578: tatra pṛthag avayavaikāc na dvir ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:39583: iyāya, āra ity atra ekāctvam api vyapadeśibhāvād eva /
GS24jvkasipu:39586: tena sa eva śabdo dvir ucāryate,
GS24jvkasipu:39587: na ca śabdāntaraṃ tasya sthāne vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:39593: ac ādir yasya dhātoḥ tadavayavasya dvitīyasya ekāco dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39599: tasmin kṛte guṇe ca raparatve ca dvirvacane 'ci (*1,2.59)
GS24jvkasipu:39605: tathā hi - kṅinimittayor guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedho vidhīyamānaḥ śayitā ity atra na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:39606: na hi kāryiṇaḥ śīṅo guṇaṃ prati nimittabhāvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39607: atra kecid ajādeḥ iti karmadhārayāt pañcamīm icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39608: ac ca asau ādiś ca ity ajādiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:39609: tasmāt ajāder uttarasya ekāco dve bhavataḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39615: dvitīyasya ekāco 'vayavabhūtānāṃ ndrāṇāṃ tadantarbhāvāt prāptaṃ dvirvacanaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39616: nakāradakārarephā dvitīyaikāco 'vayavabhūtāḥ saṃyogādayo na dvir udyante /
GS24jvkasipu:39627: kecid ajādeḥ ity api pañcamyantaṃ karmadhārayam anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39630: ajāder anantaratvābhāvād dakāro dvir ucyata eva,
GS24jvkasipu:39636: yadā bakaropadha ubjir upadiśyate tadā ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39639: yakāraparasya rephasya pratiṣedho na bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39644: īrṣyates tṛtīyasya dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39648: apare punaḥ tṛtīyasya ekācaḥ iti vyācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:39650: kaṇḍvādīnāṃ tṛtīyasya+eakāco dve bhavata iti vaktvyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39653: vā nāmadhātūnāṃ tṛtīyasya+ekāc dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39656: apara āha - yathā+iṣṭaṃ nāmadhātuṣv iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39666: dve iti prathamantaṃ yad anuvartate tad arthād iha ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39667: tatra pratyāsatter asmin prakaraṇe ye dve vihite tayor yaḥ pūrvo 'vayavaḥ so 'bhyāsasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39679: ye eve vihite te ubhe api samudite abhyastasañjñe bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39684: nenijati ity atra abhyastānām ādiḥ iti samudāye udāttatvaṃ yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:39685: pratyekaṃ paryāyeṇa vā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39692: jakṣa ity ayaṃ dhātuḥ ity ādayaś ca anye ṣaṭ dhātavaḥ abhyastasañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39694: jakṣa bhakṣahasanyoḥ ity ataḥ prabhṛti vevīṅ vetinā tulye iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:39700: dīdhyate, vevyate ity atra abhyastānām ādiḥ ity eṣa svaraḥ prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:39701: dīdhyat iti ca śatari vyatyayena sampādite na abhyastāc chatuḥ (*7,1.78)
GS24jvkasipu:39708: tujer dīrgho 'bhyāsasya na vihitaḥ, dṛśyate ca /
GS24jvkasipu:39716: sa tūtāva dīrghaś ca+eṣāṃ chandasi pratyayaviśeṣe eva dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:39722: liṭi parato 'nabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya+ekāco dvitīyasya vā yathāyogaṃ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39726: vācya ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvaḥ iti vacanād ūrṇoteḥ ijādeḥ iti ām na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39730: sasṛvāṃso viśṛṇvire ima indrāya sunvire anabhyāsasya iti kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:39743: sanantasya yaṅantasya ca anabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya+ekāco dvitīyasya vā yathāyogaṃ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39758: ślau parataḥ anabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya+ekāco dvitiyasya vā yathāyogaṃ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39765: caṅi parato 'nabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya ekāco dvitīyasya vā yathāyogam dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39774: tathā ca sanvallaghuni caṅpare iti sanvadbhāvo vidhīyamāno hrasvasya sthānivadbhāvān na pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39775: yo hy anādiṣṭād acaḥ pūrvaḥ tasya vidhiṃ prati sthānivadbhāvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39776: na ca asmin kāryāṇāṃ krameṇāniṣṭād acaḥ pūrvo 'bhyāso bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39782: dāśvān sāhvān mīḍvān ity ete śadāḥ chandasi bhāṣāyām ca aviśeṣeṇa nipāyane /
GS24jvkasipu:39783: dāśvān iti dāśṛ dāne ity etasya dhātoḥ kvasau advirvacanam aniṭtvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39786: sāhvān iti ṣaha marṣaṇe ity etasya parasmaipadam,
GS24jvkasipu:39790: mīḍvān iti miha secane ity etasya advirvacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:39795: kṛñādīnāṃ ke dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39798: kṛñaḥ klideś ca ghañarthe kavidhānam iti kaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39800: carādīnāṃ dhātūnām api pratyaye parataḥ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39803: halādiśeṣe hi sayāgamasya ādeśasya ca viśeṣo na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:39812: vado manuṣyaḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39814: hanter aci pratyaye parato dve bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:39819: pāṭer ṇiluk cok ca dīrghaś ca abhyāsasya /
GS24jvkasipu:39820: pāṭer aci parato dve bhavato ṇiluk ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39821: abhyāsasya ca ūgāgamo dīrghaś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39826: putra pati ity etasyor uttarapadayos tatpuruṣe samāse ṣyaṅaḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39827: yaṇaḥ sthāne ig bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39837: tadantāt striyām aṇ-iñor annarṣayor gurūpattamayoḥ ṣyaṅ gotre (*4,1.78)
GS24jvkasipu:39838: iti ṣyaṅ, tataś ca api vihite ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:39848: kārīṣagandhyā patir asya grāmasya kārīṣagandhyāpatiḥ ayaṃ grāmaḥ / [#599]
GS24jvkasipu:39850: ṣyaṅaḥ iti strīpratyayagrahaṇaṃ na strīpratyaye cānupasarjane iti pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣayā yasmāt sa vihitaḥ tadādeḥ ity eṣa niyamo na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:39862: ṣyaṅante ca yady apy anye yaṇaḥ santi,
GS24jvkasipu:39865: samprasāraṇam iti cādhikriyate vibhāṣā pareḥ (*6,1.44) iti yāvat // [#599]
GS24jvkasipu:39871: bandhuśabde uttarapade bahuvrīhau samāse ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39884: ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati vibhāṣayā bahuvrīhāv eva /
GS24jvkasipu:39885: kārīṣagandhyā mātā asya ity evaṃ bahuvrīhau kṛte etasmād eva upasaṅkhyānāt pakṣe matṛśabdasya mātajādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39903: yajādayaḥ - yaja devapūjāsaṃgatikaranadānesu ity ataḥ prabhṛti āgaṇāntāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39904: teṣāṃ vacisv api yajādīnāṃ kiti pratyaye parataḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati / [#600]
GS24jvkasipu:39941: bhrasja pāke ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ ṅīti pratyaye parataḥ cakārāt kati ca saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39951: halaḥ (*6,4.2) iti samprasāraṇadīrghe kṛte pvādīnāṃ iti hrasvaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39952: vayi - liṭi parataḥ veño vayiḥ ādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:39961: tatra yathā+eva sthānivadbhāvād vyervidhiḥ evaṃ pratiṣedho 'pi prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:39964: iti yakārasya saṃprasāraṇapratiṣedhād vayervidhau grahaṇaṃ pratiṣedhe cāgrahaṇamanumāsyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:39966: eṣa eva arthaḥ sākṣān nirdeśena vyeḥ spaṣṭīkriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39980: tena sarvatra añṇiti pratyaye samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:39990: tatra ṣtvaṃ prati natvasya siddhatvād jñalādir niṣṭhā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39991: kutve tu kartavye tad asiddham eva iti pravartate kutvam /
GS24jvkasipu:40012: ubhayeṣāṃ vacyādīnāṃ grahyādīnāṃ ca liṭi parato 'bhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40034: vṛścateḥ satyasati vā yoge na asti viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40035: yogārambhe tu sati yadi samprasāraṇam akṛtvā halādiśeṣeṇa repho nivartyate,
GS24jvkasipu:40037: atha rephasya samprasāraṇaṃ kṛtvā uradatvaṃ raparatvaṃ ca kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:40038: tadānī - muradatvasya sthānivadbhāvāt na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam (*6,1.37)
GS24jvkasipu:40039: iti pratiṣedho bhavati ity asti viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40044: kiti hi paratvād dhātoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānād dvirvacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:40046: adhikārād eva+ubhayeṣāṃ grahaṇe siddhe punar ubhayeṣām iti vacanaṃ halādiḥ śeṣam api bādhitvā samprasāraṇam eva yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:40063: ṅiti iti kevalam iha anuvartate ity etad durvijñānam // [#602]
GS24jvkasipu:40072: vyeñ saṃvaraṇe ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ yaṅi parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40081: vaśerdhātor yaṅi parataḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40090: cāyṛ pūjāniśāmanayoḥ ity etasya dhātoḥ yagi parataḥ kī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40097: sphāyī opyāyī vṛddhau ity asay dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ sphī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40101: sphātībhavati ity etad api ktinnantasya+eva rūpaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:40103: niṣṭhāyām ity etad adhīkrīyate liṅyaṅoś ca (*6,1.29)
GS24jvkasipu:40112: dvayor apy etayoḥ dhātvoḥ styārūpamāpannayoḥ sāmānyena grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:40113: styā ity asya prapūrvasya dhātor niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40124: prastyaḥ ity eva siddhe pūrvagrahaṇam iha api ythā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:40127: tat kathaṃ prapūrvasya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe bahuvrīhiḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:40128: praḥ pūrvo yasya dhātūpasargasamudāyasya sa prapūrvaḥ tadavayavasya styaḥ iti vyadhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyau /
GS24jvkasipu:40129: tatra prasaṃstītaḥ ity atra api prapūrvasamudāyāvayavaḥ styāśabdo bhavati // [#603]
GS24jvkasipu:40135: sparśe vartamānasya śyaiṅ gatau ity asya dhātor niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40144: guṇamātre tadvati ca asya śītaśabdasya vṛttir draṣṭavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:40151: prater uttarasya śyāyater niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ samprasaraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40154: dravamūrtisparśābhyām anyatra api yathā syāt iti sūtrārambhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:40159: abhi ava ity evaṃ pūrvasya śyāyater niṣthāyāṃ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40174: samavaśyānam ity atra mā bhūt iti kecid vyacakṣate ,
GS24jvkasipu:40175: nakilāyam abhyavapūrvaḥ samudāyaḥ iti yo 'tra abhyavapūrvaḥ samudāyastadāśrayo viklapaḥ kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:40177: yadi tu na+iṣyate tato yatnānataramāstheyam asmād vihbāṣāvijñānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40184: śrā pāke ity etasya dhātoḥ ṇyantasya aṇyantasya ca pāke 'bhidheye ktapratyaye parataḥ śṛbhāvo nipātyate vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:40189: anyatra na bhavati śrāṇā yavāgūḥ śrapitā yavāgūḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:40190: yadā api bāhye prayojake dvitīyo ṇic utpadyate tadā api niṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:40192: śrātir ayam akarmakaḥ karmakartṛviṣayasya pacer arthe vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:40194: tad atra dvayor api śṛtam iti iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40204: opyāyī vṛddhau ity asya dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyāṃ vibhāṣā pī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40219: pyāyaḥ pī (*6,1.28) ity etat caśabdena anukṛṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40220: liṭi yaṅi ca parataḥ pyāyaḥ pī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40222: paratvāt pībhāve kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt dvirvacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:40232: liṭi yaṅi ca śvayater dhātoḥ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40236: tad atra yaṅi samprasāraṇam aprāptaṃ vibhāṣa vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40237: liṭi tu kiti yajāditvāt nityaṃ prāptaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:40238: tatra sarvatravikalpo bhavati ity eṣā ubhayatravibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:40239: yadā ca dhātor na bhavati tadā liṭy abhyāsasya+ubhayeṣām (*6,1.17)
GS24jvkasipu:40246: sanpare caṅpare ca ṇau parataḥ śvayater dhātoḥ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40249: samprasāraṇaṃ samprasāraṇāśrayaṃ ca balīyo bhavati iti vacanād antaraṅgam api vṛddhyādikaṃ samprasāraṇena bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40250: kṛte tu saṃprasāraṇe vṛddhir āvādeśaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:40252: ity etad vacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ ṇau kṛtasthānivadbhāvasya,
GS24jvkasipu:40259: sanpare caṅpare ca nau parato hvaḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40266: samprasāraṇam iti vartamāne punaḥ samprasāraṇam ity uktaṃ vibhāṣā ity asya nivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:40267: hvaḥ samprasāraṇam abhyastasya ity ekayogena siddhe pṛthagyogakaranam anabhyastanimittapratyayavyavadhāne samprasāraṇābhāvajñāpanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:40278: tena abhyastakāraṇasya hvayatiḥ prāg eva dvirvacanāt samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40286: chandasi viṣaye hvayater dhātor bahulaṃ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40289: hveño laṭi ātmanepadottamaikavacane bahulaṃ chandasi iti śapo luki kṛte samprasāraṇamuvaṅādeśaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:40297: cāyater dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ kī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40306: apaspṛdhethām iti spardha saṅgharṣe ity asya laṅi āthāmi dvivarcanaṃ rephasya saṃprasāraṇam akāralopaś ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40309: apara āha - spardheḥ apapūrvasya liṅi āthāmi samprasaraṇam akāralopaś ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40315: arha pūjāyam ity anayor dhātvoliṭyusi samprasāraṇam akāralopaś ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40326: cyuṅ gatau ity asya dhātoḥ liti seśabde abhyāsaya samprasāraṇam aniṭ ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40330: tyaja hānau ity asay dhātoḥ liṭi abhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40334: śrīñ pāke ity etasya dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyāṃ śrābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40342: somād anyatra kvacid ekasminn api śrābhāvo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40344: tasya śrātāḥ iti bahuvacanasya avivakṣitatvād upasaṃgraho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40346: tasya+eva śrīṇāter āṅpūrvasya kvipi niṣṭhāyāṃ ca śīrādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:40354: samprasārane parataḥ pūrvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40358: ekayogalakṣanam api samprasāraṇam ata eva vacanāt prathamaṃ parasya yaṇaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:40360: samprasāraṇam iti vartamāne punaḥ samprasāranagrahaṇaṃ videśasthasya api samprasāraṇasya pratiṣedho yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:40363: samprasāraṇagrahaṇasāmarthyāt eva pūrvasya pratiṣedhe vaktavye svarṇadīrghatvam ekādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40366: ṛci parataḥ treḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati uttarapadād ilopaś ca chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:40367: tisra ṛcaḥ yasmin tat tṛcaṃ sūktam /
GS24jvkasipu:40374: rayiśabdasya chandasi viṣaye matau parato bahulaṃ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40383: liṭi parato vayo yakārasya samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40387: vaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ kiti // PS_6,1.39 //
GS24jvkasipu:40389: asya vayo yakārasya kiti liṭi parato vakārādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:40398: veñ tantusantāne ity asya dhātoḥ liti parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40400: kiti yajāditvāt dhātoḥ prāptam akityapi liṭy abhyāsasya+ubhayeṣām (*6,1.17)
GS24jvkasipu:40407: lyapi ca parto veñaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40415: jyā vayohānau ity asya dhātoḥ lyapi parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40422: vyeñ saṃvaraṇe ity etasya dhātoḥ lyapi parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40429: lyapi ca vyaś ca iti anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:40430: parer uttarasya vyeñ ity etasya dhātoḥ lyapi parataḥ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40432: samprasāraṇe kṛte parapūrvatve ca hrasvasya iti tuka prāpnoti, sa halaḥ (*6,4.2)
GS24jvkasipu:40439: ejanto yo dhātur upadeśe tasya akārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:40455: śakāra id yasya so 'yaṃ śit iti,
GS24jvkasipu:40458: tatra yasmin vidhistadādāvalgrahaṇe iti śidādau pratyaye pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40461: tena etad āttvam anaimittikaṃ prāg eva pratyayotpatter bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:40467: ity evam ādi siddham bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:40472: vyeñ ity etasya dhātoḥ liṭi parata ākārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40483: sphura sphula calane ity etayor dhātvoḥ ecaḥ sthāne ghañi parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40493: iṅ adhyayane ji jaye ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ ecaḥ sthāne ṇau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40502: ṣidhu hiṃsāsamrādhyoḥ ity asya dhātoḥ apāralaukike 'rthe vartamānasya ecaḥ sthāne ṇau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40508: atra hi sidhyatiḥ pāralaukike jñānaviśeṣe vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:40511: sa ca jñānaviśeṣaḥ utpannaḥ paraloke janmāntare phalam abhyudayalakṣaṇam upasaṃharan paralokaprayojano bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40517: na punaḥ siddhir eva iti na ātvaṃ paryudasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40518: sakṣāt paralokaprayojane ca sidhyarthe kṛtavakāśaṃ vacanam evaṃ viṣayaṃ na avagāhate /
GS24jvkasipu:40520: ṣidha gatyām ity asya bhauvādikasya nivṛttyarthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:40528: dīṅ kṣaye ity eteṣaṃ dhātūnāṃ lyapi viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:40529: cakārād ecaśca viṣaye upadeśe eva prāk pratyayotpatteḥ alo 'nyasya sthāne ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40542: upadeśe eva ātvavidhānād ivarṇāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40553: tayoḥ ubhayoḥ api yakā nirdeśaḥ smaryate /
GS24jvkasipu:40554: līyater dhatoḥ lyapi ca ecaśca viṣaye upadeśe eva alo 'ntyasya sthāne vibhāṣā ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40571: evaṃ ca pralambhanaśālīnīkaranayoś ca ṇau nityamāttvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:40579: khida dainye ity asya dhātoḥ ecaḥ sthāne chandasi viṣaye vibhāṣā ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40587: gurī udyamane ity asya dhātoḥ apapūrasya ṇamuli parataḥ ecaḥ sthāne vibhāṣā ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40592: asyapagoram yudhyante ity atra dvitīyāyāṃ ca (*3,4.56) iti ṇamul //
GS24jvkasipu:40596: ciñ sphura ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ ṇau parataḥ ecaḥ sthāne vibhāṣa ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40604: vī gatiprajanakāntyasanakhādaneṣu ity asya dhātoḥ prajane vartamānasya ṇau parataḥ vibhāṣā ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40618: tatra vartamānasya ñibhī bhaye ity asya dhātoḥ ṇau parataḥ vibhāṣā ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40627: libhiyoḥ īkārapraśleṣanirdeśād īkārāntasya bhiyaḥ ṣuk vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40638: ṣmiṅ īṣaddhasane ity asya dhātoḥ hetubhaye 'rthe ṇau parato nityamakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40645: na hi mukhye bhaye smayater vṛttir asti // [#611]
GS24jvkasipu:40651: dṛśir prekṣaṇe ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ jñalādāvakiti pratyaye parataḥ am āgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40667: dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatprataye kāryavijñānād iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:40675: upadeśe 'nudāttasya dhātoḥ ṛkāropadhasya jñalādāvakiti pratyaye parato 'nyatarasyām amāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40687: vṛhū udyamane ity ayam udāttopadeśaḥ ūditvāccāsyeḍ vikalopyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40697: śīrṣan iti śabdāntaraṃ śiraḥśabdena samānārthaṃ chandasi viṣaye nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:40700: śīrṣṇā hi tatra somaṃ krītaṃ haranti /
GS24jvkasipu:40708: sa katham ? taddhite iti hi paraṃ nimittam upādīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:40710: yakārādau taddhite parataḥ śiraḥśabdasya śīrṣannādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40726: śjādau taddhite śirasaḥ śīrṣaśabdaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40732: hāstiśīrṣiśabdāt striyām iño 'ṇ-iñor anārṣayoḥ ṣyaṅādeśe kṛte śīrṣasya śiraḥśabdagrahaṇena grahaṇāt śīrṣannādeśaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:40733: tatra prakṛtibhāve sati hāstiśīrṣaṇyā ity aniṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40741_0: pāda danta nāsikā māsa hṛdaya niśā asṛj yūṣa doṣa yakṛt śakṛt udaka āsana ity eteṣāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:40741_1: śabdānāṃ sthāne śasprabhṛtipratyayeṣu parataḥ pad dat nas mās hṛd niś asan yūṣan
GS24jvkasipu:40741_2: doṣan yakan śakan udan āsan ity ete ādeśāḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40745: dat - yā dato dhāvate tasyai śyāvadan /
GS24jvkasipu:40762: tathā hi bhāṣāyām api padādayaḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante /
GS24jvkasipu:40768: śasprabhṛtiṣu iti prakārārthe prabhṛtiśabda iti śalā doṣaṇī ity atra api doṣannādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40770: māṃsa pṛtanā sānu ity eteṣāṃ sthāne yathāsaṅkhyam māṃs pṛt snu ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40775: na te divo na pṛthivyā adhisnuṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:40779: nāsikāyā nasbhāvo vaktavyaḥ yat tas kṣudra ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40789: dhātor ādeḥ ṣakārasya sthāne sakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40800: ity atra ṣatvavyavasthārtham ṣādayo dhātavaḥ kecid upadiṣṭāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40801: ke punas te ? ye tathā paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:40812: ṭeṣṭhīvyate iti ca abhyāsarūpaṃ dvidhā bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:40817: dhātor āder ṇakārasya nakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40825: ity atra ṇatvavidher vyavasthārthaṃ ṇādayo dhātvaḥ kecid upadiṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:40826: ke punas te ? ye tathā paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:40833: dhatoḥ iti prakṛtaṃ yat tad dhātvādeḥ iti punar dhātugrahaṇān nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:40834: tena dhātor adhātośca vakārayakārayoḥ vali parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40852: verapṛktalopāt pūrvaṃ vali lopo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40855: vraścādīnām upadeśasāmarthyāt vali lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40857: vavṛśca ity atra api hi samprasāraṇahalādiḥśeṣayor bahiraṅgatvāt prāpnoti // [#614]
GS24jvkasipu:40863: veḥ iti kvibādayo viśeṣān anubandhān utsṛjya sāmānyena gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:40883: tad iha laukikena arthavat karmasādhanaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:40885: halantād, ṅyantād ābantāc ca dīrghāt paraṃ su ti si ity etad apṛktaṃ hal lupyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40898: bhṛño laṅi tipi ślau bhṛñāmit ity abhyāsasya ittvam /
GS24jvkasipu:40908: tipā sahacaritasya siśabdasya grahaṇāt sico grahaṇaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:40913: atha kimarthaṃ halantāt sutisināṃ lopo vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:40916: rājā, takṣā ity atra saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvān nalopo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40917: ukhāsrat, parṇadhvat ity atra apadantatvād dattvaṃ ca na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40920: abibhar bhavān ity atra tu rāt sasya (*8,3.24)
GS24jvkasipu:40921: iti niyamāl lopa eva na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40922: saṃyogāntasya lope hi nalopādir na sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:40923: rāttu te na+eva lopaḥ syād dhalas tasmād vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:40927: lopaḥ iti vartate, hal iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:40929: tathā ca pūrvasūtre punar apṛktagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:40930: eṅantāt prātipadikāt hrasvantāc ca paro hal lupyate sa cet sambuddher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40938: ami pūrvaḥ (*6,1.107) iti pūrvatve krte lahmātrasya makārasya lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40939: he katarat ity atra ḍidayam adḍādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:40940: tatra ṭilope sati hrasvābhāvān na asti sambuddhilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40946: śi ity etasya bahulaṃ chandasi viṣaye lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40954: piti kṛti parato hrasvāntasya dhātoḥ tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40966: grāmaṇi brāhmaṇakulam ity atra hrasvasya bahiraṅgasya asiddhatvāt tug na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:40970: adhikāro 'yam anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158) iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:40971: prāg etasmat sūtrād ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ saṃhitāyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:40980: chakāre parataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye hrasvasya tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40986: cicchiduḥ ity atra tuk abhyāsasya grahaṇena na gṛhyate iti haladiḥśeṣeṇa na nivartyate,
GS24jvkasipu:40991: tuk iti anuvartate, che iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:40993: māṅaś ca pratiṣedhavacanasya chakāre paratastugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40995: iti vikalpe prāpte nityaṃ tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41010: dīrghāt paro yaḥ chakāraḥ tasmin pūrvasya tasya+eva dīrghasya tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41019: padāntād dīrghāt paro yaḥ chakāraḥ tasmin pūrvasya tasya+eva dīrghasya pūrveṇa nityaṃ prāpto vā tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41023: viśvajanādīnāṃ chadasi vā tugāgamo bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41039: aci iti ca ayam adhikāraḥ saṃprasāraṇāc ca (*6,1.108) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:41043: ecaḥ sthāne aci parataḥ ay av āy āv ity ete ādeśāḥ yathāsaṅkhyam bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41054: yo 'yam ecaḥ syāne vantādeśaḥ okārasya av,
GS24jvkasipu:41070: gośabdasya yūtau parataḥ chandasi visaye vāntādeśo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41082: tasya yakārādau pratyaye parato vāntādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41091: iha na syāt gavyam, nāvyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41101: tannimittāvadhāraṇam mā bhūt iti tānimittasya hi dhātoś ca adhātoś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41108: kṣi ji ity etayor dhātvoḥ yati ratyaye parataḥ śakyārthe gamyamāne ekārasya ayādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41117: krīṇāteḥ dhātoḥ tadarthe krayārtheṃ yat tasminn abhidheye yati pratyaye parataḥ ayādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41127: bibheter dhātoḥ rapurvasya ca vī ity etasy yati pratyaye parataḥ chandasi viṣaye ayādeśaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41148: iti prāg etasmāt sūtrāt iti uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmas tatra pūrvasya parasya dvayor api sthāne ekādeśo bhavati ity etad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41150: tatra aci pūrvasya avarṇāt ca parasya sthāne eko guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41154: nobhe saptamīpañcamyau yugapat prakalpike bhavataḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41156: sthānibhedād dhi bhinnādiṣu natvavad dvāvādeśau syātām //
GS24jvkasipu:41163: iti yo 'yam ekādeśo vidhīyate sa pūrvasya antavad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41165: yathā tasyāntaḥ ādir vā tadantarbhūtaḥ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:41167: brahmabandhūḥ ity atra brahmabandhu iti prātipadikam,
GS24jvkasipu:41169: tayoḥ prātipadikāprātipadikayor yaḥ ekādeśaḥ sa prātipadikasya antavad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41173: tayoḥ subasupor ekādeśaḥ supaḥ ādivad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41174: yathā śakyate vaktuṃ subantaṃ padam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41176: tathā hi khaṭvābhiḥ ity atra antavadbhāvābhāvāt ato bhisa ais (*7,1.9)
GS24jvkasipu:41178: hvayateḥ juhāva iti samprasāraṇapūrvatvasya ādivadbhāvāhāvāt āta au ṇalaḥ (*7,1.34)
GS24jvkasipu:41184: ity atra vidhau ādivan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41187: tatra avayavayor ānumānikaṃ sthānitvam iti tadāśrayaṃ kāryaṃ sthānivadbhāvād aprāptam ity antādivadbhāvo vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:41191: ṣatve tuki ca kartavye ekadeśo 'siddho bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41196: iti ekādeśasya paraṃ pratyādivadbhāvāt apadāder iṇa uttarasya ādeśasya sakārasya ṣatvaṃ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:41200: yo 'smai ity ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt iṇaḥ iti ṣatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41202: preta ity atra+ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,1.71)
GS24jvkasipu:41212: ādguṇasya asiddhatvād hrasvalakṣaṇo nityo 'tra tuk prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:41220: avarnāt paro yo 'c ca pūrvo yo 'varṇaḥ tayoḥ pūrvaparayoḥ avarṇācoḥ sthāne eko guṇa ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41232: lṛkārasya sthāne yo 'ne yo 'ṇ tasya lapratvam iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:41239: tayoḥ pūrvaparayoḥ avarṇaicoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41252: vṛddhir eci iti vartate, āt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:41253: tad etat ejgrahaṇam eter eva viśeṣaṇaṃ ,
GS24jvkasipu:41257: iṇ gatau ity etasmin dhātau eci,
GS24jvkasipu:41258: edha vṛddhau ity etasmin ūṭhi ca pūrvaṃ yad avarṇaṃ tataś ca paro yo 'c,
GS24jvkasipu:41259: tayoḥ pūrvaparyoḥ avarṇācoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41270: om-āṅoś ca (*6,1.95) ity etat tu pararūpaṃ na bādhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:41271: yena na aprāpte yo vidhir ārabhyate sa tasya bādhako bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:41272: purastād apavādā anantarān vidhīn badhante iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:41311: tayoḥ pūrvaparayoḥ āḍacoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41328: avarṇāntād upasargāt ṛkārādau dhātau parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41336: pragatā ṛ cchakā asmād deśāt prarcchako deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41337: yatkriyāyuktāḥ prādayaḥ taṃ prati gatyupasargasañjñakāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41338: ṛti iti kim ? upa itaḥ upetaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41343: upasargagrahaṇād eva dhātugrahaṇe siddhe dhātugrahaṇaṃ śākalanivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:41344: ṛtyakaḥ (*6,1.128) iti hi śākalyasya prakrtibhāvaḥ prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:41348: āt ity eva, upasargāt ṛti dhātau iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:41349: subantāvayave dhātau ṛkārādau parataḥ avarṇāntāt upasargāt pūrvaparayoḥ āpiśaler ācāryasya matena vā vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41354: ṛkāralṛkārayoḥ sāvarṇyavidhiḥ iti ṛti iti lṛkāro 'pi gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41361: otaḥ ami śasi ca parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41368: tena nāprāptāyāṃ vṛddhau ayam ākāro vidhīyamānastāṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:41377: āt ity eva, upasargād dhātau iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:41378: avarṇāntāt upasargāt eṅādau dhātau pūrvaparayoḥ pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41387: tac ca vākyabhedena subdhātau vikalpaṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:41417: avarṇāntāt omi āṅi ca parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41421: āgi khalv api - ā ūḍhā oḍhā /
GS24jvkasipu:41428: adya arśyāt adyarśyāt iti akaḥ savarṇe dīrghatvaṃ bādhate //
GS24jvkasipu:41433: avarṇāt apadāntāt usi pūrvaparayoḥ ādguṇāpavādaḥ pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41447: akārāt apadantāt guṇe parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthane pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41451: pace, yaje ity atra vṛddhir eci iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:41462: tadanukaraṇaṃ parisphuṭavarṇam eva kenacit sādṛśyena tadavyaktam anukaroti,
GS24jvkasipu:41463: tasya yo atśabdaḥ tasmāt itau pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41475: iha mā bhūt, śrat iti śraditi /
GS24jvkasipu:41480: na āmreḍitasya anatyasya tu vā // PS_6,1.99 //
GS24jvkasipu:41482: avyaktānukaraṇasya āmreḍitasya yo atśabdaḥ itau tasya pararūpaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41488: yadā tu samudāyānukaraṇaṃ tadā bhavaty eva pūrveṇa pararūpam,
GS24jvkasipu:41496: ḍācparaṃ yad amreditaṃ tasmin pūrvasya avyaktānukaranasya acchabdasya yo 'ntyaḥ takāraḥ tasya pūrvasya parasya cādyasya varṇasya nityaṃ pararūpam ekadeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41499: paṭad ity asmāt avyaktānukaraṇāt iti ḍāci vihite ḍāci bahulam iti dvirvacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:41504: akaḥ savarṇe aci parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne dīrgha ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41512: nājjhalau (*1,1.10) ity atra yat ac iti pratyāhāragrahaṇaṃ tatra grahaṇakaśāstrasya anabhinirvṛttatvāt savarṇā na gṛhyanta iti savarnatvamīkāraśakārayor apratiṣiddham /
GS24jvkasipu:41514: ṛti savarṇe parabhūte tatra ṛ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41516: yadā na ṛ tadā dīrgha eva hotṝkāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41518: lṭti savarṇe parato lṛ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41522: dīrghapakṣe tu samudāyāntaratamasya lṛvarṇasya dīrghasya abhāvāt ṛkāraḥ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:41529: tasyāṃ prathamāyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ ca vibhaktau aci akaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41536: ato guṇe (*6,1.97) iti yadakāre pararūpaṃ tat akaḥ savarṇe dīrghatvam eva bādhate,
GS24jvkasipu:41538: purastād apavāda anantarān vidhīn bādhante na+uttarāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41543: agnī ity atra pakṣe parasavarṇo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:41550: tasmāt pūrvasavarṇadīrghāt uttarasya śaso 'vayavasya sakārasya puṃsi nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41563: lummanuṣye iti kano lupi kṛte lupi yuktavad vyaktivacane (*1,2.5)
GS24jvkasipu:41588: dīrghāt jasi ici ca parataḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41596: dīrghāt chandasi viṣaye jasi ca ici ca parato vā pūrvasavarnadīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41607: ami paratoṭakaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarupam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41615: kumārīm ity atra hi trimātraḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:41617: ity eva, śamīṃ ca, śamyaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:41624: samprasāraṇāt aci parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41628: samprasaraṇavidhānasāmarthyāt vigṛhītasya śravaṇe prāpte pūrvatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41630: ity eva, mitro no atra varuṇo yajyamānaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41631: parapūrvatvavidhāne satyarthavat samprasāraṇavidhānam iti iṣṭa ity evam ādiṣu pūrvatvabhāve yaṇādeśo bhavatyeva /
GS24jvkasipu:41632: antaraṅge ca aci iṛtārthaṃ vacanam iti bāhye paścāt sannipatite pūrvatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41638: eṅ yaḥ padāntaḥ tasmād ati parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarūpam ekādśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41657: eṅaḥ iti vartate, ati iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:41658: eṅaḥ uttarayoḥ ṅasiṅasoḥ ati parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41668: ṛkārāntād uttarayoḥ ṅsiṅasoḥ ati parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ ukāra ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41671: dvayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭayoḥ sthāne yaḥ sa labhate 'nyataravyapadeśaṃ iti uraṇ raparaḥ (*1,1.51)
GS24jvkasipu:41672: iti raparatvam atra kṛtvā rāt sasya (*8,2.24)
GS24jvkasipu:41677: ṅasiṅasoḥ iti vartate, ut iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:41678: khyatyāt iti khiśabdakhīśabdayoḥ tiśabdatīśabdayoś ca kṛtayaṇādeśayor idaṃ grahaṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:41679: tābhyāṃ parasya ṅasiṅasoḥ ata ukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41684: khīśabdasya+udāharaṇam - saha khena vartate iti sakhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:41704: akārād aplutād uttarasya ro rephasya ukārānubandhaviśiṣṭasya akāre 'plute parata ukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41716: tasya api taparatvād atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41722: atra plutasya asiddhatvāt utvaṃ prāpnoti iti aplutād aplute iti ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:41726: haśi ca parataḥ ata uttarasya rorukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41737: antar iti avyayam adhikaranabhūtaṃ madhyam ācaṣṭe /
GS24jvkasipu:41740: avakārayakārapare ati parataḥ eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41755: kecid idaṃ sūtraṃ na antaḥpādam avyapare iti paṭhanti,
GS24jvkasipu:41756: te saṃhitāyām iha yad ucyate tasya sarvasya pratiṣedhaṃ varṇayanti // [#627]
GS24jvkasipu:41761: avyāt avadyāt avakramuḥ avrata ayam avantu avasyu ity eteṣu vakāra-yakārapare 'py ati parataḥ antaḥpādam eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41772: uraḥśabdaḥ eṅantaḥ yajuṣi viṣaye ati rakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41776: te idam udāharanti uro antarikṣaṃ sajūḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41782: āpo juṣāṇo vṛṣṇo varṣiṣṭhe ity ete śabdāḥ ambe ambāle ity etau ca yāvambike śabdāt pūrvau yajuṣi paṭhitau te ati parataḥ prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41793: aṅgaśabde ya eṅ tadādau cākāre yaḥ pūrvaḥ sa yajusi viṣaye ati prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41801: anudātte ca ati kavargadhakārapare parato yajusi viṣaye eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41814: avapathāḥśabde 'nudātte akārādau parato yajuṣi viṣaye eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41824: sarvatra chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca ati parato goḥ eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:41826: chandasi - apaśavo vā anye goaśvebhyaḥ paśavo goaśvān //
GS24jvkasipu:41831: aci ity etat tv anuvartata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:41832: aci parataḥ goḥ sphoṭāyanasya ācāryasya matena avaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41844: tena gavākṣaḥ ity atra nityam avaṅ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41848: indraśabdasthe aci parato gornityam avaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41854: plutāś ca pragṛhyāś ca aci prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41862: aci ity anuvartamāne punar ajgrahaṇam ādeśanimittasya aciḥ parigrahārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:41864: jānu u asya rujati jānvasya rujati /
GS24jvkasipu:41865: pragṛhyād ukārāt parasya akārasya savarṇadīrghatvaṃ pratyanimittatvād atra prakṛtibhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41867: plutapragṛhyāṇāṃ nityam ayam eva prakṛtibhāvo yathā syād,
GS24jvkasipu:41874: āṅo 'ci parataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ chandasi viṣaye 'nunāsikādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41878: kecid āṅo 'nunāsikaś chandasi bahulam ity adhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41885: iko 'savarne aci parataḥ śākalyasya ācāryasya matena prakṛtyā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:41886: hrasvaś ca tasya ikaḥ sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41898: ārambhasāmarthyād eva hi yaṇādeśena saha vikalpaḥ siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41910: śākalyasya hrasvaś ca ity etad anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:41911: ṛkāre parataḥ śāklyasya ācāryasya matena akaḥ prakṛtyā bhavanti hrasvaś ca tasyakaḥ sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41930: apluta iti ucyamāne pluta eva pratiṣidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41932: pragṛhyāśraye prakṛtibhāve plutasya śravaṇaṃ na syāt,
