GS24jvkasipu:41938: ī3kāraḥ pluto 'ci parataḥ cākravarmaṇasya ācāryasya matena plutavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41944: tadupasthite nivṛttyartham anupasthite prāptyartham ity ubhayatravibhāṣā iyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41945: īkārād anyatra apy ayam aplutavadbhāva iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41973: etattadau yāvakakārau nañsamāse na vartate tayor yaḥ suśabdaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:41976: tasya saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye hali parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41988: tanmadhyapatitastadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti rūpabhede 'pi sākackāvetattadāv eva bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41992: uttarapadārthapradhānatvānnañsamāsasya etattador eva atra sambaddhaḥ suśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41998: sya ity etasya chandasi hali parataḥ bahulaṃ sorlopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41999: uta sya vājī kṣipaṇiṃ turaṇyati grīvāyāṃ baddho api kakṣa āsani /
GS24jvkasipu:42000: eṣa sya te pavata indra somaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42007: saḥ ity etasya aci parataḥ sulopo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:42014: pādagrahaṇena atra ślokapādasya api grahaṇaṃ kecid icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:42016: saiṣa dāśarathī rāmaḥ saiṣa rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42017: saiṣa karṇo mahātyāgī saiṣā bhīmo mahābalaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:42021: adhikāro 'yam pāraskaraprabhṛtīnāṃ ca sañjñāyām (*6,1.175) iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:42022: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmastatra suṭ iti ,
GS24jvkasipu:42023: kāt pūrvaḥ iti ca+etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:42030: saṃskriyate iti saṃyogādilakṣaṇau iḍguṇau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42034: svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti vacanān na asti vyavadhānam saṃcaskaratuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:42043: aḍvyavāye, abhyāsavyavāye api suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42049: pūrvam dhātur upasargeṇa yujyate iti tatra dhātūpasargayoḥ karyam antaraṅgam iti pūrvaṃ suṭ kriyate paścād aṅabhyāsau ?
GS24jvkasipu:42051: tataḥ sakārād uttarāvaḍabhyāsau aniṣṭe deśe syātām /
GS24jvkasipu:42052: etasmiṃs tu satyata eva vacanāt kṛtayor aḍabhyāsayoḥ tadvyavāye api suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ kriyate iti siddham iṣṭaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:42056: sam pari upa ity etebhyaḥ bhuṣaṇārthe karotau parataḥ suṭ kāt pūrvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42060: atra saṃpuṃkānāṃ satvam iti samo makārasya sakāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:42077: tasmiṃś cārthe karotau samparyupebhyaḥ kāt pūrvaḥ suḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42085: sato guṇāntarādhānamādhikyāya vṛddhasya vā tādavasthyāya samīhā pratiyatnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42089: eteṣv artheṣu gamyamānesu karotau dhātau parataḥ upāt suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42101: upād uttarasmin kiratau dhātau lavanaviṣaye sut kat pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42112: upāt prateś ca uttarasmin kiratau suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati hiṃsayāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42115: tathā te vṛṣala vikṣepo bhūyāt yathā hiṃsāmanubadhnāti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42122: apāt uttarasmin kiratau catuṣpācchakuniṣu yadālekhanaṃ tasmin visaye sut kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42131: iha mā bhūt, apakirati śvā odanapiṇḍamāśitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42136: kustumburūṇi iti suṭ nipātyate jātiś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42146: aparāsparā iti suṭ nipātyate kriyāsātatye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:42151: apare ca pare ca sakṛdeva gacchanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42163: tasya ca ṣatvaṃ sevite asevite pramāne ca viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42165: gāvaḥ padyante yasmin deśe sa gobhiḥ sevito deśo goṣpadaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42167: asevite goṣpadaśabdo na sambhavati ity agoṣpadaśabdārthaṃ nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:42171: yatra tu sevitaprasaṅgo 'sti tatra+eva syād agoṣpadam iti,
GS24jvkasipu:42172: yatra tvatyantāsambhava eva tatra na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:42175: yāni hi mahāntyaraṇāni yeṣu gavām atyantāsambhavas tāny evam ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:42197: carerāṅi cāgurau iti yatpratyaye kṛte nipātanāt suṭ /
GS24jvkasipu:42216: apaskaraḥ iti nipātyate rathāṅgaṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42224: viṣkiraḥ iti kirateḥ vipūrvasya ig-upadha-jñā-prī-kiraḥ kaḥ (*3,1.135)
GS24jvkasipu:42225: iti kapratyaye vihite suṭ nipātyate śukuniś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42228: viṣkiro vā śakunau iti va grahaṇād eva suḍvikalpe siddhe vikiragrahaṇam iha tasya api śakuner anyatra prayogo ma bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:42232: candraśabde uttarapade hrasvāt paraḥ suḍāgamo bhavati mantravisaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42238: uttarapadaṃ samāsa eva bhavati iti prasiddham,
GS24jvkasipu:42246: kaśa gatiśāsanayoḥ ity etasya dhātoḥ pratipūrvasya pacādyaci kṛte suṭ nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:42248: grāmamadya pravekṣyāmi bhava me tvaṃ pratiṣkaśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42254: atra yady api kaśer eva kaśāśabdaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:42255: tathā api kaśer iti dhātor upādānaṃ tadupasargasya prateḥ pratipattyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:42260: praskaṇva hariścandra iti suṭ nipātyate ṛṣī ced abhidheyau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42269: maskara maskarin ity etau yathāsaṅkhyaṃ veṇau parivrājake ca nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:42278: kecit punar atra māṅi upapade karoteḥ karaṇe 'cpratyayam api nipātayantik māṅś ca hrasvatvam suṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:42279: mā kriyate yena pratiṣidhyate sa maskaro veṇuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42280: veṇugrahaṇaṃ ca pradarśanārtham anyatra api bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:42282: parivrājake api māṅi upapade karotestācchīlye inirnipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:42285: sa hy evam āha - mā kuruta karmāṇi śāntirvaḥ śreyasī iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42289: kāstīra ajastunda ity etau śabdau nipātyete nagare 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:42300: kāraskara iti suṭ nipātyate vrkṣaś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42301: kāraṃ karoti iti divāvibhāniśāprabhābhāskarānta iti ṭapratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42310: pāraskaraprabhṛtīni ca śabdarūpāṇi nipātyante sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42321: sañjñāgrahaṇād upādhiparigrahe siddhe gaṇe coradevatāgrahaṇaṃ prapañcārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:42323: tumpatau dhātau praśabdāt paraḥ suṭ bhavati gavi kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:42331: yad uktaṃ prāyasya citicittayoḥ suḍaskāro vā iti tat saṅgṛhītaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:42336: yatra anyaḥ svaraḥ udāttaḥ svarito vā vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:42337: tatra anudāttaṃ padam ekaṃ varjayitvā bhavati ity etad upasthitaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:42345: dhātor antyam acaṃ varjayitvā pariśiṣṭam anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42370: yo hi yasmin sati śiṣyate sa tasya bādhako bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42371: tathā hi - gopāyati ity atra dhātusvarāpavādaḥ pratyayasvaraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:42372: tena+eva dhātusvareṇa pratyayāntasya dhātoḥ satiśiṣṭatvād bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42373: kārṣṇottarāsaṅgaputraḥ ity atra ca samāsasvarāpavādo bahuvrihisvaraḥ satiśiṣṭena samāsāntodāttatvena vādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42374: vikaraṇasvaras tu satiśiṣṭo 'pi sārvadhātukasvaraṃ na bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:42375: lunītaḥ iti tasa eva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42380: vibhaktinimittasvarāc ca nañsvaro balīyān iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:42385: devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklām iti vākye hi pratipadaṃ svaraḥpṛthag bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42386: parimāṇārthaṃ ca+idaṃ padagrahaṇam padādhikārasya nivṛttiṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:42387: tena prāg eva padavyapadeśāt svaravidhisamakālem eva śiṣṭasya anudāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42388: tathā ca kuvalyā vikāraḥ kauvalam ity atra anudāttādilakṣaṇo 'ñ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42389: tathā garbhiṇīśabdaś ca anudāttādilakṣaṇasya año bādhanarthaṃ bhikṣādiṣu paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42394: karṣater dhātor ākāravataś ca ghañantasyānta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42404: taudādikasya ghañantasya karṣaḥ ity ādyudāttaḥ eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:42408: uccha ity evam ādīnām anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42411: jalpaḥ ete ghañantāḥ iti ñitsvaraḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42416: yujer ghañantasya nipātanād aguṇatvaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣaye ca nipātanam idam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42417: kālaviśeṣe rathādyupakaraṇe ca yugaśabdasya prayogaḥ anyatra hi yogaḥ eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42424: halaś ca (*3,3.121) iti ghañantā ete karaṇo 'ntodāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42441: kecit tu bhāvagarhāyām ity atra api anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42450: yasminn anudātte parataḥ udātto lupyate tasya anudāttasyādirudātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42469: tasya yati titsvaritam iti svarite udātto lupyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:42474: antaḥ iti hi prakṛtatvād antasya syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:42501: citi pratyaye prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya anta udātta iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42513: param api ñitsvaraṃ bādhitvā 'ntodāttatvam eva yathā syād iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42533: iti vidhānāt jas eva labhyate iti jasgrahaṇam upasamastārtham eke icchanti atitistrau ity atra svaro mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42539: catasrādeśe ādyudāttanipātanād yaṇādeśasya ca pūrvavidhau sthānivattvād ayaṃ svaro na bhavati catasraḥ paśya iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42544: tatra sau ya ekāc tasmat parā tṛtīyādir vibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42561: saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇād iha na bhavati tvayā, tvayi iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42569: nityasamāsād anyatrānityasamāse yad uttarapadam antodāttam ekācca tasmāt parā tṛtīyādir vibhaktir anyatarasyām udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42589: śvorjā ity atra+eva ayaṃ vidhiḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:42596: yas tu vigrahābhāvena nityasamāsas tatra bhavaty eva vikalpaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:42605: añceḥ parā asarvanāmasthānavibhaktir udāttā bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42608: tṛtīyādiḥ iti vartamānen śaso 'pi parigrahārtham asarvanāmasthānagrahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:42614: ūṭḥ idam padādi ap pum rai div ity etebhyo 'sarvanāmasthānavibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42622: antodāttāt ity adhikārād anvādeśe na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:42625: ity evam ādayo niśparyantā iha gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:42654: ity asya apavādo vibhaktir eva+udāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42657: idam eva dīrghagrahaṇam aṣṭana āttvavikalpaṃ jñāpayati,
GS24jvkasipu:42660: svaraḥ paratvādanātvapakṣe ṣaṭsvareṇa bādhiṣyate iti kim dīrghagrahaṇena // [#641]
GS24jvkasipu:42666: anum yaḥ śatṛpratyayas tadantāt parā nadī ajādir vibhaktir asarvanāmasthānam udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42677: atra apy upadeśāt iti lasārvadhātukād anudāttatve ekādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:42680: tasya pūrvatra asiddhatvam na+iṣyate iti śatrantam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42697: udāttasthāne yo yaṇ halapūrvas tasmāt parā nadī ajādir yā asarvanāmavidbhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42719: ūṅo dhātoś ca ya udāttayaṇ halapūrvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:42720: tasmāt parā tṛtīyādir vibhaktir na+udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42726: tena saha ya ekādeśaḥ so 'py udāttaḥ iti udāttayaṇvakāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:42727: tasmād udāttatve pratiṣiddhe udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:42732: kvibandtasya kṛduttarapadaprakṛtisvareṇa antodāttasya oḥ supi (*6,4.83) yaṇādeśaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:42737: hrasvāntād antodāttān nuṭaś ca paro matub udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42747: atra ca svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat ity eṣā paribhāṣā na aśrīyate nuḍgrahaṇāt,
GS24jvkasipu:42748: tena marutvān ity atra na bhavati / [#642]
GS24jvkasipu:42761: tadantād antodāttād anyatarasyāṃ nām udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42780: ṅyantāt chandasi viṣaye nāmudātto bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:42791: tri catur ity etābhyāṃ ca parā halādir vibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42807: ṣaṭtricaturbhyo yā jñālādir vibhaktiḥ tadante pade upottamaṃ udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42822: ṣaṭ-tri-caturbhyo yā jhalādir vibhaktis tadante pade upottamam udāttaṃ bhavati vibhāṣā bhaṣāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42830: go śvan, sāvavarṇaḥ sau prathamaikavacane yadavarṇāntam,
GS24jvkasipu:42831: rāḍ aṅ kruṅ kṛd ity etebhyo yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42842: sāvavarṇaḥ - sau prathamaikavacane yad avarṇāntaṃ tasya grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:42851: yatra asya nalopo na asti tatra pratiṣedho yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:42856: nalopaviṣaye tu bhavaty eva vibhakter udāttatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:42868: divaḥ parā jhalādir vibhaktiḥ na+udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42877: nṛ ity etasmāt parā jhalādir vibhaktiḥ anyatarasyāṃ na+udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42896: tāser anudātteto ṅito 'kārāntopadeśāc ca śabdāt paraṃ lasārvadhātukam anudāttaṃ ca bhavati hnuṅ iṅ ity etābhyāṃ paraṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:42911: yady atra muk akāramātrasya syāt tadā lasārvadhātukam adupadeśād anantaram iti siddho nighātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42913: tathā api lasārvadhātukānudāttatve kartavye bahiraṅgatvāt asiddhaḥ iti siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:42917: ṅidayaṃ śnuḥ pūrvasya kāryaṃ prati na tu parasya /
GS24jvkasipu:42944: sica ādyudāttatve 'niṭaḥ pitaḥ pakṣe udāttatvaṃ vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:42953: lasārvadhātukagrahaṇaṃ yad anuvartate tad aci aniṭi iti sambandhād iha saptamyantam upajāyate svapādir āvṛtkaraṇāt /
GS24jvkasipu:42954: svapādīnāṃ hiṃseś ca ajādavaniṭi lasārvadhātuke parato 'nyatarasyām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42970: abhyastānām ajādāvaniti lasārvadhātuke parataḥ ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42981: ādiḥ iti vartamāne punar ādigrahaṇaṃ nityārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:42985: avidyamānodātte ca lasārvadhātuke parato 'bhyastānām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43003: pratyayalakṣaṇe 'py ayaṃ svara iṣyate sarvastomaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43010: bhī hrī bhṛ hu mada jana dhana daridrā jāgṛ ity eteṣāṃ abhyastānāṃ lasārvadhātuke piti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43016: madeḥ bahulaṃ chandasi iti vikaraṇasya śluḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43018: jana janane ity asya pañcame lakāre rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:43019: dhana dhānye ity asya pañcame lakāre dadhanat /
GS24jvkasipu:43048: ajantā ye upadeśe dhātavaḥ teṣāṃ kartṛyaki anyatarasyām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43053: yadā ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati tadā lasarvadhātukanighāte kṛte yaka eva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43066: seṭi thali iṭ vā udātto bhavati anto vā ādir vā anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:43069: tadā liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43072: liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam ity ayam eva svaro bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:43076: ñiti niti ca nityam ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43086: cañcāḥ ity atra yañi kani ca lupte na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:43103: tayoḥ sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43111: pathipriyaḥ ity atra pūrvapadaprakṛtisvareṇa antodāttaḥ pathiśabdaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43121: ekavarjam iti vacanād yaugapadyaṃ na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:43148: vṛṣaḥ ity evam ādīnām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43156: gayaḥ ity atra gāyater nipātanād etvam /
GS24jvkasipu:43203: iti yaḥ kan, tasya lummanuṣye (*5,3.98) iti lup /
GS24jvkasipu:43204: yady evaṃ kim artham idam ucyate pratyayalakṣaṇena siddham ādyudāttatvam ?
GS24jvkasipu:43205: etad eva jñāpayati kvacid iha svaravidhau pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43214: niṣṭhāntaṃ dvyac sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ādyudāttaṃ bhavati sa ced ādirākāro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43231: śuṣka dhṛṣṭa ity etāv ādyudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43258: juṣṭa arpita iti śabdarūpe chandasi viṣaye vibhāṣā ādyudātte bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43267: juṣṭa arpita ity ete śabdarūpe mantraviṣaye nityam ādyudātte bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43271: kecid atra juṣṭa ity etad eva anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:43274: tasmin sākaṃ triśatā na śaṅkavo 'rpitāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:43279: tayor ṅasi parataḥ ādiḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43287: ṅe ity etasmiṃś ca parato yuṣmadasmadoḥ ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43296: yat pratyayāntasya dvyaca ādir udātto bhavati na cen nauśabdāt paro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43309: īḍa vanda vṛ śaṃsa duha ity eteṣāṃ yo ṇyat tadantasya ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43315: dvyanubandhakatvāt ṇyato yad grahaṇena grahaṇaṃ na asti iti tit svaritam (*6,1.185)
GS24jvkasipu:43317: vāryam iti vṛṅ sambhaktau ity asya ayaṃ ṇyat /
GS24jvkasipu:43318: kyabvidhau hi vṛña eva grahaṇam iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:43322: veṇu indhāna ity etayoḥ vibhāṣā ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43325: veṇuśabdo 'yam ajivṛrībhyo nicca iti ṇupratyayānto nitvān nityam ādyudāttaḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43327: atha śānajantas tadā lasārvadhatuka-anudāttatve kṛte udāttanivṛttisvareṇa madhyodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43328: tad evam indhāne sarvathā aprāptam udāttatvaṃ pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43329: veṇur iva veṇuḥ ity upamānaṃ yadā sañjñā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:43336: tyāga rāga hāsa kuha śvaṭha kratha ity eteṣāṃ vibhāṣā ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43351: triprabhṛtīnām antyam uttamam tasya samīpe yat tad upottamam /
GS24jvkasipu:43363: na māṅyoge (*6,4.74) ity aṭi pratiṣiddhe hi ca (*8,1.34)
GS24jvkasipu:43364: iti nighāte 'dupadeśāt iti lasārvadhātukānudāttatve iṛte caṅa eva svare prāpte pakṣe dhātvakāra udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43370: matoḥ pūrvaḥ ākāra udātto bhavati tac cen matvantaṃ strīliṅge sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43395: na+evaṃ śakyam iha api syāt, rājavatī /
GS24jvkasipu:43396: svaravidhau nalopasya asiddhatvān na ayam avatīśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43401: īvatīśabdāntasya anta udāto bhavati striyāṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:43410: tasmin parataḥ pūrvasya anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43433: svaravidhau vyañjanamavidyamānavat iti halanteṣv apy antodāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43435: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya prathamāḥ pādaḥ // [#652]
GS24jvkasipu:43442: pūrvapadagrahaṇaṃ atra pūrvapadasthe svare udātte svarite vā vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:43443: bahuvrīhau samāse pūrvapadasya yaḥ svaraḥ sa prakṛtyā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:43446: samāsāntodāttatve hi sati anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158)
GS24jvkasipu:43447: iti so 'nudāttaḥ syāt iti samāsāntodāttatvāpavādo 'yam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43453: yūpaśabdaḥ uṇādiṣu kusuyubhyaś ca iti papratyayāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43454: tatra ca dīrghaḥ iti niditi ca vartate tena ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43467: tena sarvānudātte pūrvapade vidhir eva na asti iti samāsāntodāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43472: tatpuruṣe samāse tulyārthaṃ tṛtīyāntaṃ saptamyantam upamānavāci avyayaṃ dvitīyāntaṃ kṛtyāntaṃ ca yat pūrvapadaṃ tat prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43488: śaṅkupūrvāl lāteḥ ghañarthe kavidhānam iti vā kapratyayāntaḥ śaṅkulāśabdo 'ntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43489: kiriśabdo 'pi kirateḥ kṝgṝśṝpṝkuṭi bhidicchidibhyaś ca iti ikārapratyayaḥ kidauṇādikaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:43507: kumudaśabdo 'pi kau modate iti mūlavibhujāditvāt kapratyayāntaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:43511: pacāditvād acpratyayāntaḥ tasya nyagrodhasya ca kevalasya (*7,3.5)
GS24jvkasipu:43512: iti nipātanād hakārasya dhakāro madhyodāttatvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:43548: varṇaṃ varṇavāci pūrvapadaṃ varnavāciṣv eva+uttarapadeṣū etaśabdavarjiteṣu paratas tatpuruṣe samase prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43554: lohitaśabdo 'pi ruheraśca lo vā iti itanprayayāntaḥ ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43565: pramāṇavācini tatpuruṣe samāse gādha lavaṇa ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43574: tatra śamerban iti banpratyayāntatvāc chambaśabda ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43577: aśvaśabdo aśūpruṣilaṭikaṇikhativiśibhyaḥ kvan iti kvanpratyayāntaḥ ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43578: pramāṇam iyattāparicchedamātram iha draṣṭavyaṃ na punarāyāma eva /
GS24jvkasipu:43586: tatpuruṣe samāse dāyādaśabde uttarapade dāyādyavāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43592: kṝpṝvṛjimandinidhāñbhyaḥ kyuḥ iti bahulavacanāt kevalād api dhāñaḥ kyuḥ pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:43596: yady evaṃ pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti samāsapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:43598: tasyas tu saptamī vidhīyamānā bādhikā mā vijñāyi iti punar abhyanujñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43605: tatpuruṣe samāse cirakṛcchrayor uttarapadayoḥ pratibandhivāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43612: gamanaṃ ca yacciraṃ ca iti viśeṣaṇasamāso 'yam,
GS24jvkasipu:43614: gamanaṃ hi kāraṇavikalatayā virakālabhāvi kṛcchrayogi vā pratibandhi jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43621: tadvācini tatpuruṣe samāse padaśabde uttarapade pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43635: nivātaśabde uttarapade vātatrāṇavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43641: niruddho vāto 'smin iti vā nivātam iti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43642: tatra kuḍyādihetuke nivāte kuḍyādayo vartamānāḥ samānādhikaraṇena nivātaśabdena saha samasyante /
GS24jvkasipu:43644: kuḍyaśabdo 'pi kavater yat ḍakkicca iti yatpratyayānta ādyudātta ity eke /
GS24jvkasipu:43654: anārtavavācini śāradaśabde uttarapade uttarapade tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43660: rajjuśadaḥ sṛjerasum ca iti upratyayāntaḥ ādilopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:43661: dhānye nit iti ca tatra vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:43663: dṛṣatśabdaḥ dṛṇāteḥ ṣuk hrasvaś ca iti adipratyayānto 'ntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43667: śaradi ṛtuviśeṣe bhavaṃ yat tad iha śāradam //
GS24jvkasipu:43671: adhvaryu kaṣāya ity etayoḥ jātivācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43678: tataḥ kaṭhena proktam iti vaiśampāyana-antevāsibhyaś ca (*4,3.104)
GS24jvkasipu:43679: iti ṇiniḥ, tasya kaṭha-carakāl luk (*4,3.107) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:43682: iti prakṛtibhāve prāpte nāntasya ṭilope sabrahmacāripīṭhasarpikalāpikauthumitaitilijājalila. aṅgaliśilāliśikhaṇḍisūkarasadmasuparvaṇām upasaṅkhyānam iti ṭilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43689: dauvārikaśabdo 'pi dvāri niyuktaḥ iti ṭhaki satyantodāttaḥ eva /
GS24jvkasipu:43696: sadṛśa pratirūpa ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ sādṛśyavācini tatpruṣe samāse pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43700: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsārthaṃ ca sadṛśagrahaṇam iha tadaluki ṣaṣṭhyāḥ prayojayati,
GS24jvkasipu:43704: atra dāsīvṛṣalīśabdayor antodāttatvād udāttayaṇo hal pūrvat (*6,1.174)
GS24jvkasipu:43715: dvigāv uttarapade pramaṇavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43718: saptaśamāḥ pramāṇam asya iti mātracaḥ utpannasya pramāṇe laḥ dvigor nityam iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:43719: prācyaś ca asau saptaśamaś ca prācyasaptaśamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43728: vāṇijaśabde uttarapade tatpuruṣe samāse gantavyavāci paṇyavāci ca pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43737: tatra kardamādīnāṃ ca iti pakṣe ādyudātto bhavati, dvitīyo vā /
GS24jvkasipu:43748: mātrā upajñā upakrama chāyā eteṣu uttarapadeṣu napuṃsakavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43752: tatra bhikṣāyās tulyapramāṇam iti asvapadavigrahaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43755: samudraśabdo 'pi phiṣi pāṭalāpālaṅkāmbāsāgarārthānām ity antodātta eva /
GS24jvkasipu:43760: tatra paṇino 'ptyam ity aṇantaḥ pāṇinaśabdaḥ pratyayasvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43779: upajñopakramāntasya tatpuruṣasya napuṃsakaliṅgatā upajñopakramaṃ tadādyācikhyāsāyām (*2,3.21) iti / [#657]
GS24jvkasipu:43784: tatra ca dhānye nit iti vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:43786: dhanuḥ śabdo 'pi nabviṣayasya anisantasya ity ādyudātta eva /
GS24jvkasipu:43795: sukha priya ity etayor uttarapadyor hitavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43804: tad dhi hitaṃ yad āyatyaṃ prītiṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:43812: prītau gamayamānāyāṃ sukha priya ity etayoḥ uttapadayoḥ tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43825: svāmiśabde uttarapade tatpuruṣe samāse svavāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43835: patiśabde uttarapade aiśvaryavācini tatpuruṣe pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43840: gehe kaḥ (*3,1.144) iti prakṛtisvareṇa antodātto gṛhaśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43841: saha inena vartate iti bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā pūrvapadam (*6,2.1)
GS24jvkasipu:43853: patiśabde uttarapade aiśvaryavācini tatpuruṣe samāse bhū vāk cit didhiṣū ity etāni pūrvapadāni prakṛtisvarāṇi na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:43863: patiśabde uttarapade aiśvaryavācini tatpuruṣa samāse bhuvanaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ vā prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43867: rañjeḥ kyun iti vartamāne bhusūdhūbhrāsjibhyaś chandasi iti kyunpratyayānto bhuvanaśabdaḥ ādyudātto vyutpāditaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43876: āśaṅka ābādha nediyas ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu sambhāvanavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43895: pūrvaśade uttarapade bhūtapūrvavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43905: atra pramaścāsau pūrvaś ca iti samāso,
GS24jvkasipu:43907: tathā hi sati udāharaṇam eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:43911: savidha sanīḍa samaryāda saveśa sadeśa ity eteṣu sāmīpyavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43928: savidhādīnāṃ saha vidhayā ity evam ādikā vyutpattir eva kevalam /
GS24jvkasipu:43940: vispaṣṭādini pūrvapadāni gunavāneṣu uttarapadeṣu prakṛtisvarāṇi bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:43947: vispaṣṭaṃ kaṭukam iti vigṛhya supsupā iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43949: kaṭukādibhiś ca śabdair gunavad dravyam abhidhīyate ity asāmānādhikaranyam ato na asti karmadhārayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43957: ye ca atra apare paṭhyante tatra sampannaśabdasthāthādisvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43961: cuperaccopadhāyāḥ ity atra hi ciditi vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:43982: śra jya avama kan ity eteṣu pāpaśabdavati ca+uttarapade karmadhārye samāse bhāvavāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43994: śrajyakanām ādeśānāṃ grahaṇam iti sāmarthyāttadvaduttarapadaṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44005: kumāraśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ karmadhāraye samāse prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44010: atra kecit lakṣaṇapratipadokayoḥ pratipadoktasya+eva grahaṇam it paribhāṣayā kumāraḥ śramaṇādibhiḥ (*2,1.70)
GS24jvkasipu:44011: ity atra+eva samāse svaram etam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:44019: tasminn uttarapade karmadhāraye kumārasya ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44021: uadāttaḥ ity etad atra sāmarthyād veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44022: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvara eva hy ayam āder upadiśyate // [#660]
GS24jvkasipu:44027: pūgā gaṇāḥ, tadvācini uttarapade karmadhāraye samāse kumārasya anyatarasyām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44043: tasya tadrājasya bahuṣu tena+eva striyām (*2,4.62) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:44044: atra yadā ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati tadā kumāraś ca (*6,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:44046: ye tu tatra pratipadoktasya grahaṇam icchanti teṣāṃ samāsāntodāttatvam eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:44052: kapāla bhagāla śarāva ity eteṣu ca dvigau samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44057: pramāṇe laḥ dvigor nityam iti mātraco lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44061: pañca māsān bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā iti taddhitārthe dvigor yap (*5,1.82) /
GS24jvkasipu:44076: iti taddhitārthe ete samāsāḥ dvigor lug anapatye (*4,1.88)
GS24jvkasipu:44084: pañcāratnyo daśāratnyaḥ iti ca yaṇguṇayoḥ bahiraṅgalakṣaṇayor asiddhatvāt sthānivadbhāvād vā dvigusvara igantalakṣaṇaḥ pravartate //
GS24jvkasipu:44088: bahuśabdaḥ pūrvapadam igantādiṣu uttarapadeṣu dvigau samāse 'nyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44101: tasya prakṛtisvare kṛte yatra yaṇādeśaḥ tatra udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:44106: diṣṭi vitasti ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ dvigau samāse pūrvapadam anyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44117: saptamyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ siddha śuṣka pakva bandha ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu rakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati sā cet saptamī kālān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44123: phiṣi tu sāṃkāśyakāmpilyanasikyadārvāghāṭānām antaḥ pūrvaṃ vā iti paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:44141: saptamīsvaraḥ kṛtsvareṇa bādhitaḥ punar ayaṃ vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:44145: pari prati upa apa ity ete pūrvapadabhūtā varjyamānavācini aharavayavavācini rātryavayavavācini ca+uttarapade prakṛtisvarā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:44160: nipātā ādyudāttā upasargāś ca abhivarjam iti ādyudāttāni pūrvapadāni /
GS24jvkasipu:44161: tatpuruṣe bahuvrīhau ca siddhatvāt avyayaībhāvārtho 'yam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44163: iti tayor eva varjyamānam uttarapadaṃ, netarayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44164: ahorātrāvayavā api varjyamānā eva tayor bhavanti iti na pṛthagudāhriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44172: rājanyavācināṃ bahuvacanāntānāṃ yo dvandvo 'ndhakavṛṣṇiṣu vartate tatra pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44182: dvīpe bhavāḥ iti dvīpād anusamudraṃ yañ (*4,3.10) /
GS24jvkasipu:44216: iti tasya taddhitasyādhyetari vihitasya luk kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44229: kārtakaujapādayo ye dvandvāḥ teṣu pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44245: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā iti aṇo dvyacaḥ (*4,1.156)
GS24jvkasipu:44246: iti vihitasya phiñaḥ pailādibhyaś ca (*2,4.59) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:44251: tena pailaśyāparṇeyau ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44255: iti utpannasya yañaḥ yañañoś ca iti luk,
GS24jvkasipu:44261: tadapatye yūni ya iñ tasya ṇyakṣatriyārṣañito yūni lugaṇiñoḥ (*2,4.58) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:44264: atra api bahuvacanam avivakṣitam iti śaitikākṣapañcāleyau ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44277: teṣāṃ śaṇakaśabād utpannasya iñaḥ bahvaca iñaḥ prācyabharateṣu (*2,4.66)
GS24jvkasipu:44289: kunteḥ surāṣṭrasya ca apatyeṣu bahuṣu tannivāse vā janapade dvandvo 'yam /
GS24jvkasipu:44296: atra api apatyeṣu bahuṣu iñaḥ bahvaca iñaḥ prācyabharateṣu (*2,4.66)
GS24jvkasipu:44310: iti prakṛtibhāve prāpte na antasya ṭilope sabrahmacāripīṭhasarpi ity ādinopasaṅkhyānena ṭilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44325: tasya prayojanaṃ pakṣe samāsāntodāttatvam eva yathā syād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44346: mahān ity etat pūrvapadaṃ vrīhi aparāhṇa gṛṣṭi iṣvāsa jābāla bhāra bhārata hailihila laurava pravṛddha ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44358: tasya ratipadokto yaḥ samāsaḥ sanmahatparamotkṛṣṭāḥ pūjyamānaiḥ (*2,1.61)
GS24jvkasipu:44363: ity ayam api śreṇyādisamāse vidhiḥ iti pravṛddhaśabdaḥ iha paṭhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:44367: kṣullaka ity etat pūrvapadaṃ mahāṃś ca vaiśvadeve uttarapade prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44374: uṣṭraśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ sādivāmyor uttarapadayoḥ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44382: gośabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ sāda sādi sārathi ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44391: kurugārhapata riktaguru asūtajaratī aślīladṛḍharūpā-pārevaḍavā taitilakadrū paṇyakambala ity ete samāsāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:44392: teṣāṃ dāsībhārādīnāṃ ca pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44408: aślīladṛḍharūpā iti hi saṃsthānamātreṇa śobhanā niḥśrīkā lāvaṇyavirahitā ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44413: titilino 'patyaṃ chātro vā taitilaḥ ity aṇantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44418: pratipadokte hi kṛtyānāṃ samāse dvitīyā dṛtyā ity eṣa vihitaḥ svaritaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44427: śṝsvṛsnihitrapyasivasi ity atra dhānye nit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:44441: caturthyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ tadarthe uttarapade tadabhidheyārthaṃ yat tadvācinyuttarapade prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44446: kusuyubhyaś ca ity atra nit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:44461: arthaśabde uttarapade caturthyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44470: na tvarthaśabdavācyaṃ sāmānyaṃ ity atadarthārtho 'yam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44475: śvaśrūsuram ity atra saty api tādarthye na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:44493: karmadhārye samāse ktānte uttarapade 'niṣṭhāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44507: ahīnavācini samāse ktānte uttarapade dvitīyāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44528: karmavācini ktānte uttarapade tṛtīyāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44534: āṅi śrihanibhyāṃ hrasvaś ca iti ahirantodātto vyutpāditaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44538: nāsya khamastīti bahuvrīhau nakulanakheti nakhaśabdo nipātitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44549: karmavācini ktānte uttarapade gatiranantaraḥ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44556: vyavahitasya gater ayaṃ svaro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44558: kārakapūrvasya tu sati śiṣṭatvāt thāthādisvara eva bhavati dūrādāgataḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44559: anantaragrahaṇasāmarthyād eva kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api ity etan na aśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44566: takārādau ca tuśabdavarjite niti kṛti parato gatir anantaraḥ prakṛtisvaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44581: tavai ca antaś ca yugapat // PS_6,2.51 //
GS24jvkasipu:44583: tavaipratyayasya anta udātto bhavati gatiś ca anantaraḥ prakṛtisvaraḥ iti etad ubhayaṃ yugapad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44593: aniganto gatiḥ prakṛtisvaro bhavati añcatau vapratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44597: ity ayam ekādeśaḥ udāttaḥ svarito vā / [#668]
GS24jvkasipu:44605: coraniganto 'ñcatau vapratyayaḥ ity eva svaro bhavati vapratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:44611: ni adhi ity etau cāñcatau vapratyaye parataḥ prakṛtisvarau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44621: īṣat ity etat pūrvapadam anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44627: īṣadbhedaḥ ity evam ādau kṛtsvara eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:44631: hiraṇyaparimāṇavāci pūrvapadaṃ dhanaśabde uttarapade 'nyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44636: bahuvrīhāv api paratvād vikalpa eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44647: prathamaśabdaḥ pūrvapadam aciropasampattau gamyamānāyām anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44653: samprati vyākaraṇam adhyetuṃ pravṛttaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44657: vaiyākaraṇānāmādyo mukhyo vā yaḥ sa nityo 'ntodāttaḥ eva // [#669]
GS24jvkasipu:44662: kataraśabdaḥ katamaśadaś ca pūrvapadam karmadhāraye samāse 'nyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44667: karmadhārayagrahaṇam uttarārtham iha tu pratipadoktatvād eva siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:44671: āryaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ brahmaṇakumārayoḥ karmadhāraye samāse 'nyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44687: rājā ca pūrvapadaṃ brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ karmadhāraye samāse anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44701: ṣaṣṭhyanto rājaśabdaḥ pūrvapadam pratyenasi uttarapade 'nyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44709: ktānte uttarapade nityārthe samāse pūrvapadam anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44716: satata iti yadā bhāve ktaḥ tadā thāthādisvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44736: rājaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ śilivācini uttarapade praśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44752: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ tatra pūrvapadasya ādir udātto bhavati ity evaṃ tadveditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44760: udāttaḥ iti prakṛtyā bhagālam (*6,2.137) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:44764: saptamyantaṃ hārivāci ca pūrvapadaṃ dharmyevācini haraṇaśabdād anyasminn uttarapade ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44765: hāri iti deyaṃ yaḥ svīkaroti so 'bhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44768: tasmād anapetaṃ tena vā prāpyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44789: tasya bījaniṣekād uttarakālaṃ śarīrapūṣṭyarthaṃ yad dīyate haraṇam iti tad ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44790: paro 'pi kṛtsvaro hārisvareṇa bādhyate vipratiṣedhena ity etad aharaṇe ity anena jñāpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:44791: tena vāḍavahāryam iti hārisvaraḥ siddho bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:44795: yuktavācini ca samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44807: adhyakṣaśabde uttarapade vibhāṣā pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44816: pāpaśadaḥ śilpivācini utarapade vibhāṣā ādyudātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44822: iti pāpaśabdasya pratipadoktaḥ samānādhikaraṇasamāsaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhīsamase na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:44827: gotravācini antevāsivācini ca+uttarapade mānavabrāhmanayoś ca kṣepavācini samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44829: yo jaṅghādānaṃ dadānyaham iti vātsyaḥ sampadyate sa jaṅghāvātsyaḥ iti kṣipyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44839: kumāryādilābhakāmā ye dākṣādibhiḥ proktāni śāstrāṇy adhīyate tacchiṣyatāṃ vā pratipadyante ta evaṃ kṣipyante /
GS24jvkasipu:44848: atra yasya anyat samāsalakṣaṇaṃ na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:44849: supsupā ity eva tatra samāsaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44857: maireyaśabde uttarapade tadaṅgavācini pūrvapadāny ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:44879: samaśanaṃ samāśaḥ iti kriyāmātram ucyate, na dravyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44887: gavādiṣu upamānavāciṣu uttarapadeṣu pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44895: dhānyaṃ gaur iva iti vigṛhya vyāghrāder ākṛtigaṇatvād upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44903: akapratyayānte uttarapade jīvikārthavācini samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44908: dantalekhanādibhir yeṣāṃ jīvikā ta evam ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:44918: prāgdeśavartināṃ yā krīḍā tadvācini samāse akapratyayānte uttarapade pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44935: aṇante uttarapade niyuktavācini samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44941: sa ca kasmiṃścit kartavye tatparo na bhavati iti niyuktaḥ ity anena sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:44948: śilpivācini samāse aṇante uttarapade pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:44963: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye aṇante uttarapade akṛñaḥ pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44971: go tanti yava ity etāni pūrvapadāni pālaśabde adyudāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:44989: upamānavāci pūrvapadaṃ śabdārthaṃprakṛtau eva ṇinante uttarapade ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44994: upamānagrahanam asya pūrvasa ca yogasya viṣayavibhāgārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:44998: prakṛtir eva yatra+upasarganirapekṣā śabdārthā bhavati tatra+eva yathā syād,
GS24jvkasipu:45003: śabdārthaprakṛtau tv anupamānamupamānaṃ ca ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45017: ity asya+eva+udāharanārthaṃ pathyante purvottarapadaniyamārthā iti kecit /
GS24jvkasipu:45032: ekaḥ śitiḥ pādo 'sya iti tripado bahuvrīhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45034: tasya nimittisvarabalīyastvād antodāttatvaṃ prāptam ity ādyudāttatvaṃ vidhīyate / [#674]
GS24jvkasipu:45040: etaj jñāpayati śityantasya+uttarapade dvigusvaro na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45041: tena dviśitipād ity atra tiśabda udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45042: nimittisvarabalīyastvasya apy ekaśitipātsvaravacanam eva jñāpakaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45043: pātresamitādayaś ca yuktārohyādayas tatas te 'py ādyudāttā bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:45048: kāśa tuṣa bhrāṣṭra vaṭa ity etāni ca je uttarapade ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45058: je uttarapade bahvacaḥ pūrvapadasya antyāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45068: grāmaśabde uttarapade pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati na ced nivasadvāci bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45077: dākṣyādayo nivasanti yasmin grāme sa teṣām iti vyapadiśyate //
GS24jvkasipu:45099: yāny atra nivāsanām adheyāni teṣu nivasadvācīni api pūrvapadāni ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45116: yadā śālāntas tatpuruṣo napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati tadā api tatpuruṣe śālāyāṃ napuṃsake (*6,2.123)
GS24jvkasipu:45117: ity etasmāt pūrvavipratiṣedhena pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45124: prasthaśabde uttarapade karkyādivarjitam avṛddhaṃ pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45149: prasthe uttarapade mālādīnam ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45168: nagaraśabde uttarapade mahannavaśabdavarjitaṃ pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:45179: arme ca avarṇam dvyac tryac // PS_6,2.90 //
GS24jvkasipu:45181: armaśabde uttarapade dvyac tryac pūrvapadam avarṇāntam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45195: bhūta adhika sañjīva madra aśman kajjala ity etāni pūrvapadāni armaśabde uttarapade nādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45212: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmas tatra pūrvapadasya antaḥ udātto bhavati ity evaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45221: sarvaśabdaḥ pūrvapadam guṇakārtsnye vartamānam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45227: āśrayavyāptyā paramatvaṃ śvetatvasya iti guṇakārtsnye vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:45233: guṇāttareṇa samāsastaralopaś ca vaktavyaḥ ity evam atra samāsastaralopaś ca //
GS24jvkasipu:45237: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye giri nikāya ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45249: kumāryām uttarapade vayasi gamyamāne pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45252: kumārīśabdaḥ puṃsā sahāsaṃprayogamātraṃ pravṛttinimittam upādāya prayukto vṛddhādibhir vayo viśeṣavacanaiḥ samānādhikaraṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45261: tadvācini samāse udakaśabde uttarapade pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45264: svare kṛte ekādeśaḥ svarito vānudātte padādau (*8,2.6)
GS24jvkasipu:45272: dvigau uttarapade kratuvācini samāse pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45285: sabhāśabde uttarapade napuṃsakaliṅge samāse pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45294: sabhāyāṃ pratipadoktaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ gṛhyate iti samaṇīyasabham,
GS24jvkasipu:45299: puraśabde uttarapade prācām deśe pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45309: ariṣta gauḍa ity evaṃ pūrve samāse puraśabde uttarapade pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45319: hāstina phalaka mārdeya ity etāni pūrvapadāni puraśabde uttarapade na antodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45330: kusūla kūpa kumbha śālā ity etāni pūrvapadāni bilaśabde uttarapade antodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45342: dikśabdāḥ pūrvapadāni antodāttani bhavanti grāmajanapadākhyānavāciṣu uttarapadeṣu,
GS24jvkasipu:45378: tadvaty uttarapade sarvaśabdo dikśabdāś ca antodāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45382: susarvārdhadikśabdebhyo janapadasya+iti tadantavidhinā janapadalakṣaṇo vuñ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45392: bahuvrīhau samāse viśvaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45408: udara aśva iṣu ity eteṣu uttarapadesu bahuvrīhau samāse sañjñāyāṃviṣaye pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45419: kṣepe gamyamāne udarādiṣu uttarapadeṣu bahuvrīhau samāse sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45431: bahuvrīhau samāse bandhuny uttarapade nadyantaṃ pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45442: bahuvrīhau samāse niṣṭhāntam upasargapūrvaṃ pūrvapadam anatarasyām anatodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45447: yadi mukhaśabdaḥ svāṅgavācī tadā pakṣe mukhaṃ svāṅgam (*6,2.167)
GS24jvkasipu:45459: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāma uttarapadasya ādir udātto bhavati ity evaṃ tadveditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45466: ādiḥ iti prakṛtyā bhagālam (*6,2.127) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:45468: bahuvrīhau samāse varṇavācino lakṣaṇavācinaś ca karṇaśabda uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45474: paśūnāṃ vibhāgajñāpanārthaṃ dātraśaṅkupratirūpakaṃ karṇādiṣu cihnaṃ yat kriyate tad iha lakṣaṇaṃ gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:45475: tena sthūlakarṇaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45484: sañjñāyām aupamye ca yo bahuvrīhir vartate tatra karṇaśabda uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45493: kaṇṭha pṛṣṭha grīvā jaṅghā ity etāni uttarapadāni bahuvrīhau samāse sañjñaupamyayor ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45515: śṛṅgaśabdaḥ uttārapadam avasthāyāṃ sañjñau pamyayoś ca bahuvrīhau ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45526: naña uttare jaramaramitramṛtā bahuvrīhau samāse ādyudāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45539: soḥ uttaraṃ manantam asantaṃ ca bahuvrīhau samāse ādyudāttaṃ bhavati lomoṣasī varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:45554: aninasmaṅgrahaṇānyarthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti ity anarthakayor api manasor iha grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:45557: kapi tu paratvāt kapi pūrvam ity etad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45563: kratvādayaḥ soruttare bahuvrīhau samāse ādyudāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45577: yad ādyudāttaṃ dvyac uttarapadaṃ babuvrīhau samāse soruttaraṃ tad ādyudāttam eva bhavati chandasi visaya /
GS24jvkasipu:45590: vīra vīrya ity etau ca śabdau śoruttarau bahuvrīhau samāse chandasi viṣaye ādyudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45594: iti ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati ity etad eva vīryagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:45595: tatra hi sati pūrveṇa+eva siddhaṃ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:45599: kūla tīra tūla mūla śālā akṣa sama ity etāni uttarapadāni avayībhāvasamāse ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45628: kaṃsa mantha śūrpa pāyya kāṇḍa ity etāni uttarapadāni dvigau samāse ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45644: śālāśabdānte tatpuruṣe samāse napuṃsakaliṅge uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45658: tatpuruṣe samāse napuṃsakaliṅge kanthāśabdaḥ uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45670: kanthānte tatpuruṣe samāse napuṃsakaliṅge cihaṇādīnām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45685: ādiḥ iti vartamāne punar ādigrahaṇaṃ pūrvapadādyudāttārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:45689: cela kheṭa katuka kāṇḍa ity etāni uttarapadāni tatpuruse samāse garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyām ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45699: tatra putraḥ celam iva iti vigṛhya vyāghrāder ākṛtigaṇatvād upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45705: cīramuttarapadam upamānavāci tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45714: palala sūpa śāka ity etāny uttarapadāni miśravācini tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttani bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45730: kūla sūda sthala karṣa ity etāni uttarapadāni tatpuruṣe samāse sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ādyudāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45746: karmadhārayavarjite tatpuruṣe samāse rājyam ity etad uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45757: vagya ity evam ādīni uttarapadāni akarmadhāraye tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudattāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45765: digādiṣu tu varga pūga gaṇa pakṣa ity evam ādayo ye paṭhitāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:45766: te eva yatpratyayāntā vargyādayaḥ iha pratipattavyā //
GS24jvkasipu:45770: putraśabdaḥ puṃśabdebhya uttaras tatpuruṣe ādyudatto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45787: ācāryādyākhyebhyaḥ paraḥ putraśabdo nadyudātto bhavati ākhyāgrahaṇāt svarūpasya paryāyāṇāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ ca grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45811: cūrṇādīni uttarapadāni aprāṇivācinaḥ ṣaṣṭhyantāt parāṇi tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45832: tatra+upagrahaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhyantam eva pūrvācāryopacāreṇa gṛhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:45836: ṣaṭ purvoktāni kāṇḍādīni uttarapadāni aprāṇiṣaṣṭhyā ādyudāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45863: kuṇḍam ity etat uttarapadaṃ vanavāci tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45880: śiteḥ uttarapadaṃ nityaṃ yad abahvaj bhasacchabdavarjitaṃ bahuvrīhau samāse tat prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45890: tatra avasthāyā anyatra śitikakuda iti bahvajuttarapadaṃ bhavati iti tena na nityābahvac /
GS24jvkasipu:45905: gateḥ kārakāt upapadāt ca kṛdantam uttarapadaṃ tatpuruṣe samāse prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45922: prapacatitamām ity atra tarabādyantena samāse kṛte paścādām /
GS24jvkasipu:45923: tatra sati śiṣṭatvād āma eva svaro bhavati ity eke /
GS24jvkasipu:45929: vanaspatyādiṣu samāseṣu ubhe pūrvottarapade yugapat prakṛtisvare bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45935: tadbṛhatoḥ karapatyoś coradevatayoḥ suṭ talopaś ca iti suṭ takāralopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:45940: kecit tu śārṅgaravādisu paṭhanti teṣām ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45944: na pāti na pālayati vā napāt kvibantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45950: narā evaṃ śaṃsanti iti vā narāśaṃsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45957: śuna itva śepaḥ asya iti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45982: devatāvācināṃ yo dvandvas tatra yugapadubhe pūrvottarapade prakṛtisvare bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45989: tena ādyudāttaḥ bṛhaspatiśabde vanaspatyāditvāt dvāv udāttau,
GS24jvkasipu:45990: tena indrābṛhaspatī ity atra traya udāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45998: uttarapade 'nudāttādau pṛthivī rudra pūṣamanthivarjite devatādvandve na+ubhe yugapat prakṛtisvare bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46002: uttarapadagrahaṇam anudāttādau ity uttarapadaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:46013: manthin - śukrāmanthinau mantho 'sya asti iti manthī /
GS24jvkasipu:46015: pṛthivyādiṣu tu ubhe yugapat prakṛtisvare bhavata eva //
GS24jvkasipu:46020: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmas tatra samāsasya+uttarapadasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:46028: tha atha ghañ kta ac ap itra ka ity evam antānām uttarapadānāṃ gatikārakopapadāt pareṣām antaḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46031: hanikuṣinīramikāśibhyaḥ kthan iti ave bhṛñaḥ iti ca kthanpratyayāntāv etau /
GS24jvkasipu:46034: upasarge vaseḥ iti athanpratyayaḥ ghañ - prabhedaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46064: su ity etasmād upamānāc ca paraṃ ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46072: iti prāpte upamānā dapi tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48)
GS24jvkasipu:46079: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye gatikārakopapadād ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati ācitādīn varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:46083: sambhūtaḥ iti pratyarthāt bhavateḥ karmaṇi ktaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46085: ity atra hi karmaṇi ity anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:46102: saṃhitāśabdo yadā goranyasya sañjñā tadā antodatto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46103: yadā tu goḥ sañjñā tadā antodātta eva //
GS24jvkasipu:46107: pravṛddhādīnāṃ ca ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46116: yānādibhyo 'nyatra api teṣām antodāttatvam bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:46121: punarniṣkṛto rathaḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati // [#688]
GS24jvkasipu:46126: sañjñāyām iti vartate, ktaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:46127: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye āśiṣi gamyamānāyāṃ kārakād uttarayoḥ dattaśrutayor eva ktāntayor anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46142: akārakād api dattaśrutayor anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46148: kārakād dattaśrutayor āśisyeva ity evam atra niyama iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46149: tena āhato nadati devadattaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46157: itthaṃbhūtena kṛtam ity etasminn arthe yaḥ samaso vartate tatra ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46167: bhāve tu yadā pralapitādayas tadā thāthādisvareṇa+eva siddham antodāttatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46171: anapratyayāntam uttarapadaṃ bhāvavacanaṃ karmavacanaṃ ca kārakāt paramantodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46177: karmaṇi ca yena saṃsparśāt kartuḥ śarīrasukham (*3,3.116)
GS24jvkasipu:46196: mannantaṃ ktinnantaṃ vyākhyāna śayana sthāna ity etāni yājakādayaḥ krītaśabdaś ca+uttarapadam anatodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46214: iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsārthāḥ paṭhyante ta eva+iha gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:46226: saptamyantāt paraṃ puṇyam ity etad uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46230: tatpuruṣe tulyārtha iti pūrvapadakṛtisvaratvaṃ prāptam ity antodāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46231: uṇādīnāṃ tu vyutpattipakṣe kṛtsvareṇa ādyudāttaḥ puṇyaśabdaḥ syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46237: ūnārthāny uttarapadāni kalahaśabdaś ca tṛtīyāntāt parāṇyanatodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46245: atra kecid arthe iti svarūpagrahaṇam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46247: ūnaśabdena+eva tvarthanirdeśarthena tadarthānāṃ grahaṇam iti pratipadoktatvād eva tṛtīyāsamāsaparigrahe siddhe tṛtīyāgrahaṇaṃ vispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:46252: miśra ity etad uttarapadam anupasargaṃ tṛtīyāntāt param antodāttaṃ bhavati asandhau gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:46260: iha anupasargagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam anyatra miśragahaṇe sopasargagrahaṇasya /
GS24jvkasipu:46261: tena miśraślakṣṇaiḥ iti sopasargeṇa api miśraśabdena tṛtīyāsamāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46265: sandhiḥ iti hi paṇabandhena aikārthyam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46266: kecit punar āhuḥ gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣā pratyāsattiḥ sandhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46267: atra rājño brāhmaṇaiḥ saha deśapratyāsattāv api satyāṃ mūrtivibhāgo gṛhyate iti brāhmaṇamiśro rajā iti pratyudāhriyate / [#690]
GS24jvkasipu:46273: sampādi arha hita alam ity evam arthā ye taddhitāḥ tadantāni uttarapadāni naño guṇapratiṣedhe vartamānāt parāṇi antodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46289: tatpratiṣedho yatra+ucyate samāse tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ karnaveṣṭakābhyāṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:46301: ya yat ity etau yau taddhitāv atadarthe vartate tadantasya+uttarapadasya naño guṇapratiṣedhaviṣayādanta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46314: niranubandhakaikānubandhakayor yayator grahaṇād iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:46321: ac ka ity evam antam aśaktau gamyamānāyām uttarapadaṃ nañaḥ paramantodattaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46332: ākrośe ca gamyamāne nañaḥ uttaramackāntam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46341: akrośe gamyamāne nañaḥ param uttarapadaṃ sañjñāyāṃ vartamānam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46348: kṛtya uka iṣṇuc ity evam antāś cārvādayaś ca nañaḥ uttare 'ntodāttāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46356: ity asya dvyanubandhakasya api grahaṇam ikārāder vidhānasāmarthyād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46388: tṛnnanta anna tīkṣṇa śuci ity eteṣu naña uttareṣu vibhāṣā antaḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46397: bahuvrīhau samāse idam etad tad ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya prathamaśabdasya pūraṇapratyayāntasya ca kriyāgaṇane vartamānasya anataḥ udāttaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46398: idaṃ prathamaṃ gamanaṃ bhojanaṃ vā yasya sa idaṃprathamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46420: uttarapadasya kāryitvāt kapi pūrvam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46428: saṅkhyāyāḥ paraḥ stanaśabdo bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46438: chandasi viṣaye bahuvrīhau samāse saṅkhyāyāḥ paraḥ stanaśabdo vibhāsā 'ntodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46439: dvistanāṃ karoti dyāvāpṛthivyordohāya catuḥstanāṃ karoti paśūnāṃ dohāyāṣṭastanāṃ karoti chandasāṃ dohāya //
GS24jvkasipu:46443: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye bahuvrīhau samāse mitra ajina ityetayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ antaḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46458: tadvācinaḥ pramanataraṃ bahuvrīhau samāse antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46470: mukham uttarapadaṃ svāṅgavāci bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46480: avyaya dikśabda go mahat sthūla muṣṭi pṛthu vatsa ity etebhyaḥ paraṃ mukhaṃ svāṅgavāci bahuvrīhau samāse na antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46496: niṣṭhāntāt upamānavācinaś ca mukhaṃ svāṅgam uttarapadam anyatarasyām bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46500: yadā+etad uttarapadāntodāttatvaṃ na bhavati tadā niṣṭhopasargapūrvam anyatarasyām (*6,2.110)
GS24jvkasipu:46502: tadabhāvapakṣe 'pi pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena gatisvaraḥ iti trīṇyudāharaṇāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46510: jātivācinaḥ ācchādanavarjitāt kālavācinaḥ sukhādibhyaś ca paraṃ ktāntaṃ kṛtamitapratipannān varjayitvā bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46531: etesu bahuvrīhiṣu niṣṭhāntasya pūrvanipāto na bhavaty eva asmād eva jñāpakāt /
GS24jvkasipu:46537: jātaśabde uttarapade vā anta udātto bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46553: nañsubhyāṃ param uttarapadaṃ bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46561: samāsāntāś ca avayavā bhavanti iti anṛcaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:46562: bahvṛcaḥ ity atra kṛte samāsānte 'ntodāttatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46566: nañsubhyā kapi parataḥ pūrvam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46576: hrasvo 'nto yasya tad idaṃ hrasvāntam uttarapadaṃ samāso vā,
GS24jvkasipu:46577: tatra antyāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati kapi parato nañsuhyāṃ paraṃ bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:46583: pūrvam iti vartamane punaḥ pūrvagrahaṇaṃ pravṛttibhedena niyamapratipattyartham,
GS24jvkasipu:46587: sujñakaḥ ity atra kabantasya+eva antodāttatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46591: utarapadārthabahutve yo bahuśabdo vartate tasmāt naña iva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46593: ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46597: ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46602: ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46607: ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46617: buṇādayo 'vayavavācino bahor uttare bahuvrīhau nāntodāttāḥ bhavanti bahuguṇā rajjuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46630: upasargāt svāṅgaṃ dhruvaṃ parśuvarjitam antodāttaṃ bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:46636: satataṃ yasya pragataṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ bahvati sa prapṛṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46648: samāsamātre vanam ity etad uttarapadam upasargāt paramantodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46663: antaḥśabdaś ca uttarapadam upasargād antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46670: ni vi ity etābhyām uttaro 'ntaḥśabdo na anatodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46679: parer uttaram abhitobhavivacanaṃ maṇḍalaṃ ca antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46688: yac ca+evaṃ svabhāvaṃ kūlādi tad abhitobhāvigrahaṇena gṛhyate // [#696]
GS24jvkasipu:46712: niṣkrāntaḥ kālakāt iti kanpratyayāntena kālaśabdena prādisamāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46739: iti siddhe vacanam abahuvrīhyartham adhruvārtham asvāṅgārthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:46748: tatra api hi pari-praty-upa-apā varjyamāna. ahorātra-avyaveṣu (*6,2.33) ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:46753: sphiga pūta vīṇā añjas adhvan kukṣi ity etāny uttarapadāni sīranāmāni ca nāmaśabdaś ca apād uttarāṇy antodāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46760: iti yadā samāsānto na asti tadā anena antodāttatvaṃ bhavati / [#697]
GS24jvkasipu:46762: tasmin hi saty acpratyayasya cittvād eva siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:46763: anityaś ca samāsāntaḥ ity etad eva jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:46772: sphigapūtakukṣīṇāṃ grahaṇam abahuvrīhyartham adhruvārtham asvāṅgārthaṃ ca //
GS24jvkasipu:46781: adhyārūḍho vā dantaḥ iti samānādhikaraṇa uttarapadalopī samassaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46782: dantasya+upari yo 'nyoḥ danto jāyate sa ucyate adhidantaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46788: anor uttaram apradhānavāci kanīyaḥ ca antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46808: ateḥ paramakṛdantaṃ padaśabdaś ca antodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46841: rājaśabdaḥ samāsāntasya anityatvād yadā ṭaj na asti tadā prayojayati /
GS24jvkasipu:46842: tasmin hi sati cittvād eva antodāttatvaṃ siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:46844: pratigatāḥ aṃśavaḥ asya pratyaṃśuḥ ayam uṣṭraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46859: upād uttaraṃ dvyac ajinaṃ ca antodāttaṃ bhavati tatpuruṣe samāse gaurādīn varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:46886: suśabdāt paramuttarapadaṃ tatpuruṣe samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati avakṣepaṇe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:46888: iha khalu idānīṃ susthaṇḍile susphigābhyāṃ supratyavasitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46898: utpucchaśabde tatpuruṣe vibhāṣā anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46902: tadā thāthādisūtreṇa nityam antodāttatve prāpte vikalpo 'yam iti seyam ubhayatra vibhāṣa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46903: tatpuruṣe ity eva udastaṃ puccham asya utpucchaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:46907: dvi tri ity etābhyām uttaresu pād dat mūrdhan ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu yo bahuvrīhiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:46917: mūrdhan iti tvakṛtasamāsanto nānta eva mūrdhanśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46918: tasya etat prayojanam asatyapi samāsānte 'ntodāttatvaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:46921: yadā 'pi samāsāntaḥ kriyate tadā api bahuvrīheḥ kāryitvāt tadekadeśatvāc ca samāsāntasya antodāttatvaṃ pakṣe bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:46935: saḥ akrāntāt paro vibhāṣā antodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46947: chandasi visaye parādiḥ udātto bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:46954: parādiś ca prāntaś ca pūrvāntaś ca api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46955: pūrvādayaś ca dṛśyante vyatyayo bahulaṃ smṛtaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:46957: parāntaś ca -- antodāttaprakaraṇe tricakrādīnāṃ chandasy upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:46962: divodāsāya samagāya te ity evam ādi sarvaṃ saṅgṛhītaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46963: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // [#700]
GS24jvkasipu:46970: aluk iti ca, uttarapade iti ca etad adhikṛtam veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:46971: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo 'luk uttarapade ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:46980: anyārtham idam uttarapadagrahaṇam iha apy aluko nivṛtiṃ karoti ity evam arthaṃ lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣā na aśrayitavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:46985: tebhyaḥ parasyāḥ pañcamyāḥ uttarapade aluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46992: samāse kṛte prātipadikatvāt supo luki prāpte pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46993: dvivacanabahuvacanāntānāṃ tu stokādīnām anabhidhānāt samāsa eva na bhavati stokābhyāṃ muktaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:46995: tena atra na kadācid aikapadyam aikasvaryaṃ ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46999: tasya vyutpattir asatā satā vā avayavārthena kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:47003: ojas sahas ambhas tamas ity etebhya uttarasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ aluk bhavati uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:47017: manasaḥ uttarasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ sañjñāyām alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47026: ājñāyinyuttārapade manasaḥ uttarasya tṛtīyāyāḥ alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47032: ātmanaḥ uttarasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ pūraṇapratyayānte utārapade 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47039: bahuvrīhir ayam ātmā caturtho 'sya asau ātmacaturthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:47045: yayā sañjñayā vaiyākaraṇā eva vyaharanti tasyām ātmanaḥ uttarasyāś caturthyā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47053: parasya ca yā caturthī tasya vaiyākaraṇākhyāyām alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47059: halantād adantāc ca+uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ sañjñāyām alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47062: gaviṣṭhiraḥ ity atra tu gaviyudhibhyāṃ sthiraḥ (*8,3.95)
GS24jvkasipu:47077: hṛd div ity etebhyām uttarasya ṅer alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47084: prācāṃ deśe yatkāranāma tatra halādav uttarapade haladantād uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47107: madhyād uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ gurāv uttarapade 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47115: mūrdha-mastaka-varjitāt svāṅgād uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ akāme uttarapade 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47133: tasminn uttarapade haladanttad uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ vibhāṣā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47139: svaṅgād dhi bahuvrihau pūrveṇa nityam aluk prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:47140: tatpuruṣe tu svaṅgād asvāṅgāc ca na-in-siddha-badhnātisu ca (*6,3.19)
GS24jvkasipu:47147: tatpuruṣe samāse kṛdante uttarapade saptamyāḥ bahulam alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47157: prāvṛṭ śarat kāla div ity eteṣāṃ je uttarapade saptamyāḥ aluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47167: varṣa kṣara śara vara ity etebhya uttarasyaḥ saptamyāḥ je uttarapade vibhāṣā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47177: tanapratyaye ca parataḥ kālanāmnaḥ uttarasyāḥ saptamyā vibhāṣā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47190: uttarapadādhikāre pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhir na+iṣyate hṛdayasya hṛllekha iti lekhagrahaṇāl liṅgāt /
GS24jvkasipu:47197: śaya vāsa vāsin ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣv akālavācinaḥ uttarasyāḥ saptamyā vibhāṣā aluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47210: apsu bhavaḥ iti digāditvād yat pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47215: innante uttarapade siddhaśabde badhnātau ca parataḥ saptamyāḥ alug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47224: ghañante hi bandhe ca vibhāṣā (*6,3.13) ity uktam // [#704]
GS24jvkasipu:47229: sthe ca+uttarapade bhāṣāyām saptamyā aluk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47240: ākrośe gamyamāne uttarapade ṣaṣṭhyā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47245: ṣaṣthīprakarane vāgdikpaśyadbhyo yuktidaṇḍahareṣu yathāsaṅkhyam alug vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47255: devānāmpriya ity atra ca ṣaṣṭhyā alug vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47266: putraśabde uttarapade ākrośe gamyamāne 'nyatarasyāṃ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47276: ṛkārāntebhyo vidyasambandhavacibhyo yonisambandhavācibhyaś ca+uttarasyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47293: svasṛ pati ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ ṛkārāntebhyaḥ vidyāyonisambandhavācibhyaḥ vibhāṣā 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47300: yadā tu aluk tadā mātuḥ piturbhyam anyatarasyām (*8,3.85)
GS24jvkasipu:47309: ṛkārāntānāṃ vidyāyonisambhandhavācināṃ yo dvandvas tatra+uttarapade pūrvapadasya ānaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47318: putre ity atra anuvartate, ṛtaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:47319: tena putraśabde 'py uttarapade ṛkārāntasya anaṅādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47325: devatāvācināṃ yo dvandvaḥ tatra+uttarapade pūrvapadasya ānaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47329: dvandve iti vartamāne punar dvandvagrahaṇaṃ prasiddhasahācaryārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:47330: atyantasahacarite lokavijñāte dvandvam ity etat nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47331: tatra ye loke prasiddhasāhacaryā vede ca ye sahavāpanirdiṣṭās teṣām iha grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47333: śivavaiśravaṇau ity evam ādau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47340: soma varuṇa ity etayoḥ devatādvandve agneḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47348: kṛtavṛddhāv uttarapade devatādvandve agneḥ ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47364: div ity etasya dyāvā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati devatādvandve uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:47370: pṛthivyām uttarapade devatādvandve divo divas ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47376: kathaṃ dyāvā cid asmai pṛthivī namete iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:47381: uṣasaḥ uṣāsā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati devatādvandve uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:47387: mātarapitarau ity udīcāmācāryāṇāṃ matenāraṅādeśaḥ mātṛśabdasya nipatyate mātarapitarau /
GS24jvkasipu:47403: striyāḥ puṃvad-bhāṣītapuṃskādanūṅ samānādhikaraṇe striyām apūraṇī-priyādiṣu // PS_6,3.34 //
GS24jvkasipu:47405: bhāṣitaḥ pumān yena samānāyāmākṛtāvekasmin pravṛttinimitte sa bhāṣitapuṃskaḥ śabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47407: bhāsitaḥ pumān yasminn arthe pravṛttinimite sa bhāṣitapuṃskaśabdena+ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:47408: tasya pratipādako yaḥ śabdaḥ so 'pi bhāsitapuṃskaḥ ūṅo 'bhāvaḥ anūṅ,
GS24jvkasipu:47409: bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ yasmin strīśabde sa bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ strīśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47412: tasya bhāsitapuṃskāadanūṅaḥ strīśabdasya puṃśabdasyeva rūpaṃ bhavati samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade strīliṅge pūraṇīpriyādivarjite /
GS24jvkasipu:47433: kalyāṇī pañcamī yāsāṃ tāḥ kalyāṇīpañcamā rātrayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47436: iha mā bhūt, kalyāṇīpañcamīkaḥ pakṣaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47438: ity atra api pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam eva ity appratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47456: dṛḍhabhaktiḥ ity evam ādiṣu strīpūrvapadasya avivakṣitvāt siddham iti samādheyam //
GS24jvkasipu:47461: ity ataḥ prabhṛti saṅkhyāyāḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane kṛtvasuc (*5,4.17)
GS24jvkasipu:47462: iti prāgetasmād ye pratyayāḥ tesu bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ striyāḥ puṃvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47490: katham āgnāyī devatā asya āgneyaḥ sthālīpākaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:47498: kyaṅi parato mānini ca stiryā bhāṣitapuṃskād anūṅ puṃvat bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47504: iha tu darśanīyāmātmānaṃ manyate darśanīyamāninī iti pūrveṇa+eva siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:47526: sañjñāyāḥ pūraṇyāś ca striyāḥ puṃvadbhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47548: vṛddher nimittaṃ yasmin sa vṛddhinimittaḥ taddhitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:47549: sa yadi rakte 'rthe vikāre ca na vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:47569: lohasya vikāro lauhīm lauhī īṣā yasya rathasya sa lauheṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47574: svāṅgād uttaro ya īkāraḥ tadantāyāḥ striyāḥ na puṃvad bhavati amānini parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47590: jāteś ca striyāḥ na puṃvad bhavati amānini parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47605: karmadharaye samāse jātīya deśīya ity etayoś ca pratyayayoḥ bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ striyāḥ puṃvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47645: strītvena vinā pūrvapadārtho 'tra jatiḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47658: tatra tadrājapratyayasya striyamataśca iti luki kṛte iḍabiḍvṛndārikā iti vigṛhya samāsaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47665: gha rūpa kopa celaṭ brūva gotra mata hata ity eteṣū parato bhāṣitapuṃskat paro yo ṅīpratyayas tadantasya anekāco hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47676: brauva iti bravīti iti bruvaḥ pacādyuaci,
GS24jvkasipu:47689: nadyāḥ śeṣasya ghādiṣu parato hrasvo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:47691: aṅī ca yā nadī ṅyantaṃ ca yad ekac /
GS24jvkasipu:47704: ug-itaś ca parasyāḥ nadyāḥ ghādiṣu anyatarasyām hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47712: prakarṣayogāt prāk strītvasyā vivakṣitatvād vā siddham // [#711]
GS24jvkasipu:47717: samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade jātīye ca pratyaye parato mahataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47725: lakṣaṇoktatvād eva atra na bhaviṣyati iti ced bahuvrīhāv api na syād mahābāhuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47727: amahān mahān sampanno mahadbhūtaścandramāḥ ity atra gauṇatvān mahadarthasya na bhavatyātvam /
GS24jvkasipu:47728: mahadātve ghāsakaraviśiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānaṃ puṃvadvacanaṃ ca asamānādhikaraṇārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:47743: dvi aṣṭan ity etayoḥ ākārādeśo bhavati saṅkhyāyām uttarapade abahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47765: tri ity etasya trayas ity ayam ādeśo bhavati saṅkhyāyām abahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47779: catvāriṃśatprabhṛtau saṃkhyāyām uttarapade 'bahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ sarveṣām dvi aṣṭan tri ity eteṣāṃ yad uktaṃ tadvibhāṣa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47792: hṛdayasya hṛt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati lekha yat aṇ lāsa ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47804: śoka syañ roga ity eteṣu parataḥ hṛdayasya vā hṛdādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47818: pādasya pada ity ayam ādeśo bhavati āji āti ga upahata ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:47822: pāde ca ity auṇādikaḥ iṇ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47823: tatra ajer vībhavo na bhavati ata eva nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:47827: tasya sthāne padādeśaḥ upadeśe eva antodātto nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:47831: padaga ity eteṣu kṛtsvareṇa samāsasya+eva antodāttatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:47835: yatpratyaye parataḥ pādasya pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty atadarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:47853: hima kāṣin hati ity eteṣu pādaśabdasya pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47860: ṛkṣambandhinaḥ pādaśabdasya śe parataḥ pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47862: pādaṃ pādaṃ śaṃsati iti saṅkhyaikavacanāc ca vīpsāyām (*5,4.43)
GS24jvkasipu:47869: ghoṣa miśra śabda ity eteṣu ca+uttarapadeṣu pādasya vā pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47879: udakaśabdasya sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati uttarapade parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47892: peṣaṃ vāsa vāhana dhi ity eteṣu ca+uttarapadesu udakasya uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47904: tasminn ekahalādau pūrayitavyavāciny anyatarasyām udakasya uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47916: mantha odana saktu bindu vajra bhāra hāra vīvadha gāha ity eteṣu uttarapadesu udakasya uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:47938: igantasya aṅyantasya uttarapade hrasvaḥ bhavati gālavasya ācaryasya matena anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:47981: ṅyantasya abantasya ca sañjñāchandasoḥ bahulaṃ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48006: tvapratyaye parato ṅyāpoḥ bahulaṃ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48014: iṣṭakeṣīkāmālānāṃ cita tūla bhārin ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48033: anavyayasya ity etad eva jñāpakam iha khidantagrahaṇasya //
GS24jvkasipu:48037: arus dviṣat ity etayor ajanatānāṃ ca khidanta uttarapade mumāgamo bhavati anavyayasya /
GS24jvkasipu:48052: ijantasya ekācaḥ khidante uttarapade amāgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:48053: ampratyayavac ca dvitīyaikavacanavac ca sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48060: ampratyayavac ca ity atideśāt ātvapūrvasavarṇaguṇeyaṅuvaṅādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48066: śriyam ātmānaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ manyate ity upakramya śrimanyam iti bhavitavyam iti bhāṣye vyavasthitam ?
GS24jvkasipu:48068: atra viṣaye parityaktasvaliṅgaḥ śrīśabdo brāhmaṇakule vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:48082: kāraśabda uttarapade satya agada ity etayor mumāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48110: sūtograrājabhojamervityetebhya uttarasya duhitṛśabdasya putraḍādeśo vā vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48119: anyatra api hi dṛśyate śailaputrī iti // [#717]
GS24jvkasipu:48124: śyena tila ity etayoḥ pātaśabde uttarapade ñapratyaye pare mumāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48131: rātreḥ kṛdanta uttarapade vibhāṣā mumāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48152: tasmāl luptanakārān nañaḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati ajādav uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:48157: pūrvānte hi ṅamo hrasvād aci ṅmuṇ nityam (*8,3.32)
GS24jvkasipu:48162: nabhrāṭ napāt navedāḥ nāsatyāḥ namuci nakula nakha napuṃsaka nakṣatra nakra nāka ity eteṣu nañ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48175: nakha - na asya kham asti iti nakham /
GS24jvkasipu:48176: napuṃsaka - na strī na pumān napuṃsakam /
GS24jvkasipu:48178: nakṣatra - na kṣarate kṣīyate iti vā najñātram /
GS24jvkasipu:48192: pūrvānto 'yam āduk kriyate padāntalakṣaṇo 'tra anunāsiko vikalpena yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48207: sahaśabdasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48215: udāttānudāttavato hi sahaśabdasya antaryataḥ svaritaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48223: granthānte adhike ca vartamānasya sahaśabdasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48228: saṅgrahāntam iti antavacane ity avyayībhāvaḥ samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48229: tatra avyayībhāve cākāle iti kālavāciny uttarapade samāso na prāpnoti ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48236: dvayoḥ sahayuktayor apradhāno yaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48237: upākhyāyate pratyakṣata upalabhyate yaḥ sa upākhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48239: tasmin dvitīye 'nupākhye sahasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48243: agnyādayaḥ sākṣād anupalabhyamānāḥ kapotādibhir anumīyamānāḥ anupākhyā bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:48247: avyayībhāve ca samāse akālavācini uttarapade sahasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48257: yasya sarve 'vayavā upasarjanībhūtāḥ sa sarvopasarjano bahuvrīhir gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48258: tadavayavasya sahaśabdasya vā sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48266: priyasahakṛtvā iti iha bahuvrīhau yad uttarapadaṃ tat paraḥ sahaśabdo na bhavati iti sabhāvo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48270: prakṛtyā sahaśabdo bhavati āśiṣi viṣaye agovatsahaleṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:48282: samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye mūrdhan prabhṛti udakam ity etāni uttarapadāni varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:48297: sajātīyaḥ ity evam ādayaḥ siddhāḥ bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:48301: jyotis janapada rātri nābhi nāman gotra rūpa sthāna varṇa vayas vacana bandhu ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48316: caraṇe gamyamāne brahmacāriṇi uttarapade samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48319: tadadhyayanārthaṃ yad vrataṃ tad api brahma,
GS24jvkasipu:48321: samānaḥ tasya+eva brahmaṇeḥ samānatvad ity ayam artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48326: tīrthaśabda uttarapade yatpratyaye parataḥ samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48334: udaraśabde uttarapade yatpratyayānte samānasya vibhāṣā sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48336: samānodare śayita o ca+udāttaḥ (*4,4.108) iti yat //
GS24jvkasipu:48340: dṛk dṛśa vatu ity eteṣu parataḥ samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48344: ity atra samānānyayośceti vaktavyam iti kañkvinau pratyayau kriyete /
GS24jvkasipu:48352: idaṃ kim ity etayor īś kī ity etau yathāsaṅkhyam ādeśau bhavato dṛgdṛśavatuṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:48378: viṣvag-devayoś ca ṭer adry añcatau vapratyaye // PS_6,3.92 //
GS24jvkasipu:48380: viṣvak deva ity etayoḥ sarvanāmnaś ca ṭeḥ adri ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcatau vapratyayānte uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:48385: tatra yaṇādeśe kṛte udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:48393: ayaskāraḥ ity atra ataḥ kṛkamikaṃsakumbhapātra iti satvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48395: viśvāī ca ghṛtācī ca ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48396: kadrīcī ity atra tu bhavaty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:48400: sam ity etasya sami ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcatau vapratyayante uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:48405: tiras ity etasya tiri ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcāu vapratyayānte uttarapade 'lope,
GS24jvkasipu:48414: saha ity etasya saghriḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcatau vapratyānte uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:48422: chandasi viṣaye māda stha ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ sahasya sadha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48429: dvi antar ity etābhyāṃ upasargāc ca uttarasya ap ity etasya īkārādeśo bhavati / [#721]
GS24jvkasipu:48445: anor uttarasya apaḥ ūkārādeśo bhavati deśābhidhāne /
GS24jvkasipu:48453: aṣaṣthīsthasya atṛtīyāsthasya ca anyaśabdasya dugāgamo bhavati āśis āśā āsthā āsthita utsuka ūti kāraka rāga cha ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48475: arthaśade uttarapade anyasya vibhāṣā dugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48480: ku ity etasya kta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati tatpuruṣe samāse ajādāv uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:48495: ratha vada ity etayoś ca+uttarapadayoḥ koḥ kat ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48501: dṛṇaśabde uttarapade jātāv abhidheyāyāṃ koḥ kat ity ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48508: pathin akṣa ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ koḥ kā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48514: īṣadarthe vartamānasya koḥ kā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48517: ajādāv api paratvāt kādeśa eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48523: puruṣaśabde uttarapade vibhāṣā koḥ kā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48526: īṣadarthe tu pūrvavipratiṣedhena nityaṃ kā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48531: uṣṇaśabde uttarapade koḥ kavam ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:48537: pathiśabde uttarapade chandasi viṣaye koḥ kavam kā ity etāv ādeśau bhavato vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:48545: yeṣu lopāgamavarnavikārāḥ śāstreṇa na vihitāḥ dṛśyante ca,
GS24jvkasipu:48562: ūrdhvakhaśabdayoḥ ulū khala ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48572: dikśabdebhya uttarasya tīrasya tārabhāvo vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48577: vāco vāde ḍatvaṃ ca labhāvaś ca+uttarapadasya+iñi pratyaye bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48583: dhāsu vā ṣaṣa utvaṃ bhavaty uttarapadādeśca ṣṭutvam /
GS24jvkasipu:48586: iha mā bhūt, ṣaṭ dadhāti dhayati vā ṣaḍdhā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48588: kucchreṇa dāśyate nāśyate dabhyate ca yaḥ sa dūḍāśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48601: varṇāgamo varṇaviparyayaś ca dvau cāparau varṇavikāranāśau /
GS24jvkasipu:48604: saṅkhyā-vi-sāya-pūrvasya ahnasya ahann anyatarasyāṃ ṅau // PS_6,3.110 //
GS24jvkasipu:48606: saṅkhyā vi sāya ity evaṃpūrvasya ahnaśabdasya sthāne ahan ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyāṃ ṅau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48617: ekadeśisamāsaḥ pūrvādibhyo 'nyasya api bhavati ity etad eva visāyapūrvasya ahnasya grahaṇaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:48618: tena madhyamahnaḥ madhyāhnaḥ ity api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48641: sahi vahi ity etayoḥ avarṇasya okāra ādeśo bhavati ḍhralope /
GS24jvkasipu:48659: sādhyai sāḍhvā sāḍhā iti nigame nipātyanate /
GS24jvkasipu:48671: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ saṃhitāyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48673: vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām /
GS24jvkasipu:48680: karṇaśabde uttarapade lakṣaṇavācino dīrgho bhavati viṣṭa aṣṭan pañcan maṇi bhinna chinna chidra sruva svastika ity etān varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:48686: yat paśūnāṃ svāmiviśeṣasambandhajñāpanārthaṃ dātrākārādi kriyate tad iha lakṣaṇaṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48702: nahi vṛti vṛṣi vyadhi ruci sahi tani ity eteṣu kvipratyayānteṣu uttarapadeṣu pūrvapadasya dīrgho bhavati saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48723: vana giri ity etayor uttarapadayor yathāsaṅkhyaṃ koṭaradīnām kiṃśulukādīnāṃ ca dīrgho bhavati sajñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48764: matau parato bahvaco 'jirādivarjitasya dīrgho bhavati sañjñāyām viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48784: śarādīnāṃ ca matau dīrgho bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48802: igantasya pūrvapadasya pīluvarjitasya vahe uttarapade dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48814: upasargasya ghañante uttarapade amanuṣye 'bhidheye bahulaṃ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48836: igantasya upasargasya kāśaśabde uttarapade dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48847: dā ity etasya yaḥ takārādir ādeśaḥ tasmin parataḥ igantasya+upasargasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48852: ity antasya yady api takāraḥ kriyate tathāpi cartvasyāśrayāt siddhatvam iti takārādir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48861: aṣṭan ity etasya uttarapade sañjñāyāṃ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48875: aṣṭau pādau asyāḥ iti bahuvrīhau pādasya lope kṛte pādo 'nyatarasyām (*4,1.8) iti ṅīp /
GS24jvkasipu:48876: gavi ca yukte bhāṣāyāmāṣṭano dīrgho bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48888: viśvaśabdasya vasu rāṭ ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ dirgha ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48891: rāṭ iti vikāranirdeśo yatra asya etad rūpaṃ tatra+eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48898: naraśabda uttarapade sañjñāyām viṣaye viśvasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48906: mitre ca+uttarapade ṛṣāvabhidheye viśvasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48913: manraviṣaye soma aśva indriya viśvadevya ity eteṣāṃ matuppratyaye parataḥ dīrtho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48922: oṣadhiśabdasya vibhaktāv aprathamāyāṃ parataḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48932: ṛci viṣaye tu nu gha makṣu taṅ ku tra uruṣya ity eṣāṃ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48948: igantaraya suñi parato mantraviṣaye dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48958: vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām /
GS24jvkasipu:48969: nipātasya ca ṛgviṣaye dīrgḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49025: akṛta eva dīrghatve hrasvabhāvapakṣe kṛtārthena api dīrgheṇa pakṣāntare paratvād hrasvo bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49027: sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tadbādhitam eva iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49028: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ // [#731]
GS24jvkasipu:49036: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ aṅgasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49052: aṅgādhikāraḥ kṛto 'nyārtho nāmi dīrghatvādyapi vyavasthāpayati iti tadartham arthavadgrahaṇaparibhāṣā nāśrayitavyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49053: aṅgasya iti sambandhasāmānye eṣā ṣaṣṭhī yathāyogaṃ viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:49056: tato 'kārāntād aṅgāt bhisa ais ity evam ādy api samyak sampannaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:49060: aṅgāvayavād dhalo yad uttaraṃ samprasāraṇam tadantasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49070: tṛtīyā iti vā nipātanād atra dīrghābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49076: nām iti etat ṣaṣṭhībahuvacanam āgatanuṭkaṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49086: nāmi dīrgha āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghe na nuṭ bhavet /
GS24jvkasipu:49092: tisṛ catasṛ ity etayoḥ nāmi dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49095: idam eva nāmi iti dīrghapratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam aci ra ṛtaḥ (*7,2.100)
GS24jvkasipu:49096: ity etasmāt pūrvavipratiṣedhena nuḍāgamo bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49100: chandasi vaṣaye tisṛ-catasroḥ nāmi parataḥ ubhayathā dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:49109: nṛ ity etasya nāmi pare ubhayathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49111: tvaṃ nṛṇāṃ nṛpate kecid atra chandasi iti na anuvartayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:49116: nāntasya aṅgasya upadhāyāḥ nāmi parato dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49126: sarvanāmasthāne ca parato 'sambuddhau nopadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49138: ṣapūrvasya acaḥ nopadhāyāḥ nigamaviṣaye sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ asambuddhau vā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49149: sakārāntasya saṃyogasya yo nakāraḥ mahataś ca tasya+upadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ asambuddhau /
GS24jvkasipu:49164: svasṛ naptṛ neṣṭṛ tvaṣtṛ kṣattṛ hotṛ potṛ paśāstṛ ity eteṣāṃ cāṅgānām upadhāyā dīrgho bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parato 'sambuddhau /
GS24jvkasipu:49167: tatra samāsānto vidhiranityaḥ iti samāsānto na kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49168: nityam api ca numamakṛtva dīrghatvam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49193: evam bhūtānām anyeṣāṃ sañjñāśabdānāṃ dīrgho mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49201: in han pūṣan aryaman ity evam antānām aṅgānāṃ śau parata upadhāyā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49209: inhanpūṣāryamṇām upadhāyaḥ śāv eva dīrgho bhavati na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:49215: dīrghavidhirya ihenprabhṛtīnāṃ taṃ viniyamya suṭīti suvidvān /
GS24jvkasipu:49216: śau niyamaṃ punar eva vidadhyāt bhrūṇahanīti tathāsya na duṣyet //
GS24jvkasipu:49217: śāsmi nivartya suṭītyaviśeṣe śau niyamaṃ kuru vāpyasamīkṣya /
GS24jvkasipu:49218: dīrghavidherupadhāniyamānme hanta yi dīrghavidhau ca na doṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:49220: yasya hi śau niyamaḥ suṭi naitattena na tatra bhavedviniyamyam //
GS24jvkasipu:49222: iti dīrghatvaṃ yat tad api niyamena bādhyate vṛtrahaṇi,
GS24jvkasipu:49229: śau eva sarvanāmasthāne dīrgho bhavati na anyatra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49231: yas tu na upadhālakṣaṇaḥ sa bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:49234: atha va anuvartamāne 'pi sarvanāmasthānagrahaṇe sāmarthyādayam aviśeṣeṇa niyamaḥ /
