GS24jvkasipu:49236: na ca tasya anyat sarvanāmasthānam asti ity aviśeṣeṇa niyamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49237: tatra tu napuṃsakasya ity etan na aśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49238: tena anapuṃsakasya api dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49239: sarvanāmasthānasañjñāvidhāne tu napuṃsakasya vyāpāro 'sti iti tatra niyamaḥ kriyamaṇo napuṃsakasya syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:49243: sāv asambuddhau parataḥ inhanpūṣaryamṇām upadhāyā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49254: atu as ity evam antasya adhātor upadhāyāḥ sāvasambuddhau parataḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49260: yadi hi paratvān nityatvāc ca num syat,
GS24jvkasipu:49269: aninasmaṅgrahaṇānyarthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49278: anunāsikāntasya aṅgasya upadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati kvipratyaye parato jhalādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:49299: ajantānām aṅgānaṃ hanigamyoś ca sani jhalādau pare dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49307: iha mā bhūt sañjigaṃsate vatso mātra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49308: svargaṃ lokaṃ samajigāṃsat iti chandasi yadaniṅādeśasya api dīrghatvaṃ dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:49311: atha vā iha ajgrahaṇaṃ na kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49312: sani dīrgho bhavati ity etāvadeva sūtraṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49313: tatrācā gṛhyamāṇasya viśeṣaṇe sati siddham ajantasya dīrghatvam ?
GS24jvkasipu:49314: tat kriyate pravṛttibhedena gamer api viśeṣaṇārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:49317: tato na vaktavyam idaṃ gameriṅādeśasya iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49321: tanoter aṅgasya sani jhalādau vibhāṣā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49325: sanīvantardha ity atra tanoter upasaṅkhyānād iḍāgamo bhavati vikalpena //
GS24jvkasipu:49329: krama upadhāyā vibhāṣā dirgho bhavati ktvā pratyaye jhalādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49332: prakramya, upakramya iti bahiraṅgo 'pi lyabādeśo 'ntaraṅgānapi vidhīn bādhate iti pūrvam eva dīrghatvaṃ na pravartate //
GS24jvkasipu:49337: vakārasya ca sthāne yathāsaṅkhyam ś ūṭḥ ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:49338: anunāsikādau pratyayai parataḥ kvau jhalādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:49344: siverauṇādike na pratyaye laghūpadhaguṇāt pūrvamūṭḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49345: tatra kṛte 'ntaraṅgatvād yaṇādeśo nānāśrayatvāt ca na vārṇādāṅgaṃ balīyaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49352: asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgamantaraṅge iti nājānantarye iti pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49361: kecid atra kṅiti iti na anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:49363: dyubhiḥ iti ūṭhi kṛte ? diva ut (*6,1.131)
GS24jvkasipu:49365: chaśāṃ ṣaḥ ity atra chagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49369: vāha ūṭḥ (*6,4.139) ity ayam api ṭhideva //
GS24jvkasipu:49373: jvara tvara srivi ava mava ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ vakārasya upadhāyāś ca sthāne ūṭḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati kvau parato 'nunāsike jhalādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:49393: rephāduttarayoḥ chvorlopo bhavati kvau parato jhalādau kṅiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49406: rāllope sutukkasya chasya abhāvāt kevalo gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49421: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ tad asiddhavat bhavati ity evaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49425: tac ced atra yatra bhavati tadā bhāt śāstrīyaṃ vidhīyate tadāśrayam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49426: vyāśrayaṃ tu nāsiddhavad bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49429: edhi, śādhi ity atra etvaśābhāvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ jhallakṣaṇaṃ dhitvaṃ na prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:49431: āgahi, jahi ity atra anunāsika lope jabhāve ca ato heḥ (*6,4.105)
GS24jvkasipu:49437: iti vṛddhau kartavyāyāṃ nalopo nāsiddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49442: vasusaṃprasāraṇam āllope yaṇādeśe uvaṅādeśe ca kartavye nāsiddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49444: vasantasya vibhaktau saṃprasāraṇam iti samānāśrayatvaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:49450: tasyāṃ pravartamānāyāṃ vasusaṃprasāraṇādīnāmābhācchāstrīyāṇām eva asiddhatvād antaraṅgabahiraṅgayoḥ yugapat samupasthāpanaṃ na asti iti paribhāṣa na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:49469: supi ca (*7,3.102) iti paratvāt kṛte 'pi dīrghatve sthānivadbhavāt nalopaḥ syād eva /
GS24jvkasipu:49470: viśnānām, praśnānām ity atra lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya+eva ity evaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:49474: aniditām aṅgānāṃ halantānām upadhāyāḥ nakārasya lopo bhavati kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49489: aniditāṃ nalope laṅgikampyor upatāpaśarīravikārayor upasaṅkhyānaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49511: daṃśa sañja ṣvañja ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ śapi parata upadhāyā nakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49518: rañjeś ca śapi parataḥ upadhāyāḥ nakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49524: bhāvakaranavācini ghañi parato rañjeḥ upadhāyā nakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49535: ikprakaraṇāt na dhātulopaḥ iti pratiṣedho na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:49544: avoda edha odma praśratha himaśratha ity ete nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:49545: avoda iti underavapūrvasya ghañi nalopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49546: edha iti indher ghañi nalopo guṇaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49549: odma iti underauṇādike manpratyaye nalopo guṇaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49550: praśratha iti prapūrvasya śrantherghañi nalopo vṛddhyabhavaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49551: himaśratha iti himapūrvasya śrantheḥ ghañyeva nipātanam //
GS24jvkasipu:49555: añceḥ pūjāyām arthe nakārasya lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49569: ktvāprayaye parataḥ skanda syanda ity etayor nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49574: tatra yadā iḍāgamaḥ tadā na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18)
GS24jvkasipu:49579: jāntānām aṅgānāṃ naśeś ca ktvāpratyaye parataḥ vibhāṣā nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49587: bhañjeś ca ciṇi parato vibhāṣā nakāralopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49594: śāsa upadhāyā ikārādeśo bhavati aṅi parato halādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:49600: ittve kṛte śāsivasighasīnāṃ ca (*8,3.60) iti ṣatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:49604: kvau ca śāsa ittvaṃ bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49607: yasmāt śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ śāsu anuśiṣṭau iti,
GS24jvkasipu:49609: āṅaḥ śāsu icchāyām iti asya na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49612: kvippratyaye tu tasya api bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49620: śāso hau parataḥ śā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49624: tataḥ śāsaḥ iti sthāneyogā ṣaṣṭhī bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49627: iti pittvaṃ hiśabdasya tadā apy ādeśo bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:49628: śādhi ity ādyudāttam api chandasi dṛśyate //
GS24jvkasipu:49632: hanterdhātoḥ jaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati hau parata /
GS24jvkasipu:49637: anudāttopadeśānām aṅgānāṃ vanateḥ tanotyādīnāṃ ca anunāsikalopo bhavati jhalādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49689: lyapi parataḥ anudāttopadeśavanatitanotyādīnām anunāsikalopaḥ vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49704: ktici parato 'nudāttopadeśādīnām anunāsikalopaḥ dīrghaś ca na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49728: viṭi vani ca pratyaye parataḥ anunāsikāntasya aṅgasya ākāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49739: iti ṣatvam goṣā indo nṛṣā asi ity atra /
GS24jvkasipu:49744: anunāsikasya iti vartamāne punar anunāsikagrahaṇam anunāsikāmātraparigrahārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:49750: jana sana khana ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ sani jhalādau kṅiti jhalādau pratyaye parataḥ ākāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49767: atra jhalādau kṅiti sanoter vipratiṣedhād ātvam anunāsikalopaṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:49769: iti halgrahaṇam jñāpakam asminnasiddhaprakaraṇe vipratiṣedho bhavati iti // [#742]
GS24jvkasipu:49774: yakārādau kṅiti pratyaye parato janasanakhanām ākāra ādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:49786: tanoteḥ yaki parato vibhāṣā ākāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49791: sanaḥ ktici lopaś ca asya anyatarasyām // PS_6,4.45 //
GS24jvkasipu:49793: sanoter aṅgasya ktici pratyaye parata ākāra ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49797: yesambaddhaṃ hi vibhāṣāgrahaṇam iti nivṛttam ity āśaṅkyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:49802: na lyapi (*6,4.69) iti prāg etasmād yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ārdhahdātuke ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49809: pratyayalopalakṣaṇapratiṣedhārthaṃ syāt ity etan na jñāpakaṃ śapo lopābhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:49838: syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu bhāvakarmaṇor upadeśe 'jjhanagrahadṛśāṃ vā ciṇvadiṭ ca (*6,4.62) /
GS24jvkasipu:49842: hriyeta yagantasya ajantatvāc ciṇvadbhāve sati vṛddhiḥ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:49844: ato lopo yalopaś ca ṇilopaś ca prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:49845: āllopa ītvam etvam ca ciṇvadbhavaś ca sīyuṭi //
GS24jvkasipu:49849: bhrasjo rephasya upadhāyāś ca ram anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49850: ropadhayoḥ iti sthānaṣaṣṭhīnirdeśāt upadhā rephaś ca nivartete /
GS24jvkasipu:49857: bhṛṣṭaḥ, bhṛṣṭavān ity atra pūrvavipratiṣedhena samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49883: hala uttarasya yaśabdasya ārdhadhātuke lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49889: ity etan na bhavati, ato lopaḥ (*6,4.48)
GS24jvkasipu:49898: kyasya hala uttarasya vibhāṣā lopo bhavati ārdhadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:49902: samidham iva ātmānam ācarati iti vā kyackyaṅau yathāyogam kartavyau //
GS24jvkasipu:49932: seḍgrahaṇasāmarthyād iha pūrveṇa api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49936: atha punaḥ ekācaḥ iti tatra anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:49937: tadā nityam atra bhavitavyam eva iḍāgamena iti seḍgrahaṇam anarthakam ?
GS24jvkasipu:49940: akṛte hi tatra ṇilope sati kāritam ity atra ekāca upadeśe 'nudāttāt (*7,2.10)
GS24jvkasipu:49945: janitā iti mantraviṣaye iḍādau ṇilopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49951: yajñakarmaṇi śamitā iti iḍādau tṛci ṇilopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49959: ām anta ālu āyya itnu iṣṇu ity eteṣu parataḥ ṇeḥ ayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49975: lyapi parato laghupūrvād varṇād uttarasya ṇeḥ ayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49983: hrasvayalopāl lopānām asiddhatvaṃ na bhavati asamānāśrayatvāt,
GS24jvkasipu:49991: āpa uttarasya ṇerlyapi parato vibhāṣā ayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50000: yu plu ity etayor lyapi parataḥ chandasi viṣaye dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50008: kṣiyaś ca dīrgho bhavati lyapi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50014: tābhyām anyatra yā niṣṭhā tasyāṃ kṣiyo dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50019: prakṣīṇam idam devadattasya iti kto 'dhikaraṇe ca dhrauvya-gati. pratyavasānārthebhyaḥ (*3,4.76)
GS24jvkasipu:50023: kṣitam iti bhāve dīrghābhāvāt kṣiyo dīrghāt (*8,2.46)
GS24jvkasipu:50028: ākrośe gamyamāne dainye ca kṣiyo niṣṭhāyām aṇyadarthe vā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50035: sya-sic-sīyuṭ-tāsiṣu bhāva-karmaṇor upadeśe 'j-jhana-graha-dṛśāṃ vā ciṇvad-iṭ ca // PS_6,4.62 //
GS24jvkasipu:50037: sva sic sīyuṭ tāsi ity eteṣu bhāvakarmaviṣayeṣu parata upadeśe ajantānām aṅgānāṃ han graḥ dṛś ity eteṣāṃ ca ciṇvat kāryaṃ bhavati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:50043: ciṇvadvṛddhir yuk ca hanteś ca ghatvaṃ dīrghaś ca+ukto yo mitāṃ vā ciṇīti /
GS24jvkasipu:50044: iṭ ca asiddhas tena me lupyate ṇirnityaś ca ayaṃ valnimitto vighātī // [#746]
GS24jvkasipu:50096: kāriṣyate iti guṇe kṛte raparatve ca na prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:50114: dīṅo yuḍāgamo bhavati ajādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50117: dīṅaḥ iti pañcamīnirdeśād ajāder yuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50119: iti yaṇādeśe kartavye tasya siddhatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50125: iṭy ajādāv ārdhadhātuke kṅiti ca ākārāntasya aṅgasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50140: rāter lāteś ca laṅi iṭi rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:50147: īkāraḥ ādeśo bhavati ākārantasya aṅgasya yati parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50156: mā sthā gā pā jahāti sā ity eteṣāṃ halādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50177: jahāter iha nirdeśāt jihāter grahaṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50185: etad eva halgrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam asmin prakaraṇe vipratiṣedhena asiddhatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50205: ghvādibhyaḥ anyasya saṃyogāder ākārāntasya vā ekārādeśo bhavati liṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50215: lyapi pratyaye parataḥ ghumāsthāgāpājahātisāṃ yaduktaṃ tanna /
GS24jvkasipu:50227: mayater ikārādeśo vā bhavati lyapi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50233: luṅ laṅ lṛṅ ity eteṣu parato 'ṅgasya aḍāgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50260: auhyata iti laṅi kṛte lāvasthāyām aḍāgamād antaraṅgatvāl lādeśaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:50261: tatra kṛte vikaraṇo nityatvād aḍāgamaṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:50263: kṛte hi vikaraṇāntasya aṅgasya tena bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:50264: akṛte tu dhātumātrasya śabdāntarasya prāpnuvan vidhiranityo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50266: vikaraṇe kṛte samprasāraṇam aḍāgamān nityatvād eva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50267: samprasāraṇe ca kṛte 'jādyaṅgaṃ jātam iti āḍajādīnām ity āḍāgamaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50272: yatra hi vihitaḥ tato 'nyatra api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50278: āvaḥ iti vṛño luṅi mantre ghasahvara iti lerluki kṛte ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50284: māṅyoge luṅlaṅlṛṅkṣu yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50296: chandasi viṣaye māṅyoge 'pi bahulam aḍāṭau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50301: māṅyoge 'pi bhavataḥ - mā vaḥ kṣetre parabījānyavāpsuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50308: ire ity etasya chadasi viṣaye bahulaṃ re ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50311: dhāño rebhāvasya asiddhatvād āto lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50314: atra reśabdasya seṭoṃ dhātūnāmiṭi kṛte punā rebhāvaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:50319: śnupratyayāntasya aṅgasya dhātoḥ ivarṇa-uvarṇāntasya bhru ity etasya iyaṅ uvaṅ ity etāv ādeśau bhavato 'jādau pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50345: iyaṅuvaṅprakaraṇe tanvādīnāṃ chandasi bahulam upasaṅkhyānaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50357: abhyāsasya ivarṇovarṇāntasya avasarṇe 'ci parataḥ iyaṅ uvaṅ ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50370: strī ity etasya ajādau pratyaye parataḥ iyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50377: ami śasi parataḥ striyāṃ vā iyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50391: madhye 'pavadāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti guṇavṛddhibhyāṃ paratvādayaṃ bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50399: dhātor avayavaḥ saṃyogaḥ pūrvo yasmād ivarṇāna bhavati asāvasaṃyogapūrvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50400: tadantasya aṅgasya anekāco 'ci parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50407: eḥ iti kim ? asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇam ivarṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:50409: luluvatuḥ, luluvuḥ ity etat tu oḥ supi (*6,4.83)
GS24jvkasipu:50417: iha api syād unnyau, unnyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50424: dhātv avayavaḥ saṃyogaḥ pūrvo yasmād uvarṇān na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50425: tadantasya aṅgasya anekācaḥ ajādau supi parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50445: varṣābhū ity etasya ajādau supi parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50457: bhū sudhī ity etayor yaṇādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50465: chandasi viṣaye bhū sudhi ity etayoḥ ubhayathā dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50474: hu ity etasya aṅgasya śnupratyayāntasya anekācaḥ asaṃyogapūrvasya ajādau sārvadhātuke parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50483: idam eva huśnugrahaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ bhāṣāyām api yaṅlugasti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50486: naca yaṅlugantādayat pratyudāharaṇam uvarṇāntam anekāc asaṃyogapūrvaṃ sārvadhātuke vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50494: bhuvo vugāgamo bhavati luṅi liṭi ca ajādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50501: goho 'ṅgasya upadhāyā ūkārādeśo bhavati ajādau pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50511: yatra asya+etad rūpaṃ tatra+eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:50515: nigūhya gataḥ ity ūtvasya asiddhatvād lyapi laghupūrvād iti ṇerayādeśaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:50516: vyāśrayatvād eva asiddhatvam atra na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:50524: doṣaḥ upadhāyā ūkāraḥ ādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50532: cittavikarārthe doṣa upadhāyā vā ūkārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50541: mito dhātavaḥ ghaṭādayo mitaḥ ity evam ādayo ye pratipāditāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50542: teṣām upadhāyā hrasvo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50552: saṅkrāmayati ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50556: ciṇpare ṇamulpare ca ṇau parataḥ mitām aṅgānām upadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati anyatarasyāṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:50566: śamayantaṃ prayuṅkte iti dvitīye ṇici hrasvavikalpo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:50567: ṇilopasya sthānivadbhāvād dīrghavidhau tvajādeśo na sthānivat /
GS24jvkasipu:50577: tayor dirghavidhau ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati iti asthānivadbhāvāt dīrghaḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50586: khacpare ṇau parato hrasvo bhavati aṅgasya upadhāyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50593: hlādo 'ṅgasya upadhāyāḥ hrasvo bhavati niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50604: chāder aṅgasya advyupasargasya ghapratyaye parataḥ upadhāyāḥ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50607: ṇilopasya asiddhatvaṃ sthānivadbhāvo vāvacanasāmarthyād atra na bhavati iti hrasvabhāvinī upadhā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50612: uttarā hi saṅkhyā pūrvasaṅkhyākṛtaṃ vyapadeśam nivartayati,
GS24jvkasipu:50618: is man tran kvi ity eteṣu parataḥ chādeḥ upadhāyāḥ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50627: gama hana jana khā ghasa ity eteṣām aṅgānām upadhāyā lopo bhavaty ajādau pratyaye kṅiti anaṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50647: tani pati ity etayoḥ chandasi viṣaye upadhāyā lopo bhavati ajādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50655: ghasi bhasa ity etayoḥ chandasi upadhāyā lopo bhavati lahādau ajādau ca kgiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50656: sagdhiś ca me sapītiś ca me /
GS24jvkasipu:50658: sagdhiḥ iti adeḥ ktini bahulaṃ chandasi iti ghaslādeśe upadhāyāḥ lope ca kṛte jhalo jhali (*8,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:50662: tataḥ samānā gdhiḥ sagdhiḥ iti samāse kṛte samānasya sabhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50663: babdhām iti bhaser loṭi tāmi ślau dvirvacane kṛte upadhālopasalopadhatvajaśtvāni kartavyāni /
GS24jvkasipu:50664: dvirvacanāt paratvān nityatvāc ca upadhālopaḥ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:50672: hu ity etasmād jhalantebhyas ca+uttarasya halādeḥ heḥ sthāne dhirādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50682: bhintāt tvam iti paratvāt tātaṅi kṛte sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhena yad badhitaṃ tad bādhitam eva iti punaḥ dhibhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50683: bhindhaki, chindhaki ity atra paratvād dhibhāve kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānād akac kriyate // [#754]
GS24jvkasipu:50688: śru śṛṇu pṝ kṛ vṛ ity etebhya uttarasya heḥ dhirādeśo havati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:50694: śṛṇudhi ity atra dhibhāvavidhānasāmārthyād utaś ca pratyayāt iti herluk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50723: ahāritamām ity atra talopasya asiddhatvāt taraptamapor na lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50724: ciṇo luk ity etad viṣayabhedād bhidyate //
GS24jvkasipu:50728: akārāntād aṅgād uttarasya heḥ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50741: ukāro yo 'saṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantāt pratyayād uttarasya herluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50753: utaś ca pratyayādityatra chandasi vā iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50759: lopaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ ṃvoḥ // PS_6,4.107 //
GS24jvkasipu:50761: yo 'yam ukāro 'saṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantasya pratyayasya anyatarasyāṃ lopo bhavati vakāram akārādau pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50774: karoteḥ uttarasya ukārapratyayasya vakāramakārādau pratyaye parataḥ nityaṃ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50784: yakārādauca pratyaye parataḥ karoteḥ uttarasya ukārapratyayasya nityaṃ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50789: ukārapratyayāntasya karoteḥ akārasya sthāne ukāraḥ ādeśo bhavati sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50801: śnasya asteś ca akārasya lopo bhavati sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50810: śnasoḥ iti ākārasya pararūpatvaṃ śakandhvādisu draṣṭavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:50814: śnā ity etasya abhyastānāṃ ca aṅgānām ākārasya lopo bhavati sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50834: śnāntānām aṅgānām abhyastānāṃ ca ghuvarjitānām ātaḥ īkārādeśo bhavati halādau sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50856: daridrāteḥ halādau sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ ikarādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50863: siddhaś ca pratyayavidhau bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50867: na daridrāyake lopo daridrāṇe ca neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50871: daridrasya iti nirdeśe chāndasaṃ hrasvatvam draṣtavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:50875: bhī ity etasya aṅgasya anyatarasyām ikārādeśo bhavati halādau kṅiti sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50886: jahāteś ca ikārādeśo bhavati anyatarasyāṃ halādau kṅiti sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50898: jahāter ākāraś ca antādeśo bhavati ikāraś ca anyatarasyāṃ hau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50903: lopo bhavati jahāteḥ yakārādau kṅiti sārvadhātuke parataḥ / [#756]
GS24jvkasipu:50910: ghusañjñākānām aṅgānām asteś ca ekārādeśo bhavati hau parataḥ abhyāsalopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:50920: liṭi parata ādeśaḥ ādir yasya aṅgasya na asti tasya ekahalmadhye asahāyayor halor madhye yo 'kāras tasya ekārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50954: rūpābhede cādeśādir na aśrīyate iti śasidadyoḥ pratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:50958: demuḥ ity evam ādīnām api prakṛtijaścarādīnām etvaṃ na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:50969: aneśam iti naśeḥ luṅi puṣāditvād aṅ /
GS24jvkasipu:50970: menakā iti maneḥ āśiṣi ca (*3,1.150) iti vun /
GS24jvkasipu:50986: thali ca seṭi parato 'nādeśādeḥ aṅgasya ekahalmadhyagatasya ataḥ sthāne ekāra ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51002: tṝ phala bhaja trapa ity eteṣām aṅgānām ata ekārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51003: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:51024: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:51032: ataḥ ity etad iha+upasthitaṃ taparatvakṛtamapāsya kālaviśeṣam asambhavād avarṇamātraṃ pratipādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:51035: ekahalmadhye vā yaḥ sa sthānī bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:51039: jṝ bhramu trasa ity eteṣām aṅgānām ataḥ sthāne vā ekāra ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51040: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:51063: phaṇādīnāṃ saptānāṃ dhātūnām avarṇasya sthāne vā ekāra ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51064: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:51105: śasa dada ity etayoḥ vakārādīnāṃ ca dhātūnāṃ guṇa ity evam abhinirvṛttasya ca yo 'kāraḥ tasya sthāne ekārādeśo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51119: guṇaśabdābhinirvṛttasya arśabdasya okārasya ca ayam akāraḥ iti etvaṃ pratiṣidhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:51123: arvan ity etasya aṅgasya tṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51125: sa ca naña uttaro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51139: maghavan ity etasya aṅgasya bahulaṃ tṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51160: bhasya ity ayam adhikāraḥ ā adhyāyaparisamāapteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51161: yad ita ūrdhvam anukamiṣyāmaḥ bhasya ity evaṃ tadvedivyam /
GS24jvkasipu:51172: tadantasya aṅgasya bhasya pat ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51173: sa ca nirdiśyamānasyādeśā bhavanti iti pācchabdasya+eva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51193: ākāralope kartavye vasusaṃprasāraṇasya vyāśrayatvād asiddhatvam na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51198: vāhaḥ ity evam antasya bhasya ūṭḥ ity etat samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51208: samprasāraṇe eva kṛte guṇe ca vṛddhir eci (*6,1.88)
GS24jvkasipu:51209: iti vṛddhau satyām siddhaṃ rūpaṃ bhavati praṣṭhauhaḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:51213: bhavatyeṣā paribhāṣā asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51214: tasyāṃ hi satyāṃ bahiraṅgasya samprasāraṇasya asiddhatvāt antaraṅgo guṇo na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:51218: śvan yuvan maghavan ity eteṣām aṅgānām ataddhite pratyaye parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51247: an ity evam antasya bhasya akāralopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51261: ṣakārapūrvo yaḥ an hanaḥ dhṛtarājñaś ca tasya akāralopo bhavati aṇi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51268: an iti prakṛtibhāvena allopaṭilopau ubhāvapi na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51273: ṅau parataḥ śīśabde ca ano vibhāṣā akāralopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51280: vakāra-makārāntāt saṃyogād uttarasya anaḥ akārasya lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51327: halaḥ śnaḥ śānac ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati // [#762]
GS24jvkasipu:51332: mantreṣu āgi parataḥ ātmanaḥ āderlopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51343: bhasya viṃśateḥ tiśabdasy aṅiti pratyaye lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51352: ṭisañjñakasya ḍiti pratyaye parataḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51359: ḍiti abhasya api anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyat ṭilopo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:51363: nakārāntasya bhasya ṭeḥ lopo bhavati taddhite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51371: atra ye innantāḥ teṣām in aṇy anapatye (*6,4.164)
GS24jvkasipu:51373: ye tu anantāḥ teṣām an (*6,4.167) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51381: śaiśikeṣv artheṣu vṛddhatvād atra chaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:51409: śāśvataḥ ity evam ādiṣu na dṛśyate ṭilopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:51413: ahan ity etasya ṭakhor eva parataḥ ṭilopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51415: dve ahanī adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dvyahīnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51420: iha mā bhūt, ahnā nirvṛttam āhnikam /
GS24jvkasipu:51422: ahnaḥ eva ṭakhoḥ ity evaṃ niyamo na bhavisyati,
GS24jvkasipu:51428: uvarṇāntasya bhasya guṇo bhavati taddhite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51437: orot iti vaktavye guṇagrahaṇaṃ sañjñāpūrvako vidhir anityo yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:51443: ḍhe parataḥ uvarṇāntasya bhasya akarvāḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51453: ivarṇāntasya avarṇātasya ca bhasya ikāre pare taddhite ca lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51457: savarnadīrghatve hi sati atisakher āgacchati ity atra ekādeśasya antavattvād askhi iti ghisañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51473: auṅaḥ śībhāve kṛte yasya+iti ca iti,
GS24jvkasipu:51486: sūrya tisya agastya matsya ity eteṣāṃ yakārasya upadhāyāḥ bhasya lopo bhavati īti paratastaddhite ca /
GS24jvkasipu:51488: aṇi yo yasya+iti lopaḥ tasya asiddhatvaṃ na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:51490: īkāre tu yastasyā - siddhatvād upadhāyakāro bhasyāṇantasya sūryasya sambandhī iti lupyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51503: iha mā bhūt, matsyasya+idaṃ māṃsaṃ mātsyam /
GS24jvkasipu:51509: iha mā bhūt, sauryam caruṃ nirvapet /
GS24jvkasipu:51515: antikaśabdasya tasipratyaye parataḥ kakāradeḥ śabdasya lopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:51519: tamapratyaye antikaśabdasya takārādeḥ kakārādeś ca lopo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51532: hala uttarasya taddhitayakārasya upadhāyāḥ īti parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51542: āpatyayakārasya halaḥ uttarasya taddhite anākārādau lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51558: kya cvi ity etayoś ca parataḥ āpatyayakārasya hala uttarasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51577: tebhyaḥ uttarasya chasya bhasya taddhite parato lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51592: anyathā hi saṃniyogaśiṣṭānām anyatarāpāye ubhayor api abhāvaḥ iti kugapi nivarteta /
GS24jvkasipu:51598: iṣṭhan imanic īyasun ity eteṣu parataḥ tṛśabdasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51606: lug ity etad atra na anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:51623: ṇāviṣṭhavat prātipadikasya kāryaṃ bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:51646: sthūla-dūra-yuva-hrasva-kṣiprakṣudrāṇāṃ yaṇādiparaṃ pūrvasya ca guṇaḥ // PS_6,4.156 //
GS24jvkasipu:51648: sthūla dūra yuva hrasva kṣipra kṣudra ity eteṣāṃ yaṇādiparaṃ lupyate iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:51669: hrasīyān ity atra pūrvasya yaṇāderlopo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:51674_0: priya sthira sphira uru bahula guru vṛddha tṛpra dīrgha vṛndāraka ity eteṣāṃ pra
GS24jvkasipu:51674_1: stha spha var baṃhi gar varṣi trap drādhi vṛnda ity ete yathāsaṅkhyam ādeśā bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:51701: tena anyeṣāmimanij na bhavati iti nodāhriyate // [#768]
GS24jvkasipu:51704: bahor lopo bhū ca bahoḥ // PS_6,4.158 //
GS24jvkasipu:51707: tasya ca bahoḥ sthāne bhū ity ayam ādeśo bhavati / [#767]
GS24jvkasipu:51713: anyathā hi pratyayānām eva bhūbhāvaḥ syāt // [#768]
GS24jvkasipu:51728: lopasya yiṭā vyavahitatvāt āt ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51729: lope hi sati akṛdyakāra iti dīrghatvena jyāyān iti sidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:51733: raśabda ādeśo bhavati ṛkārasya halāder laghoḥ iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51752: pṛthuṃ mṛduṃ bhṛśaṃ ca+eva kṛśaṃ ca dṛḍham eva ca /
GS24jvkasipu:51753: paripūrvaṃ vṛḍhaṃ ca+eva ṣaḍetān ravidhau smaret //
GS24jvkasipu:51761: ṛju ity etasya ṛtaḥ sthāne vibhāṣā repha ādeśo bhavati iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:51768: ekāc yad bhasañjñākaṃ tad iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51776: ake pratyaye parato rājanya manuṣya yuvan ity ete prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:51795: aṇi iti kim ? daṇḍināṃ samūho dāṇḍam /
GS24jvkasipu:51803: gāthin vidathin keśin gaṇin paṇin ity ete ca aṇi prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:51813: saṃyogādiś ca in aṇi prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51820: annantamaṇi prakṛtyā bhavati apatye cānapatye ca /
GS24jvkasipu:51829: yakārādau ca taddhite abhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ an prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51838: ātman adhvan ity etau khe parataḥ prakṛtyā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51850: mapūrvaḥ an avarmaṇo 'ṇi parato 'patye 'rthe na prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51865: brāhmaḥ ity etad apatyādhikāre 'pi sāmarthyād apatyād anyatrāṇi ṭilopārthaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51871: apatye ātāvaṇi brahmaṇaṣ ṭilopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51887: etaj jñāpayati tācchīlike ṇe 'ṇkṛtāni bhavanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51888: tena caurī, tāpasī iti ṇāntād api īkāraḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51895: aukṣam iti anapatye 'ṇi ṭilopo nipātyate aukṣaṃ padam /
GS24jvkasipu:51902: dāṇdināyana hāstināyana ātharvaṇika jaihmāśineya vāsināyani bhrauṇahatya dhaivatya sārava aikṣvāka maitreya hiraṇmaya ity etāni nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:51903: daṇḍin hastin ity etau naḍādiṣu paṭhayete,
GS24jvkasipu:51905: keṣāṃcit tu hastin iti naḍādiṣu na paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:51906: teṣām ata eva nipātanāt phagapi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51910: atharvaṇā prokto grantho 'pi upacārāt atharvan iti ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:51920: bhrūṇahan, dhīvan ity etayoḥ ṣyañi parataḥ takārādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51924: iti yat tatvaṃ tad dhātupratyaya eva iti bhrauṇaghnaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:51927: sārava iti sarayū ity etasya aṇi parato yūśabdasya va ity ādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51940: tato ḍhañi kṛte yāderiyādeśāpavādo yuśabdalopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51943: atha kimarthaṃ mitrayuśabdo bidādiṣv eva na paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:51944: tatrāñi kṛte yādeḥ iti iyādeśenaiva siddham,
GS24jvkasipu:51945: evaṃ ca yulopārthaṃ nipātanaṃ kartavyaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51946: yaskādiṣu ca bahuṣu lugarthaḥ pāṭho na kartavyo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51950: mitrayūṇāṃ saṅghaḥ ity atra gotracaraṇād vuñaṃ bādhitvā maitreyakaḥ saṅghaḥ ity atra saṅgha-aṅka-lakṣaṇeṣv añ. yañ-iñām aṇ (*4,3.127)
GS24jvkasipu:51952: hiraṇmayam iti hiraṇyasya mayaṭi yādilopo nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:51957: ṛtvya vāstvya vāstva mādhvī hiraṇyaya ity etāni nipātyante chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:51958: ṛtu vāstu ity etayoḥ yati yaṇadeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51965: hiraṇyaśabdād vihitasya mayaṭo maśabdasya lopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51967: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:51974: yu vu ity etayoḥ utsṛṣṭaviśeṣaṇayoḥ anunāsikayaṇoḥ pratyayayor grahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:51975: tayoḥ sthāne yathāsaṅkhyam ana aka ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51989: evam ādīnāṃ hi yaṇo 'nunāsikatvaṃ na pratijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:51991: iha yuvor iti nirdeśād dvandvaikavadbhāvapakṣe anityam āgamaśāsanam iti num na kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51992: napuṃsakaliṅgatā vā liṅgamaśiṣyaṃ lokāśrayatvāl liṅgasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51994: yuvoś ced dvitvanirdeśo dvitve yaṇ tu prasajyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51995: atha ced ekavadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ puṃvad bhavedayam //
GS24jvkasipu:51997: aśiṣyatvād dhi liṅgasya puṃstvaṃ veha samāśritam //
GS24jvkasipu:52001: āyan ey īn īy iy ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pha ḍha kha cha gha ity eteṣā pratyayādīnām /
GS24jvkasipu:52029: śaṅkhaḥ, ṣaṇḍhaḥ ity evam ādīnāṃ hi uṇādayo bahulam iti bahulavacanād ādeśā na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:52030: ṛter īyaṅ (*3,1.29) iti vāvacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ dhātupratyayānāmādeśābhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:52032: ity evam ādiṣu tu itsañjñayā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:52033: taddhiteṣu hi khakāraghakārayor ādeśavacanam avakāśavaditi itsañjñāṃ bādhituṃ na+utsahate /
GS24jvkasipu:52042: pratyayāvayavasya jhasya anta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52046: adya śvo vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ saha śayāntai /
GS24jvkasipu:52052: asminn apy antādeśe kṛte pratyayādyudāttvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52053: tathā ca jhacaḥ citkaraṇam arthavac bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52057: abhyastā daṅgād uttarasya jhakārasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52074: tasya anakārāntāt aṅgāt uttarasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52086: nityatvād atra vikaraṇe kṛte jho 'ntādeśena bhavitavyam ity adādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52088: iha mā bhūt, adya śvo vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ śayāntai //
GS24jvkasipu:52092: śīṅo 'ṅgād uttarasya jhādeśasya ataḥ ruḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52097: sa yadi jhakārasya+eva syād adādeśo na syād ity ata eva ayam ādeśasya āgamo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52104: vetter aṅgād uttarasya jhādeśasya ato vibhāṣā ruḍhāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52128: ity etad api bahulavacanād eva atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52132: akārāntād aṅgād uttarasya bhisaḥ ais ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52136: jarāmatikrāntaiḥ iti vigṛhya samāse kṛte hrasvatve ca bhisa aisādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52138: sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti paribhāṣā iyam anityā,
GS24jvkasipu:52146: etvam bhisi paratvāc ced ata ais kva bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:52147: kṛte 'py etve bhautapūrvyādais tu nityas tathā sati //
GS24jvkasipu:52148: ataḥ ityadhikāro jasaḥ śī iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:52160: idam adas ity etayoḥ akakārayoḥ bhisa ais na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52165: akoḥ ity etad eva pratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam tanmadhyapatitastadgrahanena gṛhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52167: viparīto 'pi niyamaḥ sambhāvyeta idamadasor eva kāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52176: akārāntād aṅgād uttareṣām ṭāṅasiṅasām ina āt sya ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti yathāsaṅkhyam /
GS24jvkasipu:52190: yathā tu bhāṣye tathā na+etad iṣyate iti lakṣyate // [#776]
GS24jvkasipu:52196: akārāntād aṅgād uttarasya ṅe ity etasya yaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52201: sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti paribhāṣeyam anityā,
GS24jvkasipu:52206: akārāntāt sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya ṅeḥ smai ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52214: tatra antaraṅgatvād ekādeśāt pūrvaṃ smaibhāvaḥ kriyate paścād ekādeśaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:52218: ṅasi ṅi ity etayor akārāntāt sarvanāmnaḥ uttarayoḥ smāt smin ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52238: pūrvādibhyo navabhyaḥ sarvanāmnaḥ uttarayoḥ ṅasiṅyoḥ smāt smin ity etāv ādeśau vā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52262: akārāntāt sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya jasaḥ śī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52274: ābantād aṅgād uttarasya auṅaḥ śī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52282: aukāro 'yaṃ śīvidhau ṅidgṛhīto ṅiccāsmākaṃ na asti ko 'yaṃ prakāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52283: sāmānyārthas tasya ca asañjane 'smin ṅitkāryaṃ te śyāṃ prasaktam sa doṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:52284: ṅittve vidyād varṇanirdeśamātraṃ varṇe yat syāt tac ca vidyāt tadādau /
GS24jvkasipu:52285: varṇaścāyam tena ṅittve 'py adoṣo nirdeśo 'yaṃ pūrvasūtreṇa vā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:52289: napuṃsakād aṅgād uttarasya auṅaḥ śī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52301: napuṃsakād aṅgād uttarayoḥ jaśśasoḥ śi ity ayam ādeśo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:52308: jasā sahacaritasya śaso grahaṇād iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52315: tasmād uttarayoḥ jaśśasoḥ auś ity ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52321: etad eva kṛtātvasya grahaṇaṃ jñāpakam aṣṭana ā vibhaktau (*7,2.84)
GS24jvkasipu:52327: iti, tasmin prāpte ca aprāpte ca iti sa na bādhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:52333: priyāṣṭanaḥ ity atrātvasya abhāvād auśtvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52346: yatra tu upasarjanaṃ ṣaṭ tato na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52353: su am ity etayoḥ napuṃsakād uttarayoḥ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52360: tadbrāhmaṇakulam ity atra lukā tyadādyatvaṃ bādhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:52365: yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittaṃ vihanyate na tadanityaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52369: akārāntān napuṃsakād uttarayoḥ svamoḥ am ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52378: ḍatarādibhyaḥ parayoḥ svamoḥ adḍ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52390: katarat tiṣṭhati ity atra pūrvasavarnadīrgho mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:52391: iha tu katarat paśya iti sthanivadbhāvād ami pūrvaṃtvena api sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:52392: evaṃ tarhi takārādeśa eva kasmān na vidhīyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:52393: he katarat iti sambuddher lopo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:52395: aḍḍittvāḍ ḍatarādīnāṃ na lopo na api dīrghatā //
GS24jvkasipu:52399: itaraśabdād uttarayoḥ svamoḥ chandasi viṣaye adḍādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52405: ato 'm (*7,1.24) ity asmād anantaram itarāc chandasi iti vaktavyam ?
GS24jvkasipu:52406: netarācchandasi iti vacanaṃ yogavibhagartham ekatarād dhi sarvatra chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ pratiṣedha iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52413: yuṣmad asmad ity etābhyām uttarasya ṅasaḥ aś ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52424: ṅe ity etasya prathamayoś ca vibhaktyoḥ prathādvitīyayoḥ yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarayoḥ am ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52450: yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya bhyasaḥ bhyam ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52453: bhyamādeśe kṛte śeṣelope ca bahuvacane jhalyet (*7,3.103)
GS24jvkasipu:52455: tat aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttāvavidhirniṣṭhitasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52463: pañcamyāḥ bhyasaḥ yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati yuṣmad gacchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:52468: pañcamyā ekavacanasya yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52476: tasya yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya ākam ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52482: ādeśe kṛte hi śeṣelope yuṣmadasmador akārāntatvāt suṭ prāptnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:52485: akami tu sati hrasvakaraṇe tadvidhānasāmarthyād eva savarṇadīrghatvaṃ na prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:52486: tatsāmarthyam etvaṃ prati bhaviṣyati iti akārakaraṇametvanivṛttyartham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52491: ākārāntād aṅgād uttarasya ṇalaḥ aukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52499: dvirvacanam ity anena krameṇa kāryāṇi kriyante /
GS24jvkasipu:52500: ekādeśād anavakāśatvād autvaṃ dvirvacanād api paratvād ekādeśaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:52504: tu hi ity etayoḥ āśiṣi viṣaye tātaṅ ādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:52510: ṅittvāc cāsya sthānivadbhāvāt yat pittvaṃ prāpnoti tannivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:52513: iti brūtād bhavān iti īṭ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52517: tātaṅi ṅitvaṃ saṅkramakṛt syādantyavidhiś cet tacca tathā na /
GS24jvkasipu:52518: heradhikāre heradhikāro lopavidhau tu jñāpakam āha //
GS24jvkasipu:52519: tātaṅo ṅittvasāmarthyān na ayam antyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52524: vida jñāne ity etasmād dhātor uttarasya śatuḥ vasurādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52526: sthānivadbhāvādugitkārye siddhe vasoḥ ukārakaraṇaṃ vasoḥ samprasāraṇam (*6,4.131)
GS24jvkasipu:52528: ekānubandhakagrahaṇe na dvyanubandhakasya ity etad api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52536: samāse 'nañpūrve ktvā ity etasya lyap ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52548: anañ iti nañā anyadanañ nañsadṛśam avyayaṃ parigṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52549: tena nañ anavyayaṃ canañ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52550: snātvākālakādiṣu mayūravyaṃsakādiṣu nipātanāl lyabādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52553: sa ca yena vidhis tadantasya ity anena tadantavidhinā,
GS24jvkasipu:52554: na tu kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52556: gatikārakapūrvasy eva tu grahaṇe sati nañpūrvasya prasaṅga eva na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:52557: nañ na gatir na kārakam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52558: pradhāya, prasthāya ity ādiṣu hiprabhṛtīn antaraṅgan api vidhīn bahiraṅgo lyab bādhate eva iti jñāpitam etat //
GS24jvkasipu:52562: samāse anañpūrve ktvā ity etasya ktvā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52576: chandasi viṣaye supāṃ sthāne su luk pūrvasavarṇa ā āt śe yā ḍā ḍyā yāc āl ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:52589: yasmin sunvanti tasmin sāmidhenīḥ iti prāpte / [#782]
GS24jvkasipu:52603: yuyādeśo vayādeśaś ca chandasatvān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52622: īkāraḥ - dṛtiṃ na śuṣkaṃ sarasī śayānam /
GS24jvkasipu:52641: makārasya api hi makāravacanam anusvāranivṛttyarthaṃ syāt // [#783]
GS24jvkasipu:52646: ātmanepadeṣu yastakāraḥ tasya chandasi viṣaye lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52661: chandasi viṣaye dhvamo dhvāt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52667: yajadhvam ity etasya enam ity etasmin parato makāralopo nipātyate vakārasya ca yakāraḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:52673: taśabdasya loṇmadhyamapuruṣabahuvacanasya sthāne tāt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52686: chandasi viṣaye tasya sthāne tap tanap tana thana ity ete ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:52703: chandasi viṣaye mas ity ayaṃ śabdaḥ ikārānto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52716: ktvā ity etasya yagāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:52720: ity asya antantaram idaṃ kasmān na+ucyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:52725: iṣṭvīnam ity ayaṃ śabdo nipātyate chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:52734: snātvī ity evam ādayaḥ śabdā nipātyante chandasi visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:52743: avarṇāntāt aṅgād uttarasya jaseḥ asuk āgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:52746: ye pūrvāso ya uparāsaḥ ity atra paratvād asuki punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt śibhāvaḥ prāptaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:52747: sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tad bādhitam eva iti na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52752: aśva kṣīra vṛṣa lavaṇa ity eteṣām aṅgānām ātmaprītiviṣaye kyaci parato 'sugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52775: avarṇāt sarvanāmna uttarasya āmaḥ suḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52787: iti , tasya hi paratvāt āḍyāṭsyāṭo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:52791: sānubandhakau iti vā tau na gṛhyete /
GS24jvkasipu:52793: iha tu sarvanāmnaḥ iti pañcamīnirdeśāt tasmād ity uttarasya (*1,1.67)
GS24jvkasipu:52798: tri ity etasya āmi pare traya ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52805: hrasvāntāt nadyantāt ābantāc ca+uttarasya āmaḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52848: śrī grāmaṇī ity etayoḥ chandasi viṣaye āmo nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52854: sūtagrāmaṇīnām iti yadā sūtāś ca te grāmaṇyaś ca sūtagrāmaṇyo bhavanti tadartham idaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:52855: yadā tu sūtaś ca grāmaṇīś ca sūtagrāmaṇi,
GS24jvkasipu:52856: sūtagrāmaṇi ca sūtagrāmaṇi ca sūtagrāmaṇi ca iti sūtagrāmaṇīnām iti,
GS24jvkasipu:52861: go ity etasmāt ṛkpādānte vartamānād uttarasya āmaḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52862: vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām /
GS24jvkasipu:52865: sarve vidhayaśchandasi vikalpyante iti pādānte 'pi kvacin na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52866: hantāraṃ śatrūṇāṃ kṛdhi virājaṃ gopatiṃ gavām //
GS24jvkasipu:52881: ayaṃ dhātūpadeśāvasthāyām eva nugāmamo bhavati kuṇḍā,
GS24jvkasipu:52887: dhātugrahaṇam ca+iha kriyate dhātūpadeśakāla eva numāgamo yathā syāt ity evam artham /
GS24jvkasipu:52888: tāsisicoriditkāryaṃ na asti ity uccāraṇārtho niranunāsika ikāraḥ paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52889: amaṃsta ity evam ādau hi hanaḥ sic (*1,2.24)
GS24jvkasipu:52891: mantā ity atra api asiddhavad-atra-ā bhāt (*6,4.22)
GS24jvkasipu:52892: iti ṭilopasya asiddhatvān nalopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52895: iritāṃ samudāyasyetsañjñā iti iditvaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:52902: śe pratyaye parato mucādīnam numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52919: tṛpha tṛmpha tṛptau dṛpha ḍrmpha utkleśe,
GS24jvkasipu:52922: śubha śumbha śobhārthe ity atra ye sānuṣaṅgāḥ tṛmphādayaḥ teṣām aniditāṃ hala upadhāyāḥ kṅiti (*6,4.24)
GS24jvkasipu:52938: masji naśi ity etayor aṅgayoḥ jhalādau pratyaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52947: masjer antyāt pūrva numam icchanti anuṣaṅgādilopārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:52953: radhi jabhi ity etayoḥ ajādau pratyaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52969: iḍādau aliṭi pratyaye pare radher numāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52979: iti kittvaṃ na asti iti nalopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52985: atha iṭi liṭi ity evaṃ niyamaḥ kasmān na kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:52986: liṭy eva iṭi na anyatra iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:52988: iṭy eva liṭi na anyatra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52989: tathā hi sati rarandha ity atra na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:52990: radhitā ity atra ca syād eva //
GS24jvkasipu:52994: rabheraṅgasya śabliḍvarjite 'jādau pratyaye parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53007: labheś ca ajādau pratyaye śabliḍvarjite numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53020: āṅaḥ uttarasya labheḥ yakārādiprayayaviṣaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53023: prāk pratyayotpatteḥ numi kṛte vihitamadupadhatvam iti ṛhalor ṇyat (*3,1.124)
GS24jvkasipu:53030: atha vā ālabhyaḥ ity atra numi kṛte 'nuṣaṅgalopaḥ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:53034: upād uttarasya labheḥ praśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ yakārādipratyayaviṣaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53044: upasargād uttarasya labheḥ khalghañoḥ parataḥ numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53051: upasargādeva labheḥ khalghañoḥ parato numāgamo bhavati, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:53057: su dur ity etābhyāṃ kevalābhyām anyopasargarahitābhyām upasṛṣṭasya labheḥ khalghañoḥ parataḥ numāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53065: sudurbhām iti tṛtīyāṃ matvā kevalagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53067: atisulabham ity atra karmapravacanīyatvād eteḥ kevala eva suśabda upasargaḥ iti bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53069: tadā num bhavati eva atisulambhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53075: ciṇ ṇamul ity etayoḥ vibhāṣā labher num bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53087: ugitāmaṅgānāṃ dhātuvarjitānām añcateśca sarvanāmasthāne parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53101: añcater eva dhātor anyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:53108: atra hi dhātutvād añcatigrahaṇān na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:53112: yujer asamāse sarvanāmasthāne parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53116: yujeḥ iti ikāranirdeśāt yuja samādhau ity asya grahaṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53121: napuṃsakasya jhalantasya ca sarvanāmasthāne parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53137: ugito jhalantasya napuṃsakasya paratvād anena+eva num bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53150: igantasya napuṃsakasya aṅgasya ajādau vibhaktau numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53162: he trapo ity atra num mā bhūt, iti,
GS24jvkasipu:53167: iti pratyayalakṣaṇe pratiṣiddhe vibhaktir eva na asti ?
GS24jvkasipu:53168: etad eva ajgrahaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedho 'tra na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53172: iko 'ci vyañjane mā bhūdastu lopaḥ svaraḥ katham /
GS24jvkasipu:53173: svaro vai śrūyamāṇe 'pi lupte kiṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:53175: nuḍ vācya uttarārthaṃ tu iha kiñcit trapo iti //
GS24jvkasipu:53179: tṛtīyādiṣu vibhaktiṣv ajādiṣu bhāṣitapuṃskam igantaṃ napuṃsakaṃ gālavasyācāryasya matena puṃvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53181: tadvad atra api na bhavataḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53221: samānāyāmākṛtau yad bhāṣītpuṃskaṃ tulye pravṛttinimatte tasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53222: iha tu vṛkṣākṛtiḥ pravṛttinimittaṃ puṃsi śabdasya,
GS24jvkasipu:53224: tad etad evaṃ kathaṃ bhavati bhāsitapuṃskam iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:53225: bhāṣitaḥ pumān yasminn arthe pravṛttinimitte sa bhāsitapuṃskaśabdena ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:53226: uadyogād abhidheyam api yad napuṃsakaṃ tad api bhāṣitapuṃsakam /
GS24jvkasipu:53227: tasya pratipādakaṃ yac chabdarūpaṃ tad api bhāṣitapuṃskam iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:53237: asthi dadhi sakthi akṣi ity eteṣā napuṃsakānāṃ tṛtīyādiṣu ajādiṣu vibhaktiṣu parato 'naṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53248: teṣām anaṅādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvād anudāttaḥ syāt iti udāttavacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:53249: tatra bhasañjñāyām allope kṛte udāttanivṛttisvareṇa vibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53250: etair asthyādibhir napuṃsakair anapuṃsakasya api aṅgasya tadantagrahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53276: dvivacane parataḥ chandasi viṣaye asthyādīnām īkārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53280: akṣī ity atra num paratvādīkāreṇa badhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53281: tena kṛte sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tad bādhitam eva iti punar num na kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:53285: abhyastād aṅgād uttarasya śatuḥ num na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53290: śaturanantara īkāro na vihitaḥ iti vyavahitasya api numaḥ pratiṣedho vijñāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:53294: abhyastād aṅgād uttaro yaḥ śatṛpratyayas tadantasya napuṃsakasya vā numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53303: avarṇāntād aṅgād uttarasya śatuḥ vā numāgamo bhavati śīnadyoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53315: atra antaraṅgatvād ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt avarṇāntā daṅgād uttarasya śatuḥ iti na yujyate vaktum,
GS24jvkasipu:53316: ubhayata āśraye nāntadivat ity antādivadbhāvo 'pi nāsti,
GS24jvkasipu:53318: ghnatī ity evam ādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:53320: śaturavayave śatṛśabdo vartate avarṇāntād aṅgād uttaro yaḥ śatravayavaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53323: avarṇāntād aṅgād uttare ye śīnadyau tayoḥ parataḥ śatrantasya num bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53324: tatra yena nāvyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti takāreṇa eva vyavadhānam āśrayiṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53332: śap śyan ity etayoḥ śatuḥ śīnadyoḥ parato nityaṃ numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53339: nityagrahaṇam vā ity asya adhikārasya nivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:53340: ihārambhasāmarthyān nityam uttaratra vikalpa eva aśaṅkyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:53347: atra kecit āt ity adhikārād āmamoḥ kṛtayoḥ numaṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:53350: apare tu saty api sāmānyaviśeṣatve āmamoḥ numaś ca samāveśam icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:53356: dṛk svavas svatavas ity eteṣāṃ sau parato numāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:53366: div ity etasya sau parataḥ aut ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53375: pathin mathin ṛbhukṣin ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ sau parataḥ ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53380: bhāvyam anena savarṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti śuddho hy ayam ucvāryate //
GS24jvkasipu:53384: pathyādīnām ikārasya sthāne akārādeśo bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53393: āt iti vartāmāne punar advacanaṃ ṣapūrvārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:53394: ṛbhukṣaṇam ity atra vā ṣapūrvasya nigame (*6,4.9)
GS24jvkasipu:53399: pathimathoḥ thakārasya sthāne nthaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53415: sarvanāmasthāne ity anuvartamānam api virodhād iha na sambadhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:53419: puṃsa ity etasya sarvanāmasthāne parato 'suṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53421: iha paramapumān iti prāg eva vibhaktyutpatteḥ samāsāntodāttatvam,
GS24jvkasipu:53422: utpannāyāṃ vibhaktau asuñ ity aniṣṭaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:53437: aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttāvavidhirniṣṭhitasya iti sambuddhijasorgune kṛte ṇittvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53438: atha vā gotaḥ iti sambadhalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī,
GS24jvkasipu:53440: yac ca tadarthasyaikatvādiṣu sarvanāmasthānaṃ tad goḥ sarvanāmasthānam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53444: dyośabdād api yat sarvanāmasthānaṃ vidyate tadartham /
GS24jvkasipu:53446: gotaḥ ity etad eva taparakaraṇanirdeśāt okārāntopalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:53452: ṇitkāryaṃ tatra vā bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53460: asambuddhau yaḥ sakhiśabdaḥ tasmāt paraṃ sarvanāmasthānaṃ ṇit bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53467: sakhiśabdasya sau parataḥ anaṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53468: sa cet suśabdaḥ sambuddhiḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53474: ṛkārāntānām aṅgānām uśanas purudaṃsas anehas ity eteṣām ca asambuddhau sau parataḥ anaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53489: uśanasaḥ sambuddhau api pakṣe anaṅ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53494: tathā coktam - sambodhane tūśanastrirūpaṃ sāntaṃ tathā nāntamathāpyadantam /
GS24jvkasipu:53495: mādhyandinirvaṣṭi guṇaṃ tvigante napuṃsake vyāghrapadām variṣṭhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:53502: kroṣṭuśabdaḥ tunpratyayāntaḥ sañjñāśabdaḥ sarvanāmasthāne 'sambuddhau parataḥ tṛjvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53503: tṛjantasya yad rūpaṃ tadasya bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53505: prayāsatteś ca kruśer eva ṛjantasya ya rūpaṃ tadatidiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53506: tac ca kroṣtṛ ity etad antodāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:53521: teṣāṃ pañcabhiḥ kroṣṭrībhiḥ krītaiḥ pañcakroṣṭṛbhī rathaiḥ iti strīśabdasya luki kṛte na sidhyati,
GS24jvkasipu:53533: tṛtīyādiṣu vibhaktiṣu ajādiṣu kroṣṭurvibhāṣā tṛjvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53549: catur anaḍuḥ iy etayoḥ sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ ām āgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53583: cikīrṣati ity atra api yathā syāt iti dhātugrahaṇaṃ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:53593: oṣthyaḥ pūrvo yasmād ṝkārāt asau oṣṭhyapūrvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:53599: dantyoṣṭhyapūrvo 'py oṣṭhyapūrvo bhavati ity atra api bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53602: oṣṭhyo hy atra pratyāsatter aṅgāvayava eva gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:53603: tena ṝ gatau ity asya sampūrvasya samīrṇam iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53614: chandasi viṣaye ṝkārāntasya dhātor aṅgasya bahulam ukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53624: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya prathamḥ pādaḥ // ______________________________________________________//
GS24jvkasipu:53630: parasmaipadapare sici parataḥ igantasya aṅgasya vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53637: antaraṅgam api guṇam eṣāṃ vṛddhirvacanād bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:53638: nyanuvīt, nyadhuvīt ity atra kuṭāditvāt ṅittve sati pratiṣiddhāyāṃ vṛddhau uvaṅādeśaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53644: rephalakārau yāvataḥ antau samīpau tadantasya aṅgasya ata eva sthāne vṛddhiḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53658: atra yau rephalakārau aṅgasya antau na tāvataḥ samīpau //
GS24jvkasipu:53662: vadavrajoḥ halantānāṃ ca aṅgānām acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati sici parasmaipade parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53670: atra yogavibhāge sati halantagrahaṇam antareṇa api sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:53671: katham ? vadivrajyoḥ ity atra prathamayoge ataḥ iti sthānī anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:53672: tato yat acaḥ iti sūtraṃ tatra aṅgena ajviśeṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:53673: aṅgasya acaḥ sici parataḥ vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53677: anyathā hi yena na avyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt ity ekena varṇena vyavadhāne syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:53679: udavoḍhām, udavoḍham ity atra vaheḥ sici ḍhatvasalopādīnām pūrvatra asiddham (*8,2.1)
GS24jvkasipu:53680: ity asiddhatvāt pūrvaṃ halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:53682: tatra kṛte punar vṛddhir na bhavati, kṛtatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:53689: iḍhādau sici halanatasya aṅgasya vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53695: nanu ca etad apy antaraṅgatvāt guṇāvādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ halantaṃ bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:53697: antaraṅgam api guṇam vacanārambhasāmarthyāt sici vṛddhir bādhate ity uktam // [#798]
GS24jvkasipu:53703: kṣaṇa śvasa jāgṛ ṇi śvi ity eteṣām,
GS24jvkasipu:53704: editāṃ ca iḍādau sici parasmaipade parato vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53717: hmyantakṣaṇaśvasām editām ca ato halāder laghoḥ (*7,2.7)
GS24jvkasipu:53719: jāgṛṇiśvīnāṃ tu sici vṛddhiḥ prāptā, sā ca neṭi (*7,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:53721: na ca antaraṅgatvād atra pūrvaṃ guṇo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53723: yadi pūrvaṃ guṇaḥ syād iha ṇiśvigrahaṇam anarthakaṃ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:53724: guṇāyādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ yakārantatvād eva pratiṣedhasya siddhatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:53725: tasmād idam eva śvigrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam na sidyantaraṅgam asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53728: iti jāgarter guṇo vṛddher apavādo vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:53730: iti vṛddhiṃ bādhate tathā sici vṛddhim api bādhiṣyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:53733: iti ya vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti sā pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53735: yathā jāgarayati ity atra ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,1.113)
GS24jvkasipu:53737: tathā ciṇṇaloḥ pratiṣedho 'rthavān bhavati iti śakyam iha jāgṛgrahaṇam akartum ?
GS24jvkasipu:53742: ūrṇoter iḍādau sici parasmaipadapare parato yibhāṣā vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53747: ṅittvapakṣe tu guṇavṛddhyor abhāve uvaṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53752: halāder aṅgasya laghor akārasya iḍādau sici parasmaipadapare parato vibhāṣā vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53758: ity atra ataḥ ity asminnasati sthāninirdeśārthamacaḥ ity etad anuvartayitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:53759: tatra ajlakṣaṇā vṛddhir iglakṣaṇā na bhavati iti kṅiti ca (*7,2.118)
GS24jvkasipu:53766: atha+iha kasmān na bhavati acakāsīt iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:53767: yena nāvyavadhānam tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti halā vyavadhānam āśritam,
GS24jvkasipu:53768: na punaracāpi vyavadhānam iti vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53769: atha punar ekena varṇena vyavadhānam aśrīyate na punar anekena iti kalpane śakyamakartuṃ laghoḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:53770: atakṣīt ity atra anekena vyavadhānam iti na bhavisyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:53777: vaśādau kṛti pratyaye parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53793: tena ñamantāḍḍaḥ ity evam ādāv api hi pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53802: ti tu tra ta tha si su sara ka sa ity eteṣu kṛtsu iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53837: hasitam ity eva hi tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53877: upadeśe ya ekāc dhātur anudāttaś ca tasmād iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53881: ta eva vispaṣṭārtham aniṭkārikāsu pravibhaktāḥ pradarśyante / [#800]
GS24jvkasipu:53883: aniṭsvarānto bhavati iti dṛśyatāmimāṃstu seṭaḥ pravadanti tadvidaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53884: adantamṝdantamṛtāṃ ca vṛṅvṛñau śviḍīṅivarṇeṣv atha śīṅśriñāvapi //
GS24jvkasipu:53885: guṇasthamūdantamutāṃ ca rusnuvau kṣuvaṃ tathorṇotimatho yuṇukṣṇavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53886: iti svarāntā nipuṇaṃ samuccitāstato halantān api sannibodhata //
GS24jvkasipu:53900: utāṃ ca ursnuvau kṣuvaṃ tathorṇotimatho yuṇukṣṇavaḥ - ravitā /
GS24jvkasipu:53904: vācya ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvo yaṅprasiddhiḥ prayojanam ity atideśād ekāctvam ūrṇoter asti iti udātta upadiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53908: iti svarāntā nipuṇaṃ samuccitās tato halantān api sannibodhata /
GS24jvkasipu:53909: śakistu kānteṣvaniḍeka iṣyate ghasiśca sāntesu vasiḥ prasāraṇī /
GS24jvkasipu:53914: vasa nivāse ity asya yajāditvāt saṃprasāraṇaṃ vihitam,
GS24jvkasipu:53915: na tu vasa ācchādane ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:53916: sabhistu bhānteṣv atha maithune yabhistatastṛtīyo labhireva netare //
GS24jvkasipu:53920: yamiryamanteṣvaniḍeka iṣyate ramisca yaśca śyani paṭhyate maniḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53921: namiścaturtho hanireva pañcamo gamiśca ṣaṣṭhaḥ pratiṣedhavācinām //
GS24jvkasipu:53931: ime 'niṭo 'ṣṭāviha muktasaṃśayā gaṇeṣu hāntāḥ pravibhajya kīrtitāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:53949: diśiṃ dṛśiṃ daṃśimatho mṛśiṃ spṛśiṃ riśiṃ ruśiṃ krośatimaṣṭamaṃ viśim /
GS24jvkasipu:53950: liśaṃ ca śāntānaniṭaḥ purāṇagāḥ paṭhanti pāṭheṣu daśaiva netarān //
GS24jvkasipu:53956: ṛdupadhānām udāttopadeśānāṃ mṛjidṛśī varjayitvā anudāttasya cardupadhasya anyatarasyām (*6,1.59)
GS24jvkasipu:53964: ime tu dhāntā daśa ye 'niṭo matāstataḥ paraṃ sidhyatir eva netare //
GS24jvkasipu:53976: budhyatisidhyatyoḥ śyanā nirdeśāt nyāyyavikaraṇayor buddhisidhyor iḍ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:53981: śiṣiṃ piṣiṃ śuṣyatipuṣyatī tviṣiṃ viṣiṃ śliṣiṃ tuṣyatiduṣyatī dviṣim /
GS24jvkasipu:53996: kṛṣestaudādikasya bhauvādikasya ca kṛṣikarṣatī iti nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53997: tapiṃ tipiṃ cāpimatho vapiṃ svapiṃ lipiṃ lupiṃ tṛpyatidṛpyatī sṛpim /
GS24jvkasipu:53998: svareṇa vīcena śapiṃ chupiṃ kṣipiṃ pratīhi pāntān paṭhitāṃstrayodaśa //
GS24jvkasipu:54015: adiṃ hadiṃ skandibhidicchidikṣudīn śadiṃ sadiṃ svidyatipad yatī khidim /
GS24jvkasipu:54016: tudiṃ nudiṃ vidyati vinta ity api pratīhi dāntān daśa pañca cāniṭaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:54026: svidyati iti śyanā nirdeśo ñiṣvidā ity asya grahaṇaṃ mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54033: vidyati vinta ity api śyanā śnamā ca nirdeśo 'nyavikaraṇanivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54038: paciṃ vaciṃ viciricirañjipṛcchatīn nijiṃ siciṃ mucibhajibhañjibhṛjjātīn /
GS24jvkasipu:54039: tyajiṃ yajiṃ yujirujisañjimajjatīn bhujiṃ svajiṃ sṛjimṛjī viddhyaniṭsvarān //
GS24jvkasipu:54070: tathā ca tantrāntare nijivijiṣvañjivarjam ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:54081: śri ity etasya ugantānāṃ ca kiti pratyaye parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54103: sautratvāc ca nirdeśasya śryukaḥ kiti ity atra cartvasya asiddhatvamanāśritya rorutvaṃ na kṛtam visarjanīyaś ca kṛtaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54105: ity atra sthā ā ity ākārapraśleṣeṇa sthāsnoḥ siddhatvān na kiṃcid etat /
GS24jvkasipu:54107: tīrṇa ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:54108: itve hi kṛte raparatve cana syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:54110: iṭ sani vā (*7,2.41) iti vikalpe vihite yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15)
GS24jvkasipu:54113: yady evam itve hi kṛte na ayam ṝkarānto bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:54129: graha guha ity etayoḥ ugantānāṃ ca sani pratyaye parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54135: iti vikalpavidhānāt śrayatir atra na anukṛsyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54141: kṛ sṛ bhṛ vṛ stu dru sru śru ity eteṣāṃ liṭi pratyaye iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54159: vṛño hi thali vavartha iti nipātanād vyavasthā /
GS24jvkasipu:54161: ity asmād api niyamāt ya iṭ prāpnoti so 'pi neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54190: niṣṭhāyām ity adhikāraḥ ārdhadhātukasya+iḍ-valādeḥ (*7,2.35) iti yāvat // [#804]
GS24jvkasipu:54195: yasya dhātoḥ vibhāṣā kvacid iḍ uktaḥ tasya niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54203: tanipatidaridrāṇām upasaṅkhyānam iti pater vibhāṣiteṭkasya api dvitīyāśritātītapatita (*2,1.24)
GS24jvkasipu:54208: āditaś ca dhator niṣthāyam iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54219: āditaś ca vibhāṣā bhāvādikarmaṇoḥ ity evaṃ paṭhitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:54223: jñāpayati - yad upādher vibhāṣā tad upādheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54225: ity atra viderlābhārthasya vibhāṣā iti jñānārthasya pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54231: bhave ādikarmaṇi ca ādito dhātoḥ vibhāṣā niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54247: kṣubdha svānta dhvānta lagan mliṣṭa viribdha phāṇṭa bāḍha ity ete nipātyante yathāsaṅkhyaṃ mantha manaḥ tamaḥ sakta avispaṣṭa svaraḥ anāyāsa bhṛśa ity eteṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:54253: kṣubdhā girinadī ity evam ādyupamānāt bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:54266: itvam apy ekārasya nipātanād eva viribdham iti svaraś cet /
GS24jvkasipu:54269: anye tu viribhitam anyat iti paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:54274: yadaśṛtamapiṣṭaṃ ca kaṣāyamudakasamparkamātrāt vibhaktarasamīṣaduṣṇaṃ tat phāṇṭam /
GS24jvkasipu:54278: bāhṛ prayatne ity asya dhātor etan nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:54284: tatra dhṛṣa śasa ity etayoḥ niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54292: dhṛṣiśasyoḥ vaiyātye eva iḍ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54301: dṛḍha iti nipātyate sthūle balavati cārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:54309: tatra apy etad eva sarvaṃ nalopavarjam,
GS24jvkasipu:54312: ḍhalope hi sati tasya pūrvatra asiddhatvāt draḍhimā,
GS24jvkasipu:54314: draḍhayati ity atra ra ṛto halāderlaghoḥ (*6,2.161)
GS24jvkasipu:54316: iha ca paridraḍhyya gata iti lyapi laghupūrvāt (*6,4.56)
GS24jvkasipu:54318: iha ca paridṛḍhasyāpatyaṃ pāridṛḍhī kanyā iti gurūpottamalakṣaṇaḥ ṣyaṅ ca prasajyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:54324: parivṛḍha iti nipātyate prabhuś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54328: vṛhiśca yadi prakṛtiyantaram asti tasya api tad eva sarvam /
GS24jvkasipu:54333: parivṛḍhamācaṣṭe iti vigṛhya vṛḍhaśabdād eva ṇijutypadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54334: saṃgrāmayater eva sopasargāṇ ṇijutpattir iṣyate na anyasmāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54337: parivraḍhayya ity atra pariśabdasya ktvāpratyayāntena samāse sati lyabādeśaḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54345: kṛcchra gahana ity etayor arthayoḥ kaṣer dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54350: tatkāraṇam apy agnyādikaṃ kṛcchram ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54358: ghuṣer dhātor aviśabdane 'rthe niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54367: viśabdanapratiṣedhaś ca jñāpakaścurādiṇij viśabdanārthasya anityaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54368: tena ayam api prayogaḥ upapanno bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:54374: sam ni vi ity etebhya uttarasya ardeḥ niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54384: abhiśabād uttarasya ardeḥ āvidūrye 'rthe niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54393: etasmād eva nipātanāt na nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt (*5,1.121)
GS24jvkasipu:54394: ity uttarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratiṣedho na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:54398: ṇyantasya vṛtter niṣṭhāyām adhyayanārthe vṛttam iti iḍabhāvaḥ ṇiluk ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54405: tena nirvṛttam iti hi prakṛṭer eva karmaṇi ktapratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54406: tadvad iha api ṇyarthavṛtter eva ca vṛteḥ vṛtto guṇo devadattena iti bhaviṣyati iti nipātanam anarthakam ?
GS24jvkasipu:54407: tat kriyate yadāpi ṇicaiva ṇyartho 'bhidhīyate tadāvartitam ity adhyayane mā bhūt iti kecit /
GS24jvkasipu:54408: apare tu vartito guṇo devadattena ity api icchanti // [#807]
GS24jvkasipu:54414: dam śam pūrī das spaś chad jñap ity eteṣāṃ ṇyantānāṃ dhātūnāṃ vā aniṭtvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54423: jñaptes tu bharajñapisanām iti vikalpavidhānāt yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15)
GS24jvkasipu:54424: iti nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte vikalpārthaṃ nipātanam //
GS24jvkasipu:54429: ruṣi ama tvara saṅghuṣa āsvana ity eteṣāṃ niṣṭhāyāṃ vā iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54437: āditaś ca (*7,2.16) iti pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:54444: sampūrvasya ghuṣer aviśaddane 'pi paratvād ayam eva vikalpo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54449: āṅpūrvasya svaner mano 'bhidhāne 'pi paratvādayaṃ vikalpaḥ kṣubdhasvānta iti nipātanaṃ bādhate //
GS24jvkasipu:54453: lomasu vartamānasya hṛṣer niṣṭhāyāṃ vā iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54463: tayor ubhayor iha grahaṇam ity ubhayatra vibhāṣā iyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54464: lomāni mūrdhajāni aṅgajāni ca sāmānyena gṛhyante,
GS24jvkasipu:54465: yathā lomanakhaṃ spṛṣṭvā śaucaṃ kartavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54466: tadviṣaye ca harṣe vartamāno lomasu vartate ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54482: apapūrvasya cāyteḥ niṣṭhāyām aniṭtvaṃ cibhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54491: hvarateḥ dhātor niṣṭhāyaṃ chandasi hru ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54499: hru ity etasya ādeśasya abhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54504: hvaritaḥ iti hvarater niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo guṇaś ca nipātyate chandasi viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:54511_0: grasita skabhita stabhita uttabhita catta vikasta viśastṛ śaṃstṛ śāstṛ tarutṛ tarūtṛ
GS24jvkasipu:54511_1: varutṛ varūtṛ varūtrīḥ ujjvaliti kṣariti kṣamiti vamiti amiti ity etāni chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:54512: tatra grasita skabhita stabhita uttabhita iti grasu skambhu stambhu ity eteṣām udittvān niṣṭhāyām iṭpratiṣedhe prāpte iḍāgamo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54521: uttabhita iti utpūrvasya nipātasāmarthyād anyopasargapūrvaḥ stabhitaśabdo na bhavati / [#809]
GS24jvkasipu:54523: catta, vikasta iti cateḥ kaseś ca vipūrvasya niṣṭhāyām iḍabhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54524: cattā varṣeṇa vidyut catitā iti bhāṣāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:54530: viśastṛ śaṃstṛ śāstṛ iti śaser vipūrvasya śaṃseḥ śāseś ca tṛci iḍabhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54537: tarutṛ tarūtṛ varutṛ varūtṛ varūtrīḥ iti tarateḥ vṛṅvṛñoś ca tṛci uṭ ūṭ ity etāv āgamau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:54546: idam api hi bhavati - ahorātrāṇi vai varūtrayaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54550: tata eva ṅīpi sati siddho varūtrīśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54551: ujjvaliti kṣariti kṣamiti vamiti amiti iti ca jvalater utpūrvasya kṣara kṣama vama ity eteṣāṃ ca tipi śapaḥ ikārādeśo nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54563: itikaraṇaṃ pradarśanārtham tena kvacit īkāro bhāvati,
GS24jvkasipu:54564: ravimabhyamīti varuṇaḥ ity api hi vede paṭhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:54580: ity etasmin niyamārthe vajñāyamāne pratipattigauravam bhavati iti ārdhadhātukagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54585: iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇaṃ pratiṣedhanivṛttyartham // [#810]
GS24jvkasipu:54592: na cet snukramī ātmanepadasya nimittaṃ bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54596: tena ayam saty ātmanepade pratiṣedho bhavati na asati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54612: sarvatra+eva atra snaitiḥ kramiś ca ātmanepadasya nimittam /
GS24jvkasipu:54617: iha tu prasnavitevācarati iti prasnavitrīyate iti kyaṅatam ātmanepadasya nimittam, na snautiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54618: krames tu kartaryātmanepadaviṣayādasatyātmanepade kṛti pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54626: snauteḥ sani kiti ca pratyaye śryukaḥ kiti (*7,2.11)
GS24jvkasipu:54635: grahaḥ uttarasya iṭaḥ aliṭi dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54649: tasmād uttarasya ṝkārāntebhyaś ca iṭo vā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54662: vṛtaḥ uttarasya iṭo liṅi dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54670: parasmaipadapare sici vṝta uttarasya iṭo dīrghaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54696: iti iṭpratiṣedhe prāpte pakṣe iḍāgamo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54699: cikīrṣati, jihīrṣati ity atra+upadeśādhikārāt lākṣaṇikatvāc ca iḍāgamo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:54703: vṝto liṅi sici ca ātmanepadapare vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54722: ṛdantād dhātoḥ saṃyogādeḥ uttarayoḥ liṅsicorātmanepadeṣu vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54739: abhāktatvāc ca suṭa iḍāgamo na bhavati // [#812]
GS24jvkasipu:54744: svarati sūti sūyati dhūñ ity etebhyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54745: ūdidbhyaśca+uttarasya valāder ārdhadhātukasya vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54750: ūdhidbhyaḥ khalv api - gāhū - vigāḍhā, vigāhitā /
GS24jvkasipu:54752: vā iti vartamane punar vāgrahaṇaṃ liṅsicor nivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:54753: sūtisūyatyor vikaraṇanirdeśaḥ ṣū preraṇe ity asya nivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54754: dhūñ iti sānubandhakasya nirdeso dhū vidhūnane ity asay nivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54755: savitā, dhuvitā ity eva nityam etayor bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54767: radha hiṃsāsaṃsiddhyoḥ ity evam ādibhyo 'ṣṭābhya uttarasya valāder ārdhadhātukasya vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54778: krādiniyamāl liṭi radhādibhyaḥ paratvād vikalpaṃ kecid icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:54780: pūrvavidheriṇniṣedhavidhānasāmarthyāt balīyastvaṃ pratiṣedhaniyamasya iti nityamiṭā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54786: nir ity evaṃ pūrvāt kuṣa uttarasya valāder ārdhadhātukasya vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54794: nisaḥ iti vaktavye niraḥ iti nirdeśena rephāntam upasargāntaram asti iti jñāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54795: tasya hi nilayanam iti upasargasya ayatau (*8,2.19)
GS24jvkasipu:54797: niso hi rutvasya asiddhatvāl latvaṃ na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:54814: takārādāv ārdhadhātuke iṣu saha lubha ruṣa ity etebhyo vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54816: iṣu icchāyām ity asya ayaṃ vikalpa iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54817: yas tu iṣa gatau iti daivādikaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54821: yo 'pi iṣa ābhīkṣṇye iti kṛyādau paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54823: tadartham eva tīṣasaha iti sūtre kecit uditamiṣaṃ paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:54833: ṛdhu bhrasja dambhu śri svṛ yu ūrṇu bhara jñapi san ity eteṣāṃ ca sani vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54851: bhara iti bhṛñ ity etasya bhauvādikasya grahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:54872: kliśū vibādhane ity asya ktvāyāṃ vikalpaḥ siddha eva niṣṭhāyāṃ tu yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15)
GS24jvkasipu:54874: kliśa upatāpe ity etasya tu ktvāyāṃ niṣṭhāyāṃ ca nityam iḍāgamaḥ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:54879: pūṅaś ca ktvāniṣṭhayor vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54890: vasateḥ kṣudheś ca ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iḍāgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54898: vastes tu udāttatvād eva bhavitavyam iṭā /
GS24jvkasipu:54903: añceḥ pūjāyām arthe ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54906: udito vā (*7,2.56) iti ktvāpratyaye vikalpaḥ prāptaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54916: lubho vimohane 'rthe vartamānāt ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54934: jṝ vraści ity etayoḥ ktvāpratyaye iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54944: udito dhātoḥ ktvāpratyaye parato vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54952: sakārādāvasici ārdhadhātuke kṛta cṛta chṛda tṛda nṛta ity etebhyo dhātubhyo vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54988: gamer dhātoḥ sakārāder ārdhadhātukasya parasmaipadesu iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55005: ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya gameḥ ayam iḍāgamo neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55012: padaśeṣakārasya punar idaṃ darśanam - gamyupalakṣaṇārthaṃ parasmaipadagrahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:55013: parasmaipadeṣu yo gamir upalakṣitas tasmāt sakārāder ārdhadhātukasya iḍ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55019: vṛtādibhyaś caturbhyaḥ uttarasya sakārāder ārdhadhātukasya parasmaipadeṣu iḍagamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55033: vṛdgrahaṇaṃ hi tatra dyutādiparisamāptyartham kriyate - kṛpū sāmarthye vṛt iti,
GS24jvkasipu:55034: tad eva yadi vṛtādisamāptyartham api vijñāyate na kiñcidaniṣṭaṃ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:55035: tat kriyate syanderūdillakṣaṇam antaraṅgam api vikalpaṃ pratiṣedho yathā bādheta iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55036: caturgrahaṇe hi sati tātparyeṇa syandiḥ saṃnidhāpito bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55042: atra api ātmanepadena samānapadasthebhyo vṛtādibhya iḍāgama iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55044: kṛtyapi hi parasmaipadaluki ca pratiṣedho bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55051: kṛpa uttarasya tāseḥ sakārādeś ca ardhadhātukasya parasmaipadeṣu iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55061: kḷper apy ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iḍāgamaḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55063: kṛtyapi hi parsamipadaluki ca pratiṣedho bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55067: acas tāsvat thaly aniṭo nityam // PS_7,2.61 //
GS24jvkasipu:55100: upadeśe yo dhāturakāravān tāsau nityāniṭ tasmāt tāsāviva thali iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55119: ṛkārāntād ghātoḥ bhāradvājasya acāryasya matena tāsāviva nityāniṭasthali iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55131: tathā hi sati vidhyartham etat syāt // [#817]
GS24jvkasipu:55136: babhūtha ātatantha jagṛbhma vavartha ity etāni nipātyante nigamaviṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:55146: krādisūtrād eva asya pratiṣedho siddhe niyamārthaṃ vacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:55152: sṛji dṛśi ity etayoḥ thali vibhāṣā iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55158: atti arti vyayati ity eteṣāṃ thali iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55169: pratiṣedhavidhāne ca artigrahaṇam iti nityo 'yaṃ vidhiḥ iḍgrahaṇam antareṇa api śakyate vijñātum //
GS24jvkasipu:55180: dhātvabhyāsayoḥ ekādeśe kṛte etvābhyāsalopayoś ca kṛtayoḥ kṛtadvirvacanā ete ekāco bhavanti āt - yayivān /
GS24jvkasipu:55184: ekājād ghasām eva vasāviḍāgamo bhavati na anayeṣām /
GS24jvkasipu:55189: krādiniyamāt pratiṣedhābhāvāc ca ya iṭ prasaktaḥ sa niyamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55191: dvirvacane hi kṛte iṭi hi sati āto lopena bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55192: daridrātes tu kāsyanekājgrahaṇaṃ culumpādyartham ityāmā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55194: athāpyām na kriyate tathāpi ca daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaś ca pratyayavidhau iti prāg eva pratyayotpatter ākāre lupte iḍāgamasya nimittaṃ vihataṃ iti na iḍāgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55196: ghaser api yadi grahaṇam iha na kriyate tadā dvirvacanāt paratvād ghasibhasorhali ca (*6,4.100)
GS24jvkasipu:55197: iti upadhālope kṛte dvirvacanam eva na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:55199: iha tu ghasigrahaṇād upadhālopam api paratvāt iḍāgamo bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:55209: gama hana vida viśa ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ vasau vibhāṣā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55216: viśinā sāhacaryād iha videstaudādikasya lābhārthasya grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:55217: jñānārthasya tu nityaṃ vividvān ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55223: sanoteḥ sanater vā dhātoḥ saniṃsasanivāṃsam iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55226: saniṅpūrvāt anyatra senivāṃsam ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55232: ṛkārāntānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hanteś ca sye iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55236: svarater veṭtvāt ṛddhanoḥ sye ity etad bhavati vipratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:55250: stu su dhūñ ity etebhyaḥ sici parasamipade parata iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55261: yama rama nama ity eṣām aṅgānām ākārāntānāṃ ca sagāgamo bhavati parasmaipade sici,
GS24jvkasipu:55271: yamādīnāṃ halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ prāptā sā neṭi pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55278: smiṅ pūṅ ṛ añjū aśū ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ sani iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55286: aśeḥ ūdito grahaṇāt aśnoter nityam iḍāgamo 'sty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:55304: rudādibhyaḥ uttarasya valādeḥ sārvadhātukasya iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55316: īśa uttarasya se ity etasya sārvadhātukasya iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55323: īḍa jana ity etābhyām uttarasya dhve ity etasya,
GS24jvkasipu:55324: sye ity etasya ca sarvadhātukasya iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55333: janī prādurbhāve ity asya chāndasatvāt śyano luk upadhālopābhāvaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:55334: jana janane ity asya api śluvikaraṇasya grahaṇam atra+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55339: dhveśabde īśer api iḍāgama iṣyate īśidhve īśidhvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55340: tadarthaṃ kecit īḍijanoḥ sdhve ca iti sūtraṃ paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55341: tatra sakārādeḥ seśabdasya sūtra eva+upādānāc caśabdo bhinnakramaḥ īśeranukarṣaṇārtho vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55342: īśīḍijanāṃ sedhvayoḥ ity ekam eva sūtraṃ na paṭhitam ?
GS24jvkasipu:55343: vicitrā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ paṇineḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55344: dhve iti kṛtaṭer etvasya grahaṇāt laṅi dhvami na bhavitavyamiṭā /
GS24jvkasipu:55350: sārvadhātuke yo liṅ tasya anantyasya sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55363: akārāntāt aṅgād uttarasya yā ity etasya sārvadhātukasya iy ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55375: pacet ity atra api hi tarhi ato dīrgho yañi (*7,3.101)
GS24jvkasipu:55378: sa yathaiva dīrghasya bādhakaḥ evam ato lopasya api bādhakaḥ syāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:55379: syād etad evaṃ yadi dīrghaḥ sārvadhātuke vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55381: tadā yena nāprāptinyāyena dīrghasyaiva bādhakaḥ syān na punar ato lopasya /
GS24jvkasipu:55383: yaḥ iti vā ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśe yalopasya asiddhatvamanāśritya ādguṇaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55385: kecit atra ato yāsiyaḥ iti sūtraṃ pathanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55392: ākārasya ṅidavayavasya ākārāntād aṅgād uttarasya sārvadhātukasya iy ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55401: ity atra na ṅitīva ṅidvat ity evam aṅgīkriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55402: api tu ṅita iva ṅidvat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55403: pūrvasūtra eva uccukuṭiṣati iti prasiddhaye tathāṅgīkaraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:55404: yadi gāṅkuṭādisūtre ṅita iva ṅidvad bhavati ity evam aṅgīkriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55423: akāramātrabhakto 'yaṃ muk adupadeśagrahaṇena gṛhyate iti adupadeśād iti lasārvadhātukānudattatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55431: tena upadeśād ūrdhaṃ saty api kālabhede bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55466: rai ity etasya halādau vibhaktau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55478: yuṣmad asmad ity etayoḥ anādeśe vibhaktau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55485: hali ity adhikārād apy atra na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:55491: dvitīyāyāṃ ca parataḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55502: prathamāyāś ca dvivacane parato bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye yuṣmadasmadoḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55516: ajādau vibhaktau anādeśe yuṣmadasmadoḥ yakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55526: ity atra yadi hali iti anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:55537: yatra ākāro yakāraś ca na vihitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55538: pañcamyāś ca caturthyāś ca ṣaṣṭhīprathamayor api /
GS24jvkasipu:55539: yāny advivacanāny atra teṣu lopo vidhīyate // [#823]
GS24jvkasipu:55558: śeṣe lope kṛte striyāṃ ṭāp kasmān na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55563: kecit tu śeṣe lopaṃ ṭilopam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55566: tena maparyantād yo 'nyaḥ sa śeṣaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55567: tatra ayaṃ lopaḥ iti ṭilopo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:55572: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo maparyantasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55579: yuvakām, āvakām iti sākackasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:55584: tathā ca sati tvamayor akārasya yo 'ci (*7,2.89)
GS24jvkasipu:55585: iti yakāre kṛte aniṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:55586: māntasya ity eva siddhe asmin yat parigrahaṇaṃ kṛtam,
GS24jvkasipu:55589: kadā ? yadā ṇyantayoḥ kvipi māntatvaṃ vidyate yuṣmadasmadoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55590: sthānivattvaṃ ca ṇeratra kvau lutatvān na vidyate //
GS24jvkasipu:55593: dvivacane ye yuṣmadasmadī dvyarthābhidhānaviṣaye tayoḥ maparyantasya sthāne yuva āva ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55601: samāsārthasya anyasaṅkhatvāt ekavacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55602: tadā api dvyarthayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ yuvāvau bhavataḥ ,
GS24jvkasipu:55604: ity evam ādinā ādeśāntareṇa na bādhyete /
GS24jvkasipu:55625: tvāhādīnāṃ tu viṣaye paratvāt te eva bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55646: yuṣmadasmadoḥ maparyantasya jasi parato yūya vaya ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55654: aṅgādhikāre tasya ca taduttarapadasya ca iti //
GS24jvkasipu:55658: yuṣmadasmador maparyantasya sau pare tva aha ity etau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55668: yuṣmadasmadoḥ maparyantasya tubhya mahya ity etāv ādeśua bhavato ṅayi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55678: yuṣmadasmadoḥ maparyantasya tava mama ity etāv ādeśau bhavato ṅasi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55689: ekavacane ye yuṣmadasmadī ekārthāmidhānaviṣaye tayor maparyantasya sthāne tva ma ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55699: samāsārthasya tv anyasaṅkhyatvāt dvivacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55702: ity evamādīnāṃ viṣaye pūrvavipratiṣedhena te eveṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:55719: pratyaye uttarapade ca parata ekavacane vartamānayoḥ yusmadasmador maparyantasya tva ma ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55738: vibhaktau ity adhikārāt pūrvayogo vibhaktāv eva /
GS24jvkasipu:55739: tato 'nyatra api pratyaye uttarapade ca yathā syāt ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55747: etad eva tarhi ādeśavacanaṃ jñāpakam antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgo 'pi luk bādhate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55748: tena gomān priyo 'sya gomatpriyaḥ ity evam ādau numādi lukā bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55750: ity evam ādayo 'pi pratyayottarpadayor ādeśā na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55758: atha kimarthm eṣāṃ tvāhādīnāṃ bādhanārtham etan na vijñāyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:55764: tri catur ity etayoḥ striyāṃ vartamānayoḥ tisṛ catasṛ ity etāv ādeśau bhavato vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55773: striyām iti ca+etat tricaturor eva viśeṣaṇaṃ na aṅgasya /
GS24jvkasipu:55777: priyāḥ tisro brāhmaṇyo 'sya brāhmaṇasya priyatisā brāhmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55796: priyāṇi trīṇi vā asyāḥ brāhmaṇyāḥ sā priyatriḥ / [#826]
GS24jvkasipu:55805: catastraḥ paśya ity atra caturaḥ śasi (*6,1.137)
GS24jvkasipu:55807: catasṛṇām ity atra tu ṣaṭtricaturbhyo halādiḥ (*6,1.179)
GS24jvkasipu:55813: tisṛ catasṛ ity etayoḥ ṛtaḥ sthāne rephādeśo bhavati ajādau vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55830: anyathā hi tadapavādaḥ tricaturor eva ayam ādeśo vijñāyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:55834: jarā ity etasya jaras ity ayam ādeśo bhavati anyatrasyām ajādau vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55843: iha atijarasaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ paśya iti lug na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55847: jarasbhāvaḥ iti trīṇi kāryāṇi yugapat prāpnuvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55852: iti evam eva bhavati atijarasaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ paśya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55853: prathamaikavacane tṛtīyābahuvacane ca atijaraṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ tiṣṭhati,
GS24jvkasipu:55854: atijaraiḥ iti ca bhavitavyam iti gonardīyamatena /
GS24jvkasipu:55857: anye tu anityatvāt asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ atijarasaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ tiṣṭhati,
GS24jvkasipu:55858: atijarasaiḥ ity evaṃ bhavitavyam iti manyante // [#827]
GS24jvkasipu:55863: tyad ity evam ādīnām akārādeśo bhavati vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55875: sañjñopasarjanībhūtāḥ tyadādayaḥ pāṭhādeva paryudastāḥ iti iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55884: kim ity etasya kaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55887: tena akāra eva kimo na vidhīyate kimo 't (*5,3.12) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:55891: takārādau hakārādau ca vibhaktau parataḥ kim ity etasya ku ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55899: ati tiy etasyāṃ vibhaktau parataḥ kim ity etasya kva ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55903: kimo ḍvat iti pratyayāntaraṃ na vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55908: tyadādīnāṃ takāra-dakārayoḥ anantyayoḥ sakārādeśo bhavati sau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55918: adasaḥ sau parataḥ sakārasya aukārādeśo bhavati sośca lopo bhavati /
