GS24jvkasipu:55921: autvapratiṣedhaḥ sākackād vā vaktavyaḥ sādutvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:55922: yadā ca autvapratiṣedhaḥ tadā sakārād uttarasya utvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55930: hrasvāl lupyeta sambuddhir na halaḥ prakṛtaṃ hi tat //
GS24jvkasipu:55931: āpa etvaṃ bhavet tasmin na jhalītyanuvartanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:55943: idamo dakārasya sthāne makārādeśo bhavati vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55949: idamo makārasya yakārādeśo bhavati sau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55951: uttarasūtre puṃsi iti vacanāt striyāmayaṃ yakāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:55955: idamaḥ idarūpasya puṃsi sau parataḥ ay ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55962: idamaḥ akakārasya idrūpasya sthāne ana ity ayam ādeśo bhavati āpi vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55967: āpi iti pratyāhāraḥ tṛtīyaikavacanāt prabhṛti supaḥ pakāreṇa // [#829]
GS24jvkasipu:55972: halādau vibhaktau parataḥ idamo 'kakārasya idrūpasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55978: nānarthake 'lontyavidhiḥ iti sarvasya ayam idrūpasya lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55990: dhātoś ca kāryam ucyamānaṃ dhātupratyaya eva veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55996: ajantasya aṅgasya ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56012: aṅgopadhāyā akārasya sthāne ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56027: taddhite ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye parato 'ṅgasya acām ādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56034: tvāṣṭraḥ, jāgataḥ ity atra acāmāder vṛddhir antyopadhālakṣaṇāṃ vṛddhiṃ bādhate //
GS24jvkasipu:56038: kiti ca taddhite parato 'ṅgasyācām ādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56042: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:56049: devikā śiṃśapā dityavāṭ dīrghasatra śreyas ity etaṣām aṅgānām acāmādeḥ acaḥ sthane vṛddhiprasaṅge ākāro bhavati ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56059: śiṃśapā - śiṃśapāyāḥ vikāraḥ camasaḥ śāṃśapaḥ camasaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56070: vṛddhiviṣaye 'cāmādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vahīnarasya ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56076: kekaya mitrayu pralaya ity eteṣāṃ yakārādeḥ iya ity ayam ādeśo bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56085: loke ca ṛṣiśabdo gotram ity abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56088: na y-vābhyāṃ padāntābhyāṃ pūrvau tu tābhyām aic // PS_7,3.3 //
GS24jvkasipu:56090: yakāra-vakārābhyām uttarasya acāmādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56091: tābhyāṃ tu yakāra-vakārābhyāṃ pūrvam aijāgamau bhavataḥ ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56102: yaṣṭiḥ praharaṇam asya yāṣṭīkaḥ yataḥ chātrāḥ yātāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56108: vṛddher abhāvāt pratiṣedho 'pi na asti ity aprasaṅgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56111: yatra tu uttarapadasambandhī yaṇ na bhavati tatra na+iṣyate pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56112: dve aśītī bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dvyāśītikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:56116: dvāra ity evam ādīnāṃ yvābhyām uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56131: śobhano 'dhyāyaḥ ity etasyāṃ vyutpattau tu pūrveṇa+eva siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:56134: evam apy atra+eva svaśabdasya+eva pāṭhāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:56135: tadādāv api hi vṛddhiriyaṃ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:56160: nyagrodhaśabdasya kevalasya yakārād uttarasya acāmādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56161: tasmāc ca pūrvam aikāra āgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56165: nyagrodhayati iti nyagrodhaḥ iti vyutpattipakṣe niyamārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:56183: svāgata ity evam ādīnāṃ yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56205: śvādeḥ aṅgasya iñi parato yad uktaṃ tana bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56209: tatra ca tadādividhir bhavati iti etad eva vacanaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:56213: tadantasya ca anyatra api taddhite pratiṣedha iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56218: śvādeḥ aṅgasya padaśabdāntasya anyatarasyāṃ yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56226: mad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ uttarapadasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:56235: yatra pañcamīnirdeśo na asti je proṣṭhapadānām (*7,3.18)
GS24jvkasipu:56241: iti uttarapadādhikāre yā vṛddhiḥ ity evaṃ vijñāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:56243: avayavavācinaḥ uttarasya ṛtuvācinaḥ uttarapadasya ca acāmādeḥ acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56257: tatra ṛtor vṛddhimadvidhau avayavāt iti tadantavidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56265: su sarva ardha ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya janapadavācinaḥ uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56277: digvācinaḥ uttarasya janapadavācino madravarjitasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56296: prācāṃ deśe grāmanagarāṇāṃ diśa uttareṣām acāmāder aco vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56308: grāmatvād eva nagarāṇām api grahaṇe siddhe bhedena yad ubhayor upādānaṃ tat sambandhabhedapratipattyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:56310: pāṭaliputrādiḥ punar uttarapadam eva nagaram āha /
GS24jvkasipu:56311: tatra grāmavācinām aṅgānām avayavasya dikśabdād uttarasya nagaravācinām uttarapadānām avayavasya ca vṛddhir bhavati ity evam abhisambandhaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56312: itaratra tu diśa uttareṣām nagarāṇām ity eva /
GS24jvkasipu:56313: pūrvaiṣukāmaśamaḥ ity evam ādiṣu kṛtāyām uttarapadavṛddhau ekādeśo bhavati iti jñāpi ta nendrasya parasya (*7,3.22)
GS24jvkasipu:56318: saṅkhyāyā uttarapadasya saṃvatsaraśabdasya saṅkhyāyāś ca acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56321: dvau saṃvatsarābadhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dvisāṃvatsarikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56322: saṅkhyāyāḥ - dve ṣaṣṭī adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dviṣāṣṭikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56324: dviṣaṣṭhyādiśabdo varṣeṣu saṃkhyeyeṣu vartamānaḥ kālādhikāravihitaṃ pratyayam utpādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:56326: ity eva siddhe saṃvatsaragrahaṇam parimāṇagrahaṇe kālaparimāṇasya agrahaṇārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:56329: dvivarṣā, trivarṣā māṇavikā iti aparimāṇabistācita iti paryudāso na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56333: saṅkhyāyā uttarasya varṣaśabdasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56336: sa cet taddhito bhaviṣyatyarthe na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56337: dve varṣe adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto vā dvivārṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56344: adhīṣṭabhṛtayor abhaviṣyati iti pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56347: dve varṣe adhīṣṭo bhṛto vā karma kariṣyati iti dvivārṣiko manuṣyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:56351: parimāṇāntasya aṅgasya saṅkhyāyāḥ paraṃ yad uttarapadaṃ tasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56354: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye śāṇe ca+uttarapade na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56358: ity atra suvarṇaśatamānayor upasaṅkhyānam iti luko vikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56365: pañca kalāpāḥ parimāṇamasya iti vihṛhya tad asya pariṃāṇam (*5,1.57)
GS24jvkasipu:56379: tatra yaḥ taddhito vihitaḥ tasmin ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56381: kiti ca parataḥ proṣthapadānām uttarasya acāmādeḥ acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56388: je iti kim ? yadā proṣthapado megho dharaṇīmabhivarṣati,
GS24jvkasipu:56390: proṣthapadānām iti bahuvacananirdeśāt paryāyo 'pi gṛhyate bhadrapādaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:56394: hṛd bhaga sindhu ity evam anto 'ṅge pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca acāmāder aco vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56416: anuśatika ity evam ādīnāṃ cāṅgānāṃ pūrvapadasya ca+uttarapadasya ca cāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56431: ata eva vacanādasya samudāyasya prātipadikatvaṃ vibhakteś ca aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:56442: janapadasamudāyo janapadagrahaṇena na gṛhyate iti vuñ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56449: sarvabhūmeḥ nimittaṃ saṃyogaḥ utpāto vā sārvabhaumaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56494: devatādvandve ca pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56507: indraśabdasya parasya yad uktam tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56514: iti lopaḥ, aparasya pūrveṇa saha ekādeśaḥ ity aprāptir eva vṛddheḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56516: bahiraṅgam api pūrvottarapadayoḥ pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati paścād ekādeśaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56517: tena pūrvaiṣukāmaśamaḥ ity ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56521: dirghād uttarasya varuṇasya yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56533: prācāṃ deśe nagarānte 'ṅge pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56545: jaṅgala dhenu valaja ity evam antasya aṅgasya pūrvapadasya acāmāder aco vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56546: vibhāṣitam uttaram uttarapadasya vibhāṣā bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56556: ardhāt parimāṇasya pūrvasya tu vā // PS_7,3.26 //
GS24jvkasipu:56558: ardhaśabdāt parasya parimāṇavācinaḥ uttarasya acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56559: pūrvasya tu vā bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56571: ardhāt parasya parimāṇākārasya vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56572: pūrvasya tu vā bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56582: iha mā bhūt, ardhakhāryāṃ bhavā ardhakhārī /
GS24jvkasipu:56583: kiṃ ca syāt ? ardhakhārī bhāryā yasya ardhakhārībhāryaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56587: sa vṛddhinimittaṃ na bhavati iti puṃvadbhāvo na pratiṣidhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:56588: yathā vaiyākaraṇī bhāryā asya vaiyākaraṇabhāryaḥ iti // [#838]
GS24jvkasipu:56593: pravāhaṇasya ḍhe parataḥ uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56602: ḍhakprayayāntasya pravāhaṇaśabdasya taddhiteṣu parataḥ uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56608: bāhyataddhitanimittā vṛddhiḥ ḍhāśrayeṇa vikalpena bādhitum aśakyā iti sūtrārambhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:56612: nañaḥ uttareṣāṃ śuci īśvara kṣetrajña kuśala nipuṇa ity eteṣām acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56623: atra kecid āhuḥ iyaṃ pūrvapadasya vṛddhir aprāptaiva vibhāṣā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56624: na nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt ity uttaro bhāvapratyayaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56625: tatra śucyādibhyaḥ eva pratyaye kṛte paścānnañsamāse sati vṛddhiranaṅgasyāpi vacanāt bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56627: bhāvavacanādanyopi hi taddhito vṛddhinimittamapatyādiṣu artheṣu nañsamāsād eva vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56635: yathātatha yathāpura ity etayoḥ nañaḥ uttarayoḥ paryāyeṇa acamāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:56641: ayathātatha aythāpura iti brāhmaṇādiṣu nañsamāsau etau draṣṭavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:56645: bhāsye tu yathādarśita ayathātathābhāvaḥ iti tathā supsupeti samāso lakṣyate // [#839]
GS24jvkasipu:56662: dhāto kāryam ucyamānaṃ dhātoḥ pratyaye vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56668: ākārāntasya aṅgasya ciṇi kṛti ñṇiti yugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56684: udātopadeśasya māntasya aṅgasya ācamivarjitasya ciṇi kṛti ca ñṇiti yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56700: aḍa udyame, yama uparame iti nipātanād anugantavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:56702: śamī, damī, tamī ity atra yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:56713: āmaḥ iti caurādikasya ṇici vṛddhau satyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56714: tatra hi mittvaṃ na asti na anye mito 'hetau iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56715: sūryaviśrāmā bhūmiḥ ity evam ādikaṃ prayogamanyāyyam eva manyante /
GS24jvkasipu:56721: jani vadhi ity etayoḥ ciṇi kṛti ca ñṇiti yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56730: bhakṣakaścenna vidyeta vadhako 'pi na vidyate iti hi prayogo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56740: arti hrī vlī rī knūyī kṣmāyī ity eteṣām aṅgānām ākārāntānāṃ ca pugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56750: ṛ gatau iti dvayor api dhātvor grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:56753: pukaḥ pūrvāntakaraṇam adīdapat ity atra upadhāhrasvo yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:56757: śā dhā sā hvā vyā ve pā ity eteṣam aṅgānāṃ yugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56765: pāgrahaṇe pai ovai śoṣaṇe ity asya api iha grahaṇam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:56766: pā rakṣaṇe ity asya lugvikaraṇatvān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56779: etasmin prakaraṇe lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣā na asti ity upadiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56781: jāpayati ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56785: vā ity etasya vidhūnane 'rthe vartamānasya jugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56791: vāteḥ puk mā bhūt ity evam artham /
GS24jvkasipu:56792: pai ovai śoṣaṇe ity etasya etad rūpm // [#841]
GS24jvkasipu:56797: lī lā ity etayor aṅgayoḥ anyatarasyāṃ nuk luk iy etāv āgamau bhavato ṇau parataḥ snehavipātane 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:56804: na tu kṛtātvasya vibhāṣā līyateḥ (*6,1.51) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56814: bhī ity etasya hetubhaye 'rthe ṣugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56817: atra api bhī ī iti īkārapraśleṣaḥ kṛtātvasya pugnivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56818: muṇḍo bhāpayate ity evaṃ hi tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56826: sphāy ity etasya aṅgasya vakārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56831: śadeḥ aṅgasya agatau arthe vartamānasya takārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56838: ruheḥ aṅgasya anyatarasyāṃ pakārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56842: pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasya ata id āpy asupaḥ // PS_7,3.44 //
GS24jvkasipu:56844: pratyayasthāt kakārāt pūrvasya akārasya ikārādeśo bhavati āpi parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56845: sa ced āp supaḥ paro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56855: kakāramātraṃ pratyayo na asti iti sāmarthyāt pratyayasthasya grahaṇam śakyate vijñātum /
GS24jvkasipu:56869: yady evam, kārikā ity atra api na prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:56872: ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhavati iti vyavadhānam eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:56873: vacanād vyavadhānamīdṛśaṃ yat sthānivadbhāvakṛtam ekena varṇena tadāśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56874: rathakaṭyādiṣu tu śrutikṛtam anekena varṇena vyavadhānam iti itvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56876: bahavaḥ parivrājakā asyāṃ mathurāyām bahuparivrājakā mathurā /
GS24jvkasipu:56877: subantād ayaṃ bahuparivrājakaśabdāt paraḥ āp iti pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56880: paryudāse hi sati samudāyād asubantāt parataḥ āp iti itvam atra syād eva /
GS24jvkasipu:56881: avidyamānaḥ sup yasmin so 'yam asup iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:56883: tathā hi sati bahucarmikā ity atra api na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:56887: kevalamāmaka iti niyamāt sañjñāchandasoḥ īkāro na asty atra,
GS24jvkasipu:56900: yā sā ity etayoḥ ikārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56949: udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena yakārapūrvāyāḥ kakārapūrvāyāś ca ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56960: ātaḥ ity anena hy ataḥ iti sthānī viśiṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56963: yakapūrvāyāḥ iti strīliṅganirdeśaḥ ātaḥ strīpratyayasya pratipattyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:56969: dhātvantayoḥ yakārakakārayor asya pratiṣedhasya pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56977: eṣām ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāras tasya itvaṃ na bhavati udīcāmācaryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:56991: tatra hi sati yadi sākackābhyāṃ nañsamāsaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56993: ubhayathāpi samāsād ya vibhaktir utpadyate tasyāṃ satyāṃ tyadātyatve sati ṭāpā bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:56994: so 'ntarvartinyā vibhaktyā subantāt paraḥ iti itvasya prāptir eva na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:57000: ity eva siddhe yad iha grahaṇaṃ tadupasarjanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:57004: atra upasarjanahrasvatve kṛte punar bahuvrihau kṛte bhāṣitapuṃskād yaḥ ṭāp utpadyate tasya ke 'ṇaḥ (*7,4.13)
GS24jvkasipu:57006: na asau abhāsitapuṃskād vihitasya ataḥ sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57007: nañpūrvāṇām api ity apiśabdād anyapūrvāṇāṃ kevalānāṃ ca vidhir ayam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57013: atra nañpūrvāṇām iti vacanam anuvāda eva mandabuddhipratipattyarthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:57017: abhāṣitapuṃskād vihitasya ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāraḥ tasya udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ikārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57022: bahuvrīhau yadā kapi hrasvaḥ kriyate tadā bhavitavyam anena vidhinā /
GS24jvkasipu:57023: atra api abhāṣitapuṃskād vihitasya ataḥ sthāne bhavatyakāraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57024: yadā tu avidyamānā khaṭvā asyāḥ akhaṭvā,
GS24jvkasipu:57025: alpā akhaṭvā akhaṭvikā iti tadā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57031: abhāṣitapuṃskāt ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāraḥ tasya ācāryāṇām ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57042: tasya pratyayaṭhasya ikaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57050: saṅghātagrahaṇe tu pratyaye 'tra api saṅghātagrahaṇam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:57051: tatra kaṇeṣṭhaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ ity evam ādīnām uṇādīnām uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1)
GS24jvkasipu:57053: mathitaṃ paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ ity atra tu yasya+iti ca (*6,4.148)
GS24jvkasipu:57056: sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57062: is us ity evam antānām ugantānāṃ tāntānāṃ cāṅgānām uttarasya ṭhasya kaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57073: isusoḥ pratipadoktayor grahaṇād iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57081: cakārajakārayoḥ kavargādeśo bhavati ghiti ṇyati ca pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57091: nyaṅku ity evam ādīnāṃ kavargādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57093: madguḥ - mimasjibhya uḥ iti masjeḥ upratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57094: bhṛguḥ - prathimadibhrasjāṃ samprasāraṇaṃ salopaś ca iti upratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57095: dūrepākaḥ, phalepākaḥ - dūre pacyate svayam eva,
GS24jvkasipu:57101: kṣaṇepākaḥ ity api hi kecit paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:57106: takram vakram iti pañcater vañcateś ca sphāyitañcivañci ity ādinā sūtreṇa rak /
GS24jvkasipu:57117: vīrud ity atra nyakpūrvasya ruheḥ pacādyaci,
GS24jvkasipu:57124: hanteḥ hakārasya kavargādeśo bhavati ñiti ṇiti pratyaye parataḥ nakāre ca /
GS24jvkasipu:57133: haḥ iti kim ? alo 'ntyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:57142: yady api sarvair eva ñṇinnairhantihakāro viśiṣyate tathāpi yena nāvyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti ñṇiti dhātvavayavena vyavahite 'pi sati bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57153: abhyāsanimitte pratyaye hanter aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasmād eva+etat kutvam /
GS24jvkasipu:57159: hinoter hakarasya abhyāsād uttarasya kavargādeśo bhavati acaṅi /
GS24jvkasipu:57166: katham ? caṅyabhyāsanimitte ṇau hinotir aṅgaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57167: tatra abhyāsanimitte pratyaye heraṅgasya iti vijñāyamane prāptir eva na asti ?
GS24jvkasipu:57170: heracaṅi iti caṅo 'nyatra herṇya dhikasya api kutvaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57175: sani liṭi ca pratyaye jeḥ aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasmād uttarasya kavargāadeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57179: jināteḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte yady api jirbhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57180: tathāpi lākṣaṇikatvāt tasya grahaṇaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57187: cinoteḥ aṅgasya sanliṭor abhyāsād uttarasya vibhāṣā kavargādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57194: kavargādeḥ dhātoḥ cajoḥ kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57203: aji vraji ity etayoś ca kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57209: iti vībhāvasya vidhānāt ṇyati na asti udāharaṇam //
GS24jvkasipu:57213: bhuja nyubaj ity etau śabdau nipātyete pāṇau upatāpe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:57218: nyubjitāḥ śerate 'sminn iti nyubjaḥ upatāpaḥ, rogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57225: prayāja anuyāja ity etau nipātyete yajñāṅge /
GS24jvkasipu:57231: anyatra apy evaṃ prakāre kutvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57234: ṛtuyājaiścaranti ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:57238: vañceḥ aṅgasya gatau vartamānasya kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57247: ucer dhātoḥ ke pratyaye okaḥ iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57253: adhikaraṇādau tu kārakāntare ghañarthe kavidhānam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57254: kim arthaṃ punar ayaṃ ghañyeva na vyutpadyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:57258: jalaukasaḥ ity evam ādāv apy asuni pratyaye uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1)
GS24jvkasipu:57263: ṇye parataḥ āvaśyake 'rthe kavargo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57273: yaja yāca ruca pravaca ṛca ity eteṣāṃ ṇye parataḥ kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57279: ṛdupadhād api ṛcer ata eva nipātanāt ṇyat bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57284: prapūrvasya+eva vacer aśabdasañjñāyāṃ kutvapratiṣedho yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:57295: vaco 'śabdasañjñāyāṃ ṇyati parataḥ kutvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57303: prayojya niyojya ity etau śabdau śakyārthe nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:57321: ghusañjñakānāṃ leṭi parato vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57326: āḍāgame sati lope 'pi dadāt iti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57329: dadāt ity eva nitye prāpte lopaḥ ārabhya māṇo bādhate eva etad rūpam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:57333: okārāntasya aṅgasya śyani parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57353: lug vā duha-diha-liha-guhām ātmanepade dantye // PS_7,3.73 //
GS24jvkasipu:57355: duha diha liha guha ity eteṣām aṅgānām ātmanepade dantyādau parataḥ kṣasya vā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57371: anyatra tu antyasya+eva lope kṛte jhalo jhali (*8,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:57376: yadi sa na gṛhyeta tataḥ taugrahaṇam eva atra kṛtaṃ syāt // [#850]
GS24jvkasipu:57381: śamādīnām aṣṭānāṃ dīrgho bhavati śyani parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57396: ṣthivu klami ācam ity eteṣāṃ dīrgho bhavati śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57407: kramaḥ parasmaipadapare śiti parato dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57412: saṅkrāma iti herluki kṛte na lumatāṅgasya (*1,1.66)
GS24jvkasipu:57415: lumatāśabdena lupte ya daṅgaṃ tasya kārye sa pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57421: iṣu gami yama ity eteṣāṃ śiti parataḥ chakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57426: iha mā bhūt, iṣyati, iṣṇāti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57427: ye tu iṣimuditaṃ na adhīyate te iha ca sūtre aci iti anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:57428: tac ca pradhānam ajgrahaṇam śiti ity anena viśeṣyate iti varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:57430: yasmin vidhis tadādāvalgrahaṇe ity etad api viśeṣṇena+eva isyate,
GS24jvkasipu:57431: tena iṣāṇa ity atra chatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57432: na hy ayam ajeva śit iti //
GS24jvkasipu:57436: pa ghrā dhmā sthā mnā dāṇ dṛśi arti sarti śada sada ity eteṣāṃ piba jighra dhama tiṣtha mana yaccha paśya ṛccha dhau śīya sīda ity ete ādeśā bhavanti śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57449: saḥ aṅgavṛtte punar vṛttāvavidhirniṣṭhitasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57450: atha vā akārānto 'yam ādeśaḥ ādyudātto nipātyate / [#851]
GS24jvkasipu:57458: jña jana ity etayoḥ jādeśo bhavati śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57465: pū ity evam ādīnāṃ hrasvo bhavati śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57467: pūñ pavan ity ataḥ prabhṛti plī gatau vṛt iti yāvat kecit icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:57468: vṛtkaraṇam etat lvādīnāṃ pvādīnāṃ ca parisamāptyartham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57469: apare tu lvādīnām eva parisamāptyarthaṃ vṛtkaraṇam etad icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:57474: yeṣām āgaṇāntāḥ pvādayaḥ teṣāṃ jānāti ity atra hrasvaḥ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:57477: janer api hi jādeśe sati ato dīrgho yañi (*7,3.101)
GS24jvkasipu:57482: mīnāter aṅgasya śiti pratyaye parato hrasvo bhavati nigamaviṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:57488: mider aṅgasya iko guṇo bhavati śiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57494: jusi ca pratyaye parataḥ igantasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57499: sunuyuḥ ity atra kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:57503: tatra na aprāpte sārvadhātukāśrayaṅittvanimitte pratiṣedhe jusi guṇaḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ tam eva bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:57505: tatra hi prāpte ca aprāpte ca ārabhyate iti // [#852]
GS24jvkasipu:57510: sārvadhātuke ārdhadhātuke ca pratyaye parataḥ igantasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57519: yadi hi pratyaye saṅi iti vā ucyeta,
GS24jvkasipu:57524: jāgu ity etasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati aviciṇṇalṅitsu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57532: vṝddhiviṣaye pratiṣedhaviṣaye ca yathā syāt iti jāgarter ayaṃ guṇaḥ ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57535: yadi hi syāt anarthaka eva guṇaḥ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:57543: vi iti kecid ikāram uccāraṇārthaṃ varṇayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:57544: kvasāv api vakārādau guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57546: ajāgaruḥ, ahaṃ jajāgara ity atra pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:57549: athavā jāgraḥ iti praptirasāvānantaryād viciṇṇalṅitsu pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57557: pugantasya aṅgasya laghūpadhasya ca sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayor guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57565: pratyayāder aṅgāvayavasya ca halorānantarye sati lag hūpadhaguṇo na vyāvartyate iti jñāpitam etat knusanoḥ kitkaraṇena,
GS24jvkasipu:57568: saṃyoge gurusañjñāyāṃ guṇo bhettur na sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:57569: vidhyapekṣaṃ laghoś ca asau kathaṃ kuṇḍir na duṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:57573: knusanor yatkṛtaṃ kittvaṃ jñāpakaṃ syāl laghor gaṇe // [#853]
GS24jvkasipu:57575: upadhā ca atra ig eva gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:57576: tato bhinatti iti guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57579: pugantaśca laghūpadhā ca pugantalaghūypadham iti sūtrārthaṃ varṇayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:57581: na abhyastasya aci piti sārvadhātuke // PS_7,3.87 //
GS24jvkasipu:57583: abhyastasañjñakasya aṅgasya laghūpadhasya ajādau piti sārvadhātuke guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57607: bhū sū ity etayoḥ tiṅi sārvadhātuke guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57618: atha bobhavīti iti yaṅluki guṇapratiṣedhaḥ kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:57619: jñāpakāt, yad ayaṃ bobhūtu iti guṇābhāvārthe nipātanaṃ karoti //
GS24jvkasipu:57624: ukārāntasya aṅgasya vṛddhir bhavati luki sati halādau piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:57644: api stuyād rājānam ity atra hi ṅicca pinna bhavati iti pittvapratiṣedhād vṛddher abhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57645: na abhyastasya ity etad iha anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:57651: ūrṇoter vibhāṣā vṛddhir bhavati halādau piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:57661: ūrṇoter dhātoḥ apṛkte hali piti sārvadhātuke guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57665: tena+eva jñāpyate bhavaty eṣā paribhāṣā yasmin vidhis tadādāvalgrahaṇe iti //
GS24jvkasipu:57669: tṛṇaha ity etasyāṅgasya imāgamo bhavati hali piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:57678: śnami kṛte imāgamo yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:57682: vrū ity etasmād uttarasya halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasya īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57692: yaṅaḥ uttarasya halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasya īḍāgamo bhavati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:57695: tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyāṃ ā viveśa /
GS24jvkasipu:57698: halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasya yaṅantād abhāvaḥ iti yaṅlugantasya udāharaṇam //
GS24jvkasipu:57706: ama gatyādiṣu ity etebhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya halāder vā īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57713: iti vikaraṇaluki sati halādisārvadhātukam anantaraṃ sambhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57715: tatra sarveṣām eva chandasi viṣaye vidhir ayaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57716: sārvadhātuke iti anuvartamāne punaḥ sārvadhātukagrahaṇam apidartham,
GS24jvkasipu:57718: śamīdhvam ity atra api yathā syāt iti // [#855]
GS24jvkasipu:57723: aster aṅgāt sijantāc ca parasya apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57732: āhibhuvorīṭi pratiṣedhaḥ iti sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedha tena+iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57737: astisicor apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya īḍagamo bhavati bahulaṃ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:57752: rudādibhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya halādeḥ apṛktasya īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57769: rudādibhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ parasya apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya aḍāgamo bhavati gārgyagālavayor matena /
GS24jvkasipu:57785: asmād uttarasya apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya aḍāgamo bhavati sarveṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:57794: akārāntasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati yañādau sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57804: teṣāṃ bhavavān iti kvasau sārvadhātukadīrgho na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:57810: supi ca yañādau parato 'kārāntasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57821: bahuvacane jhalādau supi parato 'kārāntasya aṅgasya ekārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57857: ṅyābgrahaṇe 'dīrghagrahaṇam iti vacanāt iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57863: sambuddhau ca parataḥ ābantasya aṅgasya etvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57872: ambārthanām aṅgānāṃ nadyantānāṃ hrasvo bhavati sambuddhau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57888: talo hrasvo bā ṅisambuddhyor iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:57897: mātrā vyapadeśam arhati ślāghanīyatvād yaḥ putras tadartham /
GS24jvkasipu:57906: hrasvāntasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati sambuddhau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57910: he kumāri, he brahmabandhu ity evam ādīnāṃ hrasvavidhānasāmarthyād guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57912: ambārthānāṃ hrasvaḥ ity uktvā nadīhrasvayor guṇaḥ ity evaṃ brūyāt //
GS24jvkasipu:57916: jasi parato hrasvāntasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57922: jasādiṣu chandasi vāvacanaṃ prāṅ ṇau caṅyupadhāyā hrasva ity etasmāt /
GS24jvkasipu:57923: itaḥ prakaraṇāt prabhṛti chandasi vā iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:57939: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya ṅau parataḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57953: ghyantasyāṅgasya ṅiti pratyaye parato guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57968: nadyantād aṅgād uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyayasya āḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57976: ābantā daṅgād uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyayasya yāḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57983: atikhaṭvāya ity atra akṛte dīrghe ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ iti vacanād yāḍāgamo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57988: sarvanāmnaḥ ābantād aṅgād uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyaysya syāṭ āgamo hrasvaś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58006: dvitīyā tṛtiyā ity etābhyām uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyayasya vibhāṣā syāṭ āgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:58014: nadyantāt ābantāt nī ity etasmāc ca+uttarasya ṅeḥ ām ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58028: ikārokārābhyāṃ nadīsañjñakābhyām uttarasya ṅeḥ ām ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58035: yan na nadisañjñaṃ na api ghisañjñam ikārāntam ,
GS24jvkasipu:58049: at iti taparakaraṇaṃ striyāṃ ṭāpo nivrttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:58050: audacca gheḥ iti yeṣām ekam eva+idaṃ sūtram,
GS24jvkasipu:58056: gheḥ uttarasya āṅaḥ na abhāvo bhavati astriyām /
GS24jvkasipu:58064: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ // ______________________________________________________//
GS24jvkasipu:58079: iha tu mā bhavānaṭiṭat iti nityatvād dvitīyasya dvirvacanaṃ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:58080: tathā sati hrasvabhāvino 'ṅgasya akārasya upadhātvaṃ vihitam iti hrasvo na syāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:58082: oṇeḥ ṛdit - karaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ nityam api dvirvacanam upadhāhrasvatvena bādhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:58083: ṇau iti kim ? caṅyupadhāyā hrasvaḥ ity ucyamāne alīlavat ity atra vacanasāmarthyāt antaraṅgām api vṛddhim ādeśaṃ ca bādhitvā hrasvaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:58084: adīdapat ity atra hrasvatvena puko bādhaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:58085: apīpacat ity evam ādautu naiva syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:58091: tadedadupadhāgrahaṇam uttarārtham avaśyaṃ kartavyaṃ tad iha api hrasvatvaṃ nivartayati ity evam arthaṃ yena na avyavadhānam ity etannāśrayitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:58094: yo 'sau ṇau ṇilopastasya sthānivadbhāvena aglopitvāt aṅgasya hrasvo na prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:58099: aglopinām aṅgānāṃ śāseḥ ṛditāṃ ca ṇau caṅi upadhāyā hrasvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58104: ageva yatra kevalo lupyate tatra sthānivadbhāvād api siddham,
GS24jvkasipu:58105: halacor ādeśe tu na sidhyati iti tadartham etad vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:58113: bhrāja bhāsa bhāṣa dīpa jīva mīla pīḍa ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ ṇau caṅi upadhāyā hrasvo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:58130: pibateḥ aṅgasya ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ lopo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:58133: upadhālope kṛte oḥ puyaṇ vacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ ṇau sthānivadbhāvasya iti sthānivadbhāvād dvirvacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:58137: tiṣṭhater aṅgasya ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58144: jighrateḥ aṅgasya nau caṅi upadhāyā ikārādeśo vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58154: ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ ṛvarṇasya sthāne vā ṛkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58160: taprakaraṇaṃ dīrghe 'pi sthānini hrasva eva yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:58167: chandasi viṣaye ṇau caṅi upadhāyā ṛvarṇasya sthāne ṛkarādeśo bhavati nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:58175: dayater aṅgasya liṭi parato digi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58178: dayateḥ iti dīṅo grahaṇaṃ na tu daya dāne ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:58184: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya saṃyogādeḥ guṇo bhavati liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58196: pratiṣedhaviṣaye 'pi guṇo yathā syāt ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58205: atra hi pūrvaṃ dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścād upasargeṇa ity atra darśane liti kṛte,
GS24jvkasipu:58211: upaskṛṣīṣṭa ity atra suṭo bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya asiddhatvāt ṛtaś ca saṃyogādeḥ iti iḍāgamo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:58217: ṝkārāntānāṃ ca liṭi parato guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58231: śṝ dṝ pṝ ity eteṣāṃ aṅgānāṃ liṭi parato vā hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58241: prā pūraṇe ity eteṣām anekārthā dhātavaḥ iti śṝdṝprāmarthe vartamānānāṃ viśaśratuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:58247: tathā ca sati kvasau viśaśṛvān ity etad rūpaṃ na syāt // [#863]
GS24jvkasipu:58257: rākā, dhākā ity atra uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1)
GS24jvkasipu:58259: na kapi (*7,4.14) iti pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt kano 'pi sānubandhakasya grahaṇam iha bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:58263: kapi pratyaye parato 'ṇo hrasvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58268: ity ayam api hrasvaḥ kapi na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58270: paścāt kabantena saha samāsena bhavitavyam iti strīpratyayāntasamāsaprātipadikaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:58274: ābantasyāṅgasya kapi hrasvaḥ na bhavaty antarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:58281: ṛvarṇāntānāṃ dṛśeś ca aṅi parato guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58292: asyater aṅgasya thugāgamo bhavati aṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58297: śvayateḥ aṅgasya akārādeśo bhavati aṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58302: pater aṅgasya pumāgamo bhavati aṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58308: vaceḥ aṅgasya aṅi parataḥ umāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58313: śīṅaḥ aṅgasya sārvadhātuke parataḥ guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58319: yakārādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ śīṅaḥ aṅgasya ayaṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58329: upasargād uttarasya uhater aṅgasya hrasvo bhavati yakārādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58345: eter aṅgasya upasargād uttarasya liṅi yakārādau kṅiti parato hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58349: āśiṣi liṅi akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ iti dīrghatve kṛte hrasvo 'nena bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58351: aṇaḥ ity eva, ā īyāt eyat /
GS24jvkasipu:58356: akṛdyakāre asārvadhātukayakāre ca kṅiti parato 'jantasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58387: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya akṛdyakāre asārvadhātuke yakāre cvau ca parato rīṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58402: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya śayak ity etayoḥ liṅi ca yakārādau asārvadhātuke parato raṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58418: guṇo bhavati arteḥ saṃyogādīnām ṛkārāntānāṃ yaki parato ligi ca yakārādau asārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:58424: saṃskriyāt iti suṭo bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya asiddhatvāt abhaktatvāt vā saṃyogāditvam aṅgasya na asti iti guṇo na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:58431: yagi ca parataḥ arteḥ saṃyogādeś ca ṛtaḥ guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58446: ghrā dhmā ity etayoḥ yaṅi parataḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58454: acarṇāntasya aṅgasya cvau parataḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58463: kyaci parataḥ avarṇāntasya aṅgasya īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58474: aśanāya udanya dhanāya ity etāni nipātyante bubhukṣā pipāsā gardha ity eteṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:58475: aśanāya ity aśanaśabdasya ātvaṃ kyaci nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58487: chandasi viṣaye putravarjitasya avarṇāntasya aṅgasya kyaci yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58499: durasyuḥ draviṇasyuḥ vṛṣaṇyati riṣaṇyati ity etāni chandasi nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:58516: aśva agha ity etayoḥ kyaci parataḥ chandasi viṣaye ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58519: etad eva ātvavacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ na cchandasy aputrasya (*7,4.35)
GS24jvkasipu:58524: deva sumna ity etayoḥ kyaci parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati kāṭhake yajuṣi /
GS24jvkasipu:58534: kavi adhvara pṛtanā ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ kyaci parato lopo bhavati ṛci viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:58541: dyati syāti mā sthā ity eteṣām aṅgānām ikārādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58555: śā chā ity etayoḥ anyatarasyām ikārādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti /
GS24jvkasipu:58566: devatrāto galo grāha iti yoge ca sadvidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58572: dadhāter aṅgasya hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58579: jahāter aṅgasya hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati ktvāpratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58587: jahāter aṅgasya vibhāṣā hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye ktvāpratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58593: sudhita vasudhita nemadhita dhiṣva dhiṣīya ity etāni chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:58594: tatra sudhita vasudhita nemadhita iti suvasunemapūrvasya dadhāteḥ ktapratyaya ittvam iḍāgamo vā pratyayasya nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58601: dhiṣva iti loṇmadhyamaikavacane dadhāteḥ ittvam iḍāgamo vā pratyayasya dvirvacanābhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58604: dhiṣiya iti āśīrliṅi ātmanepadottamaikavacane dadhāteḥ ittvam,
GS24jvkasipu:58611: dā ity etasya ghusañjñakasya dad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti pratyaya parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58622: evaṃ hy uktam - tānte doṣo dīrghatvaṃ syād dānte doṣo niṣṭhānatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:58624: yadi tu dasti iti takārādau dīrghatvaṃ tadā tānte 'pi adoṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58625: dāntadhāntayor api sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti natvadhatve na bhaviṣyataḥ iti na doṣaḥ / [#869]
GS24jvkasipu:58631: anupasargā vā ete avādayaḥ kriyāntaraviṣayā veditavyāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:58635: ajantād upasargāduttarasya dā ity etasya ghusaṃjñakasya ta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti /
GS24jvkasipu:58647: upasargāt iti paccamīnirdeśād āder alaḥ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:58651: aparam api ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ sthāninirdeśartham ity ākārasya sthāne takāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58654: apo bhi (*7,4.48) ity atra pañcamyantam acaḥ ity anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:58656: dyater ittvād acasta ity etad bhavati vipratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:58662: ap ity etasya aṅgasya bhakārādau pratyaye parataḥ ta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58666: svavaḥsvatavasormāsa uṣasaś ca takārādeśa iṣyate chandasi bhakārādau /
GS24jvkasipu:58674: sakārāntasya aṅgasya sakārādau ārdhadhātuke parataḥ takārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58688: tāseḥ asteś ca sakārasya sakārādau pratyaye parataḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58693: asteḥ akārāsakārayoḥ luptayoḥ se iti pratyayamātram etat padam,
GS24jvkasipu:58699: rephādau ca pratyaye parataḥ tāsastyoḥ sakārāsya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58707: tāsastyoḥ sakārasya hakārādaśo bhavati eti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58713: yakārādau ivarṇādau ca parato dīdhīvevyoḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58727: sani pratyaye sakārādau parataḥ mī mā ghu rabha labha śaka pata pada ity eteṣām aṅgānām acaḥ sthāne is ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58728: mī iti mīnātiminotyoḥ dvayor api grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58744: sani rādho hiṃsāyām aca is vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58752: āp jñapi ṛdha ity eteṣām aṅgānām aca īkārādeśo bhavati sani sakārādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58762: sanīvantardha iti jñapeḥ ṛdheś ca iṭo vikaopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:58767: cakārāt īt ca sani sakārādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58773: muco 'karmakasya guṇo vā bhavati sani sakārādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58785: yad etat prakrāntaṃ sani mīmā ity ādi muco 'karmakasya iti yāvat,
GS24jvkasipu:58788: abhyāsasya ity etac ca achikṛtaṃ veditavyam ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58789: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ abhyāsasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:58795: ity evam siddhe yad atragrahanam iha akriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:58817: abhyāsasya yad ucyate anaci tad bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:58835: tatra abhyāsajāteḥ āśrayaṇāt kvacid api vartamāno halādiḥ anadeḥ sarvatra nivṛttiṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:58842: abhyāsasya anāder halo nivṛttiḥ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:58843: sā kim iti āder avidheyāṃ satīm anivṛttim apekṣiṣyate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:58855: ucicchiṣati ity atra uccheḥ antaraṅgatvāt tuki kṛte dvirvacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:58856: tatra halādiḥ śeṣe sati abhyāse takāraḥ śrūyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:58871: kavateḥ abhyāsasya yaṅi parataḥ cuḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58874: kavateḥ iti vikaraṇanirdeśaḥ kauteḥ kuvateś ca nivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58881: kṛṣeḥ chandasi viṣaye yaṅi parataḥ abhyāsasya cuḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58889_0: dādharti dardharti dardharṣi bobhūtu tetikate alarṣi āpanīphaṇat saṃsaniṣyadat karikrat
GS24jvkasipu:58889_1: kanikradat bharibhrat davidhvataḥ davidyutat taritrataḥ sarisṛpatam varīvṛjat marmṛjya
GS24jvkasipu:58889_2: āganīganti ity etāni aṣṭādaśa chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:58891: dhṛṅo vā ślau yaṅluki vā abhyāsasya dīrghatvaṃ ṇilopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:58896: atra ca yallakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:58897: bobhūtu iti bhavateḥ yaṅlugantasya loṭi guṇābhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58902: jñāpayati, anyatra yaṅlugantasya guṇapratiṣedho na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:58905: yaṅo ṅittvāt pratyayalakṣaṇena ātmanepadaṃ siddham eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:58908: alarṣi iti - iyarteḥ laṭi sipi abhyāsasya halādiḥ śeṣāpavādo rephasya latvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58911: āpanīphaṇat iti - phaṇater āṅpūrvasya yaṅlugantasya śatari abhyāsasya nīk nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58918: karikrat iti - karoteḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari cutvabhyāvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:58920: kanikradat iti - krandeḥ luṅi cleḥ aṅādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:58926: bharibhrat iti - bibharteḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari bhṛñām it (*7,4.76)
GS24jvkasipu:58928: davidhvataḥ iti - dhvarateḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari jasi rūpam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:58929: atra abhyāsasya vigāgamaḥ ṛkāralopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58932: davidyutat iti - dyuteḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari abhyāsasya amprasāraṇābhāvaḥ attvam,
GS24jvkasipu:58934: taritrataḥ iti - tarateḥ śatari ślau ṣaṣṭhyekavacane abhyāsasya rigāgamaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58935: sarīsṛpatam iti - sṛpeḥ śatari ślau dvitīyaikavacane abhyāsasya rīgāgamaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58936: varīvṛjat iti - vṛjeḥ śatari ślau rīgāgamaḥ nipātyate abhyāsasya /
GS24jvkasipu:58937: marmṛjya iti - mṛjeḥ liṭi ṇali abhyāsasya rugāgamaḥ dhātoś ca yugāgamo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58941: āganīganti iti - āṅpūrvasya gamerlati ślau abhyāsasya cutvābhāvaḥ nīgāgamaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58943: itikaraṇam evaṃ prakāraṇām anyeṣām apy upasaṅgrahārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:58952: narīnarti ity evam ādau abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādo na+utsargān vidhīn bādhate iti uḥ adatve kṛte rugādaya āgamāḥ kriyante //
GS24jvkasipu:58956: dyuti svāpi ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58964: tasya abhyāsanimittena pratyayena ānantarye sati samprasāranam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58976: halādiḥ śeṣeṇa yakārasya nivṛttau prāptāyāṃ samprasāraṇaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:58985: iṇo 'ṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya dīrgho bhavati kiti liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58987: iṇo yaṇ (*6,4.81) iti yaṇādeśe kṛte sthānivadbhāvād dvirvacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:58993: abhyāsasya ādeḥ akārasya dīrgho bhavati liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59001: tasmād ato 'bhyāsād dīrghībhūtād uttarasya dvihalo 'ṅgasya nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59012: aśnoteś ca dīrghībhūtād abhyāsād uttarasya nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59014: aśnoteḥ iti vikaraṇanirdeśaḥ aśnāter mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59019: bhavater abhyāsasya akārādeśo bhavati liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59021: bhavateḥ iti kṛtavikarananirdeśād iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:59029: sūter liṭi parasmaipadaṃ vugāgamaḥ abhyāsasya ca atvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:59036: nijādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ abhyāsasya guṇo bhavati ślau sati /
GS24jvkasipu:59041: eṣāṃ hi vṛtkaraṇam samāptyarthaṃ paṭhyate eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59046: bhṛñādīnāṃ trayāṇām abhyāsasya ikārādeśo bhavati śalau sati /
GS24jvkasipu:59055: arti piparti ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya ikārādeśo bhavati ślau /
GS24jvkasipu:59061: chandasi viṣaye abhyāsasya ślau bahulam ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59086: sani iti vartate, it iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:59087: uvarṇāntābhyāsasya pavarge yaṇi jakāre ca avarṇapare parataḥ ikārādeśo bhavati sani pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59098: etad eva puyaṇjyapare iti vacanaṃ jñāpakam,
GS24jvkasipu:59100: oḥ iti kim ? pāpacyateḥ san - pāpaciṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:59109: sravati śṛṇoti dravati pravati plavati cyavati ity eteṣām abhyāsasya oḥ avarnapare yaṇi vā ikārādeśo bhavati sani parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59123: pūrvasūtrena tu anantara eva yaṇi bhavitavyam iti aprāptabibhāṣeyam /
GS24jvkasipu:59129: yaṅi yaṅluki ca igantasya abhyāsasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59138: akito 'bhyāsasya dīrgho bhavati yagi yaṅluki ca /
GS24jvkasipu:59148: nanu cātra apavādatvān nuki kṛte abhyāsasya anajantatvād eva dīrghatvaṃ na bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:59149: evaṃ tarhi akitaḥ ity anena etaj jñāpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:59150: abhyāsavikāreṣv apavādā na+utsargān vidhīn bādhante iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59152: ḍoḍhaukyate ity atra dīrgho 'kitaḥ ity anena sandhyakṣarahrasvo na bādhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:59155: mānprabhṛtīnāṃ dīrgheṇa sanītvaṃ na bādhyate - mīmāṃsate, ī ca gaṇaḥ (*7,4.97)
GS24jvkasipu:59160: vañcu sraṃsu dhvaṃsu bhraṃsu kasa pata pada skanda ity eteṣām abhyāsasya nīgāgamo bhavati yaṅi yaṅluki ca /
GS24jvkasipu:59181: anunāsikāntasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya akārāntasya nugāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59192: tena yaṃyamyate ity evam ādau ajhalparatve 'pi anusvāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59197: taparakaraṇaṃ tu bhūtapūrvasya api dīrghasya nivṛttyartham,
GS24jvkasipu:59203: japa jabha daha daśa bhañja paśa ity eteṣām abhyāsasya nugāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59210: dandaśīti daśa iti daṃśiḥ ayaṃ nakāralopārtham eva nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59219: cara phala ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya nugāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59227: caraphaloḥ abhyāsāt parasya ataḥ ukārādeśo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59238: dīrghasya asiddhatvāt iha labhutvaṃ na nivartate // [#879]
GS24jvkasipu:59243: takārādau pratyaye parataḥ caraphaloḥ akārasya ukārādeśo bhavati caraṇaṃ cūrtiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59248: abhyāsasya iti ca anuvartamānam api vacanasāmarthyād iha na abhisambadhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:59252: ṛdupadhasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya rīgāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59268: yaṅluki ṛdupadhasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsas tasya rugrikau āgamau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:59279: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya rugrikau āgamau bhavataḥ rīk ca yaṅluki /
GS24jvkasipu:59286: kiratiṃ carkarītāntaṃ pacati ity atra yo nayet /
GS24jvkasipu:59287: prāptijñaṃ tamahaṃ manye prārabdhas tena saṅgrahaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:59288: tatreyaṃ prāptiḥ taparakaranasāmarthyād aṅgaviśeṣaṇam ṛtaḥ ity etat,
GS24jvkasipu:59293: laghuni dhātvakṣare parato yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya caṅpare ṇau parataḥ sanīva kāryaṃ bhavati anaglope /
GS24jvkasipu:59315: atra kecid gaśabdam labhumāśritya sanbadbhāvam icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:59316: sarvatraiva laghorānantaryam abhyāsena na asti iti vyavadhāne 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyād bhavitavyam, tad asat /
GS24jvkasipu:59317: yena na avyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt ity ekena vyavadhānam āśrīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:59320: ācāryapravṛttir jñāpayati bhavaty evaṃ jātīyakānām ittvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59321: yad ayaṃ tad bādhanārthaṃ samratyādīnām atvam vidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:59325: caṅi eva kevale mā bhūt, acakamata /
GS24jvkasipu:59328: vāditavantaṃ prayojitavān avīvadat ity atra yo 'sau ṇau ṇerlopo nāsāvaglopa ity āśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:59332: mīmādīnām atra grahaṇāt sanvadbhāvena abhyāsalopo na bhavati ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:59333: kiṃ ca sanvat iti sanāśrayaṃ kāryamatidiśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:59334: na ca lopaḥ sanam eva apekṣate,
GS24jvkasipu:59337: tadabhāvāt amīmapat ity ādau abhyāsalopo na bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:59341: dīrghā bhavati laghoḥ abhyāsasya laghuni ṇau caṅpare anaglope /
GS24jvkasipu:59357: smṛ dṝ tvara pratha mrada stṝ spaśa ity eteṣām abhyāsasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati caṅpare ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59367: ity etad api na bhavati, adadarat //
GS24jvkasipu:59371: veṣṭi ceṣṭi ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya vibhāṣā at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati caṅpare ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59379: gaṇeḥ abhyāsasya īkārādeśo bhavati caṅpare ṇau parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:59382: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59389: sarvasya iti ca dve iti ca+etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:59392: sarvasya dve bhavataḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:59394: iti, tatra sarvasya sthāne dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59396: ye śabdataś ca arthataś ca ubhayathāntaratame /
GS24jvkasipu:59400: yadā tu dviḥ prayogo dvirvacanam tadā sa eva pacatiśabdo dvirāvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:59404: atha padasya ity eva kasmān na+ucyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:59406: iha hi na syāt prapacati prapacati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59408: droḍhā iti ghatvaḍhatvayoḥ asiddhatvād akṛtayor eva tayor dvivacanaṃ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:59409: tatra paścād vikalpe satyaniṣtam api syāt drogdhā droḍhā,
GS24jvkasipu:59411: tasmād vaktavyam etat pūrvatra asiddhīyam advirvacane iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59412: sarvasya ity etad eva vā kṛtaṃ sarvakāryapratipattyarthaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:59416: tasya dviruktasya yat paraṃ śabdarūpaṃ tad āmreḍitasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59426: anudāttaṃ ca tad bhavati yad āmreḍitasañjñam /
GS24jvkasipu:59432: nitye cārthe vipsāyāṃ ca yad vartate tasya dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59438: yāṃ kriyāṃ kartā prādhānyena anuparaman karoti tan nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:59443: lunīhi lunīhi ity evāyaṃ lunāti ktvāṇamulorloṭaś ca dvirvacanāpekṣāyām eva paunaḥpunyaprakāśane śaktiḥ / [#883]
GS24jvkasipu:59447: yadā tu tatra dvirvacanam tadā kriyāsamabhihāre paunaḥpunyaṃ draṣṭavyam pāpacyate pāpacyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59452: kā punaḥ sā ? nānāvācinām adhikaraṇānāṃ kriyāguṇābhyāṃ yugapat prayokturvyāptum icchā vīpsā /
GS24jvkasipu:59453: nānābhūtārthavācināṃ śabdānāṃ yānyadhikaraṇāni vācyāni teṣāṃ kriyāguṇābhyāṃ yugapat prayoktum icchā vīpsā /
GS24jvkasipu:59457: yat tiḍantaṃ nityatayā prakarṣeṇa ca yuktaṃ tataḥ kṛtadvirvacanāt prakarṣapratyaya iṣyate pacati pacatitarām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59458: iha tu āḍhyataramāḍhyataramānaya iti prakarṣayuktasya vīpsāyoga iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:59462: pari ity etasya varjane 'rthe dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59472: samāse tu tena+eva+uktatvād varjanasya na+eva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:59477: pra sam upa ut ity etaṣāṃ pādapūraṇe dve bhavato dvirvacanena cet pādaḥ pūrvate /
GS24jvkasipu:59480: upopa me parā mṛśa kiṃ nodudu harṣase dātavā u /
GS24jvkasipu:59489: upari adhi adhas ity eteṣāṃ dve bhavataḥ sāmīpye vivakṣite /
GS24jvkasipu:59499: auttarādharyam eva vivakṣitaṃ na sāmīpyam iti dvirvacanaṃ na bhavati // [#884]
GS24jvkasipu:59505: vākyāder āmantritasya dve bhavataḥ asūyāsammatikopakutsanabhartsaneṣu yadi tad vākyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59542: ekam ity etac chabdarūpaṃ dviruktaṃ bahuvrīhivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59551: bahuvrīhir eva yo bahuvrīhiḥ iti vijñānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:59555: ṛk pūḥ iti samāsānto na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:59570: priyasya ciragamanādinā pīḍyamānaḥ kaścid evam prayuṅkte prayoktā // [#885]
GS24jvkasipu:59575: ita uttareṣu dvirvacaneṣu karmadhārayavat kāryaṃ bhavati ity etad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:59583: kopadhāyā api hi karmadhārayavadbhāvāt puṃvatkarmadhārayaḥ iti puṃvadbhāvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59586: samāsāntodāttatvam anena+eva vidhīyate iti paratvadāmreḍitānudāttatvaṃ bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:59587: adhikāreṇaiva siddhe yat uttareṣu iti vacanaṃ tadvispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:59602: tat katham ? vakṣyamāṇam anyatarasyāṃgrahaṇam ubhayoḥ śeṣo vijāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:59608: yadyapyatra agniśabdo gośabdaś ca mukhyārthasambandhādavabhṛtabhedaṃ taikṣṇyajāḍyādikamarthāntare gunaviśeṣam eva pratipādayituṃ pravṛttaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:59609: tathāpi sarvadā guṇavacano na bhavati iti na dvirucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:59615: asmāt kārṣāpaṇād iha bhavadbhyām māṣaṃ māṣaṃ dehi /
GS24jvkasipu:59618: atra hi dvāv eva māṣau dīyete,
GS24jvkasipu:59622: asmāt kārṣāpaṇād iha bhavadbhyāṃ māṣamekaṃ dehi,
GS24jvkasipu:59626: asmāt kārṣāpaṇād iha bhavadbhyāṃ māṣamekaṃ dehi /
GS24jvkasipu:59636: sa bhavān lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayaṃ lunāti / [#886]
GS24jvkasipu:59641: nitya ity eva siddha iti tatra+uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:59649: tadarthaṃ kecit ḍāci bahulam iti paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:59656: ḍataraḍatamayoḥ samasampradhāraṇayoḥ strīnigade bhave dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:59664: tathā strīnigadādbhāvāt anyatra api hi dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:59667: karmavyatihāre sarvanāmno dve bhavata iti vaktavyaṃ samāsavacca bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:59668: yadā na samāsavat prathamaikavacanaṃ tadā pūrvapadasya anyamanyamime brāhmaṇā bhojayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:59685: priya sukha ity etayoḥ anyatarasyāṃ dve bhavataḥ akṛcchre dyotye /
GS24jvkasipu:59706: sarveṣāṃ tu yathāyathaṃ yathātmīyam ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:59712: attvaṃ ca+uttarapadasya nipātyate rahasya maryādāvacana vyutkramaṇa yajñapātraprayoga abhivyakti ity eteṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:59724: dvivargasambandhanena pṛthagavasthitā dvanvdvaṃ vyutkrāntā ity ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:59725: yajñapātraprayoge - dvandvaṃ nyañci yajñapātrāṇi prayunakti dhīraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59729: anyatra api dvandvam ity etad dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:59738: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ padasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:59744: vakṣyamāṇavākyāpekṣayā padasya adhikṛtasya ṣaṣṭhyarthavyavasthā draṣṭavyāḥ kvacit sthānaṣaṣṭhī,
GS24jvkasipu:59750: padāt ity ayam adhikāraḥ prāk kutsane ca supyagotrādau (*8,1.69)
GS24jvkasipu:59752: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ padāt ity evaṃ tad deditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:59754: āmantritasya padāt parasya anudāttādeśo bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59764: apādādau iti ca etat trayam adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam ā pādaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59765: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ anudāttaṃ sarvam apādādau ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:59769: yat te niyānaṃ rajasaṃ mṛtyo anavadharṣyam /
GS24jvkasipu:59777: sarvagrahaṇam sarvam anūdyamānaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ ca anudāttaṃ yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59778: tena yuṣmadasmadādeśānām api vākyabhedena anudāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:59779: yuṣmadasmadādeśāś ca sarvasya subantasya padasya yathā syuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:59786: āmantritasya padasya padāt parasya apadādau vartamānasya sarvam anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59799: āmantritāntaṃ tiṅantaṃ yuṣmadasmadādeśāś ca yasmāt parāṇi na teṣāṃ sāmarthyam iti tadāśrayā nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśā na syuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:59805: yuṣmad asmad ity etayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vām nau ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:59808: anudāttaṃ sarvamapādādau iti sarvam iha sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:59816: ekavacanabahuvacanāntayor ādeśāntar avidhānād dvivacanāntayoḥ etāv ādeśau vijñāyete /
GS24jvkasipu:59820: iha mā bhūt, ayaṃ yuṣmatputraḥ ayam asmatputraḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:59824: bahuvacanāntayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam vas nas ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59834: yuṣmadasmadoḥ ekavacanāntayoḥ ṣaṣthīcaturthīsthayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ te me ity etau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59844: dvitīyāyā yad ekavacanaṃ tad antayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam tvā mā ity etau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59850: ca vā ha aha eva ebhir yukte yuṣmadasmadoḥ vānnāvādayoḥ na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:59930: yuṣmākam eva svam asmākam eva svam /
GS24jvkasipu:59954: taiḥ paśyārther anālocane vartamānair yukte yuṣmadasmadoḥ vānnāvādayo na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:59969: vidyamānapūrvāt prathamāntāt padāt uttarayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhāṣa vānnāvādayo na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:59990: iha mā bhūt, atho grāme kambalaste svam,
GS24jvkasipu:59992: apara āha - sarva eva vānnāvādayo 'nanvādeśe vibhāṣā vaktavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60000: na tarhi idānīmidaṃ vaktavyam sapūrvāyāḥ prathamāyā vibhāṣā iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:60013: tiṅantāt padāt parāṇi gotrādīni kutsane ābhīkṣṇye cārthe vartamānāni anudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:60047: tena anyatra api gotrādigrahaṇena kutsanābhīkṣṇyayor eva kāryaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:60051: tiṅantaṃ padam atiṅantāt padāt param anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60067: tāseḥ parasya lasārvadhātukasya anudāttatve sati sarvatāsir eva udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60074: yat yadi hanta kuvit net cet caṇ kaccit yatra ity etair nipātair yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60087: tena yogena vidhir ayaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60097: yatra kva ca te mano dakṣaṃ dadhasa uttaram //
GS24jvkasipu:60101: naha ity etena yukte pratyārambhe tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60102: coditasya avidhīraṇe upālipsayā pratiṣedhayuktaḥ pratyāraṃhaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:60106: naha vai tasmiṃś ca loke dakṣiṇām icchanti //
GS24jvkasipu:60110: satyam ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ na anudāttaṃ bhavati praśne /
GS24jvkasipu:60118: aṅga ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ aprātilomye gamyamāne nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60130: hi ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantam aprātilomye nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60141: chandasi viṣaye hiyuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃane kam api nānudāttaṃ bhavati, ekam api /
GS24jvkasipu:60142: kadācid ekaṃ kadācid anekam ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60143: tatra anekaṃ tāvat - anṛtaṃ hi matto vadati,
GS24jvkasipu:60146: ekaṃ khalv api - agnir hi pūrvamudajayat tamindro 'nūdajayat tiṅantadvayam api hiśabdayuktam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:60149: ajā hy agner ajaniṣṭa garbhāt sā vā apaśyaj janitāram agne /
GS24jvkasipu:60155: yāvat yathā ity etābhyāṃ yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60166: yāvad yathā ity etābhyāṃ yuktam anantaraṃ tiṅantaṃ pūjāyaṃ viṣaye nānudāttaṃ na bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ?
GS24jvkasipu:60182: yāvadyathābhyāṃ yuktaṃ upasargavyapetaṃ ca pūjāyāṃ viṣaye nānudāttaṃ na bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ?
GS24jvkasipu:60197: tu paśya paśyata aha ity etair yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati pūjāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:60204: pūjāyām iti vartamāne punaḥ pūjāyām ity ucyate nighātapratiṣedhārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:60205: tad dhi pratiṣedhasya pratiṣedhena sambaddham iti //
GS24jvkasipu:60209: aho ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati pūjāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:60216: aho ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ śeṣe vibhāṣā nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60222: pūjāyām ity asay pūrvatra ca anukṛṣṭatvād anadhikāre siddhe śeṣavacanaṃ vispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:60226: purā ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ parīpsāyām arthe vibhāṣā nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60239: nanu ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60244: anujānīṣva māṃ karaṇaṃ prati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60254: kim ity etat kriyāpraśne yadā vartate tadānena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ anupasargam apratiṣiddhaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60260: pūrvaṃ kiṃyuktam iti tan na nihanyate,
GS24jvkasipu:60261: uttaraṃ tu na kiṃyuktam iti tannihanyata eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:60263: yady apy ekasya ākhyātasya samīpe kiṃśabdaḥ śrūyate,
GS24jvkasipu:60264: tathāpi sarvasya saṃśayaviṣayasya tena yogaḥ iti ubhayatra pratiṣedhena bhavitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:60281: kimo lope kriyāpraśne tiṅantam anupasargam apratiṣiddhaṃ vibhāṣā nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60293: ehi manye ity anena yuktaṃ lṛḍantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati prahāse /
GS24jvkasipu:60305: gatyarthaloṭā lṛṭ ity eva siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:60310: prahāse eva hi manyater uttamo vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:60330: tat kiṃvṛttaṃ ciduttaram avidyamānapūrvaṃ yat tena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60346: āho utāho ity etābhyām apūrvābhyāṃ yuktam anantaraṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60359: āho utāho ity etābhyāṃ yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttam śeṣe vibhāṣā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60367: gatyartha-loṭā lṛṇ na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyat // PS_8,1.51 //
GS24jvkasipu:60371: tena gatyarthaloṭā yuktaṃ lṛḍantaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:60373: yatra+eva kārake kartari karmaṇi vā loṭ,
GS24jvkasipu:60374: tatra+eva yadi lṛḍ api bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60375: kartṛkarmaṇī eva atra tiṅantavācye kārakagrahaṇena gṛhyete,
GS24jvkasipu:60391: lṛṭ iti kim ? āgaccha devadatta grāmam,
GS24jvkasipu:60393: na cet kārakam sarvānyat iti kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:60401: tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca drakṣyāvaḥ enam ity atra api nighātapratiṣedho yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:60402: lṛḍantavācye hi sarvasmin kārake anyasmin na bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:60403: iha tu yat loḍantasya kārakaṃ taccānyacca lṛḍantena ucyate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:60407: loḍantaṃ tiṅantaṃ gatyarthaloṭā yuktaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:60409: loḍantayor ekaṃ kārakaṃ yadi bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60421: na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyat ity eva,
GS24jvkasipu:60425: āgaccha devadatta grāmam tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca paśyāva /
GS24jvkasipu:60432: loḍantaṃ sopasargam uttamavarjitaṃ gatyarthalootā yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ vibhāṣitaṃ nānudāttam bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:60448: hanta ity anena yuktaṃ loḍantaṃ sopasargam uttamavarjitaṃ vibhāṣitaṃ nānudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60452: nipātair yadyadihanta iti nityam atra nighātapratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60459: āmaḥ uttaram ekapadāntaram āmantritāntam anantike nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60463: nāmantrite samānādhikaraṇe sāmānyavacanam iti nāvidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60473: āma ekāntaram āmantritaṃ yat tasya ekaśruter anudāttasya ca pratiṣedha iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:60474: tad ubhayam anena kriyate iti kecid āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60477: anantike ity anena yan na dūraṃ na sannikṛṣṭaṃ tat parigṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:60478: tena asminnekadśruteḥ prāptir eva na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:60486: tuparaṃ ca tiṅantaṃ chandasi nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60488: hiparam - indavo vāmuśanti hi tuparam - ākhyāsyāmi tu te /
GS24jvkasipu:60490: iti, tupaśyapaśyatāhaiḥ iti ca nighātapratiṣedhe siddhe vacanam idaṃ niyamārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:60495: ehi ity anena gatyarthaloṭā yuktasya rohāva ity asya loḍantasya highāto bhavaty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:60499: cana cid iva gotrādi taddhita āmreḍita ity eteṣu parataḥ agateḥ uttaraṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60506: iha api gotrādayaḥ kutsanābhikṣṇyayoḥ eva gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:60516: sagatir api tiṅ ity atra ca upasargagrahaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:60523: cādiṣu ca parataḥ tiṅantamagateḥ paraṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60527: caśabde tāvat - devadattaḥ pacati ca khādati ca /
GS24jvkasipu:60528: vā - devadattaḥ pacati vā khādati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:60529: ha - devadattaḥ pacati ha khādati ha /
GS24jvkasipu:60533: devadattaḥ prapacati ca prakhādati ca prakhādati ca /
GS24jvkasipu:60534: prathamasyātra tiṅantasya cavāyoge prathamā iti nighātaḥ pratiṣidyate eva,
GS24jvkasipu:60540: agateḥ iti pūrvasūtre ca anukṛṣṭam ity atra nānuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:60541: ca, vā ity etābhyāṃ yoge prathamā tiṅavibhaktir nānudāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60546: yogagrahaṇaṃ pūrvābhyām api yoge nighātapratiṣedho yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:60547: prathamāgrahaṇam dvitīyādeḥ tiṅantasya mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:60548: cavāyogo hi dvisamuccaye vikalpe ca sati bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:60553: ha ity anena yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ nānudāttā bhavati kṣiyāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:60566: aha ity anena yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhktir nānudāttā bhavati viniyoge gamyamāne,
GS24jvkasipu:60579: calope ahalope prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ nānudāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60580: eva iti etac ced avadhāraṇārthaṃ prayujyate,
GS24jvkasipu:60590: grāmaṃ cāraṇyaṃ ca gacchatu ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60598: na kva cid bhokṣyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60605: teṣāṃ lope prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ nānudāttā bhavati vibhāṣā / [#900]
GS24jvkasipu:60610: bhavanti ity etad vikalpena na nihanyate /
GS24jvkasipu:60618: vai vāva ity etābhyāṃ yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ vibhāṣā nānudāttā bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:60626: eka anya ity etābhyāṃ samarthābhyāṃ yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ vibhāṣā nānudāttā bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:60643: yatra pade yacchabdo vartate tatsarvaṃ yadvṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:60645: ḍataraḍatamau ca pratyayau ity etan na aśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:60646: tasmād yad vṛttād uttaraṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttam bhavati nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:60660: pūjanebhyaḥ kāṣṭhādibhyaḥ uttarapadaṃ pūjitam anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60680: dāruṇam adhyāpakaḥ ity evam ādiṣu na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60681: malopaś ca ity anena apy ayam eva viṣaya ākhyāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:60682: yatra vibhakter abhāvāt makāro na śrūyate tatra audāttatvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:60685: pūjanāt ity eva pūjitaparigrahe siddhe pūjitagrahaṇam anantarapūjitapratipattyarthaṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:60686: etad eva jñāpakam iha prakaraṇe pañcamīnirdeśe 'pi nānantaryamāśrīyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:60689: anudāttam iti vartamāne punar anudāttagrahaṇam pratiṣedhanivṛttyartham //
GS24jvkasipu:60693: sagatir agatir api pūjanebhyaḥ kāṣṭhādibhyaḥ paraṃ pūjitaṃ tiṅantam anudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60700: nipātair yadyadihanta iti pratiṣedhe prāpte punar vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:60711: kutsane ca subante gotrādivarjite parataḥ sagatir api tiṅ agatir api anudātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60731: vibhāṣitaṃ ca api bahvartham anudāttam bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:60736: supi kutsane kriyāyā malopa iṣṭo 'tiṅi iti coktārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:60737: pūtiś ca cānubandho vibhāṣitaṃ ca api bahvartham //
GS24jvkasipu:60749: yāhi ity etat prati kriyāyogādāṅityeṣa gatiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:60750: tasya gatau ity etasmin na sati gatiḥ ity anāśritaparanimittakam anudāttatvaṃ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:60760: tatrānudātto bhavati iti dhātau eva udāttavati syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:60761: pratyaye na syāt yat prakaroti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:60762: yatkriyāprayuktāḥ prādayas teṣām taṃ prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti tiṅante dhātum eva prati gatisañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:60767: teṣām avyayapūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratve satyakriyamāṇe 'pi tiṅgrahaṇe paramanudāttavad bhavati iti gatinighāto naiva sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:60769: evam api satiśiṣṭatvādāma eva svare sati gateḥ anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158)
GS24jvkasipu:60771: yeṣāṃ gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ samāsavacanam prāk subutpatteḥ ity anena vacanena kṛdantena+eva prāk subutpatteḥ samāso bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:60774: teṣām evaṃvidhe viṣayesamāsena na+eva bhavitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:60775: pṛthak svarapravṛttau satyāmanena nighātena prayojanam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:60787: devadatta, yajñadatta ity atra āmantritasya padāt parasya iti nighāto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60792: devadatta mama grāmaḥ svam ity evam ādisu yuṣmadasmadādeśā na bhavanti / [#903]
GS24jvkasipu:60795: yāvad devadatta pacasi ity atra api pūjāyāṃ nānantaram ity eva pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60797: tiy etat, devadatta jātu pacasi ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60800: utāho devadatta pacasi ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60802: iti, ām bho pacasi devadatta ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60806: devadatta ity etasya āmantritādyudāttatve kartavye na avidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60807: pūrvatvam ca parāpekṣam bhavati iti parasya+eva kārye svanimitte 'nyanimitte vā tadavidyamānavad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:60809: devadatta pacasi ity atra api hi āmantritādyudāttatvaṃ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:60810: iha imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati iti gaṅgeśabdaḥ pūrvamānantritam,
GS24jvkasipu:60811: tataḥ parasya yamuneśabdasya anudāttatve kartavye svayam avidyamānavattvān nimittaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60816: avidyamānavattvasya pratiṣedhaḥ āmantritānte samānādhikarane parataḥ pūrvam āmantritāntaṃ sāmānyavacanam na avidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60841: viśeṣavacane samānādhikarane āmantritānte parataḥ pūrvam āmantritaṃ bahuvacanāntaṃ vibhāṣitam avidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60846: sāmānyavacanādhikāradeva viśeṣavacane iti siddhe viśeṣavacanagrahaṇaṃ vispaṣṭārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:60850: iti vāmanakāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamasya adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:60857: pūrvatra asiddham ity adhikāro 'yam ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60858: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ pūrvatra asiddham ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:60861: ita uttaraṃ ca uttara uttaro yogaḥ pūrvatra pūrvatra asiddho bhavati asiddhavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60868: asā ādityaḥ ity atra vyalopasya śasiddhatvāt, ād guṇaḥ (*6,1.87)
GS24jvkasipu:60872: amuṣmin iti utvasya asiddhatvāt smāyādayo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:60876: ity asya asiddhatvād udīcāmātaḥ sthāne yakapūrvāyāḥ (*7,3.46)
GS24jvkasipu:60881: kṣāmo vā asya asti iti kṣāmī,
GS24jvkasipu:60882: kṣāmiḥ kṣāmī vā yasya asti iti kṣāmimān /
GS24jvkasipu:60883: kṣāyo maḥ ity asya asiddhatvān mādupadhāyāś ca iti vatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60887: iti dvirvacane kartavye ḍhatvadhatvaṣṭutvaḍhalopānām asiddhatvāṇ ṇau ca yaḥ ṭilopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:60888: tasya sthānivadbhāvāt tha ity etad dvirucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:60889: anaglope iti pratiṣedhāt sanvadittvaṃ na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:60891: aujiḍhat ity etat tu ktinnantasya uḍhiśabdasya bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60892: guḍaliṇmān iti guḍaliho 'sya santi iti matup,
GS24jvkasipu:60901: , tasmād ity uttarasya iti ca kartavye na asiddhatva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:60902: kāryakālaṃ hi sañjñāparibhāṣam iti pūrvatvamāsāṃ paribhāṣāṇāṃ na asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:60903: vipratiṣedhe param ity eṣā ca paribhāṣā yena pūrveṇa lakṣaṇena saha spardhate,
GS24jvkasipu:60904: paraṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tatprati tasya asiddhatvān na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:60906: agoryam iti guṇaḥ pareṇa hali ca (*8,2.77)
GS24jvkasipu:60908: apavādasya tu parasya api utsarge kartavye vacanaprāmaṇyād asiddhatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60910: dogdhum ity atra ghatvasya asiddhatvād ho ḍhaḥ (*8,2.31)
GS24jvkasipu:60919: vidhiśabdo 'yaṃ pratyekam abhisambadhyamānaḥ svarasañjñātukāṃ vidheyatvāt taiḥ karmaṣaṣṭhīyuktaiḥ bhāvasādhano 'bhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:60925: takṣabhiḥ ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvāt ato bhisa ais (*7,1.9)
GS24jvkasipu:60932: svaravidhau - rājavatī ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvāt anto 'vatyāḥ (*6,1.220)
GS24jvkasipu:60935: ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvāt arme cāvarṇaṃ dvyac tryac (*6,2.90)
GS24jvkasipu:60937: pañcadaṇḍī ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvād igante dvigau iti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60939: daśa brāhmaṇyaḥ iti nalopasya asiddhatvāt ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ (*1,1.24)
GS24jvkasipu:60944: yadi pratikāryaṃ sañjñāpravṛttiḥ ity etad darśanam /
GS24jvkasipu:60946: tayā strīpratyayapratiṣedho na kriyate iti sā punaḥ pravartayitavyā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:60948: vṛtrahabhiḥ iti nalopasya asiddhatvāt hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,1.71)
GS24jvkasipu:60950: atra kecit sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti tukaṃ prati nalopasya animittatvāt,
GS24jvkasipu:60953: tat tu kriyate paribhāṣadvayasya anityatvaṃ jñāpayitum / [#906]
GS24jvkasipu:60960: eteṣv eva nalopo asiddho bhavati, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:60969: mubhāvo nābhāve kartavye na asiddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60972: mubhāvasya asiddhatvāt ghilakṣaṇo nābhāvo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:60973: kṛte tu nābhāve mubhāvasya asiddhatvāt, supi ca (*7,3.102)
GS24jvkasipu:60975: tat sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60977: atha vā ne parato yat prāpnoti tasmin kartavye mubhāvo na asiddhaḥ ity eṣa eva atra sūtrārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60978: ne tu kartavye mubhāvasya yat siddhatvaṃ tadarthāt saṅgṛhītam /
GS24jvkasipu:60979: tena atra mubhāvasya siddhatvāt nābhāvaś ca bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:60996: katham idam udāharaṇam yadi udāttayaṇo halpūrvāt (*6,1.174)
GS24jvkasipu:60997: ity udāttatve kṛte vibhakteḥ āṭaś ca (*6,1.90)
GS24jvkasipu:60999: atha tu kṛte ekādeśe udāttayaṇo halpūrvāt (*6,1.174)
GS24jvkasipu:61000: iti svaraḥ, tadā na+etad asya prayojanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61003: ekādeśaḥ svaraḥ gāṅge 'nūpa iti gāṅgeśabde ekāraḥ ekādeśa udāttena+udāttaḥ (*8,2.5)
GS24jvkasipu:61005: tasya siddhatvāt ya punaḥ eṅaḥ padāntādati (*6,1.109)
GS24jvkasipu:61016: nahi sanuṃkaṃ śatrantaṃ śatrantaṃ kiñcid ekādeśasvaram antareṇa antodāttam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:61019: ekadeśasvarasya siddhatvāt tena anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158)
GS24jvkasipu:61025: antaraṅga iti vacanād bahiraṅgasya asiddhatvam eva,
GS24jvkasipu:61034: iti vattve, saṃyogāntasya lope ca kṛte,
GS24jvkasipu:61036: iti rutvam, tasya saṃyogāntasya lopasya asiddhatvāt haśi ca (*6,1.114)
GS24jvkasipu:61041: iṭa īṭi (*8,2.29) iti sijlopasya siddhatvāt savarṇadīrghatva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61045: niṣṭhādeśasya siddhatvāt jhali iti ṣatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61046: kutvaṃ tu prati asiddha eva iti tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61049: yadā kṣīber niṣṭhāyām iṭi kṛte itśabdalopo nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:61050: tadā kṣībaḥ iti sañjñāyām itśabdalopasya asiddhatvāt niṣṭhā ca dvyajanāt (*6,1.205)
GS24jvkasipu:61052: kṣībena tarati kṣībikaḥ iti dvyajalakṣaṇaṣṭhan na prapnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:61059: iti hrasvalakṣaṇo nityas tug na prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:61061: ścyutir kṣaraṇe ity ayaṃ dhātuḥ sakārādiḥ paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:61063: raṭ ścyotati iti ḍaḥ si ḍhuṭ (*8,3.21)
GS24jvkasipu:61073: madhuścyayateḥ punaḥ kvipi kṛte saṃyogāditvāt salopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:61078: śakārādau punar etasmin saṃyogāntalopena yakāracakārayoḥ luptayoḥ śakārasya ṣatve sati madhuḍ iti syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:61084: uccheḥ ucicchiṣati iti abhyāsādeśasya asiddhatvāt che ca (*6,1.73)
GS24jvkasipu:61092: talṃ lṃ lokam iti parasavarṇasyāsiddhatvād yaraḥ iti dvirvacanaṃ na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:61111: latvādīnāṃ vikalpitānām asiddhatvāt kṛte dvirvacane satyupariṣṭad vikalpe siti garo galaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:61112: galo garaḥ ity evaṃ rūpam api dviruktaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:61113: tad etat sarvaṃ na mu ne iti yogavibhāgena sādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61114: na ity etāvadaniṣṭe viṣaye pūrvatra asiddhasya pratiṣedhārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:61120: udāttayaṇaḥ svaritayaṇaś ca parasya anudāttasya svaritaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61125: tasmāt parasya anudāttasya svaritaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61134: tasmāt svaritayaṇaḥ parasya āśāśabdākārasya anudāttasya svarito bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61135: nanu ca saptamyekavacanasya yadudāttayaṇaḥ iti svaritatvam,
GS24jvkasipu:61141: ity etasya api āśrayāt siddhatvaṃ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:61142: tataś ca dadhyaśā ity atra api svaritaḥ syāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:61143: tasmād ayam eva yaṇsvaro yaṇādeśe siddho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:61145: udāttāt svaritayaṇo 'pi parasya anudāttasya svaritatvaṃ dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61146: tathā ca taittirīyake śākhāntare paṭhyate - yāste viśvāḥ samidhaḥ santyagne iti /
GS24jvkasipu:61147: agne ity ayam akāraḥ svaritaḥ paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61148: tathā brāhmaṇe 'pi dadhyāśayati ity ākāraḥ svaritaḥ paṭhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:61150: tathā udāttāt svaritayaṇaḥ parasya anudāttasya anena svaritatvaṃ na bhavati iti sthitam /
GS24jvkasipu:61151: tathā ca bhāṣye svaritayaṇgrahaṇam idaṃ pratyākhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61152: sakṛllvyāśā ity evam ādau udāttayaṇaḥ ity eva svaritasya siddhatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:61156: pūrvasmād api vidhau sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam asti,
GS24jvkasipu:61157: svaradīrghayalopeṣu ca lopājādeśasya sthānivadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:61169: udātena saha anudāttasya ya ekādeśaḥ sa udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61177: lasārvadhātukānudāttatve kṛte dvayor anudāttayoḥ ayam ekādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:61182: anudātte padādau udāttena saha ya ekādeśaḥ sa svarito vā bhavati udātto vā /
GS24jvkasipu:61188: tasya prāditvāt samāse sati avyayapūrvaprakṛtisvaratvena ādyudāttaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:61189: śeṣam anudāttam iti ca anudātte padādau ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61190: vīkṣate, vasuko 'si ity atra api tiṅṅ atiṅaḥ (*8,1.28)
GS24jvkasipu:61194: udātte hi vikalpite tasminnasatyāntaryata eva svarito bhaviṣyati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:61203: prātipadikasya padasya yo 'ntyo nakāraḥ tasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61213: prātipadikagrahaṇam asamastam eva supāṃ suluk iti ṣaṣṭhyā lukā nirdiṣṭam /
GS24jvkasipu:61224: ahan iti ruvidhau yad upādīyate prathamaikavacanāntam akṛtanalopaṃ tad āvartyate,
GS24jvkasipu:61225: tatra ekayā āvṛttyā tad evaṃ rūpaṃ nalopābhāvārtham anvākhyāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:61230: ṅau parataḥ sambuddhau ca nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61236: etasmād eva nalopapratiṣedhavacanāt apratyayaḥ iti pratyayalakṣaṇena prātipadikasañjñā na pratiṣidhyate iti jñāpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:61238: tathā ca rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ ity atra nalopaś ca bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:61242: he rājan vṛndāraka ity atra samudāyārthasambodhanam,
GS24jvkasipu:61243: na pūrvapadārthasambodhanaṃ pratīyate iti sambuddhyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ na+eva samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61250: matoḥ iha kāryitvena upādānāt sāmarthyalabdhaṃ prātipadikaṃ tat māt iti makārāvarṇābhyāṃ viśiṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61251: makārāvarṇaviśiṣṭayā ca upadhayā ity ayam artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61252: makārāntāt makāropadhāt avarṇāntād avarṇopadhāt ca uttarasya matoḥ vaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:61289: yasya sati nimitte matupo vattvaṃ na dṛśyate sa yavādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ iha nṛmataḥ idaṃ nārmatam iti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt avarṇopadhasya matupo vattvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:61293: jhayantād uttarasya matoḥ vaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61301: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye matoḥ vaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61310: āsandīvat aṣṭhīvat cakrīvat kakṣīvat carmaṇvatī ity etāni sañjñāyāṃ nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:61323: āsandīvat ity eta prapañcārtham iha paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61330: cakrīvanti sado havirdhānāni bhavanti ity etat tu chāndasatvād anugantavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:61341: carmaṇvatī iti carmaṇo nalopābhāvo ṇatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61348: udanvān iti udakaśabdasya matāvudanbhāvo nipātyate udadhāvarthe,
GS24jvkasipu:61350: udanvān nāma ṛṣiḥ yasya audanvataḥ putraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:61354: udakavān ghaṭaḥ ity atra tu dadhātyartho na vivakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61360: śobhano rājā yasminniti sa rājanvān deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:61366: chandasi viṣaye ivarṇāntād rephāntāc ca+uttarasya matorvattvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61375: chandasi sarve vidhayo vikalpyante iti iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:61387: anantād uttarasya matoḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:61393: nuṭaḥ asiddhatvāt tasya ca vatvaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:61398: nakārāntāt uttarasya ghasañjñākasya nuḍāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:61406: rathaśabdād eva vā matvarthīyo 'yam īkāraḥ chandasīvanipau iti //
GS24jvkasipu:61416: tato 'yaṃ kevalasya rephasya sthāne lakārādeśo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61426: kṛpā ity etat ṛpeḥ samprasāraṇam ca iti bhidādiṣu pāṭhād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61427: tasya hi kṛtasamprasāraṇasya lākṣaṇikatvāt iha kṛpaḥ iti grahaṇaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:61432: vālamūlalaghvasurālam aṅgulīnāṃ vā ro lamāpadyata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:61439: kapilakādīnāṃ sañjñāchandasor vā ro lamāpadyata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:61449: samānaviṣayatvam eva tayoḥ smaryate ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:61453: ayatau parataḥ upasargasya yo rephaḥ tasya lakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61457: tasya sthānivadbhāvād ayateḥ upasargasya ca vibhāge sati,
GS24jvkasipu:61459: tadā yena na avyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti ekena varṇena vyavadhāne 'pi latvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61460: tathā ca palyayate ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61461: upasargaviśeṣaṇe tu ayatigrahaṇe siddham eva+etat sarvam,
GS24jvkasipu:61463: tatra keṣāṃcid darśanaṃ bhavitavyam eva platyayate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:61464: prathamapakṣadarśanābhiniṣṭāstu pratyayate ity eva bhavati iti manyante /
GS24jvkasipu:61465: apare tu pratiśabdopasṛṣṭasya ayateḥ prayogam eva na+icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:61466: nis dus ity etayos tu rutvasya asiddhatvāl latvena na+eva bhavitabyam /
GS24jvkasipu:61472: gṝ ity etasya dhātoḥ rephasya lakāra ādeśo bhavati yaṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:61477: kecid graḥ iti girateḥ gṛṇāteś ca sāmānyena grahaṇam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:61485: ajādau pratyaye parato gro rephasya vibhāṣā lakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61490: tena galaḥ iti prāṇyaṅge nityaṃ latvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:61491: garaḥ iti viṣe nityaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61494: nigālyate iti ṇilopasya sthānivadbhāvāt aci vibhāṣā iti latvavikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:61495: pūrvatra asiddhe na sthānivat iti etad api sāpavādam eva,
GS24jvkasipu:61497: antaraṅgatvād vā kṛte latvavikalpe ṇilopo bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:61498: girau, giraḥ ity atra dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye kāryavijñānam iti latvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61504: pari ity etasya yo rephaḥ tasya ghaśabde aṅkaśabde ca parato vibhāṣā lakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61519: iha śreyān, bhūyān iti rutvam param api asiddhatvāt saṃyogāntasay lopaṃ na bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:61520: jaśtve tu nāprāpte tadārabhyāte iti tasya bādhakaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:61523: ity atra tu yaṇādeśasya bihiraṅgalakṣaṇasya asiddhatvāt saṃyogāntalopo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:61527: saṃyogāntapadasya yo rephaḥ tasmād uttarasya antasya sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61530: kṣarateḥ tsarateś ca luṅi sicaḥ chāndasatvād īḍabhāvaḥ bahulaṃ chandasi (*7,3.97)
GS24jvkasipu:61534: iti uttve kṛte raparatve ca sati rāt sasya iti salopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:61543: dhakārādau pratyaye parataḥ sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61551: itaḥ prabhṛti sicaḥ sakārasya lopa iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61554: tathā payo dhāvati ity evam ādāv api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61555: sagdhiḥ, babdhām iti chāndaso varṇa lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:61558: tena payo dhāvati ity evam ādau yatnānataramāstheyam / [#916]
GS24jvkasipu:61561: āśādhvaṃ tu kathaṃ jaśtvaṃ sakārasya bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:61562: sarvam evaṃ prasiddhaṃ syāc chru tiścāpi na bhidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61563: luṅaścāpi na murdhanye grahaṇaṃ seṭi duṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:61564: ghasibhasor na sidhyeta tasmāt sijgrahaṇaṃ na tat /
GS24jvkasipu:61570: jhalaḥ uttarasya sakārasya jhali parato lopo bhavati abhitta /
GS24jvkasipu:61574: avāttām, avātta ity atra vā sicaḥ sakāralopasya asiddhatvāt saḥ syārdhadhātuke (*7,4.49)
GS24jvkasipu:61588: hrasvāntād aṅgād uttarasya lopo bhavati jhali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:61608: iṭaḥ uttarasya sakārasya lopo bhavati īṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:61637: thakāre jhali kakārasya saṃyogāder lopaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:61638: tad atra śakeḥ kvibantasya prayoga eva na asti ity āha kāṣṭhaśageva na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:61641: kākvartham ity atra api bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya yaṇādeśasya asiddhatvāt saṃyogādilopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61650: cavargasya kavargādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ, padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:61659: kruñcā ity atra siṅi iti vacanād ñakārasya cakāre jhali kutvaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:61661: nakāropadho vā dhāturayaṃ repharahitaśca kruñca kauṭilyālpībhāvayoḥ iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61663: yujikruñcāṃ ca iti tasyaiva repho 'dhiko nakārasya lopābhāvaś ca iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61664: tatra anusvārasya parasavarṇasya ca asiddhatvāt ñakāra eva na asti iti kutvaṃ na bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:61668: hakārasya ḍhakāradeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:61681: dakārādeḥ dhātoḥ hakārasya ghakārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:61697: dhātor avayavo yo dādiḥ śabdas tad avayavasya hakārasya iti / [#918]
GS24jvkasipu:61700: adhok ity atra api ghakāraḥ siddho bhavati /
