GS24jvkasipu:61704: atha vā dhātūpadeśe yo dādiḥ ity evaṃ vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61706: dāmalihyateḥ kvip pratyayaḥ dāmaliṭ ity atra api na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:61710: druha muha ṣṇuha ṣṇiha ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ hakārasya vā ghakārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:61725: naho hakārasya dhakārādeśo bhavati jhali pare padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:61734: āho hakārasya thakārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:61746: udgrābhaṃ ca nigrābhaṃ ca brahma devā avīvṛdhan //
GS24jvkasipu:61750: vraśca bhrasja sṛja mṛja yaja rāja bhrāja ity eteṣām,
GS24jvkasipu:61752: śakārāntānāṃ ca ṣakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:61786: ity atra kṅiti ity anuvartate iti chagrahaṇam iha kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61797: ekāco baśo bhaṣ jhaṣantasya s-dhvoḥ // PS_8,2.37 //
GS24jvkasipu:61799: dhātor avayavo ya ekāc jhaṣantaḥ tadavayavasya baśaḥ sthāne bhaṣ ādeśo bhavati jhali sakāre dhvaśabde ca parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:61800: atra catvaro baśaḥ sthānino bhaṣādeśāścatvāra eva,
GS24jvkasipu:61801: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśe prāpte ḍakārasya sthānino 'bhāvāt ḍhakārādeśo na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:61812: ajarghāḥ - gudheḥ yaṅlugantasya laṅi sipi labhūpadhaguṇe kṛte sipo halṅyādilope ca dhātoḥ avayavasya ekāco baśaḥ sthāne bhaṣbhāvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:61822: asati hy ekājgrahaṇe dhātoḥ ity etad baśo viśeṣaṇaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:61830: dadha dhāraṇe ity etasya yaṅluki loṭi hujhalbhyo herdhiḥ (*6,4.101)
GS24jvkasipu:61836: tasya jhalantasya baśaḥ sthāne bhaṣ ādeśo bhavati takārathakārayoḥ parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:61851: jhalāṃ jaśaḥ ādeśā bhavanti padasyānte vartamānānām /
GS24jvkasipu:61862: jhaṣa uttarayoḥ takārathakārayoḥ sthāne dhakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:61899: ra-dābhyāṃ niṣthāto naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ // PS_8,2.42 //
GS24jvkasipu:61901: rephadakārābhyām uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati pūrvasya ca dakārasya /
GS24jvkasipu:61913: raḥ ity atra raśrutisām anyaṃ na+upādīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:61916: rephasāmānyanirdeśe 'pi sati rephāt parā yā 'jbhaktis tadvyavadhānānnatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61925: iha kṛtasya apatyaṃ kārtiḥ iti vṛddheḥ bahiraṅgalakṣaṇāyā asiddhatvānnatve kartavye rephasya asiddhatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:61948: lūñ chedane ity etat prabhṛti vṝñ varaṇe iti yāvat vṛtkaraṇena samāpitā lvādayo gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:61975: grāso 'pi yadā karmaiva bhavati na karmakartā,
GS24jvkasipu:61981: okāreto dhātor uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62010: kṣiyo dhātoḥ dīrghād uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62021: hrasvasya api hi dhātvanukaraṇasya iha iyaṅā nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:62025: ity evam ādau tu dhātutvam anukāryagataṃ sadapyavivakṣitatvād jirupasāmānyānukaraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:62029: śyāyateḥ uttarasya niṣthātakārasya asparśe nakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62036: śītam udakam ity atra guṇabhūto 'pi sparśaḥ natvapratiṣedhasya samprasāraṇasya ca nimittaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62039: tena pratiṣīnaḥ ity atra natvaṃ bhavty eva // [#922]
GS24jvkasipu:62044: añcateḥ uttarapadasya niṣthātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati na ced apādānaṃ tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62053: divaḥ uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati avijigīṣāyam arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:62062: nirvāṇaḥ iti nispūrvād vāter uttarasya niṣthatakārasya nakāro nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:62070: nirvāṇaḥ pradīpo vātena ity atra tu pradīpādhikaraṇo vātyarthaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:62071: vātastu tasya karaṇam iti bhavaty eva natvam //
GS24jvkasipu:62075: śuṣeḥ dhātor uttarasya niṣthātakārasya kakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62081: paceḥ dhātor uttarasya niṣthātakārasya vakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62094: prapūrvāt styāyateḥ uttarasya niṣthātakārasya anyatarasyāṃ makārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62101: ity asya pūrvatra asiddhatvāt saṃprasāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:62102: tatra kṛte nimittavyāghātān natvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:62106: phulla kṣība kṛśa ullāgha ity ete nipātyante,
GS24jvkasipu:62108: phullaḥ iti ñiphalā viśaraṇe ity etasmād dhātor uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya lakāro nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62113: kṣībakṛśollādhāḥ iti kṣībikṛśibhyām utpūrvāc ca lāgheḥ kta pratyayasya talopaḥ iḍabhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62127: parikṛśaḥ ity atra yaḥ pariśabdaḥ sa kriyāntarayogāt kṛśiṃ pratyanupasarga eva,
GS24jvkasipu:62132: nuda vida unda trā ghrā hrī ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya nakāra ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:62141: vida vicāraṇe ity asya vider iha grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62142: evaṃ hy uktam - vettestu vidito niṣṭhā vidyater vinna iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62143: vinater vinnaś ca vittaśca bhogavittaś ca vindateḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:62148: dhyā khyā pṝ mūrcchi mada ity eteṣāṃ niṣṭhātakārasya nakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62159: radābhyām, saṃyogādeḥ iti ca prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate // [#924]
GS24jvkasipu:62164: vittaḥ iti vider lābhārthāt uttarasya ktasya natvābhāvo nipātyate bhoge pratyaye ca abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:62175: bhittam iti nipātyate śakalaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62180: bhidikriyāvivakṣāyāṃ hi śakalaviṣaye bhinnam bhittam ity eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:62184: ṛṇam iti ṛ ity etasmād dhātor uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya nakāro nipātyate ādhamarṇyaviṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:62186: etasmād eva nipātanāt saptamyantena uttarapadena samāsaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:62188: yady evam, uttamarṇaḥ iti na sidhyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:62191: tena uttamarṇaḥ ity api hi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62199: nasatta niṣatta anutta pratūrta sūrta gūrta ity etāni chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:62200: nasatta, niṣatta iti sadeḥ naṇpūrvāt nipūrvāc ca natvābhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62208: praturtam iti tvarateḥ turvī ity etasya vā nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:62211: sūrtam iti sṛ ity etasya utvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62214: gūrtam iti gūrī ity etasya natvābhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62223: kvin pratyayo yasmād dhātoḥ sa kvinpratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:62229: kvinaḥ kuḥ iti vaktavye pratyayagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bahuvrīhivijñānārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:62230: kvin pratyayo yasmād vihitas tasmād anyasminn api pratyaye kutvaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:62239: dṛgbhiḥ iti kvibantasya api dṛśeḥ kutvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62240: evaṃ ca sati rajjusṛḍbhyām ity atra api kutvaṃ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:62272: makāravakārayoś ca parataḥ makārāntasya dhātoḥ nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62275: gamerlaṅi bahulaṃ chandasi iti śapo luk /
GS24jvkasipu:62284: sakārāntasya padasya sajuṣ ity etasya ca ruḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62293: avayāḥ śvetavāḥ puroḍāḥ ity ete nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:62295: puras pūrvasya dāśateḥ mantre śvetavahokthaśaspuroḍāśo ṇvin (*3,2.71)
GS24jvkasipu:62298: śvetavahādīnāṃ ḍaspadasya iti ḍaspratyaye nipātanāni etāni /
GS24jvkasipu:62299: kimarthaṃ tarhi nipātanaṃ yāvatā pūrveṇa+eva ruḥ siddhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:62303: ity atra hi asambuddhau iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:62312: ahan ity etasya padasya ruḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62315: nalopam akṛtvā nirdeśo jñāpakaḥ nalopābhāvo yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:62318: ahan ity atra tu lākṣaṇikatvād ahanśabdasya ruḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62323: ro 'supi (*8,2.69) ity asya apavādo rutvam upasaṅkhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62324: apara āha - sāmānyena rephādau rutvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:62330: ahan ity etasya rephādaśo bhavati asupi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:62339: uktam etat - ahnor avidhau lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:62341: yatra tu lopaśabdena lupyate tatra pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ bhavaty eva,
GS24jvkasipu:62344: atra hi halṅyābbhyaḥ iti lopena pratyayasya nivṛttiḥ // [#927]
GS24jvkasipu:62349: amnas ūdhas avas ity eteṣāṃ chandasi viṣaye ubhayathā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:62356: chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca vibhāṣā pracetaso rājany upasaṅkhyānaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:62363: visarjanīyabādhanārtham atra pakṣe rephasya+eva repho vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:62367: bhuvas ity etasya mahāvyāhṛteḥ chandasi viṣaye ubhayathā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:62373: bhuvaḥ ity etad avyavyam antarikṣavāci mahāvyāhṛtiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:62379: tena sambhavāt vyabhicārāc ca vasur eva viśeṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:62385: anaḍuḥ ity eteṣāṃ ca dakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62399: rutve nāprāpte idam ārabhyate iti tad bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62400: saṃyogāntalopas tu na+evam iti tena etad eva datvaṃ bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62410: tipi parataḥ sakārāntasya padasya anasteḥ dakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62417: āḥ ity asteḥ laṅi tipi bahulaṃ chandasi (*7,3.97)
GS24jvkasipu:62423: sipi parataḥ sakārāntasya padasya dhātoḥ ruḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, dakāro vā /
GS24jvkasipu:62432: dakārāntasya dhātoḥ padasya sipi parato ruḥ bhavati, dakāro vā /
GS24jvkasipu:62440: rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ padasya upadhāyāḥ ikaḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62457: hali ca parato rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ upadhāyāḥ ikaḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62474: dhātoḥ upadhābhūtau yau rephavakārau halparau tayoḥ upadhāyāḥ iko dīrgho bhavati hurcchā - hūrcchitā /
GS24jvkasipu:62486: yaṇādeśasya sthānivattvāt asiddhatvāc ca bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvena halparau rephavakārau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:62487: caturyitā ity atra api bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt ato lopasya dhātoḥ upadhābhūto repho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62488: pratidīvnā ity atra tu hali ca (*8,2.77)
GS24jvkasipu:62491: asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgamantaraṅge ity etat tu nāśrayitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:62494: giryoḥ ity evam ādiṣu dīrgho na bhavati // [#929]
GS24jvkasipu:62499: rephavakārāntasya bhasya kur chur ity etayos ca dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62509: adaso 'ser dād u do maḥ // PS_8,2.80 //
GS24jvkasipu:62511: adaso 'sakārāntasya varṇasya dāt parasya uvarṇādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:62515: bhāvyamānena apy ukāreṇa savarṇānāṃ grahaṇam iṣyate iti ekamātrikasya mātrikaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:62520: okārarephayor api pratiṣedho yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:62526: tena tyadādyatvavidhāne etad anyatra na bhavitavyam eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:62528: adaso 'dreḥ pṛthaṅ mutvaṃ kecid icchanti latvavat /
GS24jvkasipu:62531: yaiḥ aseḥ iti sakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:62532: anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya iti ca paribhāṣā na aśrīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:62538: ye tu paribhāṣām āśrayanti teṣām antyasadeśasya eva bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:62542: yeṣaṃ tu tyadādyatvaviṣaya eva mutvena bhavitavyam iti darśanam teṣām atra na bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:62546: dāt iti kim ? alo 'ntyasya mā bhūt, amuyā /
GS24jvkasipu:62551: adaso dakārād uttarasya ekārasya īkārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:62560: pāribhāṣikasya hi bahuvacanasya grahaṇe amī ity atra na syāt // [#930]
GS24jvkasipu:62570: yat iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ vākyasya ṭeḥ pluta udattaḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:62578: ṭigrahaṇaṃ vyañjanāntyasya api ṭeracaḥ pluto yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:62582: tatra aśūdraviṣaye yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62594: yāvac ca tasya asūyakatvaṃ na jñāyate tāvad eva pratyabhivādavākyam /
GS24jvkasipu:62595: tasmiṃstvasūyakatvena nirjñāte pratyabhivādaḥ eva na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:62600: abhivādanavākye yat saṅkīrtitaṃ nāma gotraṃ vā,
GS24jvkasipu:62601: tad yatra pratyabhivādavākyānte prayujyate tatra plutiḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62618: dūrād dhūte yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:62625: tathāpi hūtāpekṣaṃ yat tadāśrīyate iti yatra prākṛtāt prayatnād yatnaviśeṣe āśrīyamāṇe śabdaḥ śrūyate tad dūram /
GS24jvkasipu:62627: tena yatra apy āhvānaṃ na asti tatra api plutir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:62630: asyāś ca pluter ekaśrutyā samāveśaḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62633: dūrādāhvāne vākyasyānte yatra sambodhanapadaṃ bhavati tatra ayaṃ plutaḥ iṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:62640: haiheprayoge yad vākyaṃ vartate tatra haihayoḥ eva pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62645: punar haihayor grahaṇam antyayor api yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:62647: guror anṛto 'nantyasya apy ekaikasya prācām // PS_8,2.86 //
GS24jvkasipu:62650: ity evam ādinā yaḥ pluto vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:62653: apiśabdād antyasya api ṭeḥ ekaikasya sambodhane vartamānasya pluto bhavati prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:62668: sarva eva plutaḥ sāhasamanicchatā vibhāṣā kartavyaḥ iti tadupapannaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:62673: tatra yaḥ oṃśabdaḥ tasya pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62676: om ity etad akṣaram udgītham upāsīta //
GS24jvkasipu:62680: ye ity etasya yajñakarmaṇi pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62683: ye yajāmaha iti pañcākṣaram iti svadhyāyakāle mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:62684: ye yajāmahe ity atra+eva ayaṃ plutaḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:62693: pādasya vā ardharcasya vā antyam akṣaram upasaṃgṛhya tadādyakṣaraśeṣasya sthāne trimātramokāram oṅkāraṃ vā vidadhati taṃ praṇava ity ācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:62705: yājyā nāma ye yājyākāṇḍe paṭhyante mantrāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:62706: teṣām antyo yaḥ ṭiḥ sa plavate yajñakarmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:62711: tatra yāvanti vākyāni teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ ṭeḥ plutaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:62717: brūhi preṣya śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ āvaha ity eteṣām ādeḥ pluto bhavati yajñakarmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:62723: āvaha devān yajamānāya ity evam ādāvayaṃ pluto na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:62734: agnīdagnīn vi hara barhiḥ stṛṇāhi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:62735: tadarthaṃ kecid vakṣyamāṇaṃ vibhāṣa ity abhisambadhnanti,
GS24jvkasipu:62737: apara āha - sarva eva plutaḥ sāhasamanicchatā vibhāṣa vijñeyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:62758: tatra nigṛhyānuyoge yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:62760: tam upālipsuḥ upapatibhir nigṛhya sabhyasūyam anuyuṅkte,
GS24jvkasipu:62768: adya amāvāsyā ity evaṃ vādī yuktyā pracyāvya svamatād evam anuyujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:62772: vākyādeḥ āmantritasya iti bhartsane dvirvacanam uktam,
GS24jvkasipu:62786: aṅga ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantam ākāṅkṣaṃ bhartsane plavate /
GS24jvkasipu:62800: tasya viṣaye vicaryamāṇānāṃ vākyānāṃ ṭeḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62810: bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye vicāryamāṇānāṃ pūrvam eva plavate /
GS24jvkasipu:62820: śravaṇābhimukhyaṃ ca tatra aviśeṣāt sarvasya grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:62821: pratiśravaṇe yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62831: abhipūjite ca agama3ḥ pūrvā3n grāmā3n grāmā3n agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u ?
GS24jvkasipu:62832: agnibhūte, paṃṭo ity etayoḥ praśnānte vartamānayoṇ anudāttaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62833: agamaḥ ity evam ādīnāṃ tu anantyasya api praśnākhyānayoḥ (*8,2.105)
GS24jvkasipu:62840: cit ity etasmin nipāte upamārthe prayujyamāne vākyasya ṭeḥ anudāttaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62854: uparisvidāsīt ity etasya ṭeḥ anudattaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62858: upari svidāsīt ity atra tu anena anudāttaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:62862: svaritaḥ pluto bhavati āmreḍite parataḥ asūyāyām,
GS24jvkasipu:62891: eteṣu gamyamāneṣu tiṅantam ākāṅkṣaṇaṃ yat tasya svaritaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62898: pūrvam atra tiṅantam uttarapadam ākāṅkṣati iti sākāṅkṣaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:62899: āśiṣi - sutāṃś ca lapsīṣṭa3 dhanaṃ ca tāta /
GS24jvkasipu:62901: praiṣe - kaṭaṃ kuru3 grāmaṃ ca gaccha /
GS24jvkasipu:62911: anantyasya api antyasyāpi padasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati praśne ākhyāne ca /
GS24jvkasipu:62913: sarveṣam eva padānām eṣa svaritaḥ plutaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:62921: tatra aicaḥ plutaprasaṅge tadavayavabhūtau idutau plutau /
GS24jvkasipu:62927: idutau plavete vṛddhiṃ gacchataḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:62928: tāvatī ca sā plutir bhavati yayā tāvecau trimātrau sampadyete /
GS24jvkasipu:62929: yadā tu ardhamātrā avarṇasya adhyardhamātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:62933: tat katham ? samapravibhāgapakṣe idutor anena trimātraḥ pluto vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:62935: eco 'pragṛhyasya adūrādhdūte pūrvasya ardhasya ad uttarasya+idutau // PS_8,2.107 //
GS24jvkasipu:62937: eco 'pragṛhyasya adūrād dhūte plutaviṣayasya ardhasya akāraḥ ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:62942: praśnānte - agama3ḥ pūrvā3n grāmā3n agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u /
GS24jvkasipu:62943: abhipūjite - bhadraṃ karoṣi māṇavaka3 agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u /
GS24jvkasipu:62944: vicāryamāṇe - hotavyaṃ dīkṣitasya gṛhā3i pratyabhivāde - āyuṣmān edhi agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u /
GS24jvkasipu:62947: so 'yam ākaraḥ pluto yathāviṣayam udātto 'nudāttaḥ svarito veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:62952: parigaṇane ca sati adūrād dhūte iti na vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:62954: iha mā bhūt, bhadraṃ karoṣi gauḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:62962: tayoḥ idutoḥ yakāravakārādeśau bhavato 'ci saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:62964: ita utaram ādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ yad vakṣyāmaḥ saṃhitāyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:62975: iti na prāpnoti ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:62977: evam api svarṇadīrghatvanivṛttyarthaṃ śākalanivṛttyarthaṃ ca vaktvayam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:62982: kiṃ nu yaṇā bhavati iha na siddhaṃ yvāvidutoryadayaṃ vidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:62983: tau ca mama svarasandhiṣu sidddhau śākaladīrghavidhī tu nivartyau //
GS24jvkasipu:62984: ik tu yadā bhavati plutapūrvas tasya yaṇaṃ vidadhātyapavādam /
GS24jvkasipu:62985: tena tayoś ca na śākaladīrghau yaṇsvarabadhanam eva tu hetuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:62986: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:62994: matvantasya vasvantasya ca padasya ruḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati sambuddhau parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:62995: matvantasya tāvat - indra marutva iha pāhi somam /
GS24jvkasipu:62999: suptakārayoḥ halṅyādilope saṃyogāntasya lope ca kṛte nakārasya ruḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63000: vasvantasya khalv api - mīḍhvastokāya tanayāya mṛla /
GS24jvkasipu:63013: chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca bhavat bhagavat aghavat ity eteṣāṃ vibhāṣa ruḥ vaktavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:63021: atha vā bho ity evam ādayo nipātā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63034: ita uttaraṃ yasya sthāne ruḥ vidhīyate tataḥ pūrvasya tu varṇasya vā anunāsiko bhavati ity etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:63041: adhikāraparimāṇāparigrahe hi sati ḍho ḍhe lopa (*8,3.13)
GS24jvkasipu:63042: ity atra api pūrvasya anunāsikaḥ āśaṅkyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:63046: aṭi parato roḥ pūrvasya ākārasya sthāne nityam anunāsikādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63049: tataḥ pūrvasya āto 'nunāsikavikalpe prāpte nityārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:63053: kecid anusvāram adhīyate sa cchāndaso vyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63081: kecit tu paraśabdam eva anyārthaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:63082: anunāsikāt paraḥ anunāsikāt anyaḥ anusvāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63083: yasmin pakṣe 'nunāsiko na asti tatra anusvārāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63089: samaḥ ity etasya ruḥ bhavati suṭi parataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:63099: tena atra nityaṃ sakāra eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63111: pum ity etasya ruḥ bhavati ampare khayi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63117: puṃskāmā ity atra visarjanīyasya kupvoḥ ḥkaḥpau ca (*8,3.37)
GS24jvkasipu:63120: dvisakārakanirdeśapakṣe tu pūrvasmād eva sūtrāt saḥ ity anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:63131: nakārāntasya padasya praśānvarjitasya ruḥ bhavati ampare chavi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63151: nakārāntasya padasya chavi parataḥ ampare ubhayathā ṛkṣu bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:63161: dīrghād uttarasya padāntasya nakārasya ruḥ bhavati aṭi parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:63163: ṛkṣu iti prakṛtatvād ṛkpādaḥ iha gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:63165: devāṃ acchā dīdyat mahāṃ indro ya ojasā /
GS24jvkasipu:63177: nṝn ity etasya nakārasya rurbhavati paśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63183: ubhayathā ity api kecid anuvartayanti nṝn pāhi ity api yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:63187: svatavān ity etasya nakārasya rurbhavati pāyuśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63192: kān ity etasya nakārsya ruḥ bhavati āmreḍite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63198: samaḥ suṭi (*8,3.5) ity ato vā sakāro 'nuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:63200: pūrveṣu yogeṣu sambandhāvṛttyā gatasya roḥ atra anabhisambandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63208: saty api padādhikāre tasya asambhavād apadāntasya ḍhakārasya ayaṃ lopo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:63212: śvaliḍ ḍhau kate ity atra tu jaśve kṛte kāryaṃ na asti iti lopābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63213: na ca ḍhalopo jaśtvāpavādo vijñātuṃ śakyate,
GS24jvkasipu:63216: śāstrakṛtaṃ tu yadā nānantaryaṃ ṣṭutvasya asiddhatvena prāptam,
GS24jvkasipu:63218: śvaliḍ ḍhaukate ity atra tu na śrutikṛtamanantaryam,
GS24jvkasipu:63231: tena apadāntasya api rephasya lopo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:63239: rephāntasya padasya khari parato 'vasāne ca visarjanīyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63250: nṛpater apatyaṃ nārpatyaḥ iti vṛddher bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt tadāśrayasya rephasya asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgam iti asiddhatvād visarjanīyo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:63254: ru ity asya rephasya supi parato visarjanīyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63260: ror eva supi visarjanīyādeśaḥ, na anyasya /
GS24jvkasipu:63265: bhor bhagor aghor ity evaṃ pūrvasya avarṇapūrvasya ca roḥ rephasya yakārādeśo bhavati aśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63283: ity ayaṃ lopaḥ aśi hali yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:63288: atha tatra+eva aśgrahaṇaṃ kasmān na kṛtam ?
GS24jvkasipu:63294: ity etac ca vṛkṣav karoti ity atra mā bhūt ity aśgrahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:63300: vakārayakārayoḥ bhobhagoaghoavarṇapūrvayoḥ padāntayo laghuprayatnatara ādeśo bhavati aśi parataḥ śākaṭāyanasya ācaryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:63319: vakārayakārayoḥ padāntayoḥ avarṇapūrvayoḥ lopo bhavati śākalyasya ācāryasya matena aśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63328: tena yadā 'pi laghuprayatnataro na bhavati ādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:63333: okārād uttarasya yakārasya lopo bhavati gārgyasya ācāryasya matena aśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63340: yo 'yamalaghuprayatnasya vikalpena lopaḥ kriyate so 'nena nivartyate /
GS24jvkasipu:63345: kecit tu sarvam eva yakāram atra na+icchanti //
GS24jvkasipu:63349: avarṇapūrvayoḥ vyoḥ padāntayor lopo bhavati uñi ca pade parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63355: veñaḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte uñiti bhūtapūrveṇa ñakāreṇa śakyate pratipattum iti /
GS24jvkasipu:63356: atha uñ ity evaṃ rūpo nipātaḥ pratipadokto 'sti ?
GS24jvkasipu:63357: tadā lākṣaṇikatvād veñādeśasya grahaṇam iha na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:63362: hali parataḥ bhobhagoaghoapūrvasya yakārasya padāntasya lopo bhavati sarveṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:63370: sarveṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ śākaṭāyanasya api lopo yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:63375: makārasya padāntasya anusvāraḥ ādeśo bhavati hali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63388: nakārāsya makārasya ca apadāntasya anusvārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63402: samo makārasya makāraḥ ādeśo bhavati rājatau kvippratyayānte parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63414: hakāre makārapare parato makārasya vā makāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63420: yavalapare hakāre makārasya yavalā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vā bhavanti iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:63429: nakārapare he parataḥ makārasya vā nakārādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63436: ṅakāraṇakārayoḥ padāntayoḥ kuk ṭuk ity etāv āgamau vā bhavataḥ śari parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63442: pūrvantakaraṇaṃ prāṅk chete ity atra chantvartham /
GS24jvkasipu:63443: śaścho 'ṭi (*8,4.63) iti hi padantāj jhayaḥ iti tad vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:63444: iha mā bhūt, purā krūrasya visṛpo virapśin /
GS24jvkasipu:63445: prāṅk sāyaḥ ity atra api sāt padādyoḥ (*8,3.111)
GS24jvkasipu:63447: vaṇṭ sāyaḥ ity atra ca na padāntāṭ ṭoranām (*8,4.42)
GS24jvkasipu:63453: ḍakārantāt padāt uttarasya sakārādeḥ padasya vā dhuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63463: nakārāntāt padāt uttarasya sakārasya vā dhuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63472: nakārasya padantasya śakāre parato vā tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63475: yady evaṃ kurvajcchete ity atra nakārasya apadāntatvāt ṇatvaṃ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:63479: ṇatvapratiṣedhārthaṃ stoḥ ścunā ṇakāro na bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:63482: ṅamo hrasvād aci ṅamuṇ nityam // PS_8,3.32 //
GS24jvkasipu:63484: hrasvāt paraḥ yo ṅam tadantāt padāt uttarasya acaḥ ṅamuḍāgamo bhavati nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:63498: paramadaṇdinā iti uttarapadatve cāpadādividhau iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhād uttarapadasya padatvaṃ na asti iti ṅamuṭ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63500: ity ataḥ saptamyantaṃ pade ity anuvarvate /
GS24jvkasipu:63505: maya uttarasya uño vā vakārādeśo bhavati aci parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63512: pragṛhyatvāt uñaḥ prakṛtibhāve prāpte vakāro vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:63513: tasya asiddhatvād hali iti mo 'nusvāraḥ (*8,3.23) na bhavati // [#945]
GS24jvkasipu:63519: visarjanīyasya sakāraḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati khari parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63535: śarpare khari parato visarjanīyasya visarjanīyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63542: na iti vaktavye visarjanīyasya visarjanīyādeśavidhānaṃ vikāranivṛttyartham,
GS24jvkasipu:63547: visarjanīyasya visarjanīyādeśo vā bhavati śari pare /
GS24jvkasipu:63563: kavargapavargayoḥ parato visarjanīyasya yathāsaṅkhyam ḥkaḥpa ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:63576: ity etasminnāprāpte idam ārabhyate iti etasya bādhakam,
GS24jvkasipu:63581: pūrvatrāsiddhe nāsti vipratiṣedho 'bhāvād uttarasya iti śarpare visarjanīyaḥ (*8,3.35)
GS24jvkasipu:63583: kecit tu etad arthaṃ yogavibhāgaṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:63584: kupvoḥ śarparayoḥ visarjanīyasya visarjanīyaḥ ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:63592: sakāra ādeśaḥ bhavati visarjanīyasya kupvoḥ apadādyoḥ parataḥ pāśakalpakakāmyeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:63608: ror eva kāmye na anyasya iti niyamārthaṃ vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:63613: upadhmānīyasya kavarge parataḥ sakārādeśo bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:63621: iṇaḥ uttarasya visarjanīyasya ṣakārādeśo bhavati kupvor apadādyoḥ parataḥ pāśakalpakakāmyeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:63639: tatra iṇaḥ paro yo visarjanīyaḥ tasya ṣakāro bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:63644: namas puras ity etayoḥ gatisañjñakayoḥ visarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63654: ikāropadhasya ukāropadhasya ca apratyayasya visarjanīyasya ṣakāra ādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63676: iti sakāralope kṛte rephasya yo visarjanīyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:63678: kaskādiṣu tu mrātuṣputragrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam ekādeśanimittatvāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya /
GS24jvkasipu:63692: tirasaḥ visarjanīyasya anyatarasyāṃ sakārādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63704: dvis tris catur ity eteṣāṃ kṛtvo 'rthe vartamanānāṃ visarjanīyasya ṣakāra ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyāṃ kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63721: idudupadhasya ity etasya anuvṛttau satyāṃ krtvo 'rthaviṣayeṇa ca padena visarjanīye viśeṣyamāṇe dvistriścatur iti śakyamakartum /
GS24jvkasipu:63723: ṣatvaṃ vibhāṣayā bhūnnanu siddhaṃ tatra pūrveṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:63724: siddhe hy ayaṃ vidhatte caturaḥ satvaṃ yadāpi kṛtvo 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:63727: evaṃ sati tvidānīṃ dvistriścatur ity anena kiṃ kāryam / [#947]
GS24jvkasipu:63729: anyo hi nedudupadhaḥ kṛtvo 'rthaḥ kaścid apy asti //
GS24jvkasipu:63731: caturo na sidhyati tadā rephasya visarjanīyo hi //
GS24jvkasipu:63732: tasmiṃs tu kriyamāṇe yuktaṃ caturo viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63733: prakṛtaṃ padaṃ tadantaṃ tasya api viśeṣaṇaṃ nyāyyam //
GS24jvkasipu:63734: evaṃ tu kriyamāṇe dvistriścaturgrahaṇe catuḥśabdasya kṛtvo 'rthe 'pi vartamanasya pūrveṇa+eva nityaṃ ṣatvaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:63735: pūrvatra siddhe na asti vipratiṣedho 'bhāvād uttarasya // [#948]
GS24jvkasipu:63741: is us ity etayoḥ visarjanīyasya anyatarasyāṃ ṣakārādeśo bhavati sāmarthye kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63754: samāsaviṣaye isusoḥ visarjanīyasua anuttarapadasthasya nityaṃ ṣtvaṃ bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63763: etad eva anuttarapadasthasya iti vacanaṃ jñāpakam isusoḥ pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt sa vihitaḥ tadādeḥ ity ayaṃ niyamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63768: vyapekṣā ca tatra sāmarthyamāśritam iti samāse na bhavati // [#949]
GS24jvkasipu:63773: akārād uttarasya anavyayavisarjanīyasya samāse anuttarapadasthasya nityaṃ sakārādeśo bhavati kṛ kami kaṃsa kumbha pātra kuśā karṇī ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63784: prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:63792: śunaskarṇaḥ ity ayaṃ tu kaskādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63797: bhāskaraḥ ity ayaṃ tu kaskādiṣu draṣtavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63810: adhas śiras ity etayoḥ visarjanīyasya samāse anuttarapadasthasya sakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati padaśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63823: kaska ity evam ādisu ca visarjanīyasya sakāraḥ vā yathāyogamādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63837: yajuṣpātram ity eṣāṃ pāṭhaḥ uttarapadasthasya api ṣatvaṃ yathā syād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:63838: paramasrpiḥphalam ity evam ādi pratyudāharaṇāt iti pārāyaṇikā āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63840: ity atra praramasarpiḥkuṇdikā ity etad eva pratyudāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:63848: chandasi viṣaye visarjanīyasya vā sakārādeśoḥ bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:63860: sa naḥ pāvaka ity evam ādiṣu sarve viṣayaśchandasi vikalpyante iti satvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:63864: kaḥ karat karati kṛdhi kṛta ity eteṣu parataḥ anaditeḥ visarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:63874: pañcamīvisarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati parau parataḥ adhyarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:63882: ebhyo vā etal lokebhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ samairayat /
GS24jvkasipu:63890: pātau ca dhātau parataḥ pañcamīvisarjanīyasya bahulaṃ sakārādeśaḥ bhavati chandasi visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:63898: ṣaṣthīvisarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati pati putra pṛṣṭha pāra pada payas poṣa ity eteṣu parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:63912: iḍāyāḥ ṣaṣthīvisarjanīyasya vā sakāra ādeśo bhavati patyādiṣu parataḥ chandasi viṣaye / [#950]
GS24jvkasipu:63934: mūrdhanyaḥ iti caitad adhikṛtam veditavyam āpādaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:63943: ṣaḥ ity evaṃ siddhe mūrdhanyagrahaṇaṃ ḍhakārārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:63949: saher dhātoḥ sāḍrūpasya yaḥ sakāraḥ tasya mūrdhanyaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63957: yatrāsya etad rūpaṃ tatra yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:63960: saḥ iti kim ? ākārasya mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:63966: iṇaḥ kavargāc ca ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:63983: nuṃvyavāye 'pi visarjanīyavyavāye 'pi śarvyavāye 'pi uttarasya sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:63998: ṇisi cumbane ity etasya etad rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:64005: mūrdhanyaḥ iti vartate, sa iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:64008: pratyayasya ca yaḥ sakāraḥ iṇkor uttaraḥ tasya mūrdhanyo bhavati ādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:64016: sa devān yakṣat iti vyapadeśivadbhāvāt pratyayasya iti ṣatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64017: yajater vahateś ca pañcamalakāre parasmaipadaprathamaikavacane ikāralopaḥ, leṭo 'ḍaṭau (*3,4.94)
GS24jvkasipu:64019: iti sip, tataḥ siddhaṃ yakṣat, vakṣat iti //
GS24jvkasipu:64023: śāsi vasi ghasi ity eteṣāṃ ca iṇkoḥ uttarasya yakārasya mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64044: stauteḥ ṇyantānāṃ ca ṣabhūte sani parataḥ abhyāsāt iṇaḥ uttarasya ādeśasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64050: stautiṇyoḥ eva ṣaṇi abhyāsād yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:64055: stautiṇyoḥ ṣaṇi eva iti hi vijñāyamāne tuṣṭāva ity atra na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:64056: iha ca syād eva sisikṣati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:64066: abhyāsāt yā prāptiḥ tasyā niyamo yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:64067: dhātoḥ yā prāptis tasyā niyamo mā bhūt,
GS24jvkasipu:64074: svidi svadi sahi ity eteṣāṃ ṇyantānāṃ sani ṣabhūte parato 'bhyāsād uttarasya sakārasya sakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64083: prāk sitasaṃśabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ tatra aḍvyavāye 'pi mūrdhanyo bhavati ity evaṃ tad veditavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:64098: upasargāt sunoti ity atra sthāsenayasedha iti sthādayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:64099: tesu sthādiṣu prāk sitasaṃśabdanāt abhyāsena vyavāye mūrdhanyo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:64100: abhyāsasakārasya ca bhavati ity evaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:64108: sthādiṣu eva abhyāsasakārasy mūrdhanyo bhavati, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:64114: mūrdhanya iti vartate, saḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:64115: upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya sunoti suvati syati stauti stobhati sthā senaya sedha sica sañja svañja ity eteṣāṃ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64175: nirgatāḥ secakā usmasad deśāt niḥsecako deśaḥ iti nāyaṃ siceḥ upsargaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:64176: abhisāvakoyati ity atra api na sunotiṃ prati kiryāyogaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ?
GS24jvkasipu:64178: abhiṣāvayati ity atra tu sunotimeva prati kriyāyogaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:64179: na sāvaryatiṃ prati iti ṣatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:64183: sadeḥ sakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt aprateḥ uttarasya mūrdhanya ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64196: stanbheḥ sakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya mūrdhanya murdhanya ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64203: aprateḥ ity etad iha na anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:64211: avaśabdāt upasargāt uttarasya stanbheḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyaḥ ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:64226: veḥ upasargāt avāt ca+uttarasya bhojanārthe svanateḥ sakāsya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64241: pari ni vi ity etebhyāḥ upasargebhyaḥ uttareṣām seva sita saya sivu saha suṭ stu svañja ity eteṣām sakārasya mūrdhanya ādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64299: sivādīnām aḍvyavāye 'pi parinivibhyaḥ uttarasya sakārasya vā mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64304: anu vi pari abhi ni ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya syandateḥ aprāṇiṣu sakārasya vā mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64317: prāṇyaprāṇiviṣayasya api syandateḥ ayam vikalpo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:64326: veḥ upasargād uttarasya skandeḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyo vā bhavati aniṣṭhāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:64335: pariśabdād uttarasya skandeḥ sakārasya vā mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64342: pṛthagyogakaraṇasāmarthyāt aniṣthāyām ity etan na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:64348: pariskandaḥ iti mūrdhanyābhāvo nipātyate prācyabharateṣu prayogaviṣayeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:64349: pūrvena mūrdhanye prāpte tad abhavo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:64358: sphuratisphulatyoḥ sakārasya nis ni vi ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya vā mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64374: veḥ uttarasya skabhnāteḥ sakārasya nityaṃ mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64383: iṇantād aṅgāt uttareṣāṃ ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāṃ yo dhakāraḥ tasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64403: iṇaḥ parasmāt iṭa uttareṣāṃ ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāṃ yo dhakāraḥ tasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:64416: kecidāhuḥ, iṇantād aṅgād uttarasya iṭa ānantaryaṃ yuṭā vyavahitam iti na bhavitavyaṃ ḍhatvena iti /
GS24jvkasipu:64420: tataś ca yakārād eva inaḥ paro 'nantaraḥ iṭ iti pakṣe bhavitavyaṃ mūrdhanyena iti //
GS24jvkasipu:64424: saṅgasakārasya aṅguleḥ uttarasya mūrdhanya ādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:64440: agneḥ uttarasya stut stoma soma ity eteṣāṃ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:64455: jyotis āyus ity etābhyām uttarasy stomasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:64463: mātṛ pitṛ ity etābhyām uttarasya svasṛsakārasya samāse mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64470: mātur pitur ity etābhyām uttarasya svasṛśabdasya anyatarasyāṃ mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:64475: mātuḥ pituḥ iti rephāntayor etad grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:64476: ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvād visarjanīyāntā sakārāntāt ca ṣatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64479: mātuḥ svasā ity eva nityaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:64483: abhinis ity etasmāt uttarasya stanatisakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati anyatarasyāṃ śabdasañjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:64494: upasargasthān nimittāt prādusśabdāc ca+uttarasya yakāraparasya acparasya ca astisakārasya mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64507: atha asatyapi astigrahaṇe sakāram eva prati upasarga āśrīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:64508: prāduḥśabdasya ca kṛbhvastiṣv eva prayogaḥ iti anyatrāprasaṅgaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:64521: su vi nir dur ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya supi sūti sama ity eteṣāṃ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64536: supeḥ ṣatvaṃ svapermā bhūd visuṣvāpeti kena na /
GS24jvkasipu:64538: sthādīnāṃ niyamo nātra prāk sitāduttaraḥ supiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:64540: pūrvatrāsiddhīyamadvirvacane iti kṛte ṣtve tato dvirvacanam // [#959]
GS24jvkasipu:64545: ni nadī ity etābhyām uttarasya snātisakārasya mūrdhnyādeśo bhavati kauśale gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:64549: supi sthaḥ (*3,2.4) ity atra supi iti yogavibhāgāt kapratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:64555: pratiṣṇātam iti nipātyate sūtraṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64563: kapiṣṭhalaḥ nāma yasya saḥ kāpiṣṭhaliḥ putraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:64578: viṣṭaraḥ iti nipātyate vṛkṣe āsane ca vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:64588: vipūrvāt stṛ ity etasmād dhātoḥ chandonāmni ca (*3,3.34)
GS24jvkasipu:64589: ity evaṃ vihito ghañ iti viṣṭaraḥ ity api prakṛte viṣṭāraḥ iti vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:64601: gośabdād ahalantād api etasmād eva nipātanāt saptamyā alug bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:64605: vi ku śami pari ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya sthalasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64613: amba āmba go bhūmi savya apa dvi tri ku śeku śaṅku aṅgu mañji puñji parame barhis divi agni ity etebhaḥ uttarasya sthaśabdasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64640: śobhanaṃ sāma yasya asau suṣāmā brāhmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:64645: suśabdasya karmapravacanīyasañjñākatvān nirdurśabdayoś ca kriyāntaraviṣayatvād anupasargatve sati pāṭho 'yam /
GS24jvkasipu:64663: ekāraparasya sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśaḥ bhavati iṇkor uttarasya agakārāt parasya sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:64669: pṛthvī senā yasya sa pṛthuseno rājā /
GS24jvkasipu:64676: nakṣatravācinaḥ śabdād uttarasya sakārasya vā eti sañjñāyām agakārāt mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64687: hrasvād uttarasya sakārasya mūrdhanyādeeśo bhavati tādau taddhite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:64688: tarap tamap taya tva tal tyap,
GS24jvkasipu:64706: iti saty api pratiṣedhe prakṛtisakārasya syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:64715: nisaḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati tapatau parato 'nāsevane 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:64722: niṣṭaptaṃ rakṣo niṣṭaptā arātayaḥ ity atra sadapyāsevanaṃ na vivakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:64727: yuṣmat tat tatakṣus ity eteṣu takārādiṣu parataḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:64742: yajuṣi viṣaye yuṣmattattatakṣuḥṣu parata ekeṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64754: stuta stoma ity etayoḥ sakārasya chandasi viṣaye mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati ekeṣāmācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:64759: pūrvapadāt ity eva siddhe prapañcārtham idam //
GS24jvkasipu:64765: pūrvapadasthānnimittāt parasya sakārasya murdhanyādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye ekeṣāmācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:64774: asamāse 'pi yat pūrvapadaṃ tadapi iha gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:64781: tasya pūrvapadasthānnimittāt uttarasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:64791: gosaniṃ vācamudeyam pūrvapadāt ity eva siddhe niyamārtham idam /
GS24jvkasipu:64792: atra kecit savanādipāṭhād gosanirniyamasya phalaṃ na bhavati iti sisānayiṣati iti prayudāharanti /
GS24jvkasipu:64798: pṛtanā ṛta ity etābhyām uttarasya sahisakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64802: ṛtīṣaham ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:64804: avagrahe tu ṛtisaham ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64811: rephaparasya sakārasya sṛpi sṛji spṛśi spṛhi savanādīnāṃ ca mūrdhanyo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64814: spṛpi - purā krūrasya visṛpaḥ sṛji - vāco visarjanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:64826: aśvasanigrahaṇam aniṇo 'pi ṣatvam asti iti jñāpanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:64844: sāt ity etasya padādeś ca mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64856: sicaḥ sakārasya yagi parato mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64859: upasargāt iti yā prāptiḥ sā padādilakṣaṇam eva pratiṣedhaṃ bādhate,
GS24jvkasipu:64867: gatau vartamānasya sedhateḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64876: pratistabdha nistabdha ity etau mūrdhanyapratiṣedhāya nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:64893: stambhu sivu saha ity eteṣāṃ caṅi parataḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64895: parinivibhyaḥ iti ca prāptaḥ mūrdhanyaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:64903: upasargādyā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ eva pratiṣedho yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:64904: abhyāsādyā prāptiḥ tasyā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:64909: sunoteḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyadeśo na bhavati sye sani ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:64923: idaṃ tarhi, abhisusūṣateḥ apratyayaḥ abhisusūḥ ity udāharanam iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:64924: atra hi sanṣabhūto na bhavati ity abhyāsāt prāptir asti /
GS24jvkasipu:64929: sadi ṣvañja ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ liṭi parataḥ sakārasya parasya mūrdhanyaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:64938: svañjeḥ saṃyogāntād api vibhāṣā liṭaḥ kittvam icchanti iti pakṣe 'nuṣaṅgalopaḥ // [#965]
GS24jvkasipu:64943: ni vi abhi ity etebhyaḥ upasargebhyaḥ uttarasya sakārasya aḍvyavāye chandasi viṣaye mūrdahnyādeśo na bhavati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:64948: sadiṣvañjor iti tad iha na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:64952: abhyastaut ity etad api siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:64953: iti vāmanakāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:64979: avarnabhaktyā ca vyavadhāne 'pi ṇatvaṃ bhavati iti kṣubhnādiṣu nṛnamanatṛpnotigrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:64980: athavā ṛvarṇād api ṇatvaṃ bhavati iti etad eva anena jñāpyate //
GS24jvkasipu:64984: aṭ ku pu āṅ num ity etair vyavāye 'pi rephaṣākārabhyām uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65001: aḍvyavāye iti siddhe āṅgrahaṇaṃ padavyavāye ity asya pratiṣedhasya bādhanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:65006: tṛṃhaṇīyam ity atra anusvāravyavāye numabhāve 'pi ṇatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65007: saty api ca numi yatra anusvāro na śrūyate tatra na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:65010: vyavāyopalakṣaṇārthatvād aḍādīnām iha vyastaiḥ samastair vyavāye 'pi ṇatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:65014: pūrvapadasthān nimittād uttarasya gakāravarjitād nakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:65023: pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām eva ṇatvaṃ na anyatra iti / [#967]
GS24jvkasipu:65025: samāse 'pi hi samānapade nimittanimittinor bhāvād asti pūrveṇa prāptiḥ iti sa ca niyamaḥ pūrvapadasambadhād uttarapadasthasya+eva ṇatvaṃ nivartayati,
GS24jvkasipu:65033: apare tu pūrvasūtre samānam eva yan nityaṃ padaṃ tat samānapadam ity āśrayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:65035: teṣām aprāptam eva ṇatvam anena nidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:65036: samāse hi pūrvapadottaravibhāgād asamānapadatvam apy asti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:65041: puragā miśraka sighrakā śārikā koṭarā agre ity etebhyaḥ pūrvapadebhyaḥ uttarasya vananakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:65049: etebhya eva parasya vananakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:65057: pra nir antar śara ikṣu plakṣa āmra kārṣya khadira pīyūkṣā ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya vananakārasya sañjñāyām asañjñāyām api ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65072: oṣadhivāci yat pūrvapadaṃ vanaspativāci ca tatsthān nimittād uttarasya vananakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:65089: satyapi bhede vṛkṣavanaspatyor iha bhedena grahaṇaṃ draṣtavyam // [#968]
GS24jvkasipu:65094: adantaṃ yat pūrvapadaṃ tatsthān nimittād uttarasya ahno nakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65101: ahnaḥ ity akārāntagrahaṇād dīrghāhnī śarad ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:65105: āhitavāci yat pūrvapadaṃ tatsthān nimittād uttarasy avāhananakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65109: vāhane yad āropitam uhyate tad āhitam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:65116: pānanakārasya pūrvapadasthān nimittād uttarasya deśābhidhāne ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65120: kṣīraṃ pānaṃ yeṣāṃ te kṣīrapāṇā uśīnarāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:65130: bhāve karaṇe ca yaḥ pānaśabdaḥ tadīyasya nakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati vā pūrvapadasthānimittād uttarasya /
GS24jvkasipu:65147: prātipadikānte numi vibhaktau ca yo nakāraḥ tasya pūrvapadasthānnimittād uttarasy vā ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65158: pūrvapadādhikārād uttarapadasya prātipadikastho yo 'ntyo nakāraḥ tasya+idaṃ ṇatvam iṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:65167: māṣavāpinī ity atra tu gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prākṣubutpatteḥ iti kṛdantena+eva samāse sati prātipadikasya uttarapadasya+eva sato nakāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65169: sa hi samudāyabhaktatvād uttarapadasya anto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65179: tasminn ekājuttarapadasamāse prātipadikāntanuṃvibhaktisu pūrvapadasthānnimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65186: ṇaḥ iti vartamāne punarṇagrahaṇaṃ vikalpādhikāranivṛtteḥ vispaṣṭīkaraṇārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:65190: kavargavati ca+uttarapade prātipadikāntanuṃvibhaktiṣu pūrvapadasthānnimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65203: ṇopadeśasya dhātor yo nakāraḥ tasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati asamāse 'pi samāse 'pi /
GS24jvkasipu:65209: pragatā nāyakāḥ asmād deśāt pranāyako deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:65211: pūrvapadādhikārāt samāsa eva syāt iti tadadhikāraṇivṛttidyotanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:65218: hinu mīnā ity etayoḥ upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65229: āni ity etasya loḍādeśasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakāradeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65238_0: ni ity etasya upasargasthānnimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati gada nada
GS24jvkasipu:65238_1: pata pada ghu mā syāti hanti yāti vāti drāti psāti vapati vahati śāmyati cinoti degdhi ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:65286: akakārādirakhakārādiraṣakārāntaḥ ca upadeśe yo dhātuḥ sa śeṣaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:65287: tasmin parataḥ upasargasthānnimittāt uttarasya neḥ nakārasya vibhāṣa ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65308: aniteḥ nakārasya upasargasthānnimittād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65316: upasargasthānnimittāt uttarasya anitinakārasya padānte vartamānasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65321: kecit tu pūrvasūtre eva etad antagrahaṇaṃ sāmīpyārtham abhisambadhnanti /
GS24jvkasipu:65322: nimittasamīpasthaikavarṇavyavahitasya anitinakārasya padānte vartamānasya ṇakārādeśo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:65324: tair dvitīyam api padāntasya ṇatvārtham antagrahaṇam āśrayitavyam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:65325: yeṣāṃ tu paryaṇiti iti bhavitavyam iti darśanam,
GS24jvkasipu:65330: sābhyāsasya aniteḥ upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya ubhayoḥ nakārayoḥ ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65335: pūrvatrāsiddhīyam advirvacane ity etasmin sati pūrveṇa+eva kṛtaṇatvasya dvirvacane kṛte siddham etad antareṇa api vacanam ?
GS24jvkasipu:65336: etat tu nāśrayitavyam iti sūtram idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:65341: akārapūrvasya hantinakārasya upasargasthāt nimittād uttarasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65356: vakāramakārāyoḥ parataḥ hantinakārasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya vā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65366: antaḥśabdād uttarasya hantinakārasya atpūrvasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati adeśābhidhāne /
GS24jvkasipu:65380: ayananakārasya ca antaḥśabdād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati adeśābhidhāne /
GS24jvkasipu:65389: ṛkārāntād avagrahāt pūrvapadād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:65395: yāvatā saṃhitādhikāra ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ ity uktam ?
GS24jvkasipu:65403: nas ity etasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati dhātusthān nimittād uttarasya uruśabdāt ṣuśabdāc ca chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:65413: upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya naso nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:65425: kṛtsthaḥ yo nakāraḥ acaḥ uttaraḥ tasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65458: ṇyantād yo vihitaḥ kṛtpratyayaḥ tatsthasya nakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya vibhāṣā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65472: prayapyamāṇam ity atra yakā vyavadhāne 'pi yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:65477: halādiḥ yo dhāturijupadhaḥ tasmāt paro yaḥ kṛtpratyayaḥ tatsthastha nakārasya aca uttarasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya vibhāṣā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65496: ijādeḥ sanumaḥ halantād dhātoḥ vihito yaḥ kṛt,
GS24jvkasipu:65497: tatsthasay nakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya ṇakāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65509: halaḥ ity adhikārād ṇyante nityaṃ vidhyartham etan na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:65514: niṃsa nikṣa ninada ity eteṣāṃ nakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya vā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65525: bhā bhū pū kami gami payāyī vepa ity eteṣām upasargasthāt nimittād uttarasya kṛtsthasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65550: ṣakārāt padantād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65588: padena vyavāye 'pi sati nimittanittinoḥ nakārasya nakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65599: svādau pūrvaṃ padam iti gośabdaḥ pūrvapadam tena vyavāyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:65604: kṣubhnā ity evam ādiṣu śabdeṣu nakārasya ṇakāradeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65606: ajādeśasya sthānivadbhāvād iha api pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65628: parigahanam iti sañjñāyām pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām iti prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:65629: parinandanam ity atra upasargād asamāse 'pi iti prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:65648: sakāratavargayoḥ śakāracavargābhyāṃ sannipāte śakāracavargāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:65649: stoḥ ścunā iti yathāsaṅkhyam atra neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:65682: stoḥ ścau iti saptamīnirdeśo na kṛtaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:65683: pūrveṇa pareṇa ca ścunā sannipāte ścutvaṃ yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:65688: sakāratavargayoḥ ṣakāraṭvargābhyāṃ sannipāte ṣakāraṭavargāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:65717: padāntāṭ ṭavargād uttarasya stoḥ ṣṭutvaṃ na bhavati nām ity etad varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:65734: tavargasya ṣakāre yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65742: śakārād uttarasya tavargasya yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65749: yaraḥ padāntasya anunāsike parataḥ vā anunāsikaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65767: aca uttarau yau rephahakārau tābhyām uttarasya yaro dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:65779: anacparasya aca uttarasya yaro dve vā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:65784: yaṇo mayo dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:65793: śaraḥ khayo dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:65794: atra api yadi śaraḥ iti pañcamī,
GS24jvkasipu:65798: athavā khaya uttarasya śaro dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:65803: avasāne ca yaro dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:65811: ādini parataḥ ākrośe gamyamāne putraśabdasya na dva bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:65825: cayo dvitīyā bhavanti śari parataḥ pauṣkarasāder ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:65845: triprabhṛtiṣu varṇeṣu saṃyukteṣu śākaṭāyanasya matena dvitvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65854: śākalyasya ācaryasya matena sarvatra dvirvacanaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65862: dīrghād uttarasya ācāryāṇāṃ matena na dvitvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65870: jhalāṃ sthāne jaśādeśo bhavati jhaśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:65909: khari ca parato jhalāṃ carādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65922: avasāne vartamānānāṃ jhalāṃ vā carādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65930: aṇaḥ apragṛhyasañjñasya avasāne vartamānasya vā anunāsikādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65941: anusvārasya yayi parataḥ prasvarṇaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65958: vṛṣanti ity atra ṇatvasya asiddhatvāt pūrvaṃ nakārasya anusvāraḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:65959: tasya api parasavarṇena punar nakāra eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65960: tasya api asiddhatvāt punar ṇatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65968: padāntasya anusvārasya yayi parataḥ vā parasavarṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:65970: taṃ kathaṃ citrapakṣaṃ ḍayamānaṃ nabhaḥsthaṃ puruṣo 'vadhīt //
GS24jvkasipu:65984: udaḥ uttarayoḥ sthā stambha ity etayoḥ pūrvasavarṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:66018: jhaya uttarasya śakārasya aṭi parataḥ chakarādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:66036: hala uttareṣāṃ yamāṃ yami parato lopo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:66041: aditer apatyamādityyaḥ ity atra takārāt paraḥ ekaḥ yakāraḥ, [#981]
GS24jvkasipu:66046: ādityo devatā asya sthālīpākasya iti ādityyaḥ ity atra api dvau yakārau kramajastṛtīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:66047: tatra madhyamasya madhyamayor vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:66057: hala uttarasya jharo jhari savarṇe parato lopo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:66060: tatra madhyamasya madhyamayor vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:66061: maruttttaḥ ity atra catvārastakārāḥ kramajaḥ pañcamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:66062: tatra madhyamasya madhyamayoḥ madhyamānāṃ vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:66068: allopasya ca pūrvatra asiddhe na sthānivat iti sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhāt cakārasya ñakāre lopaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:66075: piṇḍhi iti ḍhakāre ḍakārasya lopo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:66084: asya svaritasya asiddhatvāt anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158)
GS24jvkasipu:66090: udattodayasya svaritodayasya ca anudāttasya svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:66099: tasminnudātte parato gārgyaśabdaḥ svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:66103: tasmin parataḥ anudāttaḥ svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:66107: teṣāṃ hi matena svarito bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:66121: tasya tathābhūtasya eva prayogo mā bhūt iti saṃvṛtapratyāpattir iyaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:66122: dīrghaplutayoś ca anena vivṛtena akāreṇa grahaṇaṃ neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:66124: saṃvutena ca sarvaguṇasya mātrikasya grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:66128: iti śrīvāmanakāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamādhyāyasya turīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaścāyamadhyāyo granthaśca //
